40001001	Ɗe'e ngoni inɗe maama'en Yeesu Almasiihu lenyol Dawda, Dawda lenyol Ibraahim.
40001002	Ibraahim danyi Iciyaaku, nden Iciyaaku danyi Yaakubu, nden Yaakubu danyi Yahuuda e sakiraaɓe maako,
40001003	Yahuuda danyi Feresa e Jeera, maduujo Jeera woni Taamar, Feresa danyi Heseruuna, Heseruuna danyi Aram,
40001004	Aram danyi Amiinadab, Amiinadab danyi Naacon, Naacon danyi Salmon,
40001005	Salmon danyi Bo'aaja, maduujo Bo'aaja woni Rahab, Bo'aaja danyi Obida, maduujo Obida woni Rut, Obida danyi Jeesi,
40001006	Jeesi danyi Dawda Laamiiɗo, Dawda Laamiiɗo danyi Suleymaanu, maduujo Suleymaanu woni debbo Uriya ndenno,
40001007	Suleymaanu danyi Rehobowam, Rehobowam danyi Abija, Abija danyi Aasa,
40001008	Aasa danyi Jehoocafat, Jehoocafat danyi Jooram, Jooram danyi Ajaariya,
40001009	Ajaariya danyi Jootama, Jootama danyi Ahas, Ahas danyi Hejekaaya,
40001010	Hejekaaya danyi Manaase, Manaase danyi Amon, Amon danyi Joosaya,
40001011	Joosaya danyi Jekooniya e sakiraaɓe maako worɓe, carel ko Yahuudanko'en nangaa njaaraa leydi Baabiila.
40001012	Gaɗa ɗum yaariiɓe leydi Baabiila, Jekooniya danyi Ceyaltiyal, Ceyaltiyal danyi Jaruubabel,
40001013	Jaruubabel danyi Abiihudu, Abiihudu danyi Eliyaakim, Eliyaakim danyi Aajoro,
40001014	Aajoro danyi Jaadok, Jaadok danyi Aakim, Aakim danyi Aliiyudu,
40001015	Aliiyudu danyi Eleyaajar, Eleyaajar danyi Mataana, Mataana danyi Yaakubu,
40001016	Yaakubu danyi Yusufu gorko Maryaama, Maryaama danyi Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu.
40001017	E woodi maama'en sappo e nayo daga jaamanu Ibraahim yaaki jaamanu Dawda. E woodi maama'en sappo e nayo daga jaamanu Dawda yaaki carel ngel Yahuudanko'en njaaraa maccungaaku to leydi Baabiila. E woodi maama'en sappo e nayo daga carel ngel Yahuudanko'en njaaraa maccungaaku to leydi Baabiila yaaki danyngol Almasiihu.
40001018	Raa no Yeesu Almasiihu danyiraa. Maduujo maako Maryaama waadi alkawal teegal e Yusufu. Ammaa ko ɓe ngaɗa teegal, sey o tawraa reedu daga to Ruuhu Allah.
40001019	Nde Yusufu o neɗɗo aadiliijo, o yiɗaa o semtinamo e njayri. O darwi o yoofamo e suuɗe.
40001020	Ammaa carel ngel o nyumata dow maajum, malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wanganimo nder koyɗol, wi'imo, “Yusufu ɓii Dawda, taa' hulu te'uki Maryaama, ngam ɓingel ngel o saawi daga to Ruuhu Allah ngel ƴiwoyi.
40001021	O danyay ɓiɗɗo gorko nden a noddaymo Yeesu, ngam o hisnay yimɓe maako daga hakke maɓɓe.”
40001022	Fuu fii ɗu'um ɗum waɗi ngam ɗum hebbina ko Joomiraawo wi'i daga honduko annabiijo, o wi'i,
40001023	“Raɗɗum, surbaajo mo andaa gorko danyay ɓiɗɗo gorko, nden ɗum nodday inde maako Imaanuwel.” Ma'ana Imaanuwel woni, “Allah e wondi e meeɗen.”
40001024	Nde Yusufu ummii daga ɗeyngol ngol, sey waɗi ko malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo on wi'imo, o te'i Maryaama.
40001025	Ammaa o andaamo naaki gaɗa o danyi ɓiɗɗo maako. Nden Yusufu noddi ɓiɗɗo on Yeesu.
40002001	Gaɗa Yeesu danyaama e gariiri Baytalaami nder leydi Yahuudiya, nder carel ngel Hirudus laamoto, woɓɓe andanɓe koode daga fuuna ɓe ngari Urucaliima,
40002002	e ɓe ƴama, “Toye on ɗon danyaaɗo laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en? Ngam min ngi'i hoodere maako daga fuuna, min ngarii min mawninamo.”
40002003	Nde Hirudus laamiiɗo nani non, o wanni, kanko e yimɓe Urucaliima ɗuɗɓe.
40002004	Sey o noddi mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra, o ƴamiɓe, “Toye Almasiihu danyetee?”
40002005	Ɓe mbi'imo, “Nder gariiri Baytalaami nder leydi Yahuudiya. Ngam raa ko annabiijo windi,
40002006	‘Ammaa, an, gariyel Baytalaami gongel nder leydi Yahuuda, an a gariyel goodungel teddungal nder leydi ndin, ngam daga nder maaɗa goɗɗo laamiiɗo ƴiwoyta, kanko wartata gaynaako yimɓe am Israa'iilanko'en.’ ”
40002007	Sey Hirudus noddi ɓen ɗon andanɓe koode e suuɗe, o ƴamiɓe carel ngel ɓe ngi'i hoodere nden, ɓe mbi'imoka.
40002008	Sey o liliɓe Baytalaami, o wi'i, “Njahee ɗaɓɓiton ɓingel ngel boɗɗum. To on ngi'iingel, ngaron mbi'onyamka, ngam min maa mi yaha mi mawninangel.”
40002009	-
40002010	Nde ɓe nani ko laamiiɗo on wi'i, sey ɓe nangi laawol. Nde ɓe ngi'i hoodere nden, ɓe nani belɗum naa' seɗɗa. Hoodere nden ardiiɓe naaki nde dari dow to ɓingel ngel woni.
40002011	Nde ɓe natti wuro ngon, ɓe tawi ɓingel ngel e Maryaama maduujo maagel. Ɓe ndicci ɓe mawniningel, nden ɓe pitti doŋle maɓɓe ɓe kokkingel caahu jiinaari, e urde welnde bi'eteende firankisen, e nebbam uroojam bi'eteeɗam mur.
40002012	Nde Allah haɗiiɓe nder koyɗol to' ɓe co''oo to Hirudus, sey ɓe tokki laawol feere ɓe co''i leydi maɓɓe.
40002013	Gaɗa andanɓe koode ɓen ndilli, sey malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wangani Yusufu nder koyɗol, wi'imo, “Umma koccaa ɓingel ngel e maduujo maagel ndoggaa njahaa leydi Masar. Njooɗee ton naa mi wi'ii'on ngarton, ngam Hirudus e yiɗi ɗaɓɓita ɓingel ngel ngam o warangel.”
40002014	Yusufu ummii hocci ɓingel ngel e maduujo maagel caka jemma, o dilli leydi Masar.
40002015	Ton ɓe njooɗi naaki Hirudus maayi. Non waɗii ngam ɗum hebbina ko Joomiraawo wi'i daga honduko annabiijo maako wiiki, “Daga leydi Masar mi noddi Ɓiɗɗo am.”
40002016	Nde Hirudus faami andanɓe koode ɓen ƴoyriimo, sey ɓernde maako metti naa' seɗɗa. O wi'i ɗum wara ɓikkoy pamaroy fuu ngoroy ngoodukoy duuɓi ɗiɗi yaaki ley ngonkoy nder gariyel Baytalaami e haade gariyel ngel. O waɗu non ngam andanɓe koode ɓen mbi'imo arande hoodere nden wanganiiɓe duuɓi ɗiɗi ƴaɓɓiiɗi.
40002017	Non hebbini ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Annabi Irmiya wiiki,
40002018	“Ɗum nani hononde nder gariiri Raama, bojji nawɗi. Ɗum Rahiila woyanta ɓiɓɓe maako, o wanyi o waltinanee ɓernde, ngam ɓiɓɓe maako maayi.”
40002019	Gaɗa Hirudus maayi, sey malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wangani Yusufu nder koyɗol e Masar, wi'i,
40002020	“Umma koccaa ɓingel ngel e maduujo maagel co''oɗaa leydi Israa'iila, ngam ɓen ɗon ɗaɓɓutuɓe mbara ɓingel ngel ɓe maayi.”
40002021	Sey Yusufu ummii, hocci ɓingel ngel e maduujo maagel, ɓe co''ii leydi Israa'iila.
40002022	Ammaa nde o nani Arkilayus ronii jooɗorgal laamu nyaako muuɗum Hirudus e mo laamo leydi Yahuudiya, sey o huli yaaki ton. Ammaa nde ɗum wagginimo nder koyɗol, sey o so''i o yahi leydi Galiili.
40002023	O yahi o jooɗii nder wondi gariiri bi'eteendi Najarat, ngam ɗum hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga konduɗe annabo'en wiiki, “Ɗum noddaymo Najarankeejo.”
40003001	Gaɗa duuɓi ɗuɗɗi Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma yahi nder ladde Yahuudiya, e mo wa'ajina,
40003002	e mo wi'a, “Tuubee, ngam Laamu Allah ɓadake!”
40003003	On ɗon kanko woni mo Annabi Icaaya meti dow maako, wi'i, “Goɗɗo e nodda nder ladde, e wi'a, ‘Mo''inee ɗatal Joomiraawo, portee laawol ngam garol maako!’ ”
40003004	Yahaya e ɓornii kolte ɗe ɗum waɗiri leeɓe ngeelooba, e mo taadii taadorde laral. Nyamndu maako woni baabeeji e njumri.
40003005	Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe daga gariiri Urucaliima e leydi Yahuudiya fuu e gariije ɗe haade Caangol Urdun ɓe ngaɗi ka yaaki to maako.
40003006	E ɓe mbi'a fuu ko wooɗaa ɗum ɓe ngaɗi, e mo waɗanaɓe baptisma nder Caangol Urdun.
40003007	Ammaa nde Yahaya yi'i Faarisanko'en e Saadusanko'en ɗuɗɓe ngari ngam o waɗanaɓe baptisma, o wi'iɓe, “Onon ɓiɓɓe boole! Moye wi'i'on ndoggon bone garayɗum?
40003008	Ngaɗee ko hollata on ali hakkeeji mooɗon.
40003009	To' on nyumu on mbi'ay nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ‘Minon, min ɓiɓɓe Annabi Ibraahim.’ Ngam e mi wi'a'on, Allah waaway umminanki Annabi Ibraahim ɓiɓɓe daga nder kaaƴe ɗe'e.
40003010	Koo jooni fe''irde ƴeftaama ngam fe''a leɗɗe daga ɗaɗi maaje. Lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓikkoy mboɗkoy, ɗum fe''ayki ɗum faɗɗaki nder hiite.
40003011	Min, e mi waɗirana'on baptisma e ndiyam ngam holluki on tuubi. Ammaa ɓurɗoyam mangu e wara gaɗa am. Mi fotaayi mi jogoo paɗe maako. O waɗiranay'on baptisma e Ruuhu Allah e hiite.
40003012	E mo jogii besirɗum gawri maako ngam senduki gawri e nyaande. O hawritay gawri ndin, o waɗandi nder resirde gawri maako, ammaa o wula nyaande nden nder hiite nge waatataa.”
40003013	E carel ngel Yeesu waroyi daga leydi Galiili. O yahi Caangol Urdun to Yahaya ngam Yahaya waɗanamo baptisma.
40003014	Ammaa Yahaya yiɗii wanya waɗankimo baptisma, e wi'a, “E haani ngaɗanaayam baptisma, ammaa a wari to am?”
40003015	Ammaa Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Alu ɗum warta non jooni, ngam non haani kebbiniren ko Allah yiɗi ngaɗen.” Nden Yahaya jaɓi.
40003016	Nde ɗum waɗani Yeesu baptisma, e mo wurto nder ndiyam ɗam, sey ɗon e ɗon dow maɓɓitii o yi'i Ruuhu Allah e jippoyo dow maako e ɓandu bo foondu.
40003017	Sey hononde ƴiwoyi daga dow wi'i, “O'o woni Ɓiɗɗo am mo ngiɗumi, e mi nana belɗum maako.”
40004001	Sey Ruuhu Allah yaari Yeesu nder ladde ngam Ceyɗan foondamo.
40004002	Gaɗa Yeesu waɗii balɗe 40 e suumoo jemma e nyalawma, weelo nangimo.
40004003	Sey Ceyɗan wari, wi'imo, “To an woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah, wi'u ɗe'e kaaƴe ngarta buroodi.”
40004004	Yeesu nootii wi'imo, “Aayaare wi'ii, ‘Naa' e nyamndu tan neɗɗo marortoo, sey ni e koo ndeye wolde garoynde daga to Allah.’ ”
40004005	Sey Ceyɗan yaarimo Urucaliima Gariiri Ceniindi darnimo ton dow hoore Wuro Ceniingo,
40004006	wi'imo, “To an woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah, diwu daga ɗo'o ngam aayaare wi'ii, ‘Allah wi'ay malaa'ika'en muuɗum mballumaa boɗɗum. Ɓe taɓɓete nder juuɗe maɓɓe, ngam to' nawnaa koyɗe maaɗa dow hayre.’ ”
40004007	Yeesu wi'imo, “Ɗonmaa aayaare wi'ii, ‘Taa' foondu Allah Joomiraawo maaɗa!’ ”
40004008	Ceyɗan fuɗɗiti yaarimo dow wonde hocceere townde hollimo leyɗe duuniyaaru fuu e jawdi maaje,
40004009	o wi'imo, “Ɗu'um fuu mi hokketeɗum taa diccake a mawniniiyam.”
40004010	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Umma daga ɗo'o, an Ceyɗan! Aayaare wi'ii, ‘Mawnin Allah Joomiraawo maaɗa, kanko tan mawnintaa.’ ”
40004011	Sey Ceyɗan alimo, malaa'ika'en ngari mballimo.
40004012	Too, nde Yeesu nani ɗum maɓɓii Yahaya nder suudu cural, o so''ii leydi Galiili.
40004013	O ali gariiri Najarat, o yahi o jooɗii gariiri Kafarnahum ngondi haade mbeela nder leydi Jabaluuna e Naftaali.
40004014	O waɗii non ngam ɗum hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Annabi Icaaya wiiki,
40004015	“Leydi Jabaluuna e leydi Naftaali, onon leyɗe gonɗe dow laawol haade mbeela, fongo Caangol Urdun, nder leydi Galiili ndi yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en!
40004016	Yimɓe jooɗiiɓe nder nyiwre ɓe ngi'ii jayngol mangol, nden ɓen ɗon jooɗiiɓe nder leydi ndi ɗowdi mayde, jayngol wurtoyake yeyni dow maɓɓe.”
40004017	Daga carel ngel, Yeesu fuɗɗi wa'ajinki, e wi'a, “Tuubee, ngam Laamu Allah warii haade mooɗon.”
40004018	Yeesu e yaha haade Mbeela Galiili, o yi'i sakiraaɓe ɗiɗo, Siiman bi'eteeɗo Biiturus e minyiraawo maako Andiraawus, e ɓe ngaɗa nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe nder ndiyam, ngam ɓe nangooɓe liƴƴi.
40004019	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Tokkeeyam, mi wartiray'on gaddayɓe yimɓe to am.”
40004020	Ɗon e ɗon ɓe ali nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe ɓe tokkimo.
40004021	Nde o ɓeydi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o yi'i woɓɓe sakiraaɓe ɗiɗo, Yaakubu e minyiraawo muuɗum Yahaya ɓiɓɓe Jabadi, e ɓe nder komiwal e nyaako maɓɓe Jabadi, e ɓe mo''ina nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe, sey Yeesu noddiɓe.
40004022	Ɗon e ɗon ɓe ali komiwal ngal e nyaako maɓɓe on, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
40004023	Yeesu yahi koo toye nder leydi Galiili, e mo ekkitina nder cuuɗi do'aare maɓɓe, e mo wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum dow Laamu Allah, nden e mo yamɗitina koo iri ɗume nyawu e ciya njamu nder yimɓe.
40004024	Habaru maako sankiti koo toye nder leydi Siiriya. Yimɓe ngaddanimo fuu nyawɓe, piidooɓe e nyawuuji feere‑feere, e piidooɓe e nawɗum ɓalli, e gooduɓe ginni, e ngooduɓe paɗɗe, e jaraaɓe, o yamɗitiniɓe.
40004025	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokki Yeesu ƴiwoyɓe leydi Galiili, e leydi Dikapolis, e Urucaliima, e leydi Yahuudiya, e fongo Caangol Urdun.
40005001	Nde Yeesu yi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngari, sey o ƴenti ƴolde o jooɗi, tokkuɓemo ngari to maako.
40005002	Sey o fuɗɗi ekkitinkiɓe, o wi'i,
40005003	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe gaɗuɓe fuu kammunde dow Allah, ngam kamɓe njeyi Laamu Allah.
40005004	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe yimɓe woyooɓe, ngam ɗum waltinay ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
40005005	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe leynooɓe ko'e, ngam kamɓe ndonata duuniyaaru.
40005006	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe nanooɓe weelo e ɗonka waɗuki aadilaaku, ngam ɓe karneteeɓe.
40005007	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe jurminanooɓe yimɓe, ngam kamɓe maa ɗum yurminanayɓe.
40005008	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe ɓe ɓerɗe laɓɗe, ngam ɓe ngi'ay Allah.
40005009	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe ciryootirooɓe yimɓe, ngam ɗum noddirayɓe ɓiɓɓe Allah.
40005010	“Ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe torreteeɓe ngam waɗuki aadilaaku, ngam kamɓe njeyi Laamu Allah.
40005011	“On barkiɗinaaɓe to yimɓe kuɗii'on, torrii'on, pewanii'on mbi'ii haalaaji kalluɗi feere‑feere dow mooɗon ngam am.
40005012	Nanee belɗum, mbelmbeltee, ngam barka mooɗon ɗum ɗuɗɗum e dow, ngam non ɓe ngaɗannoo annabo'en arande'en.
40005013	“Onon ngoni lamɗam duuniyaaru. Ammaa to belɗum maajam ittake, ko wartirta belɗum maajam? Walaa ko ɗam nafata kadin, sey ni ɗam rufee yimɓe njaaɓaɗam.
40005014	“Onon ngoni jayngol duuniyaaru. Gariiri ngondi dow ƴolde ndi suuɗataako.
40005015	Walaa gaɗanayɗo fitilaaru hiite hippa tummude dow mayru. Sey ni o resandu dow danki, ndu yeynanoo koo moye gonɗo nder wuro ngon.
40005016	Non onon maa, alee jayngol mooɗon yeynanoo yimɓe, ngam ɓe ngi'a kuuɗe mooɗon boɗɗe, ɓe mawnina Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow.
40005017	“To' on kammo mi waroyi ngam mi wartira Attawra koo Defte Annabo'en meere. Mi waroyi naa' ngam mi wartiraɗum meere, ammaa ngam mi hebbinaɗum.
40005018	E mi wi'a'on goonga, haa dow e ley re'a, walaa bindel go'o koo toɓɓel go'el itteteengel nder Attawra naa koo ngele bindel nder Attawra hebbinaama.
40005019	Ngam non, koo moye yewi go'o nder koo ko ɓuri famɗuki nder ko Allah wi'i ɗum waɗa, nden o ekkitini woɓɓe ngaɗa non, ɗum noddaymo ɓurɗo famɗuki nder Laamu Allah. Ammaa koo moye waɗi ko Allah wi'i ɗum waɗa, nden o ekkitini woɓɓe ngaɗa non, ɗum noddaymo mawɗo nder Laamu Allah.
40005020	E mi wi'a'on, to aadilaaku mooɗon ɓuraayi ɗum moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en, on nattataa Laamu Allah koo seɗɗa!
40005021	“On nani ɗum wi'i yimɓe ndenno, ‘Taa' waɗu warhoore,’ nden ‘koo moye waɗi warhoore o kiiteteeɗo.’
40005022	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, koo moye monnani goɗɗo, Allah hiitotomo. Kadin koo moye huɗi goɗɗo, ardiiɓe hiitotomo. Nden koo moye wi'i goɗɗo ‘A meereejo!’ e mo dow laawol nattuki wuro hiite.
40005023	Ngam non, taa warii hokkuki dokkal ngam Allah to sakkirde, taa siftorii bandiraawo maaɗa e monnanmaa,
40005024	alu dokkal maaɗa yeeso sakkirde nden, arande yahu ciryootiraa e bandiraawo maaɗa on, nden ngartaa kokkaa dokkal maaɗa.
40005025	“To goɗɗo wulloyakema, carel ngel ngonɗon dow ɗatal yaaki yeeso laamu siryootir e maako jawɗum. To naa' non, o yaarete yeeso gaɗoowo kiita, gaɗoowo kiita waɗumaa nder juuɗe taadiiɓe, ɗum maɓɓumaa nder suudu cural.
40005026	E mi wi'a'on goonga, a wurtataako naa a yoɓii fuu ceede ɗe ɗum tokkatama koo aniiniyel horataako.
40005027	“On nani ɗum wi'ii, ‘Taa' waɗu njeenu.’
40005028	Ammaa min, e mi wi'a'on koo moye raari debbo darɗe suuno yaadake waadii njeenu e maako nder ɓernde.
40005029	To hitere maaɗa nde nyaamo e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittunde, paɗɗaande. Ɗum ɓuraniima ndullaa jokkoode go'o nder jokkooɗe ɓandu maaɗa e dow ɗum hubina fuu ɓandu maaɗa nder wuro hiite.
40005030	To jungo maaɗa nyaamo e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittungo, paɗɗaango. Ɗum ɓuraniima ndullaa jokkoode go'o nder jokkooɗe ɓandu maaɗa e dow fuu ɓandu maaɗa natta nder wuro hiite.
40005031	“Kadin ɗum wi'i, ‘Koo moye yoofi debbo muuɗum, sey hokkamo ɗerewol warki teegal.’
40005032	Ammaa min, e mi wi'a'on, koo moye yoofi debbo muuɗum to naa' njeenu o waɗi, too, o waɗiimo waɗuki njeenu to o waɗii wongal teegal. Nden koo moye te'i joofaaɗo waɗi njeenu.
40005033	“On nanii ɗum wi'ii yimɓe ndenno, ‘Taa' huna dow fewre, ammaa hebbin alkawal ngal ngaɗanɗaa Joomiraawo.’
40005034	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, to' on kuno koo seɗɗa. To' on kunoro dow, ngam ton woni to Allah jooɗoto.
40005035	Nden to' on kunoro duuniyaaru, ngam ɗon woni to Allah resata koyɗe muuɗum. Nden to' on kunoro Urucaliima ngam kayri woni gariiri Laamiiɗo Mawɗo.
40005036	To' on kunoro gaasa ko'e mooɗon, ngam on mbaawataa wartirki laasol ngo'ol danewol koo ɓalewol.
40005037	Al ‘Ee’ mooɗon warta ‘Ee,’ nden ‘Aa'a’ mooɗon warta ‘Aa'a.’ Fuu ko ƴaɓɓii ɗu'um, daga to Ceyɗan ɗum ƴiwoyi.
40005038	“On nani ɗum wi'ii, ‘Hitere ngam hitere, nden nyiinde ngam nyiinde.’
40005039	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, to goɗɗo waɗanii'on goɗɗum kalluɗum, to' on ngaato. To goɗɗo fiyiima to wolo nyaamo, waylitanmo wo'oto ngon maa.
40005040	To goɗɗo yaariima yeeso laamu ngam jaɓanmaa toggoore, hokkumo fuu e cuddaari maaɗa.
40005041	To goɗɗo waɗiima ngaɗaa yaadu mil go'o, yaadu e maako mil ɗiɗi.
40005042	Toriiɗoma goɗɗum fuu, hokkumo. To goɗɗo ƴamiima nyamaande, taa' haɗumo.
40005043	“On nanii ɗum wi'ii, ‘Yiɗu bandiraawo maaɗa, wanyu ganyo maaɗa.’
40005044	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, ngiɗee ganyooɓe mooɗon, ngaɗanee torrooɓe'on do'aare,
40005045	ngam ngarton ɓiɓɓe Nyaako Mo Dow. Ngam e mo waɗa naange maako yeynoo dow yimɓe kalluɓe e yimɓe gaɗooɓe ko wooɗi, nden e mo waɗa ndiyam toɓa dow aadili'en e ɓe ngalaa aadilaaku.
40005046	To yiɗuɓe'on tan ngiɗɗon, ɗume barka keɓoton? Koo jaɓooɓe ceede leydi maa e ngiɗi yiɗuɓeɓe.
40005047	To bandiraaɓe mooɗon tan kownoton, ɗume ngaɗoton ɓurɗum ɗum woɓɓe ngaɗata? Yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en naa' e ngaɗa non?
40005048	Ngam non, ngartee keewuɓe no Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow o kewɗo.
40006001	“Paamee to' ngaɗon kuuɗe aadilaaku mooɗon yeeso yimɓe ngam ɓe ngi'a. Ngam to on ngaɗii non, on keɓataa mbarjaari to Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow.
40006002	“Ngam non, taa hokkay ɓe ngalanaa caahu, taa' andinka koo moye no munaafuki'en ngaɗata nder cuuɗi do'aare e dow ɗatal ngam yimɓe ngi'a mantaɓe. E mi wi'a'on goonga, ɓe njaadake ɓe keɓi mbarjaari maɓɓe.
40006003	Ammaa taa hokkay mo walanaa caahu, taa' jaɓu jungo nano maaɗa anda ko jungo nyaamo maaɗa waɗata.
40006004	Hokku caahu maaɗa e suuɗe, nden Nyaako maaɗa Mo Dow anduɗo koo ɗume gaɗaaɗum e suuɗe, o hokkete mbarjaari.
40006005	“To on ngaɗay do'aare, to' on ngaɗu no munaafuki'en ngaɗata, ngam e ɓe ngiɗi waɗuki do'aare e ɓe ndarii nder cuuɗi do'aare e dow to ɗate kawri ngam koo moye yi'aɓe. E mi wi'a'on goonga, ɓe njaadake ɓe keɓii mbarjaari maɓɓe.
40006006	Ammaa taa waɗay do'aare, nattu suudu maaɗa maɓɓaa dammugal, toroɗaa Nyaako maaɗa Mo Dow mo yi'ataake. Nden kanko gi'oowo ko waɗetee e suuɗe o hokkete mbarjaari.
40006007	“To on ngaɗa do'aare, to' on metu haalaaji meere no yimɓe ɓe andaa Allah ngaɗata. E ɓe nyuma allaaji maɓɓe nanay ko ɓe mbi'i ngam ɓe kuutiri boliiɗe ɗuɗɗe.
40006008	To' on ngaɗu no ɓe ngaɗata ngam Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow e andi ko ngiɗɗon ko torooɗonmo.
40006009	Raa no ngaɗirton do'aare, ‘Yaa Allah Nyaako amin Mo Dow, inde maaɗa ceniinde mawninee.
40006010	Laamu maaɗa wara, ko ngiɗɗaa waɗee nder duuniyaaru, no ɗum waɗirtee e dow.
40006011	Hokkumin ko min nyaamata hande.
40006012	Yaafanamin hakkeeji amin no min njaaforantoo gaɗanɓemin ko wooɗaa.
40006013	Taa' alu min njaha to min ngaɗata hakke, ammaa hisnumin daga Kalluɗo.’
40006014	“Ngam to on njaafanake gaɗanɓe'on ko wooɗaa, Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow maa yaafanto'on.
40006015	Ammaa to on njaafanaakiɓe, kanko maa o yaafantaako'on hakke mooɗon.
40006016	“To on cuumii, to' on mbonnu geece mooɗon no munaafuki'en ngaɗata, ngam kamɓe e ɓe mbonna geece maɓɓe ngam ɓe kolla yimɓe e ɓe cuumii. E mi wi'a'on goonga, ɓe njaadake ɓe keɓii mbarjaari maɓɓe.
40006017	Ammaa taa suumii, sulma, moytanaa hoore maaɗa nebbam.
40006018	Taa waɗii non, walaa andayɗo a suumii, sey ni Nyaako maaɗa Mo Dow mo yi'ataake. Nden kanko gi'oowo ko waɗetee e suuɗe, o hokkete mbarjaari.
40006019	“To' on ndesan ko'e mooɗon jawdi e duuniyaaru to mooƴu wonnatandi, koo ndi nyola, koo wuyɓe pusata, natta, ngujjandi.
40006020	Ammaa ndesanee ko'e mooɗon jawdi ton dow to mooƴu wonnataandi, koo ndi nyola, to wuyɓe mbaawataa pusa natta ngujjandi.
40006021	Ngam to jawdi maaɗa woni, ton ɓernde maaɗa maa so''otoo.
40006022	“Gite ngoni fitilaaru ɓandu. To gite maaɗa e njamɗi, ɓandu maaɗa fuu heeway jayngol.
40006023	Ammaa to gite maaɗa njamɗaa, ɓandu maaɗa fuu heeway nyiwre. To jayngol gongol nder ɓandu maaɗa ɗum nyiwre, nyiwre nden wartay ɓaleere naa' seɗɗa.
40006024	“Walaa baawayɗo jagganaaki joomu wuro'en ɗiɗo. Koo o wanya go'oto o yiɗa go'oto, koo o mawnina go'oto o yawana go'oto. Non onon maa, on mbaawataa jagganaaki Allah e jagganaaki jawdi carel go'o.
40006025	“Ngam non, e mi wi'a'on, to' on ngannu dow jonde mooɗon, waato dow ko nyaamoton, koo ko njaroton, koo ko ɓornotooɗon. Naa' yonki ɓurii nyamndu? Nden naa' ɓandu ɓurii kolte?
40006026	Ndaaree colli! Ɗi aawataa, ɗi pe''ataa, ɗi ngalaa to ɗi ndesata nyamndu. Fuu e non Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow e nyamnaɗi. Naa' on ɓurii colli daraja?
40006027	Moye nder mooɗon to wannii waawata ɓeydanki hoore muuɗum carel seɗɗa nder balɗe muuɗum?
40006028	“Too, ngam ɗume ngannoton dow ko ɓornotooɗon? Ndaaree pindi ladde no mawnirta, ndi huwataa, ndi sanyataa kolte.
40006029	Fuu e non e mi wi'a'on, Annabi Suleymaanu fuu e risku muuɗum meeɗaayi mo''itinaaki bo pindi wo'oyri ndi'i.
40006030	To Allah e mo''itinira pindi ladde nihi, hande e ndi ɗon, jaango ndi wulee, hakko onon, o ɓuray non ɓornuki'on, onon kooliiɓemo seɗɗa!
40006031	“Ngam non, to' on ngannu mbi'on, ‘Ko nyaameten?’, koo ‘Ko njareten?’, koo ‘Ko ɓornotooɗen?’
40006032	Ngam iri ɗum ɗon yimɓe ɓe andaa Allah ɗaɓɓitata. Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow e andi on ngiɗi fuu fii ɗu'um.
40006033	Ammaa arande ɗaɓɓitee Laamu Allah e aadilaaku maako, nden ɗum ɓeydanay'on fuu fii ɗu'um.
40006034	Ngam non, to' on ngannu e jaango, ngam jaango e woodi wannaare muuɗum. Koo ndeye nyalnde e woodi wannaare mayre keƴayndende.
40007001	“To' on kiito woɓɓe, ngam to' ɗum hiito'on.
40007002	Ngam non no kiitoriiɗon woɓɓe, onon maa non ɗum hiitorantoo'on, nden e poondirgel ngel poondirɗon, e maagel ɗum foondiranta'on.
40007003	Ngam ɗume ndaarataa geenel gongel nder hitere bandiraawo maaɗa, ammaa a wannaayi e legga wonga nder hitere maaɗa?
40007004	No waɗata mbi'aa bandiraawo maaɗa, ‘Al mi ittanmaa geenel nder hitere maaɗa,’ nden boo e woodi legga nder hitere maaɗa?
40007005	An munaafukiijo, artu ittuki legga wonga nder hitere maaɗa, nden ngi'aa boɗɗum keɓaa no ittiraa geenel gongel nder hitere bandiraawo maaɗa.
40007006	“To' on kokku kutiiji goɗɗum ceniiɗum. To on ngaɗii non, ɗi ngaylitoto, ɗi ciccita'on. To' on kubano aladeeji lu'u‑lu'u. To on ngaɗii non, ɗi njaaɓayɗum tan.
40007007	“Toree, ɗum hokkay'on. Ɗaɓɓitee, on keɓay. Cilminee, ɗum maɓɓitanay'on dammugal.
40007008	Ngam koo moye toriiɗo ɗum hokkaymo, ɗaɓɓutuɗo boo heɓay, nden koo moye cilminiiɗo ɗum maɓɓitanaymo dammugal.
40007009	Moye nder mooɗon to ɓiɗɗo muuɗum torakemo buroodi, o hokkamo hayre?
40007010	Koo boo to o torakemo lingu, o hokkamo mboodi?
40007011	To onon kalluɓe, on andi no kokkirton ɓiɓɓe mooɗon fii boɗɗum, hakko Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow! O ɓuray non hokkuki toriiɓemo fii boɗɗum!
40007012	“Fuu ko ngiɗɗon woɓɓe ngaɗana'on, onon maa ngaɗaneeɓe non, ngam kanjum woni ko Attawra e Defte Annabo'en mbi'i.
40007013	“Nattiree dammugal ɓiɗɗiingal. Ngam dammugal jaarayngal halkere ngal jaajungal, nden ngal saɗaa tokkuki, nattirooɓengal e ɗuuɗi.
40007014	Ammaa dammugal jaarayngal yonki ki re'ataa ngal ɓiɗɗiingal, ɗonmaa ɗatal jaarayngal yonki ki re'ataa e ngal saɗi tokkuki, yimɓe seɗɗa tokkatangal.
40007015	“Paamanee annabo'en fewre garayɓe to mooɗon nder nandi baali, ammaa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe e ɓe nandi e caafaali kalluɗi.
40007016	On anditirayɓe kuuɗe maɓɓe. Ɗum heɓataa ɓikkoy inabooje to gi'ehi, koo ibbe daga to kooraaje.
40007017	Non maa, koo kiye lekki boɗki e ki rima ɓikkoy mboɗkoy. Lekki ki wooɗaa boo e ki rima ɓikkoy koy mbooɗaa.
40007018	Lekki boɗki rimataa ɓikkoy koy mbooɗaa. Non maa, lekki ki wooɗaa rimataa ɓikkoy mboɗkoy.
40007019	Fuu lekki ki rimataa ɓikkoy mboɗkoy ɗum fe''ayki ɗum faɗɗaki nder hiite.
40007020	Ngam non, on anditirayɓe kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe ɓe ngaɗata.
40007021	“Naa' fuu bi'ayɗoyam, ‘Moodibbo, Moodibbo,’ nattata Laamu Allah, sey ni gaɗuɗo ko Nyaako am Mo Dow yiɗi.
40007022	E Nyalnde Jaango yimɓe ɗuɗɓe mbi'ayyam, ‘Moodibbo, Moodibbo! Naa' min nga'ajinii nder inde maaɗa? Naa' min mburtinii ginni nder inde maaɗa? Naa' min ngaɗii kayɗiniiɗum ɗuɗɗum nder inde maaɗa?’
40007023	Ammaa mi wi'ayɓe, ‘Mi andaa'on. Cendiree e am, onon kalluɓe.’
40007024	“Ngam non, neɗɗo fuu nanɗo ɗe'e boliiɗe am waɗi ko mbiimi e nandi e neɗɗo gooduɗo faamu mahuɗo wuro muuɗum dow tafaare.
40007025	Nde ndiyam waɗi, canɗi keewi, hendu ummoyii piyi wuro ngon, ammaa ngo yanaayi ngam ngo mahaama dow tafaare.
40007026	“Ammaa koo moye nanɗo boliiɗe am waɗaayi ko mbiimi e nandi e neɗɗo mo walaa hakkiilo mahuɗo wuro muuɗum dow njaareendi.
40007027	Nde ndiyam waɗi, canɗi keewi, hendu ummoyii piyi wuro ngon, sey ngo yani ngo sankitii ngo fuu.”
40007028	Nde Yeesu yottini ko wi'ata, yimɓe hawrutuɓe kayɗini e ekkitinol maako,
40007029	ngam o ekkitiniraayiɓe no moodiɓɓe Attawra ekkitinirta, ammaa o ekkitiniiɓe e bawɗe.
40008001	Nde Yeesu jippoyii daga dow hocceere nden, yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkimo.
40008002	Sey goɗɗo gooduɗo nyawu nyaamoojum laral wari diccii yeeso maako, wi'i, “Moodibbo, taa jaɓii, a waaway njamɗitinaayam.”
40008003	Sey Yeesu forti jungo muuɗum, meemimo, wi'i, “Mi jaɓii. Yamɗutu!” Ɗon e ɗon nyawu ɗum alimo, o yamɗiti.
40008004	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Faamu, taa' wi'uka koo moye, ammaa yahu kollaa hoore maaɗa to ardiiɗo diina, nden kokkaa cakkiri no Muusa wi'i ɗum waɗa ngam laaɓol maaɗa. Waɗu non ngam tabbitinanki yimɓe a yamɗitii.”
40008005	Nde Yeesu natti gariiri Kafarnahum, sey goɗɗo mawɗo sooji'en Rooma wari to maako, e toroomo, wi'i,
40008006	“Moodibbo, maccuɗo am e fukkii e wuro o jaraaɗo, e mo fiida e nawɗum kalluɗum.”
40008007	Yeesu wi'imo, “Mi yahay mi yamɗitinamo.”
40008008	Sey mawɗo sooji'en on nootii wi'i, “Moodibbo, mi fotaayi nattaa wuro am, ammaa metu tan, maccuɗo am yamɗitay.
40008009	Ngam min e hoore am ley laamu woɓɓe sooji'en ngonmi, min maa, e mi laamoo sooji'en. To mi wi'ii o'o, ‘Dillu!’ o dillay. To mi wi'ii on ton, ‘Woroy!’ o waray. To boo mi wi'ii maccuɗo am, ‘Waɗu ɗu'um!’ o waɗayɗum.”
40008010	Nde Yeesu nani non, hayɗini, wi'i kawrutuɓe e tokkimo, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, koo nder Israa'iila mi heɓaayi kooliiɗoyam ɓernde go'o bo o'o.
40008011	E mi wi'a'on, yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en ɗuɗɓe ngaray daga fuuna e hirna ɓe njooɗoo ɓe nyaama nyamndu humto e Annabi Ibraahim, e Iciyaaku, e Yaakubu nder Laamu Allah.
40008012	Haanuɓe ngarta yimɓe Allah ammaa ɓe nganyi, ɗum faɗɗayɓe nder nyiwre ɓaleere. Ɗon ɓe mboyata ɓe nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.”
40008013	Sey Yeesu wi'i mawɗo sooji'en Rooma on, “Yahu! Ngam a hoolake Allah, maccuɗo maaɗa yamɗitay.” Ɗon e ɗon maccuɗo soojiijo on yamɗiti.
40008014	Nde Yeesu yahi wuro Biiturus yi'i esiraawo Biiturus debbo e fukkii, jonte kalluɗe e torramo,
40008015	o meemi jungo maako. Jonte ɗen njoofi debbo on, o ummii, o fuɗɗi waddankimo nyamndu.
40008016	Nde futuro waɗi, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu gooduɓe ginni ɗuɗɓe. O metaniɗi wolde go'o ɗi mburtii. O yamɗitini fuu ɓe njamɗaa.
40008017	Non waɗii ngam ɗum hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Annabi Icaaya, wiiki, “O ittii nyawuuji meeɗen, o yamɗitinii'en.”
40008018	Nde Yeesu yi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e piliimo, o wi'i tokkuɓemo, “En kuulu fongo mbeela.”
40008019	Sey goɗɗo moodibbo Attawra wari to maako, wi'imo, “Moodibbo, mi tokkete to njahataa fuu.”
40008020	Yeesu wi'imo, “Dilaaji e ngoodi gayɗe, colli e ngoodi caɓɓe, ammaa Ɓii Neɗɗo walaa to fukkotoo.”
40008021	Goɗɗo nder tokkuɓemo wi'imo, “Moodibbo, al mi yaha mi uwoya nyaako am taw.”
40008022	Ammaa Yeesu wi'imo, “Tokkam, alu mayɓe uwa mayɓe mu''en.”
40008023	Yeesu natti komiwal, tokkuɓemo maa tokkimo.
40008024	Sey hendu cembindu ummoyii dow mbeela ngan, geelooɗi ndiyam puɗɗi piiki komiwal ngal, ndiyam natti nder maagal haa naaki ngal ɓadii heewa ndiyam, ammaa Yeesu e nder maagal e ɗaanii.
40008025	Sey tokkuɓemo ɓaddii pindinimo, ɓe mbi'i, “Moodibbo, hisnu'en! En kalkay!”
40008026	Sey o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume kultorɗon, onon kooliiɓeyam seɗɗa?” Sey o ummii, o haɓani hendu ndun e geelooɗi ndiyam ɗin. Sey koo ɗume de''iti.
40008027	Koo moye hayɗini wi'i, “O'o ɗum iri moye neɗɗo, haa keni e geelooɗi ndiyam e ngaɗa ko o wi'i?”
40008028	Nde Yeesu yottii fongo mbeela nder leydi Gaarasinko'en, sey woɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo taɓɓiimo, gooduɓe ginni jooɗotooɓe to genaale. Ɓe ngartii ko hulnii naa' seɗɗa haa maa walaa baawayɗo tokkira laawol ngol ɗon!
40008029	Ɗon e ɗon ɓe ngulli, e ɓe mbi'a, “Ko wannumaa e amin, Ɓiɗɗo Allah? A warii ngam torraamin ko carel waɗa?”
40008030	Haade ɗon e woodi ornde aladeeji ɗuɗɗi e dura.
40008031	Ginni ɗin torii Yeesu, mbi'i, “Taa riiwiimin, alumin min nattoya ornde aladeeji ɗin nii.”
40008032	Sey o wi'iɗi, “Ndillee!” Sey ɗi mburtii, ɗi nattoyi aladeeji ɗin. Sey ornde nden fuu nyaari jippoyii daga dow ƴolde nden, yani nder mbeela, ndiyam nyaamiɗi.
40008033	Woynaaɓe aladeeji ɗin ndoggi njahi nder gariiri mbi'oyi koo ɗume ko waɗi. Ɗonmaa ɓe mbi'i ko heɓi gooduɓe ginni ɗin.
40008034	Sey yimɓe gariiri ndin ɗuɗɓe mburtoyii taɓɓii Yeesu. Nde ɓe ngi'imo, ɓe toriimo o alanaɓe leydi maɓɓe.
40009001	Sey Yeesu natti komiwal huuli so''ii gariiri muuɗum.
40009002	Sey woɓɓe ngaddanimo goɗɗo jaraaɗo dow daago. Nde Yeesu yi'i hoolaare maɓɓe, o wi'i jaraaɗo on, “Taa' wannu, higo am, a yaafanaama hakkeeji maaɗa.”
40009003	Nde woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Attawra nani non, ɓe puɗɗi metitaaki hakkunde maɓɓe, e ɓe mbi'a, “O'o neɗɗo o fottidini hoore maako e Allah. Ka'a haala ka kalluka.”
40009004	Ammaa Yeesu faami ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, sey o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume nyumoton nyumo kallungo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
40009005	Ko ɓuri hoyki, ɗum wi'a, ‘A yaafanaama hakke maaɗa,’ koo ɗum wi'a, ‘Umma yaaɓu?’
40009006	Ammaa e mi yiɗi andon Ɓii Neɗɗo e woodi laamu nder duuniyaaru yaafoo hakke.” Sey o wi'i jaraaɗo on, “Umma koccaa daago maaɗa, kootaa wuro.”
40009007	Sey jaraaɗo on ummii hooti wuro.
40009008	Nde kawrutuɓe ɗon ngi'i non, ɓe kuli, ɓe manti Allah, kokkuɗo yimɓe iri ɗe'e bawɗe.
40009009	Yeesu e ala wigeere nden, sey yi'i goɗɗo jaɓoowo ceede leydi bi'eteeɗo Maatiyu e jooɗii to ɗum jaɓata ceede leydi. Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Tokkam.” Sey Maatiyu ummii, tokkimo.
40009010	Gaɗa ɗon Yeesu yahi wuro Maatiyu, jooɗii e nyaama hiraande, sey jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e gaɗooɓe hakke ngari njooɗii to maako e tokkuɓemo.
40009011	Nde Faarisanko'en ngi'i non, ɓe mbi'i tokkuɓemo, “Ngam ɗume moodibbo mooɗon nyamdata e jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e gaɗooɓe hakke?”
40009012	Nde Yeesu nani non, wi'i, “Naa' yamɓe ngiɗi nyawndoowo, sey ni nyawɓe.
40009013	Njahee, ekkitooɗon ma'ana aayaare biinde, ‘E mi yiɗi kollon yurmeende, naa' sakkuki cakkiri.’ Mi waroyaayi ngam nodduki nyumooɓe ɓe aadili'en, ammaa mi waroyi ngam nodduki anduɓe ɓe gaɗooɓe hakke.”
40009014	Sey tokkuɓe Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma ngari to Yeesu ɓe ƴamimo, ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume minon e Faarisanko'en e min cuumoo, ammaa tokkuɓema cuumataako?”
40009015	Sey Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “E yiiki mooɗon higooɓe angoojo nanay belɗum carel ngel angoojo on wondi e maɓɓe? Ammaa carel e wara ngel ɗum hoccata angoojo on daga nder maɓɓe, e carel ngel ɓe cuumoto.
40009016	“Walaa nyootayɗo lefel kesel to limcere kiinde, ngam lefel ngel ngel seekay limcere kiinde nden. Non waɗay nde ɓura no ndenno seekuki.
40009017	Non maa walaa gaɗayɗo ndiyam inabojam kesam nder faandu hiindu. To o waɗii non, ɗam ƴuufay, ɗam pusa faandu ndun, ɗam rufa, faandu ndun boo lalli won ɗon. Ammaa ndiyam inabojam kesam e waɗee nder faandu heyru ngam to' ɗum dullaɗam ɗum dulla faandu ndun.”
40009018	Yeesu e nder wiikiɓe non, sey goɗɗo ardiiɗo suudu do'aare bi'eteeɗo Jaayirus wari. O diccii yeeso Yeesu, o wi'i, “Ɓiɗɗo am surbaajo maayii jooni‑jooni, ammaa waroy njahen meemaamo, o ummoto.”
40009019	Yeesu ummodii e tokkuɓemo ɓe ndillidi e maako.
40009020	Too, e woodi goɗɗo debbo ɗon gaɗuɗo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi e torrodoo e rufuki ƴiiƴam o ƴiwoyi gaɗa Yeesu, o meemi cilmbi toggoore maako.
40009021	Ngam o wi'ii nder ɓernde maako, “Koo toggoore maako tan meemumi, mi yamɗitay.”
40009022	Nde Yeesu waylitii, yi'imo, wi'i, “Taa' wannu, bandiraawo. Hoolaare maaɗa yamɗitiniima.” Ɗon e ɗon debbo on yamɗiti.
40009023	Nde Yeesu yottii wuro Jaayirus on, yi'i duudooɓe duudaali e hawrutuɓe e ɓe ngulla sembee,
40009024	sey o wi'iɓe, “Alee ɗo'o, ngam surbaajo on maayaayi, ammaa o ɗaani.” Sey ɓe njalimo.
40009025	Ammaa gaɗa o wurtinii koo moye yaasi, o natti, o jogii jungo surbaajo on, sey surbaajo on ummii.
40009026	Habaru ɗum boo sankitii koo toye nder leydi ndin.
40009027	Yeesu e ala wigeere nden, sey woɓɓe wumɓe ɗiɗo tokkimo e nodda sembee, e mbi'a, “Ɓiɗɗo Dawda, yurminanmin!”
40009028	Nde Yeesu natti wongo wuro, sey wumɓe ɓen ngari to maako, o ƴamiɓe, o wi'i, “On njaɓii mi waaway yamɗitinki'on?” Ɓe mbi'imo, “Ee, moodibbo.”
40009029	Sey Yeesu meemi gite maɓɓe, wi'i, “Non no kooloriiɗonyam mi yamɗitinay'on.”
40009030	Ɗon e ɗon gite maɓɓe mbumtii. Sey Yeesu wagginiɓe, wi'i, “To' on mbi'uka goɗɗo.”
40009031	Ammaa ɓe ndilli ɓe cankiti habaru maako koo toye nder leydi ndin.
40009032	Wumɓe ɓen e ndilla, sey ɗum waddani Yeesu goɗɗo gooduɗo ginnol gartirngolmo paho.
40009033	Gaɗa Yeesu wurtinii ginnol ngol, neɗɗo on fuɗɗi metuki. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawrutuɓe ɗon kayɗini, mbi'i, “Ɗum meeɗaayi yiiki goɗɗum iri ɗu'um nder leydi Israa'iila.”
40009034	Ammaa Faarisanko'en mbi'i, “E bawɗe Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginni o wurtinirta ginni.”
40009035	Yeesu yahi gariije mawɗe e ngarihoy pamaroy fuu, e ekkitina nder cuuɗi do'aare ɗi Yahuudanko'en, e wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum dow Laamu Allah, e mo yamɗitina yimɓe gooduɓe koo iri ɗume nyawu, e koo iri ɗume ciya njamu.
40009036	Nde o yi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawritii, sey o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, ngam e ɓe torroo, walaa ballayɗoɓe, bo baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako.
40009037	Sey o wi'i tokkuɓemo, “Gese ɓenduɗe e ɗuuɗi, ammaa huwooɓe ɗuuɗaa.
40009038	Toree Joomu gese ɗen liloya huwooɓe nder gese maako.”
40010001	Sey Yeesu noddi tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo, o hokkiɓe bawɗe wurtinki ginni e yamɗitinki yimɓe daga koo iri ɗume nyawu e ciya njamu.
40010002	Raa inɗe lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓen: arande e woodi Siiman bi'eteeɗo Biiturus, e minyiraawo maako Andiraawus, e Yaakubu ɓii Jabadi, e minyiraawo maako Yahaya,
40010003	e Filibus, e Batiloomi, e Tooma, e Maatiyu jaɓoowo ceede leydi, e Yaakubu ɓii Halfa, e Taadiyus,
40010004	e Siiman Kananiyankeejo, nden e Yahuuda Iskariyooti, gartuɗo kokkitirɗo Yeesu.
40010005	Yeesu lili tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo ɓen, o wi'iɓe, “To' on njahu to yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en. Ɗonmaa to' on nattu gariije Samaariyanko'en.
40010006	Sey ni njahon to yimɓe Israa'iila gartuɓe bo baali majjuɗi.
40010007	Njahee, nga'ajinanonɓe, mbi'on, ‘Laamu Allah warii haade.’
40010008	Njamɗitinee nyawɓe, umminee mayɓe daga mayde, njamɗitinee gooduɓe nyawu nyaamoojum laral, mburtinanee yimɓe ginni. Mi hokkii'on bawɗe yamɗitinki yimɓe caahu, ngam non njamɗitinee yimɓe caahu.
40010009	To' on njogo ceede jiinaari, koo ceede ajurfaari, koo ceede njamndi mboɗeeri.
40010010	Nden to' on njaadu e jakaare, koo toggooje ɗiɗi, koo paɗe koyɗe ɗiɗi, koo sawru, ngam kuwoowo haanii hokkee nyamndu.
40010011	“Fuu gariiri koo gariyel pamarel to nattuɗon, ɗaɓɓitee neɗɗo mo ngikku boɗɗum, njooɗooɗon wuro maako naa on alii wigeere nden.
40010012	To on nattii wuro ngon, cilminee.
40010013	To yimɓe wuro ngon njaɓɓake'on boɗɗum, alee barka mooɗon jooɗoo dow maɓɓe. Ammaa to ɓe njaɓɓaaki'on boɗɗum, alee barka mooɗon warta to mooɗon.
40010014	Fuu mo jaɓɓaaki'on, koo wanyi ko mbiiɗon, to on mburtake wuro ngon koo gariiri ndin, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon.
40010015	E mi wi'a'on goonga, Nyalnde Jaango Allah ɓuray yurminanki yimɓe Sodom e Gomoora dow yimɓe gariiri ndin ɗon.
40010016	“Raɗɗum, e mi lila'on bono mbaaloy caka caafaali. Ngam non, paamanee ko'e mooɗon no boole ngaɗata, ɗonmaa ngartee ɓe kallaa bo pooli.
40010017	Paamanee yimɓe, ngam ɓe njaaray'on yeeso mawɓe, ɓe piya'on nder cuuɗi do'aare maɓɓe,
40010018	ɓe njaara'on yeeso mawɓe leydi e laamiiɓe, ngam on tokkuɓeyam on kokkayɓe habaru am. Non wartay laawol no kokkirtonɓe habaru am kamɓe e yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en.
40010019	Fuu carel ngel ɗum nangi'on ɗum yaari'on yeeso laamu, to' on ngannu dow no metirton, koo ko mbi'oton, ngam nder carel ngel ɗum wi'ay'on ko mbi'oton.
40010020	Ngam naa' ɗum onon metata, ammaa ɗum Ruuhu Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow metata nder konduɗe mooɗon.
40010021	“Neɗɗo hokkitiray sakiraawo muuɗum ɗum waramo, nyaako maa hokkitiray ɓiɗɗo muuɗum. Ɓiɓɓe ummanto danyooɓe maɓɓe, ɓe ngaɗa ɗum waraɓe.
40010022	Koo moye wanyay'on ngam on tokkuɓeyam. Ammaa munyuɗo haa re'irde hisay.
40010023	To yimɓe torrii'on nder wondi gariiri, ndoggee njahon wondi gariiri. E mi wi'a'on goonga, ko njahidon gariije Israa'iila fuu, Ɓii Neɗɗo wartoyay.
40010024	“Ekkitotooɗo ɓurataa moodibbo muuɗum, maccuɗo boo ɓurataa jeyɗomo.
40010025	Ekkitotooɗo nanay belɗum to wartii bo moodibbo muuɗum, maccuɗo maa nanay belɗum to wartii bo jeyɗomo. To ɓe noddirii joomu wuro on Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginni, ɓe ɓuray wiiki ko halli dow ɓe wuro ngon!
40010026	“Ngam non, to' on kulu yimɓe, ngam walaa goɗɗum ombaaɗum ɗum omtataake, non maa walaa cuuɗiiɗum ɗum suuritataake.
40010027	Ko mbiimi'on nder nyiwre, mbi'eeka nyalawma, non maa ko nanɗon to am e suuɗe, mbi'eeka e njayri.
40010028	To' on kulu warooɓe ɓandu neɗɗo, ammaa ɓe mbaawataa warki yonki maako. Sey ni kulon on ɗon baawayɗo halka ɓandu e yonki fuu nder wuro hiite.
40010029	Naa' coloy ɗiɗoy e cooree yamnde go'o? Fuu e non walaa koo go'otel maakoy baatayngel naa e yidde Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow.
40010030	Koo gaasa ko'e mooɗon maa fuu ka limaama.
40010031	Ngam non, to' on kulu, on ɓurii coloy ɗuɗkoy.
40010032	“Koo moye jaɓuɗoyam yeeso yimɓe, mi jaɓaymo yeeso Nyaako am Mo Dow.
40010033	Ammaa fuu ganyuɗoyam yeeso yimɓe, min maa mi wanyaymo yeeso Nyaako am Mo Dow.
40010034	“To' on kammo mi waroyii waddanki duuniyaaru jonde jam. Mi waroyaayi ngam wadduki jonde jam, sey ni hawre.
40010035	Mi warii ngam mi wadda sendirki hakkunde ɓiɗɗo e nyaako muuɗum, ɓiɗɗo debbo e maduujo muuɗum, debbo boo e esiraawo muuɗum debbo.
40010036	Ɓe njooɗodiɗaa wuro go'o ɓe ngartay wanywanyɓe maaɗa.
40010037	“Koo moye ɓuri yiɗuki nyaako muuɗum koo maduujo muuɗum dow am, o fotaayi wartuki tokkuɗoyam. Ɗonmaa fuu ɓurɗo yiɗuki ɓiɗɗo muuɗum dow am, o fotaayi wartuki tokkuɗoyam.
40010038	Nden fuu mo hoccaayi gaafaangal muuɗum tokkiyam, o fotaayi wartuki tokkuɗoyam.
40010039	Fuu giɗɗo hisnuki yonki muuɗum, o dullayki. Ammaa fuu dulluɗo yonki muuɗum ngam am, o hisnayki.
40010040	“Fuu jaɓuɗo'on jaɓiiyam, ɗonmaa fuu jaɓuɗoyam jaɓii on ɗon liloyɗoyam.
40010041	Koo moye jaɓuɗo annabiijo ngam o annabiijo, o heɓay mbarjaari annabiijo. Nden koo moye jaɓuɗo aadiliijo ngam o aadiliijo, o heɓay mbarjaari aadiliijo.
40010042	Koo moye kokkuɗo ɓurɗo famɗuki nder tokkuɓeyam ɓe'e koo ndiyam pewɗam nder jardugel ngam o tokkuɗoyam, e mi wi'a'on goonga, o dullataa heɓuki mbarjaari.”
40011001	Nde Yeesu yottini ko wi'ata tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo, sey o ummii daga ɗon, o dilli, e mo ekkitina, e mo wa'ajina nder gariije.
40011002	E carel ngel, Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma suraama nder suudu cural. Nde o nani habaru ko Almasiihu waɗata, sey o noddi woɓɓe nder tokkuɓemo o liliɓe to maako
40011003	ngam ɓe ƴamamo, ɓe mbi'a, “An woni Almasiihu mo ɗum wi'i waray, koo min keɗoo goɗɗo?”
40011004	Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “Njahee, mbi'on Yahaya ko nanuɗon e ko ngiiɗon:
40011005	wumɓe e mbumta, jaraaɓe e njaaɓa, gooduɓe nyawu nyaamoojum laral e njamɗitinee, pahuɓe e nana, mayɓe e umminee, ɓe ngalanaa e nga'ajinanee Habaru Belɗum.
40011006	O barkiɗinaaɗo neɗɗo mo alaayi hoolaakiyam.”
40011007	Gaɗa lilaaɓe ɓen ndilli, sey Yeesu fuɗɗi metanki yimɓe dow Yahaya, o wi'iɓe, “Ɗume njaaɗon raaroyki nder ladde? Kuɗol ngol hendu dimbata ndaaroyɗon?
40011008	To naa' non, ɗume njaaɗon raaroyki? Neɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce boɗɗe? Naa' non, ngam ɓornotooɓe limce boɗɗe e laamorde ɓe ngoni.
40011009	Too, ɗume njaaɗon raaroyki? Annabiijo? E mi wi'a'on goonga, o ɓurii annabiijo.
40011010	Kanko woni mo Allah wi'i nder aayaare, ‘Raɗɗum, mi liloyay lilaaɗo am o ardoo yeeso maaɗa o mo''inanmaa laawol.’
40011011	E mi wi'a'on goonga, nder ɓe rewɓe ndanyi fuu walaa ɓurɗo Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma mangu. Fuu e non, ɓurɗo famɗuki nder Laamu Allah ɓuriimo mangu.
40011012	Daga jaamanu Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma haa wadduki hande, Laamu Allah e torree. Torrooɓe laamu ɗum e ngiɗi teetaɗum e sembe.
40011013	Ngam Defte Annabo'en fuu e Attawra metii dow laamu ɗum naa Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma wari.
40011014	To on njaɓay ko ɓe mbi'i, Yahaya woni Iliya mo ɗum wi'i waray.
40011015	Gooduɗo noppi nanuki fuu nana.
40011016	“Ko nandinaymi yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um? E ɓe nandi e sukahoy njooɗiikoy nder luumo e noddindira, e mbi'a,
40011017	‘Min nduudanii'on duudaandu, ammaa on ngamaayi. Min mboyi bo goɗɗo maayi, ammaa on mboyaayi.’
40011018	Ngam Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma warii nyaamataa nyamndu yarataa ndiyam inabojam, sey ɓe mbi'i, ‘E mo woodi ginnol.’
40011019	Ɓii Neɗɗo boo warii e nyaama e yara, sey ɓe mbi'i, ‘Raa o'o, o beelaaɗo o jaroowo, higo jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e gaɗooɓe hakke.’ Fuu e non, tokkuɓe laawol Allah fuu e ɓe kolla kangol woni goongawol.”
40011020	Sey o fuɗɗi haɓanki gariije ɗe o waɗi kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe nder maaje ngam yimɓe gariije ɗen tuubaayi.
40011021	O wi'i, “Yimɓe gariiri Korasin, on mbonii! Yimɓe gariiri Betasayda, on mbonii! Daa kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe gaɗaaɗe nder mooɗon ɗe ngaɗanaama yimɓe Taaya e Sidon, daa ɓe ɓornake kolte kollayɗe wannaare ɓe njooɗake nder tooka ngam holluki ɓe tuubii.
40011022	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, Nyalnde Jaango Allah ɓuray yurminanki yimɓe Taaya e Sidon dow mooɗon.
40011023	Onon boo, yimɓe gariiri Kafarnahum, on kammii ɗum hoccay'on yaaki dow? Naa' non! Ɗum nattinay'on nder ngayka hiite. Daa kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe gaɗaaɗe nder maaɗa ɗe ngaɗaama nder gariiri Sodom, daa e ndi ɗon haa jooni.
40011024	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, Nyalnde Jaango Allah ɓuray yurminanki yimɓe Sodom dow mooɗon.”
40011025	E carel ngel Yeesu wi'i, “Mi yettiima, Nyaako am Mo Dow, Joomiraawo dow e ley, ngam a suuɗii fii ɗu'um to gooduɓe faamu e andal, a holliiɗum ɓikkoy pamaroy.
40011026	Non Nyaako am, ngam non welanmaa ngaɗaa.”
40011027	Sey o wi'i yimɓe, “Nyaako am hokkiiyam koo ɗume. Walaa anduɗo moye woni Ɓiɗɗo on sey ni Nyaako on, non maa walaa anduɗo Nyaako on sey ni Ɓiɗɗo on, e mo Ɓiɗɗo on yiɗi andina Nyaako on.
40011028	“Ngaree to am on fuu dondiiɓe doŋle tedduɗe, mi hokkay'on siwtaare.
40011029	Tokkee ko mbi'aymi'on. Ekkitee to am, ngam e mi woodi hakkiilo, mi lestinɗo hoore, nden ɓerɗe mooɗon mbaltoto.
40011030	Ngam ko mbiimi'on ngaɗon ɗum saɗaa waɗuki, nden dongal am teddaa.”
40012001	E carel ngel ɗum Nyalnde Siwtaare. Yeesu e yaha nder ngesa alkamaari, sey tokkuɓemo nani weelo ɓe puɗɗi ɓoruki cammeeje mayri e ɓe nyaama.
40012002	Ammaa nde woɓɓe Faarisanko'en ngi'i non, mbi'i Yeesu, “Raa tokkuɓema e ngaɗa ko Attawra haɗi ɗum waɗa Nyalnde Siwtaare.”
40012003	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On meeɗaayi janguki ko Dawda waɗi nde nani weelo, kanko e gonduɓe e maako?
40012004	O natti Lukuru Seniiɗum, o nyaami buroodi ceniiɗum, o hokkori jaadooɓe e maako. Attawra boo wi'ii ardiiɓe diina tan haani nyaamuki buroodi ɗum.
40012005	Koo on meeɗaayi janguki nder Attawra no ardiiɓe diina ngewirta dooka Nyalnde Siwtaare nder Wuro Ceniingo, ammaa ɗum wartaayi hakke?
40012006	E mi wi'a'on, raa ɓurɗo Wuro Ceniingo ɗo'o.
40012007	Ammaa daa on andunoo ma'ana aayaare nde'e bi'unde, ‘E mi yiɗi kollon yurmeende, naa' sakkuki cakkiri,’ daa on kiitaaki ɓe ngaɗaayi hakke.
40012008	Ngam Ɓii Neɗɗo woni Joomu Nyalnde Siwtaare.”
40012009	Sey Yeesu ali ɗon dilli, natti suudu do'aare maɓɓe.
40012010	E woodi goɗɗo mo jungo jaraango nder mayru. Sey Faarisanko'en ƴami Yeesu, mbi'i, “Attawra jaɓii ɗum yamɗitina Nyalnde Siwtaare?” Ɓe mbi'u non ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngulliroytoomo.
40012011	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Moye nder mooɗon to e woodi mbaala go'o to nga yanii nder ngayka Nyalnde Siwtaare, o jogataakonga o ittoyanga?
40012012	Too! Neɗɗo ɓurii mbaala daraja naa' seɗɗa! Ngam non, Attawra haɗaayi ɗum waɗa ko wooɗi Nyalnde Siwtaare.”
40012013	Sey o wi'i neɗɗo on, “Fortu jungo maaɗa.” Sey o fortingo, sey ngo yamɗiti, ngo warti bo wo'oto ngon.
40012014	Ammaa Faarisanko'en ɓen mburtii meddi dow no ɓe mbardata Yeesu.
40012015	Nde Yeesu faami ko ɓe ciryotoo, sey o ummii o ali wigeere nden. Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkimo, o yamɗitiniɓe ɓe fuu,
40012016	o wagginiɓe to' ɓe mbi'aka koo moye kanko o moye.
40012017	Ɗu'um fuu waɗii ngam ɗum hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Annabi Icaaya, wiiki,
40012018	“O'o woni maccuɗo mo cuɓumi, mo ngiɗumi, e mi nana belɗum maako naa' seɗɗa. Mi hokkaymo Ruuhu am, o hokkay lenyi habaru kisndam am.
40012019	O yeddataa o metataa sembee, walaa nanayɗo hoolo hononde maako dow ɗate.
40012020	O heenyitataa yewuki ƴombal ɓadiingal yewuki. O nyifataa fitilaaru ɓadiindu waatuki, naa o waɗii aadilaaku heɓi jaalorgal dow halleende.
40012021	Lenyi fuu ngaɗay kammunde dow maako.”
40012022	Sey ɗum waddanimo goɗɗo paho bumɗo gooduɗo ginnol. Yeesu boo yamɗitinimo, o warti e mo meta, e mo yi'a.
40012023	Kawrutuɓe fuu kayɗini, mbi'i, “E yiiki mooɗon koo o'o woni Ɓiɗɗo Dawda?”
40012024	Ammaa nde Faarisanko'en nani non, ɓe mbi'i, “E bawɗe Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginni o wurtinirta ginni.”
40012025	Ammaa Yeesu e andi ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, o wi'iɓe, “Laamu fuu cendiiɗum e wanywanytira, ɗum lallay. Non maa to gariiri koo wuro sendake e wanywanytira, ɗum waawataa ɗum daroo.
40012026	To Ceyɗan e wurtina ginni Ceyɗan nder laamu Ceyɗan, Ceyɗan sendake e wanywanytira won ɗon. To laamu maako sendake, noye laamu ɗum darortoo?
40012027	To e mi wurtinira ginni nder bawɗe Ba'aljabul, e bawɗe moye tokkuɓe'on mburtinirtaɗi? Ngam non tokkuɓe'on kollay on ngalaa goonga.
40012028	Ammaa, to e mi wurtina ginni nder bawɗe Ruuhu Allah, too, hollii Laamu Allah waranii'on.
40012029	“No waɗata ɗum waawa nattuki wuro neɗɗo cembiɗɗo ɗum teetanamo ko o woodi, naa' sey to ɗum artii haɓɓukimo? Nden ɗum waawa hoccuki ko o woodi nder wuro ngon.
40012030	“Mo wondaa e am fuu, o ganyo am. Mo wallaayiyam moɓtuki fuu, o cankitoowo.
40012031	Ngam non, e mi wi'a'on, ɗum waaway yaafanaaki yimɓe hakke e koo iri ɗiye haalaaji ɗi mbooɗaa ɗi ɓe meti, ammaa bi'uɗo ko wooɗaa dow Ruuhu Allah o yaafantaake.
40012032	Fuu bi'uɗo ko wooɗaa dow Ɓii Neɗɗo, ɗum waaway yaafanaakimo. Ammaa fuu bi'uɗo ko wooɗaa dow Ruuhu Allah, o yaafantaake haa abadaa.
40012033	“Lekki boɗki e rima ɓikkoy mboɗkoy, non maa lekki ki wooɗaa e rima ɓikkoy koy mbooɗaa. Koo kiye lekki e andiree ɓikkoy maaki.
40012034	Onon boole kalluɗe! No waɗata onon kalluɓe meton ko wooɗi? Ngam honduko neɗɗo e meta ko woni nder ɓernde muuɗum.
40012035	Neɗɗo mo ngikku boɗɗum e wurtina fii boɗɗum daga nder ɓernde muuɗum. Non maa neɗɗo kalluɗo e wurtina halleende daga nder ɓernde muuɗum.
40012036	“E mi wi'a'on, nder Nyalnde Jaango koo moye doole wi'a Allah ngam ɗume wi'i koo ɗeye boliiɗe meereeje.
40012037	Dow boliiɗe ɗe mbi'uɗaa ɗum waɗirantama kiita, koo ɗe nangumaa, koo ɗe mburtinmaa.”
40012038	Sey woɓɓe nder moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en mbi'imo, “Moodibbo, e min ngiɗi yiiki goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum daga to maaɗa tabbitinayɗum Allah liloymaa.”
40012039	Sey Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “Yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um kalluɓe ɓe kulataa Allah, e ɓe ngiɗi holleeki goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum, ammaa walaa ko ɗum hollataɓe sey ni ko heɓuno Annabi Inuusa.
40012040	Ngam non, no Inuusa waɗiri balɗe tati jemma e nyalawma nder wonga linga manga, non maa Ɓii Neɗɗo waɗirta balɗe tati jemma e nyalawma nder yenaande.
40012041	E Nyalnde Jaango yimɓe gariiri Niineba ɓe ummodoto e yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um. Ɓe kolla ko yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um ngaɗi ɗum wooɗaa, ngam kamɓe, nde ɓe nani wa'aju Annabi Inuusa, ɓe tuubii. Raa boo ɓurɗo Inuusa ɗo'o.
40012042	Nyalnde Jaango laamiiɗo leydi fombina debbo o ummodoto e yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um. O holla ko ɓe ngaɗi ɗum wooɗaa, ngam kanko o waroyii daga ɓadaaki nanuki faamu Annabi Suleymaanu. Raa boo ɓurɗo Suleymaanu ɗo'o.
40012043	“To ginnol wurtake nder ɓandu neɗɗo, ngol yahay to bigeeje jorɗe e ngol ɗaɓɓita to ngol siwtotoo. Ammaa to ngol heɓaayi,
40012044	sey ngol wi'a, ‘Mi so''oto wuro ngo mburtoyiimi.’ To ngol wartii, ngol tawii wuro ngon walaa goɗɗum nder, ngo wuuwaama ngo mo''inaama.
40012045	Sey ngol yaha ngol waddoya ginni joweeɗiɗi ɓurɗingol halluki, ɗi natta ɗi njooɗoo ɗon. Nden re'irde neɗɗo on ɓuray fuɗɗoode maako halluki. Non ɗum wartanta yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um kalluɗum.”
40012046	Yeesu e medda e yimɓe ɗuɗɓe hawrutuɓe, sey raa maduujo maako e minyiraaɓe maako ngari ndarii yaasi, e ɓe ngiɗi medduki e maako.
40012047	Sey goɗɗo wi'imo, “Maduujo maaɗa e minyiraaɓe maaɗa e ton ndarii yaasi, e ɓe ngiɗi medduki e maaɗa.”
40012048	Ammaa o wi'i biiɗomoka on, “Moye woni maduujo am, nden ɓeye ngoni minyiraaɓe am?”
40012049	Sey o sappii tokkuɓemo, o wi'i, “Raa maduujo am e minyiraaɓe am ɗo'o!
40012050	Ngam koo moye waɗi ko Nyaako am Mo Dow yiɗi, kanko woni minyiraawo am e maduujo am.”
40013001	Nyalnde nden Yeesu wurtii wuro ngon, yahi jooɗii haade Mbeela Galiili.
40013002	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawriti to maako naaki o natti komiwal o jooɗii nder maagal dow ndiyam. Kawrutuɓe fuu ndarii haade mbeela ngan.
40013003	Sey o huutiri misaalu o ekkitiɓe ekkitinol feere‑feere ɗuɗngol, o wi'i, “Goɗɗo demoowo yahi ngesa ngam saaka awdi.
40013004	E mo nder saakuki awdi ndin, wondi yani dow ɗatal, colli ngari cuppidindi.
40013005	Wondi boo yani nder kaaƴe, ɗon ndi heɓaayi leydi ɗundi. Ndi fuɗi jawɗum ngam leydi ndin luggaa.
40013006	Ammaa nde naange wurtoyii fiyindi, sey ndi yoori ngam ndi walaa ɗaɗi.
40013007	Wondi awdi boo yani nder gi'e, sey gi'e ɗen mawni ɓiɗɗindi haa ndi waawaayi waɗuki cammeeje.
40013008	Ammaa wondi awdi yani dow leydi mbondi ndi fuɗi ndi mawni ndi waɗi cammeeje. Wondi waɗi gabbe 100, wondi waɗi gabbe 60, wondi waɗi 30.”
40013009	Nde Yeesu heenyi hokkuki misaalu ɗu'um, sey wi'i, “Gooduɗo noppi nanuki fuu nana.”
40013010	Sey tokkuɓemo ngari ƴamimo, mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume metirantaaɓe e misaalu nihi?”
40013011	O nootii o wi'iɓe, “Onon on kokkaama faamu sirru Laamu Allah, ammaa kamɓe ɓe kokkaaka.
40013012	Ngam fuu gooduɗo faamu dow Laamu Allah ɗum ɓeydanaymo, haa ɗum ɗuuɗanamo. Ammaa mo walaa faamu dow Laamu Allah, koo ko o woodi maa ɗum jaɓayɗum.
40013013	Ko waɗi metiranaymi yimɓe e misaalu woni, ngam koo ɓe ndaarii ɓe ngi'ataa, koo ɓe kettindake ɓe nanataa, ɗonmaa ɓe paamataa.
40013014	Dow maɓɓe ɗum hebbini ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Icaaya, ‘On ngaɗay ka nanuki, ammaa on paamataa koo seɗɗa. On ngaɗay ka raaruki, ammaa on ngi'ataa koo seɗɗa.
40013015	Ngam ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓen ɗon ɗe cembiɗɗe, nden ɓe cukkii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe maɓɓii gite maɓɓe, ngam to' ɓe ngi'a e gite maɓɓe, to' ɓe nana e noppi maɓɓe, ɓe paama nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe haa ɓe ngarta to am, mi yamɗitina ɓerɗe maɓɓe.’
40013016	“Ammaa onon, gite mooɗon ɗe barkiɗinaaɗe ngam e ɗe ngi'a, e noppi mooɗon ngam e ɗi nana.
40013017	E mi wi'a'on goonga, annabo'en e aadili'en ɗuɗɓe ngiɗii ngi'a ko ngiiɗon, ammaa ɓe ngi'aayi. Ɓe boo ngiɗii nanuki ko nanoton, ammaa ɓe nanaayi.
40013018	“Too, raa ma'ana misaalu demoowo on ɗon.
40013019	Fuu nanuɗo habaru Laamu Allah o heɓtaayiɗum, sey Ceyɗan wara hocca ko ɗum aawi nder ɓernde maako. Ɗum ɗon woni misaalu awdi njanundi dow ɗatal.
40013020	Janundi dow kaaƴe woni misaalu nanuɗo Wolde Allah ɗon e ɗon o jaɓande e belɗum ɓernde.
40013021	Ammaa nde wolde nden walaa ɗaɗi nder ɓernde maako, o munyay carel seɗɗa tan. To caɗeele koo torra warii ngam wolde nden, ɗon e ɗon o yoofande.
40013022	Janundi nder gi'e woni misaalu nanɓe Wolde Allah, ammaa wannuki e fii duuniyaaru, e yidde jawdi, ɓiɗɗi wolde nden kaɗinde wallukiɓe ɓe ngaɗa ko Allah yiɗi.
40013023	Ammaa awdi caakaandi dow leydi mbondi woni misaalu nanɗo Wolde Allah, o faaminde boɗɗum, o waɗi ko Allah wi'i, o huutinirinde haa o heɓi ɓeydaari. Goɗɗo heɓi nde 100, goɗɗo boo heɓi nde 60, goɗɗo heɓi nde 30.”
40013024	Sey Yeesu hokkiɓe goɗɗum misaalu wi'i, “Laamu Allah e nandi e goɗɗo neɗɗo aawuɗo alkamaari mbondi nder ngesa muuɗum.
40013025	Ammaa jemma, koo moye e ɗaanii, sey goɗɗo ganyo maako yahi saaki awdi goɗɗe geene nder alkamaari ndin dilli.
40013026	Nde alkamaari ndin fuɗi, mawni waɗi cammeeje, sey geene ɗen maa ummoyii.
40013027	Sey maccuɓe joomu ngesa kan ngari mbi'imo, ‘Joomu wuro, naa' awdi mbondi aawuɗaa to ngesa maaɗa? Too, no waɗi geene puɗoyi nder mayri?’
40013028	O wi'iɓe, ‘Ɗum goɗɗo ganyo am waɗi non.’ Sey maccuɓe ɓen mbi'imo, ‘A yiɗi min njaha min ittaɗe?’
40013029	Ammaa o wi'iɓe, ‘Naa' non. Ngam to on ittaɗe, on ittay fuu e alkamaari ndin.
40013030	Aleeɗe ɗe mawnida e mayri naa carel taƴukindi waɗi. To carel taƴukindi waɗi, mi wi'ay taƴooɓe ɓen arta taƴuki geene ɗen ɓe kaɓɓaɗe kaɓɓe‑kaɓɓe, ɗum wulaɗe. Ammaa alkamaari ndin, ɓe ngaɗandi nder resirde gawri am.’ ”
40013031	Yeesu fuɗɗiti hokkiɓe goɗɗum misaalu wi'i, “Laamu Allah e nandi e gabbel mastat ngel goɗɗo hocci aawi nder ngesa muuɗum.
40013032	Kangel woni gabbel ɓurngel famɗuki nder ngabboy fuu, ammaa to ngel mawni, sey ngel ɓura koo ngele leggel mawnuki, haa colli ngara ngaɗa caɓɓe dow lice maagel.”
40013033	Yeesu fuɗɗiti hokkiɓe goɗɗum misaalu wi'i, “Laamu Allah e nandi e ƴuufinirɗum ɗum goɗɗo debbo hocci lancindiri e condi alkamaari poondirkoy tatoy, haa ndi fuu ndi ƴuufi.”
40013034	Yeesu metirani hawrutuɓe ɓen fuu fii ɗu'um e misaalu. Fuu ko o wi'ataɓe e mo huutira misaalu.
40013035	O waɗii non ngam o hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga honduko annabiijo wiiki, “Mi metiranay yimɓe e misaalu. Ko suuɗii daga taguki duuniyaaru, mi wurtinayɗum e njayri.”
40013036	Sey Yeesu ali yimɓe ɓen natti wuro. Tokkuɓemo ngari to maako mbi'imo, “Wi'umin ma'ana misaalu geene nder ngesa alkamaari.”
40013037	O wi'iɓe, “Aawuɗo awdi mbondi ndin woni Ɓii Neɗɗo.
40013038	Ngesa kan woni duuniyaaru. Nden awdi mbondi ndin woni ɓiɓɓe Laamu Allah. Geene ɗen ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ceyɗan.
40013039	On ɗon ganyo aawuɗo geene ɗen, kanko woni Ceyɗan. Carel taƴukindi woni re'uki duuniyaaru, nden taƴooɓendi ngoni malaa'ika'en.
40013040	Non no ɗum hawritirta geene ɗum wulaɗe, non ɗum waɗata e re'uki duuniyaaru.
40013041	Ɓii Neɗɗo liloyay malaa'ika'en muuɗum, ɓe mburtina koo ɗume pooɗoojum yimɓe ngaɗa hakke e fuu gaɗooɓe ko halli nder Laamu Allah.
40013042	Sey malaa'ika'en ɓen kubooɓe nder hiite kallunge. Ɗon ɓe mboyata ɓe nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40013043	Nden aadili'en ɗelkitoto bo naange nder Laamu Nyaako maɓɓe Mo Dow. Fuu gooduɗo noppi nanuki nana.
40013044	“Laamu Allah e nandi e jawdi cuuɗiindi e ngesa ndi goɗɗo heɓti, o fuɗɗiti o suuɗindi. Nder welwelo o yahi, o soori fuu ko o woodi o soodi ngesa kan.
40013045	“Ɗonmaa Laamu Allah e nandi e neɗɗo coodoowo e sooritoo ɗaɓɓitoowo lu'u‑lu'u gooduɗum ceede.
40013046	Nde o yi'i go'o gooduɗum ceede ɗuɗɗe, sey o yahi o soori fuu ko o woodi, o soodi lu'u‑lu'u ɗum.
40013047	“Ɗonmaa Laamu Allah e nandi e nangirɗum liƴƴi ɗum woɓɓe kubii nder mbeela, ɗum nangoyi koo iri ɗiye liƴƴi.
40013048	Nde ɗum heewi, ɓe pooɗoyiɗum daande mbeela ngan, ɓe njooɗii, ɓe cupti liƴƴi boɗɗi, ɓe ngaɗiɗi nder faandu, ammaa ɓe cankiti ɗi mbooɗaa ɗin.
40013049	Non ɗum waɗata e re'uki duuniyaaru. Malaa'ika'en ngaray kakkita kalluɓe daga nder aadili'en,
40013050	ɓe kuboo kalluɓe ɓen nder hiite kallunge. Ɗon ɓe mboyata ɓe nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40013051	“On paamii fuu ɗu'um?” Ɓe nootii ɓe mbi'i, “Ee.”
40013052	Sey o wi'iɓe, “Too, fuu moodibbo Attawra ekkitiiɗo dow Laamu Allah e mo nandi e joomu wuro burtinɗo jawdi keyri e kiindi nder ndesa muuɗum.”
40013053	Nde Yeesu heenyi wiikiɓe fuu misaalu ɗu'um, sey o ummii o ali wigeere nden.
40013054	O yahi gariiri to o mawni, o fuɗɗi ekkitinki yimɓe nder suudu do'aare maɓɓe haa ɓe kayɗini, ɓe mbi'i, “Toye neɗɗo o'o heɓi faamu ɗu'um e bawɗe waɗuki kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ɗe'e?
40013055	Naa' kanko woni ɓiɗɗo on ɗon cehoowo? Naa' maduujo maako e wi'ee Maryaama? Naa' Yaakubu e Yusufu e Siiman e Yahuuda ngoni minyiraaɓe maako?
40013056	Nden naa' en ngondi e minyiraaɓe maako rewɓe? Too, toye neɗɗo o'o heɓi fuu fii ɗu'um?”
40013057	Sey ɓe nganyi hoolaaki Yeesu. Ammaa Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Koo toye yimɓe e kokka annabiijo mangu, ammaa yimɓe gariiri maako, e yimɓe wuro maako ɓe kokkataamo mangu.”
40013058	Yeesu waɗaayi goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum ton ngam ɓe koolaakimo.
40014001	E carel ngel Hirudus Laamiiɗo nani habaru Yeesu.
40014002	Sey o wi'i maccuɓe maako, “On ɗon ɗum Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma umminaa daga mayde, kanjum waɗi e mo woodi bawɗe waɗuki kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe.”
40014003	Ngam ndenno Hirudus e hoore muuɗum waɗii ɗum nangii Yahaya, ɗum haɓɓimo, ɗum surimo nder suudu cural. Hirudus waɗi non ngam Hiruudiya debbo mawniraawo maako Filibus mo o te'i.
40014004	Ngam ndenno Yahaya wi'ii Hirudus, “Ɗum haanaayi te'aamo.”
40014005	Non waɗi Hirudus e yiɗi warki Yahaya, ammaa e mo hula yimɓe, ngam ɓe njaɓii Yahaya o annabiijo.
40014006	Ammaa nde nyalnde humto siftorki danyngol Hirudus wari, sey ɓiɗɗo Hiruudiya surbaajo wami yeeso hoɓɓe garɓe humto ngon. Gamol maako welii Hirudus,
40014007	haa waɗanimo alkawal hunaniimo wiiki hokkaymo koo ɗume ko o torii.
40014008	Sey maduujo maako wi'imo ko o wi'ata. Surbaajo on wi'i Hirudus, “Hokkam hoore Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma nder le'al jooni.”
40014009	Laamiiɗo on boo wanni, ammaa ngam o yaadake o hunanakemo yeeso hoɓɓe, o waɗi ɗum hokkamo hoore nden.
40014010	O lili woɓɓe ittonoyi Yahaya hoore nder suudu cural.
40014011	Ɗum waddi hoore nden nder le'al, ɗum hokki surbaajo on. Surbaajo on boo waddaninde maduujo muuɗum.
40014012	Sey tokkuɓe Yahaya on ngari kocci ɓandu ndun uwoyindu. Nden ɓe njahi ɓe mbi'oyika Yeesu.
40014013	Nde Yeesu nani non, sey natti komiwal e tokkuɓemo ɓe ndilli to wigeere nder ladde kamɓe tan. Ammaa nde yimɓe ɗuɗɓe nani non, ɓe mburtoyii daga gariije, ɓe tokkimo e koyɗe.
40014014	E jippaaki Yeesu daga nder komiwal ngal o yi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e kawriti, sey o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, o yamɗitini ɓe njamɗaa nder maɓɓe.
40014015	Nde naange hiirii, sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako, mbi'imo, “Ɗo'o ɗum ladde, ɗonmaa naange hiiri. Wi'u yimɓe ɓe'e ndilla ngam ɓe njaha ngarihoy ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.”
40014016	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Naa' doole ɓe ndilla. Onon kokkeeɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.”
40014017	Sey ɓe nootii ɓe mbi'imo, “Buroodi jowi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi tan min ngoodi.”
40014018	Sey o wi'i, “Ngaddaneeyamɗum ɗo'o.”
40014019	O wi'i hawrutuɓe ɓen njooɗoo dow huɗo hecco. O hocci buroodi jowi ɗum e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗin, o raari dow, o yetti Allah, o sendi buroodi ɗum o hokki tokkuɓemo, sey tokkuɓemo ngeedani yimɓe hawrutuɓe.
40014020	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami ɓe kaari. Tokkuɓemo moɓti ko hori ko waɗi kondooje sappo e ɗiɗi.
40014021	Nyaamuɓe nyamndu ndun worɓe tan ɓadake 5,000, sukaaɓe e rewɓe limaaka.
40014022	Ɗon e ɗon Yeesu waɗi tokkuɓemo natta komiwal ɓe artamo huuluki yaaki fongo, kanko boo o jaɓɓitoto kawrutuɓe.
40014023	Gaɗa o jaɓɓitake hawrutuɓe ɓen, o ƴenti hocceere kanko tan ngam o waɗa do'aare. Nde futuro waɗi, e mo ton kanko tan.
40014024	E carel ngel komiwal ngal e caka mbeela. Geelooɗi ndiyam e piyangal, hendu e haɗaɓe yaadu.
40014025	Fajiri e mo yaha to maɓɓe, e mo yaha dow ndiyam mbeela ngan.
40014026	Ammaa nde ɓe ngi'imo e mo yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe kultori, ɓe mbi'i, “Ɗum ginnol!” Sey ɓe ngulli ngam kulol.
40014027	Ammaa ɗon e ɗon o metaniɓe, o wi'i, “Pukkinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, ɗum min. To' on kulu.”
40014028	Sey Biiturus nootii, wi'imo, “Moodibbo, to ɗum an, wi'am mi wara to maaɗa dow ndiyam ɗam.”
40014029	Yeesu wi'imo, “Woroy.” Sey Biiturus wurtii nder komiwal ngal fuɗɗi yaadu dow ndiyam ɗam yaaki to Yeesu.
40014030	Ammaa nde o nani hendu cembindu, sey o hultori, ndiyam ɗam fuɗɗi moɗukimo, sey o wulli, o wi'i, “Moodibbo, hisnam!”
40014031	Ɗon e ɗon Yeesu forti jungo muuɗum fooɗoyimo, wi'imo, “An gooduɗo hoolaare seɗɗa, ngam ɗume ngaɗuɗaa seko?”
40014032	E nattuki maɓɓe nder komiwal ngal, hendu ndun darii.
40014033	Wonɓe nder komiwal ngal mawnini Yeesu, e mbi'a, “Goonga, an a Ɓiɗɗo Allah.”
40014034	Nde ɓe kuuli fongo mbeela ngan, ɓe njottii leydi Janisarat.
40014035	Nde yimɓe leydi ndin anditi Yeesu, ɓe lili koo toye nder leydi ndin ɗum waddoya fuu nyawɓe to maako.
40014036	Ɓe toriimo nyawɓe ɓen meema cilmbi toggoore maako tan. Fuu meemuɓeɗi njamɗiti.
40015001	Sey woɓɓe Faarisanko'en e moodiɓɓe Attawra ngari to Yeesu daga Urucaliima, ɓe mbi'i,
40015002	“Ngam ɗume tokkuɓema tokkataa ndonu maama'en meeɗen? Ngam ɓe lootataa juuɗe maɓɓe ko ɓe puɗɗa nyaamuki nyamndu.”
40015003	Sey Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “Onon maa, ngam ɗume on tokkataa ko Allah wi'i ngam ndonu mooɗon?
40015004	Ngam Allah wi'ii, ‘Hokku nyaako maaɗa e maduujo maaɗa mangu,’ nden, ‘Koo moye huɗi nyaako muuɗum koo maduujo muuɗum doole waree.’
40015005	Ammaa onon on mbi'a to neɗɗo wi'ii nyaako muuɗum koo maduujo muuɗum, ‘Fuu ko kokkaynomaami, mi hokkiiɗum Allah,’ too, naa' doole neɗɗo on mawnina nyaako maako won ɗon.
40015006	Non ngartirɗon Wolde Allah meere ngam ndonu mooɗon.
40015007	Onon munaafuki'en! Icaaya wi'ii goonga nde o waɗi annabaaku dow mooɗon wiiki,
40015008	Allah wi'ii, ‘Ɓen ɗon yimɓe e honduko tan ɓe mawnintayam, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe e ngoɗɗitiiyam.
40015009	E meere ɓe mawnintayam. E ɓe ekkitina dooka yimɓe bo to am ɗum ƴiwoyi.’ ”
40015010	Sey Yeesu noddi yimɓe hawrutuɓe, wi'iɓe, “Kettindee, paamon.
40015011	Naa' ko nattata neɗɗo e honduko wartirta ɓernde maako nde laaɓaa yeeso Allah, ammaa ko wurtoytoo daga nder honduko maako wartirtamo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.”
40015012	Sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako, mbi'imo, “A andi Faarisanko'en nanii monnere nde ɓe nani kan ɗon haala ka mbiiɗaa?”
40015013	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Fuu awre nde ɗum aawi, to naa' Nyaako am Mo Dow aawinde, ɗum ɗoofaynde.
40015014	Aleeɓe! Ɓe wumɓe ardiiɓe wumɓe. To bumɗo ardake bumɗo, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe njanay nder ngayka.”
40015015	Sey Biiturus wi'imo, “Wi'umin ma'ana ɗu'um misaalu.”
40015016	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Haa jooni onon maa on paamaayi?
40015017	On andaa fuu ko natti nder honduko neɗɗo nder reedu maako ɗum natti, nden ɗum wurtoto?
40015018	Ammaa ko wurtoyii nder honduko, daga nder ɓernde ɗum ƴiwoyi. Kanjum wartirta neɗɗo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.
40015019	Ngam daga nder ɓernde neɗɗo nyumo kallungo wurtoytoo, e warhoore, e njeenu, e njeenu hakkunde yimɓe ɓe ngalaa teegal, e nguyka, e ceyda fewre, e wonnuki inde neɗɗo.
40015020	Ɗu'um kanjum wartirta neɗɗo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah, ammaa nyaamuki nyamndu e juuɗe ɗe lootaaka naa' kanjum wartirta neɗɗo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.”
40015021	Yeesu ali ɗon yahi haade gariije Taaya e Sidon.
40015022	Sey raa goɗɗo Kan'aaniyankeejo debbo neɗɗo leydi ndin wari noddi sembee, wi'i, “Moodibbo, Ɓii Dawda, yurminanam! Wongol ginnol e torra ɓiɗɗo am surbaajo.”
40015023	Ammaa Yeesu wi'aayimo goɗɗum. Sey tokkuɓemo ngari toriimo, mbi'i, “Riiwumo, ngam e mo tokki'en e mo wanna'en e wulluki!”
40015024	Sey o wi'i debbo on, “Mi liloyaaka to woɓɓe, sey to baali majjuɗi ɗi lenyol Israa'iila tan.”
40015025	Ammaa o wari o diccii yeeso Yeesu, o wi'i, “Moodibbo, wallam!”
40015026	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Ɗum haanaayi ɗum hocca nyamndu ɓikkoy ɗum hubanoondu kutihoy.”
40015027	O wi'i, “Ee, ɗum non, Moodibbo, ammaa koo kutihoy e nyaama horaano januɗum daga teebur jeyɗokoy.”
40015028	Sey Yeesu nootii, wi'imo, “Hoolaare maaɗa e ɗuuɗi! Ɗum waɗante no ngiɗɗaa.” Ɗon e ɗon ɓiɗɗo maako yamɗiti.
40015029	Yeesu ummii, ali ɗon, tokki haade Mbeela Galiili, o ƴenti dow hocceere o jooɗii.
40015030	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngari to maako, ɓe ngaddoyi ɓe koyɗe jaraaɗe, e wumɓe, e laƴooɓe, e ɓe mbaawataa metuki, e woɓɓe ɗuɗɓe gooduɓe nyawuuji. Ɓe ndesiɓe yeeso maako, sey o yamɗitiniɓe.
40015031	Yimɓe kayɗini nde ngi'i yimɓe ɓe metataa e meta, laƴooɓe e njaha, ɓe koyɗe jaraaɗe e njaaɓa, wumɓe e ngi'a. Sey ɓe manti Allah Israa'iila.
40015032	Sey Yeesu noddi tokkuɓemo, wi'iɓe, “E mi nana jurumɗum yimɓe ɓe'e ngam hande balɗe maɓɓe tati e ɓe ngondi e am, ammaa ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe nyaamata. Mi yiɗaa ɓe ndillida e weelo, ngam ɗum saɗaa ɓe pekkora dow ɗatal.”
40015033	Sey tokkuɓemo mbi'imo, “Toye min keɓoyta buroodi nder ladde nde'e keƴayɗum yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ɓe'e?”
40015034	Yeesu ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Buroodi noye ngooduɗon?” Ɓe mbi'i, “Buroodi joweeɗiɗi e liƴƴi seɗɗa.”
40015035	Sey o wi'i yimɓe hawrutuɓe ɓen fuu ɓe njooɗoo e leydi.
40015036	O hocci buroodi joweeɗiɗi ɗum e liƴƴi ɗin, o yetti Allah, o sendiɗum, o hokki tokkuɓemo, kamɓe boo ɓe ngeedani yimɓe ɓen.
40015037	Yimɓe ɓen fuu nyaami kaari. Gaɗa maajum tokkuɓemo moɓti ko horii, ɗum heewi kondooje joweeɗiɗi.
40015038	Nyamɓe ɓen worɓe tan ngaɗi 4,000, rewɓe e sukaaɓe limaaka.
40015039	Gaɗa Yeesu jaɓɓitake hawrutuɓe ɓen, sey o natti komiwal, o dilli leydi Magadan.
40016001	Faarisanko'en e Saadusanko'en ngari to Yeesu, e ɓe ngiɗi foondukimo, sey ɓe mbi'imo o waɗanaɓe goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum ƴiwoyɗum to Allah.
40016002	Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “To naange hiirii, dow woojii, on mbi'a, ‘Jaango njayri wooɗay.’
40016003	Ɗonmaa to subaka waɗii on ngi'ii dow woojii e woodi duule koo toye, on mbi'a, ‘Hande ɗum waɗay iyeende.’ On mbaawi raaruki ko woni e dow andon ko waɗata, ammaa on mbaawataa faamuki ma'ana kuuɗe ɗe ngaɗaymi.
40016004	Yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um kalluɓe ɓe kulataa Allah, e ɓe ngiɗi holleeki goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum, ammaa walaa ko ɗum hollataɓe sey ni ko heɓuno Annabi Inuusa.” Sey o aliɓe o dilli.
40016005	Nde tokkuɓemo kuuli fongo mbeela, ɓe ngi'i ɓe ngejjitii ɓe ngardoya e buroodi.
40016006	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Paamee, ngaɗee hakkiilo e ƴuufinirɗum Faarisanko'en e Saadusanko'en.”
40016007	Sey tokkuɓemo meddi hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i, “O wi'u non ngam en ngaddaayi buroodi.”
40016008	Nde Yeesu faami ko ɓe mbi'ata, sey o ƴamiɓe, o wi'ii, “Onon gooduɓe hoolaare seɗɗa, ngam ɗume meddoton dow on ngalaa buroodi?
40016009	Haa jooni on paamaayi? On ciftoraayi no nyamnirmi yimɓe 5,000 e buroodi jowi, e kondooje sappo e ɗiɗi ɗe ɓoptuɗon e keewi horaano?
40016010	Ɗonmaa on ciftoraayi no nyamnirmi yimɓe 4,000 e buroodi joweeɗiɗi, e kondooje joweeɗiɗi ɗe ɓoptuɗon e keewi horaano?
40016011	No ɗum waɗi on paamaayi naa' dow buroodi metaymi? Mi wi'ii paamanee ƴuufinirɗum Faarisanko'en e Saadusanko'en.”
40016012	Nden tokkuɓemo keɓti naa' e mo metanaɓe ɓe paama dow ƴuufinirɗum gaɗeteeɗum nder buroodi, ammaa ɓe ngaɗa hakkiilo e ekkitinol Faarisanko'en e Saadusanko'en.
40016013	Nde Yeesu wari leydi Kaysaariya Filibi, sey o ƴami tokkuɓemo, o wi'i, “Moye yimɓe mbi'ata Ɓii Neɗɗo woni?”
40016014	Sey ɓe mbi'i, “Woɓɓe e mbi'a a Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma. Woɓɓe boo e mbi'a a Annabi Iliya. Nden woɓɓe e mbi'a a Annabi Irmiya koo go'oto nder annabo'en.”
40016015	O wi'iɓe, “Ammaa onon, moye mbi'otonyam?”
40016016	Sey Siiman Biiturus nootii, wi'i, “An woni Almasiihu, Ɓiɗɗo Allah mo yonki.”
40016017	Yeesu nootii wi'imo, “A barkiɗinaaɗo, Siiman ɓii Inuusa, ngam naa' ɗum neɗɗo wi'imaaka, sey ni Nyaako am Mo Dow.
40016018	E mi wi'imaa, an woni Biiturus, waato Tafaare. Dow tafaare nden njooɗinaymi tokkuɓeyam. Mayde fuu e bawɗe mayre waawataa jaalooɓe.
40016019	Mi hokkete maɓɓitirkoy Laamu Allah, fuu ko kaɗuɗaa e duuniyaaru, Allah Mo Dow jaɓi. Ɗonmaa fuu ko aluɗaa ɗum waɗa e duuniyaaru, Allah Mo Dow jaɓii.”
40016020	Sey Yeesu haɗi tokkuɓemo to' ɓe mbi'aka koo moye kanko woni Almasiihu.
40016021	Daga ngel ɗon carel Yeesu fuɗɗi wiiki tokkuɓemo doole o yaha Urucaliima, o yara bone ɗuɗɗum to juuɗe mawɓe yimɓe, e mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e moodiɓɓe Attawra, nden o waree. Nder nyalnde tatawre boo ɗum umminaymo.
40016022	Sey Biiturus noddimo wuttudu go'o fuɗɗi haɓankimo, e wi'a, “Allah hoyna, Moodibbo! Non heɓataama haa abadaa!”
40016023	Ammaa Yeesu waylitii, wi'i Biiturus, “Sendir e am, an Ceyɗan! A kaɗayɗoyam waɗuki ko Allah yiɗi, ngam naa' to Allah nyumo maaɗa ƴiwoyi, iri nyumo yimɓe nyumataa.”
40016024	Sey Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “Fuu giɗɗo warta tokkuɗoyam, doole wanya hoore muuɗum, hocca gaafaangal muuɗum, tokkayam.
40016025	Ngam fuu giɗɗo hisnuki yonki muuɗum o dullayki. Ammaa fuu dullayɗo yonki muuɗum ngam am o heɓayki.
40016026	Ko ɗum nafanta neɗɗo to o heɓii duuniyaaru fuu, ammaa dullii yonki maako? Koo boo ko neɗɗo waawata hokkuki ngam jaɓtoya yonki muuɗum?
40016027	Ngam Ɓii Neɗɗo waray nder teddungal Nyaako muuɗum Mo Dow e malaa'ika'en maako, o waatanay koo moye ko waɗi.
40016028	E mi wi'a'on goonga, e woodi woɓɓe dariiɓe ɗo'o ɓe maayataa naa ɓe ngi'ii Ɓii Neɗɗo e waroya nder laamu muuɗum.”
40017001	Gaɗa balɗe joweego'o, sey Yeesu hocci Biiturus e Yaakubu e minyiraawo maako Yahaya, o yaariɓe dow wonde hocceere townde kamɓe tan.
40017002	Sey nandi maako wayliti yeeso maɓɓe. Yeeso maako e ɗelkitoo bo naange. Kolte maako ngarti daneeje tar bo jayngol.
40017003	Ɗon e ɗon sey Annabi Muusa e Annabi Iliya wanganiɓe e ɓe medda e Yeesu.
40017004	Sey Biiturus wi'i Yeesu, “Moodibbo, wonki amin ɗo'o e wooɗi. Al min nyiɓa cuuɗi tati ɗo'o, wo'oyru ndu maaɗa, wo'oyru ndu Muusa, nden wo'oyru ndu Iliya.”
40017005	E mo nder metuki, sey raa wonga nduula ɗelkitotoonga wari suddiɓe. Ɓe nani hononde Allah daga nder maaga, wi'i, “O'o woni Ɓiɗɗo am mo ngiɗumi. E mi nana belɗum maako naa' seɗɗa. Nanee ko o wi'ata'on!”
40017006	Nde tokkuɓemo nani hononde nden, kulol mangol nangiɓe ɓe njani e leydi.
40017007	Sey Yeesu wari meemiɓe, wi'i, “Ummee, to' on kulu.”
40017008	Nde ɓe ƴefti ko'e, ɓe ngi'aayi goɗɗo sey Yeesu tan.
40017009	E ɓe njippoyoo daga dow hocceere nden, sey Yeesu wagginiɓe, wi'i, “To' on mbi'u goɗɗo ko ngiiɗon naa ɗum ummini Ɓii Neɗɗo daga mayde.”
40017010	Tokkuɓemo ƴamimo, mbi'i, “Too, ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe Attawra e mbi'a doole Annabi Iliya arta Almasiihu warki?”
40017011	O nootii, o wi'i, “Goonga Annabi Iliya artay warki, ngam o siryoo koo ɗume.
40017012	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, Iliya yaadake warii, ɓe boo keɓtaayi ɗum kanko, ammaa ɓe ngaɗanimo fuu ko ɓe ngiɗi. Non maa Ɓii Neɗɗo yaray bone e juuɗe maɓɓe.”
40017013	Nden tokkuɓemo paami e mo metanaɓe dow Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma.
40017014	Nde ɓe njottii to yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawriti, sey goɗɗo neɗɗo wari to Yeesu diccii yeeso maako wi'i,
40017015	“Moodibbo, yurminan suka am e woodi nyawu paɗɗe, e mo torroo naa' seɗɗa. Nde ɗuɗɗum e mo yana nder hiite e nder ndiyam.
40017016	Mi yaariimo to tokkuɓema, ammaa ɓe mbaawaayi yamɗitinkimo.”
40017017	Sey Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Onon yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um kalluɗum on koolaakiyam, haa ndeye njooɗodotoomi e mooɗon e mi munyida e mooɗon? Ngaddaneeyam suka on ɗo'o.”
40017018	Sey Yeesu haɓani ginnol ngol, ngol wurtii suka on, ɗon e ɗon o yamɗiti.
40017019	Sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴamimo ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume minon min mbaawaayi wurtinki ginnol ngol?”
40017020	Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “Ngam hoolaare mooɗon famɗii. E mi wi'a'on goonga, daa on ngoodi hoolaaki famɗirki bo gabbel mastat, on mbaaway mbi'on hocceere nde'e, ‘Itta daga ɗo'o, yahu ɗaa'e,’ sey nde waɗa ko mbiiɗon. Walaa boo ko salorta'on.
40017021	[Ammaa iri ngo'ol ginnol ngol wurtataako sey e do'aare e suumaaki.]”
40017022	Nde Yeesu e tokkuɓemo kawriti e leydi Galiili, sey o wi'iɓe, “Ɗum hokkitiray Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe yimɓe,
40017023	ɓe mbaramo, e nyalnde tatawre ɗum umminaymo.” Sey fii ɗum wanni tokkuɓemo naa' seɗɗa.
40017024	Nde Yeesu e tokkuɓemo njottii gariiri Kafarnahum, jaɓooɓe ceede ngam Wuro Ceniingo ngari to Biiturus, ɓe mbi'imo, “Moodibbo mooɗon e hokka ceede walluki Wuro Ceniingo?”
40017025	O wi'i, “Ee, e mo hokka.” Nde Biiturus warti wuro, sey Yeesu arti metankimo, wi'i, “No ngiiɗaa, Biiturus? To ɓeye laamiiɓe duuniyaaru ndu'u njaɓata ceede leydi, to ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe koo to woɓɓe?”
40017026	Nde Biiturus wi'i, “To woɓɓe,” sey Yeesu wi'i, “Too, ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe njoɓataa won ɗon.
40017027	Fuu e non, ngam to' ɓe nana monnere meeɗen, yahu mbeela ngaɗaa nangirɗum liƴƴi maaɗa. Fuu lingu ngu artuɗaa nanguki, maɓɓutu honduko maagu a taway yamnde ajurfaari nder. Hoccunde, kokkaaɓe njoɓaari Wuro Ceniingo ngam min e maaɗa.”
40018001	E ngel ɗon carel tokkuɓe Yeesu ngari ƴamimo, mbi'i, “Moye ɓuri mangu fuu nder Laamu Allah?”
40018002	Sey Yeesu noddi wongel sukayel pamarel darningel caka maɓɓe,
40018003	wi'i, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, to naa' on lestin ko'e mooɗon ngartuɗon bo sukahoy, on nattataa Laamu Allah koo seɗɗa!
40018004	Fuu lestinɗo hoore muuɗum bo sukayel pamarel nge'el, kanko woni ɓurɗo mangu nder Laamu Allah.
40018005	Nden fuu jaɓuɗo sukayel pamarel bo nge'el nder inde am jaɓiiyam.
40018006	“Ammaa fuu gaɗuɗo go'oto nder sukaaɓe ɓe'e kooliiɓeyam waɗi hakke, ɗum ɓuranaymo o haɓɓanee kaaƴa namol manga e daande maako ɗum faɗɗamo nder mbeela luggunga.
40018007	Duuniyaaru wonii ngam e woodi ko fooɗata yimɓe ngaɗa hakke! Ngam doole ko fooɗata yimɓe ngaɗa hakke wara, fuu e non fooɗuɗo goɗɗo waɗi hakke wonii.
40018008	“To jungo maaɗa koo koyngal maaɗa e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, too, ittungo paɗɗaango, koo ittungal paɗɗaangal. Ɗum ɓuraniima nattaa wuro Allah e jungo wo'oto koo koyngal go'otal dow ɗum hubomaa nder hiite nge nyifataa haa abadaa e juuɗe ɗiɗi koo koyɗe ɗiɗi.
40018009	To boo hitere maaɗa e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittunde paɗɗaande. Ɗum ɓuraniima nattaa wuro Allah e hitere go'o dow ɗum hubomaa nder wuro hiite e gite ɗiɗi.
40018010	“Paamee, to' on njawan koo go'oto nder sukahoy pamaroy ko'oy. Ngam e mi wi'a'on, malaa'ika'en maakoy ton dow koo ndeye e ndaara yeeso Nyaako am Mo Dow.
40018011	[Nden Ɓii Neɗɗo waroyii ngam hisna ko majji.]
40018012	“Too, ko nyumoton? To neɗɗo e woodi baali 100, sey go'o nder baali ɗin majji, naa' o alay koriiɗi ley hocceere, o dilla ɗaɓɓutuki mbaala majjunga ngan?
40018013	E mi wi'a'on goonga, to o heɓtoyiinga, belɗum ɗum o nanata dow maaga ɗum ɓurii ɗum baali koriiɗi ɗin ɗi meeɗaayi majjuki.
40018014	Non Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow yiɗaa koo go'oto nder sukaaɓe pamarɓe ɓe'e halka.
40018015	“To bandiraawo maaɗa waɗaniima ko wooɗaa, yahu mbi'aamo ko wooɗaa ɗum o waɗanmaa, an e maako tan. To o jaɓii, a wartirii sumpo hakkunde mooɗon won ɗon.
40018016	Ammaa to o wanyii jaɓuki, sey fuɗɗitaa co''odoɗaa e neɗɗo go'oto koo ɗiɗo to maako, ngam ‘doole ɗum heɓa ceydu'en ɗiɗo koo tato ko ɗum tabbitina haala.’
40018017	To boo o wanyii ko ɓe mbi'i kamɓe maa, sey mbi'aaka kawtal tokkuɓeyam. Ɗonmaa to o wanyii nanki kawtal tokkuɓeyam, hoccumo bo mo andaa Allah koo gooduɗo hakke ganyuɗo tuuba.
40018018	“E mi wi'a'on goonga, fuu ko kaɗuɗon e duuniyaaru, Allah Mo Dow jaɓi. Ɗonmaa fuu ko aluɗon ɗum waɗa e duuniyaaru, Allah Mo Dow jaɓi.
40018019	“Ɗonmaa, e mi wi'a'on, to yimɓe ɗiɗo nder mooɗon kawtii ko'e torake goɗɗum e duuniyaaru, Nyaako am Mo Dow waɗanayɓeɗum.
40018020	Ngam to yimɓe ɗiɗo koo tato kawriti nder inde am, e mi wondi e maɓɓe.”
40018021	Sey Biiturus ɓaddoyii wi'i Yeesu, “Moodibbo, nde noye bandiraawo am e waɗanayam ko wooɗaa e mi yaafanoomo? Nde joweeɗiɗi?”
40018022	Yeesu nootii wi'imo, “Naa' nde joweeɗiɗi tan, ammaa joweeɗiɗi nde cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi.
40018023	Ngam non, ɗum nandinay Laamu Allah e goɗɗo laamiiɗo giɗɗo lima jawdi muuɗum ngondi jungo kuwanooɓemo.
40018024	Nde o fuɗɗi limukindi, sey ɗum waddanimo goɗɗo mo o tokkata nyamaande ceede ɗe o waawataa yoɓuki haa keerol jonde maako e duuniyaaru.
40018025	Nde o tampi yoɓuki, sey laamiiɗo on waɗi ɗum sooramo e debbo maako e ɓiɓɓe maako e koo ɗume ko o woodi ngam ɗum yoɓa ceede ɗen.
40018026	Sey maccuɗo on diccii yeeso maako, toriimo, wi'i, ‘Waɗu munyal. Mi yoɓete koo ɗume.’
40018027	Sey laamiiɗo on nani jurumɗum maccuɗo on yaafaniimo nyamaande nden yoofimo.
40018028	“Ammaa maccuɗo on e wurtaaki maako o tawi goɗɗo mo o huudata mo o tokkata nyamaande ceede ɗe ɗum yoɓata kuwoowo to ngesa lebbi jowi. O ɗeɗɗanimo daande, o wi'imo, ‘Yoɓam ko tokkaymaami!’
40018029	Sey mo o huudata on dicci toriimo, wi'i, ‘Waɗanam munyal mi yoɓete.’
40018030	Ammaa o wanyi, o waɗi ɗum maɓɓimo nder suudu cural sey nde o yoɓimo ko o tokkatamo.
40018031	Nde higooɓe kuugal maako ngi'i non, ɓe nganni naa' seɗɗa. Sey ɓe njahi ɓe mbi'ika laamiiɗo on fuu ko waɗi.
40018032	“Sey laamiiɗo on noddi maccuɗo on, wi'imo, ‘An a maccuɗo kalluɗo! Mi yaafanakema fuu nyamaande nde tokkaymaami ngam a torakeyam.
40018033	Too, haanaayi njurminanaa mo kuudataa non no njurminiranmaami?’
40018034	Laamiiɗo on nani monnere naa' seɗɗa, o waɗi ɗum nangimo ɗum waɗa ka torrukimo naa o yoɓii koo ɗume ko ɗum tokkatamo.
40018035	“Non Nyaako am Mo Dow waɗanta koo moye mooɗon mo yaafanaaki bandiraawo muuɗum e ɓernde go'o.”
40019001	Nde Yeesu heenyi wiiki fii ɗu'um, sey o ali leydi Galiili o natti leydi Yahuudiya ngondi fongo Caangol Urdun.
40019002	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkimo, o yamɗitini nyawɓe ton.
40019003	Sey woɓɓe Faarisanko'en ngari to maako ngam ɓe poondamo, ɓe ƴamimo, ɓe mbi'i, “E yiiki maaɗa Attawra alii neɗɗo yoofa debbo muuɗum?”
40019004	O nootii, o wi'i, “Too, on meeɗaayi janguki aayaare biinde taguɗo yimɓe daga fuɗɗoode taguki o tagiiɓe gorko e debbo?
40019005	O wi'ii, ‘Ngam non neɗɗo alay nyaako muuɗum e maduujo muuɗum takkanoo debbo muuɗum, kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ngarta go'o.’
40019006	Ngam non naa' ɓe ɗiɗo kadin, ammaa ɓe ngartii neɗɗo go'oto. Ngam maajum ko Allah hawti, to' neɗɗo sendaɗum.”
40019007	Sey ɓe mbi'imo, “Too, ngam ɗume Annabi Muusa wi'i neɗɗo windana debbo muuɗum ɗerewol warki teegal wi'amo o dilla?”
40019008	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɓerɗe mooɗon ɗe caatuɗe waɗi Muusa ali'on njoofon rewɓe mooɗon, ammaa naa' non ɗum woni daga arande.
40019009	E mi wi'a'on, koo moye yoofi debbo muuɗum, to naa' njeenu o waɗi, nden te'i goɗɗo debbo, waɗii njeenu won ɗon.”
40019010	Sey tokkuɓemo mbi'imo, “To non ɗum woni hakkunde neɗɗo e debbo muuɗum, too, ciya teegal maa ɓurii.”
40019011	Ammaa o wi'iɓe, “Naa' koo moye waawata jaɓuki haala ka'a, sey ni ɓe Allah wawni.
40019012	Ngam e woodi ɓe ɗum danyi ngorgu maɓɓe e waati. E woodi woɓɓe boo ɓe yimɓe tappi. Nden e woodi woɓɓe ɓe te'ataa ngam ɗaɓɓutuki Laamu Allah. Fuu baawayɗo jaɓuki haala ka'a jaɓaka.”
40019013	Sey ɗum waddani Yeesu sukahoy pamaroy ngam o yowanakoy juuɗe o waɗanakoy do'aare. Ammaa tokkuɓemo kaɓani gaddayɓekoy.
40019014	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Alee sukahoy pamaroy ngara to am. To' on kaɗukoy, ngam gooduɓe ɓerɗe iri ɗe maakoy njeyi Laamu Allah.”
40019015	Sey o yowanikoy juuɗe maako ngam barkiɗinki, nden o dilli.
40019016	Sey goɗɗo ɓaddoyii to Yeesu wi'i, “Moodibbo, ɗume fii geetum haani mi waɗa ngam mi heɓa yonki ki re'ataa?”
40019017	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Ngam ɗume ƴamataayam dow geetum? E woodi geeto go'oto tan. Taa yiɗi keɓaa yonki ki re'ataa, tokku ko Attawra wi'i.”
40019018	Sey o wi'i Yeesu, “Ɗume Attawra wi'i?” Sey Yeesu wi'i, “Taa' waɗu warhoore. Taa' waɗu njeenu. Taa' wujju. Taa' hokku ceyda fewre.
40019019	Hokku nyaako maaɗa e maduujo maaɗa mangu. Yiɗu bandiraawo maaɗa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maaɗa.”
40019020	Sey kayeejo on wi'imo, “E mi waɗa fuu fii ɗu'um. Ko horaniiyam kadin?”
40019021	Yeesu wi'imo, “Taa yiɗi ngartaa kewɗo, yahu, cooraa ko ngooduɗaa fuu, kokkaa ɓe ngalanaa ceede ɗen, nden a heɓay mbarjaari ton dow. Nden ngaraa, tokkaayam.”
40019022	Nde kayeejo on nani non, o dilli o nanaayi belɗum, ngam e mo woodi risku ɗuɗɗum.
40019023	Sey Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, e ɗum saɗi naa' seɗɗa diskuɗo natta Laamu Allah.
40019024	Ɗonmaa e mi wi'a'on, ɗum ɓuray hoyki ngeelooba tokka nder yolnde baatal dow diskuɗo natta Laamu Allah.”
40019025	Nde tokkuɓemo nani non, ɓe kayɗini naa' seɗɗa, ɓe mbi'i, “Too, to ɗum non, moye hisata?”
40019026	Ammaa Yeesu raariɓe, wi'i, “To yimɓe ɗum waɗataako, ammaa to Allah koo ɗume ɗum gaɗotooɗum.”
40019027	Sey Biiturus wi'i, “Too, raɗɗum, minon min alii koo ɗume min tokkiima. Ko min keɓata?”
40019028	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, e jaamanu garayɗum, to Ɓii Neɗɗo jooɗake dow jooɗorgal laamu muuɗum ɗum teddungal, onon tokkuɓeyam onon maa on njooɗoto dow jooɗorle laamu sappo e ɗiɗi, on laamoo lenyi Israa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi.
40019029	Ɗonmaa koo moye aluɗo gureeje, koo sakiraaɓe muuɗum worɓe koo rewɓe, koo nyaako, koo maduujo, koo ɓiɓɓe, koo gese ngam am, o heɓay ko ɓuri non nde 100, nden o heɓay yonki ki re'ataa.
40019030	Ammaa yimɓe ɗuɗɓe artuɓe ɓe ngartay cakitiiɓe, nden cakitiiɓe ngartay artuɓe.
40020001	“Laamu Allah e nandi e goɗɗo joomu ngesa burtiiɗo ilaa subaka ngam o heɓa huwooɓe to ngesa inabooje maako.
40020002	O waadi e maɓɓe o yoɓayɓe yamnde ajurfaari go'o e nyalnde, sey o wi'iɓe ɓe njaha ngesa kan.
40020003	Nde o wurtii faro njamndi joweenayi subaka, sey o yi'i woɓɓe e njooɗii e meere nder luumo.
40020004	Sey o wi'iɓe, ‘Onon maa njahee ngesa am, mi yoɓay'on ko haani.’ Sey ɓe njahi.
40020005	Nde o fuɗɗiti o wurtii, o waɗi non faro caka nyalawma e faro njamndi tati alaasara.
40020006	Faro njamndi jowi alaasara o fuɗɗiti o wurtii o tawi woɓɓe e ndarii, o wi'iɓe, ‘Ngam ɗume nyalluɗon on ndarii e meere?’
40020007	Sey ɓe mbi'imo, ‘Ngam walaa koccuɗomin kuugal.’ Sey o wi'iɓe, ‘Onon maa njahee ngesa am.’
40020008	“Nde futuro waɗi, joomu ngesa on wi'i paamanoowo kuugal ngesa kan, ‘Noddoy huwooɓe ɓen, njoɓaaɓe njoɓaari maɓɓe, artiraa cakitiiɓe ɓen haa yaaki arande'en ɓen.’
40020009	Nde koccaaɓe faro njamndi jowi alaasara ngari, koo moye hokkaa yamnde ajurfaari go'o.
40020010	Ngam non, nde arande'en ngari, e ɓe kammii ɓe keɓay ko ɓuri non, ammaa koo moye maɓɓe hokkaa yamnde ajurfaari go'o.
40020011	Nde ɓe njaɓi ceede ɗen, ɓe metitani joomu ngesa on,
40020012	e ɓe mbi'a, ‘Ɓe'e cakitiiɓe e waruki, carel seɗɗa tan ɓe kuwi, nden a hokkiiɓe no kokkuɗaamin, minon nyalluɓe nder naange e kuwa.’
40020013	Sey o nootii, o wi'i go'oto nder maɓɓe, ‘Higo, mi hallanaayima. Naa' en ngaadii dow yamnde ajurfaari go'o e nyalnde?
