40020014	Jaɓu njoɓaari maaɗa, ndillaa. Min yiɗi hokkuki cakitiiɓe ɓen no kokkumaami.
40020015	Mi walaa laamu mi waɗa no ngiɗumi waɗuki e ceede am? Koo a nana lawliiru ngam mi waɗi ko wooɗi?’ ”
40020016	Nden o yottini e wiiki, “Non yimɓe cakitiiɓe ɓe ngartay artuɓe, nden artuɓe ngartay cakitiiɓe.”
40020017	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo e dow ɗatal yaaki Urucaliima, sey o noddiɓe wuttudu laawol, o wi'iɓe,
40020018	“Raɗɗum, en njahay Urucaliima, nden ɗum waɗay Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra. Ɓe taƴanaymo kiita mayde,
40020019	ɓe ngaɗamo nder juuɗe heeferɓe ɓe njukkitamo, ɓe piyamo, ɓe mbaramo dow gaafaangal. Nden nyalnde tatawre ɗum umminaymo daga mayde.”
40020020	Sey maduujo ɓiɓɓe Jabadi wari to Yeesu e ɓiɓɓe maako o diccii yeeso maako, ngam o toroomo goɗɗum.
40020021	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Ko ngiɗɗaa?” Maduujo on wi'imo, “Waɗu ɓiɓɓe am ɓe'e ɗiɗo njooɗoo wuttudu jooɗorgal maaɗa nder Laamu maaɗa, go'oto nyaamo maaɗa go'oto nano maaɗa.”
40020022	Ammaa Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “On andaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaaway njaron iri jardugel torra ngel njaraymi yeeso ɗo'o?” Ɓe mbi'imo, “Ee, min mbaaway.”
40020023	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ee, on njaray iri jardugel torra ngel njaraymi, ammaa jooɗaaki e jungo am nyaamo e jungo am nano naa' min hokkataɗum. Ɗe'e bigeeje ɗum ɗe ɓen ɗon ɓe Nyaako am Mo Dow siryanii.”
40020024	Nde horiiɓe tokkuɓe Yeesu sappo nani non, ɓe puɗɗi monnanki Yaakubu e Yahaya.
40020025	Ammaa Yeesu noddiɓe ɓe fuu, wi'iɓe, “On andi laamiiɓe yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en e kollaɓe laamu sembe, nden mawɓe maɓɓe maa e kolla ɓural.
40020026	Ammaa onon, to' on ngaɗu non hakkunde mooɗon. Fuu giɗɗo warta mawɗo nder mooɗon doole warta jaggantooɗo'on.
40020027	Kadin fuu giɗɗo warta ardiiɗo mooɗon, doole o warta maccuɗo mooɗon.
40020028	Non maa Ɓii Neɗɗo warii naa' ngam o jagganee, ammaa ngam o jagganoo yimɓe, o hokka yonki maako ngam rimɗinki ɗuɗɓe.”
40020029	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo e mburtoo gariiri Jeriiko, sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkimo.
40020030	Sey raa wumɓe ɗiɗo e njooɗii haade ɗatal. Nde ɓe nani Yeesu e ƴaɓɓoo, sey ɓe noddi sembee, “Moodibbo, Ɓiɗɗo Dawda, yurminanmin!”
40020031	Kawrutuɓe ɓen kaɓaniɓe ɓe nde''ita, ammaa ɓe ɓeydi nodduki e sembe, e ɓe mbi'a, “Moodibbo, Ɓiɗɗo Dawda, yurminanmin!”
40020032	Sey Yeesu darii, noddiɓe, wi'i, “Ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana'on?”
40020033	Ɓe mbi'imo, “Moodibbo, e min ngiɗi mbumtinaamin.”
40020034	Yeesu nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe. Ɗon e ɗon gite maɓɓe mbumti, ɓe tokkimo.
40021001	Nde Yeesu e tokkuɓemo ɓadii gariyel Betafaaji haade Urucaliima to Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun, sey o lili tokkuɓemo ɗiɗo.
40021002	O wi'iɓe, “Njahee nder gariyel gongel yeeso meeɗen. E nattuki mooɗon, on taway mbabba e haɓɓii e ɓinga maaga. Pittoyeeɗi ngaddanonyamɗi.
40021003	To goɗɗo metanii'on, mbi'ee, ‘Moodibbo e yiɗi huutiraɗi, o waɗay ɗum wartiraɗi naa' ko neeɓi.’ ”
40021004	Non waɗii ngam ɗum hebbina ko Allah wi'i daga honduko Annabi Jakaariya, wiiki,
40021005	“Mbi'ee yimɓe Urucaliima, ‘Raa laamiiɗo mooɗon e wara to mooɗon! O lestinɗo hoore e mo dow mbabba, e dow mbabba mola pamara.’ ”
40021006	Sey tokkuɓemo ɓen ndilli, ngaɗi ko Yeesu wi'iɓe.
40021007	Ɓe njaari mbabba ngan e ɓinga maaga, ɓe mbe''iti cuddaari maɓɓe dow maaji, o ƴenti o jooɗi.
40021008	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe hawrutuɓe mbe''iti cuddaari maɓɓe dow ɗatal ngal, woɓɓe boo ngewoyi haako to leɗɗe e mbe''itako dow ɗatal.
40021009	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe yahooɓe yeeso Yeesu e tokkirɓemo gaɗa e ɓe mbi'a e sembe, “Hosaana to Ɓiɗɗo Dawda! O barkiɗinaaɗo garoyɗo nder inde Joomiraawo! En mantu Allah Mo Dow!”
40021010	Nde Yeesu natti Urucaliima, hakkiilo yimɓe gariiri ndin fuu ummii, e ɓe mbi'a, “Ɗum moye o'o?”
40021011	Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ɓen jaadooɓe e Yeesu mbi'i, “Ɗum Yeesu, annabiijo daga gariiri Najarat nder leydi Galiili.”
40021012	Sey Yeesu natti Wuro Ceniingo riiwi soorooɓe e soodooɓe nder maggo. O talli teeburji gaylitooɓe ceede Roomanko'en yaaki ceede Wuro Ceniingo e jooɗorle coorooɓe pooli.
40021013	O wi'iɓe, “Ɗum windaama Allah wi'ii, ‘Ɗum noddiray wuro am wuro do'aare,’ ammaa on ngartiriingo luuro wuyɓe!”
40021014	Sey wumɓe e laƴooɓe ngari to maako nder Wuro Ceniingo, o yamɗitiniɓe.
40021015	Ammaa mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra nani monnere nde ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ɗe o waɗi, haa sukahoy e mbi'a e sembe nder Wuro Ceniingo, “Hosaana to Ɓiɗɗo Dawda!”
40021016	Ɓe mbi'imo, “A nana ko sukaaɓe ɓe'e mbi'ata?” Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Ee. On meeɗaayi janguki aayaare biinde, ‘An siryi sukahoy pamaroy e musinaykoy mantumaa?’ ”
40021017	Sey o dilli o aliɓe o wurtii gariiri ndin o yahi Betani o waali ton.
40021018	Nde weeti Yeesu e wartoya gariiri Urucaliima o nani weelo.
40021019	Nde o yi'i wokki ibbi haade ɗatal, o yahi to maaki, ammaa o tawaayi goɗɗum to maaki sey haako tan. Sey o wi'iki, “Taa' fuɗɗutu ndimaa haa abadaa!” Ɗon e ɗon ki yoori.
40021020	Nde tokkuɓemo ngi'i non, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe mbi'i, “No ɗum waɗi ibbi ki'i yoori ɗon e ɗon?”
40021021	Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, to on ngoodi hoolaare, on ngalaa seko koo seɗɗa, on mbaaway ngaɗon ko ɓuri ko ngaɗanmi ibbi ki'i, haa maa to on mbi'ii hocceere nde'e, ‘Ɗoofa daga ɗo'o, kuboɗaa hoore maaɗa nder mbeela,’ sey nde waɗa non.
40021022	To on ngoodi hoolaare, fuu ko toriiɗon Allah on keɓayɗum.”
40021023	Nde Yeesu natti Wuro Ceniingo e mo nder ekkitinki, sey mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe ngari to maako mbi'i, “E laamu moye ngaɗataa kuuɗe ɗe'e? Moye hokkumaa laamu ɗum?”
40021024	Sey Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “Min maa mi ƴamay'on. To on nootanakeyam, nden mi wi'ay'on e ɗume laamu ngaɗiraymi kuuɗe ɗe'e.
40021025	Too, baptisma ɗum Yahaya waɗi, to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi koo to yimɓe?” Sey ɓe meddi hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i, “To en mbi'ii, ‘Daga to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi,’ o wi'ay'en, ‘Ko waɗi on jaɓaayi ko o wi'i?’
40021026	Ammaa to en mbi'ii, ‘To yimɓe ɗum ƴiwoyi,’ en kula ko yimɓe ngaɗanta'en, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe njaɓii Yahaya o annabiijo.”
40021027	Ngam non ɓe nootii, ɓe mbi'i Yeesu, “Min andaa.” Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Non min maa, mi wi'ataa'on koo e ɗume laamu ngaɗiraymi kuuɗe ɗe'e.
40021028	“Too, no ngiiɗon? E woodi goɗɗo gooduɗo sukaaɓe ɗiɗo. O yahi to suka arandeejo on, o wi'i, ‘Ɓiɗɗo am, hande yahu ngesa inabooje kuwaa.’
40021029	Sey suka on wi'imo, ‘Mi yahataa.’ Ammaa daga gaɗa suka on wayliti nyumo muuɗum yahi.
40021030	Sey nyaako on yahi to suka ɗiɗaɓo on wi'imo ko wi'i on ton suka arandeejo on. Suka on nootii, wi'i, ‘Too, mi yahay, Bappa,’ ammaa o yahaayi.
40021031	Too, nder maɓɓe moye waɗi ko nyaako on yiɗi?” Sey ɓe mbi'i, “Arandeejo on.” Yeesu wi'iɓe, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e kaaruwa'en e ɓe arta'on nattuki Laamu Allah.
40021032	Ngam Yahaya warii hollii'on laawol aadilaaku, on koolaakimo. Ammaa jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e kaaruwa'en koolakemo. Koo nde ngiiɗon non, daga gaɗa on tuubaayi kooliiɗonmo.
40021033	“Too, raa goɗɗum misaalu. E woodi goɗɗo joomu ngesa gaɗuɗo ngesa inabooje, o howika, o wasi ngayka mawka nder tafaare ngam moyluki ndiyam daga nder inabooje ɗen, o mahi suudu towndu ngam reenuki ngesa kan. Sey o hokkika woɓɓe remooɓe mo''inaka, o dilli wondi leydi.
40021034	Nde carel ɓenduki inabooje ɗen waɗi, o lili maccuɓe maako to ɓe o hokki ngesa kan ngam ɓe njaɓonoyamo ko ɓe ngaaduno nder ko ɓendi.
40021035	Ammaa ɓe nangiɓe ɓe piyi go'oto, ɓe mbari go'oto, ɓe kuborii go'oto kaaƴe.
40021036	Sey o fuɗɗiti o lili woɓɓe maccuɓe maako ɓurɓe arande'en ɗuuɗuki. Kamɓe maa remooɓe ɓen ngaɗaniɓe non no ɓe ngaɗani arande'en ɓen.
40021037	Gaɗa ɗon joomu ngesa on lili ɓiɗɗo maako to remooɓe ɓen, e mo wi'a, ‘Ɓe kokkay ɓiɗɗo am mangu.’
40021038	Ammaa nde ɓe o hokki ngesa kan ngi'i ɓiɗɗo on, sey ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe, ‘Too! Raa donoowo joomu ngesa kan. Ngaree mbarenmo, ndonu ngesa kan warta ɗum meeɗen.’
40021039	Sey ɓe nangimo, ɓe mburtinimo nder ngesa kan, ɓe mbarimo.
40021040	“Too, to joomu ngesa on warii, ko o waɗanta ɓe o hokki ngesa ɓen?”
40021041	Sey ɓe mbi'imo, “O waɗanay kalluɓe ɓen ɗon wokki warki kalluki. O hokka woɓɓe ngesa kan kokkayɓemo daga nder ko ɓendi.”
40021042	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On meeɗaayi janguki ko aayaaje mbi'i? Ɗe mbi'i, ‘Hayre nde mahooɓe nganyi, kayre warti hayre ɓurnde darnuki maadi. Ɗu'um ɗum kuugal Joomiraawo, ɗum kayɗiniiɗum to meeɗen!’
40021043	“Ngam non e mi wi'a'on, ɗum jaɓay Laamu Allah to mooɗon ɗum hokkaɗum woɓɓe gaɗayɓe ko Allah yiɗi.
40021044	Koo moye yanoyi dow hayre nden yewi yewinay; ammaa to hayre nden yanii dow goɗɗo, nde namaymo bo condi.”
40021045	Nde mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e Faarisanko'en nani misaalu feere‑feere ɗum o hokki, sey ɓe paami dow maɓɓe o meti.
40021046	Sey ɓe ɗaɓɓiti laawol no ɓe nangirtamo, ammaa e ɓe kula yimɓe, ngam yimɓe ɓen njaɓii o annabiijo.
40022001	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗiti metiraniɓe misaalu, wi'i,
40022002	“Ɗum nandinay Laamu Allah e goɗɗo laamiiɗo ciryaniiɗo ɓiɗɗo muuɗum humto teegal.
40022003	O lili maccuɓe maako noddoya kumpitaaɓe humto ngon, ammaa kumpitaaɓe ɓen nganyi ngara.
40022004	Sey o fuɗɗiti o lili woɓɓe maccuɓe maako, o wi'i, ‘Njahee mbi'on kumpitaaɓe ɓen, “Raɗɗum mi siryake nyamndu, ɗum hirsii ga'i e nyalbi payɗi, koo ɗume siryaama. Ngaree humto teegal ngal!” ’
40022005	Ammaa kumpitaaɓe ɓen ngannaayi. Go'oto yahi ngesa muuɗum, go'oto yahi luumo muuɗum.
40022006	Horiiɓe ɓen nangi maccuɓe ɓen torriɓe, mbariɓe.
40022007	Sey laamiiɗo on ɓerni naa' seɗɗa, lili sooji'en muuɗum ɓe kalki ɓen ɗon gaɗuɓe warhoore ɓe nguli gariiri maɓɓe.
40022008	Sey o wi'i maccuɓe maako, ‘Humto teegal ngon siryaama, ammaa kumpitaaɓe ɓen ɓe potaayi warki.
40022009	Ngam non njahee dow ɗate mawɗe, kumpiton fuu mo ngiiɗon wara humto ngon.’
40022010	Sey maccuɓe ɓen njahi dow ɗate ɗen ɓe ɓoptoyi koo moye mo ɓe tawi, fuu kalluɓe e ɓe ngikku boɗɗum, haa wuro humto ngon heewi hoɓɓe.
40022011	“Ammaa nde laamiiɗo on nattoyi ngam yi'a hoɓɓe ɓen, o yi'i goɗɗo nder maɓɓe mo ɓornaaki limce humto teegal.
40022012	Sey o wi'imo, ‘Higo, no ɗum waɗi nattoyɗaa ɗo'o a ɓornaaki limce humto?’ Ammaa neɗɗo on dulli ko wi'ata.
40022013	Sey laamiiɗo on wi'i kuwanooɓemo, ‘Kaɓɓee neɗɗo o'o juuɗe e koyɗe, paɗɗonmo nder nyiwre kallunde, to ɗum woyata ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.’ ”
40022014	Yeesu ɓeydi wiiki, “Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kumpitaa, ammaa seɗɗa cuɓaa.”
40022015	Sey Faarisanko'en njahi kawti ko'e, kaɓɓi dabare no ɓe nangirta Yeesu dow ko o wi'i.
40022016	Sey ɓe liloyi tokkuɓeɓe e yimɓe Hirudus, ɓe mbi'i, “Moodibbo, e min andi ko mbi'ataa e ko ngaɗataa ɗum goonga, a ekkitina dow laawol Allah e goonga, a hulataa ko yimɓe mbi'ata dow maaɗa, a hollataa feerootirol hakkunde yimɓe.
40022017	Too, wi'umin, e yiiki maaɗa e haani min njoɓa Kaysar ceede leydi koo ɗum haanaayi?”
40022018	Ammaa Yeesu heɓti halleende maɓɓe, o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume poondotonyam, onon munaafuki'en?
40022019	Kolleeyam yamnde nde ɗum yoɓirta ceede leydi.” Sey ɓe ngaddanimo yamnde go'o.
40022020	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ɗowdi moye e inde moye woni dow mayre?”
40022021	Ɓe nootii, ɓe mbi'i, “Ɗum Kaysar.” Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Too, ngam non kokkee Kaysar ko woni ɗum Kaysar, nden kokkon Allah ko woni ɗum Allah.”
40022022	Nde ɓe nani non, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe alimo, ɓe ndilli.
40022023	Saadusanko'en e mbi'a walaa ummaaki mayɓe. E nyalnde nden, sey woɓɓe maɓɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe ƴamimo, ɓe mbi'i,
40022024	“Moodibbo, Annabi Muusa wi'ii to neɗɗo te'ii debbo maayii danyidaayi e maako, sakiraawo maako sey te'amo ngam heɓana sakiraawo muuɗum mayɗo ɓiɓɓe.
40022025	Too, ndenno e woodi woɓɓe sakiraaɓe worɓe njoweeɗiɗo nder amin. Afo on te'i debbo, maayi. Nde o danyidaayi e debbo on, o alanimo sakiraawo maako.
40022026	Non maa ɗiɗaɓo on e tataɓo on haa njoweeɗiɗaɓo on waɗii non.
40022027	Gaɗa maajum debbo on maa maayi.
40022028	Too, nyalnde nde mayɓe ummotoo debbo on wartay debbo moye nder maɓɓe? Ngam ɓe fuu ɓe te'iimo.”
40022029	Sey Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “On mboofii ngam on andaa ko aayaaje mbi'i, nden on andaa bawɗe Allah.
40022030	To mayɓe ummake daga mayde, walaa te'ayɗo walaa te'eteeɗo, ammaa ɓe ngartay bo malaa'ika'en Allah.
40022031	Nden dow ummaaki mayɓe daga mayde, on meeɗaayi janguki ko Allah wi'i'on? E ɗum windi wiiki,
40022032	‘Min woni Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakubu.’ Kanko naa' o Allah mayɓe, ammaa o Allah gooduɓe yonki.”
40022033	Nde hawrutuɓe ɗon nani non, ɓe kayɗini dow ekkitinol maako.
40022034	Ko Yeesu wi'i waɗi Saadusanko'en ndullii ko mbi'a. Nde Faarisanko'en nani non, sey ɓe kawriti.
40022035	Go'oto nder maɓɓe, moodibbo Attawra, ƴami Yeesu ngam foondamo, wi'i,
40022036	“Moodibbo, ɗume dooka ɓuri mangu fuu nder Attawra?”
40022037	Yeesu wi'imo, “ ‘Yiɗu Joomiraawo Allah maaɗa e ɓernde maaɗa fuu, e yonki maaɗa fuu, e hakkiilo maaɗa fuu.’
40022038	Ɗu'um woni dooka mawɗum arandejum.
40022039	Ɗiɗaɓum maa e fottidi e arandejum ɗum. ‘Yiɗu bandiraawo maaɗa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maaɗa.’
40022040	Dow ɗu'um dooka ɗiɗum Attawra e Defte Annabo'en ndarii.”
40022041	Nde Faarisanko'en kawriti, Yeesu ƴamiɓe,
40022042	wi'i, “Ɗume nyumoton dow Almasiihu? O ɓiɗɗo moye?” Ɓe mbi'imo, “O ɓiɗɗo Dawda.”
40022043	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Too, no ɗum waɗi Dawda nder bawɗe Ruuhu Allah noddi Almasiihu ‘Joomiraawo?’ O wi'i,
40022044	‘Joomiraawo wi'ii Joomiraawo am, “Jooɗa to jungo am nyaamo, naa mi waɗii a yaaɓii wanywanyɓe maaɗa.” ’
40022045	Nde Dawda noddii Almasiihu ‘Joomiraawo,’ too, no ɗum waɗata o warta ɓiɗɗo Dawda?”
40022046	Walaa bawɗo nootanaakimo. Daga nden ɗon nyalnde walaa gaɗuɗo sembe ɓernde ƴamimo wongol ƴamol.
40023001	Yeesu metani hawrutuɓe e tokkuɓemo, wi'i,
40023002	“Moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en kokkaama laamu hokkuki yimɓe ma'ana ko Muusa windi.
40023003	Ngam non, ngaɗee fuu ko ɓe ekkitini'on tokkeeɗum, ammaa to' on ngaɗu ko ɓe ngaɗata, ngam ɓe ngaɗataa ko ɓe nga'ajinta.
40023004	E ɓe kaɓɓa doŋle tedduɗe caɗuɗe hoccuki, ɓe njowaɗe dow balbe yimɓe, ammaa kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe koo koolel go'o ɓe ngaɗataa ɓe mballaɓe.
40023005	Fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata e ɓe ngaɗaɗum ngam yimɓe ngi'aɓe. E ɓe kaɓɓa laayaho mawko ko aayaaje Deftere Ceniinde to tiiɗe maɓɓe e juuɗe maɓɓe, e ɓe njuutina cilmbi toggooje maɓɓe.
40023006	To humto e ɓe ngiɗi jooɗaaki to mawɓe njooɗotoo; nder cuuɗi do'aare maa e ɓe ngiɗi jooɗorle mawɓe.
40023007	E ɓe ngiɗi hownireeki mangu nder luumo, nden e ɓe ngiɗi ɗum wi'aɓe, ‘Allah sabbinanee, Moodibbo.’
40023008	Ammaa onon, to' ɗum noddira'on ‘Moodibbo,’ ngam Moodibbo mooɗon o go'oto, nden on fuu on bandiraaɓe.
40023009	To' on noddu koo moye ‘Nyaako’ e duuniyaaru, ngam on ngoodi Nyaako go'oto, gonɗo ton dow.
40023010	Nden to' ɗum noddira'on ‘Ardiiɗo,’ ngam on ngoodi Ardiiɗo go'oto, kanko woni Almasiihu.
40023011	Sey mawɗo nder mooɗon warta jaggantooɗo'on.
40023012	Fuu mawninɗo hoore muuɗum ɗum lestinaymo. Fuu lestinɗo hoore muuɗum ɗum mawninaymo.
40023013	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! On maɓɓanii yimɓe dammugal nattuki Laamu Allah. Onon on nattaayi, on alaayi giɗuɓe nattuki natta.
40023014	[On mbonii onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! On nyaama jawdi rewɓe ɓe worɓe maɓɓe maayi, on ngaɗa do'aare juutunde ngam yimɓe ngi'a. Ngam non, Allah ɓuray hokkuki'on bone.]
40023015	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! Ngam on kuula maayo on ngiiloo nder leyɗe feere‑feere ngam heɓuki go'oto tokkayɗo diina mooɗon. To on keɓiimo, on ngartiramo kalluɗo ɓurɗo'on halluki nde ɗiɗi nattayɗo hiite bo mooɗon.
40023016	“On mbonii, onon wumɓe ardiiɓe wumɓe! On mbi'a, ‘Koo moye hunorii Wuro Ceniingo, naa' ɗum goɗɗum. Ammaa koo moye hunorii jiinaari gonɗum nder maago, doole o waɗa ko o hunanii.’
40023017	Onon kaaŋaaɓe, wumɓe! Ɗume ɓuri mangu, jiinaari ɗum, koo Wuro Ceniingo ngon gartirngo jiinaari ɗum ceniiɗum?
40023018	Ɗonmaa on mbi'a, ‘Koo moye hunorii sakkirde, naa' ɗum goɗɗum. Ammaa koo moye hunorii cakkiri ngondi dow sakkirde nden, doole o waɗa ko o hunanii.’
40023019	Onon wumɓe! Ɗume ɓuri mangu, cakkiri ndin, koo sakkirde gartiraynde cakkiri ndin ceniindi?
40023020	Ngam non, koo moye hunorii sakkirde nden hunorakende e koo ɗume ko woni dow mayre.
40023021	Ɗonmaa koo moye hunorii Wuro Ceniingo ngon hunorakengo e Allah jooɗiiɗo nder maago.
40023022	Nden koo moye hunorii dow, hunorake jooɗorgal laamu Allah e jooɗiiɗo dow maagal.
40023023	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! On kokka Allah jakka haakohoy njongeteekoy, ammaa on tokkaayi ko ɓuri daraja nder Attawra, waato waɗanki yimɓe ko haani, e yurmeende, e hoolaaki Allah. Ɗu'um tatum e haani ngaɗonɗum, ammaa to' on alu waɗuki ko horii.
40023024	Onon wumɓe ardiiɓe wumɓe! On itta buululel nder ndiyam ɗam njaroton, ammaa on moɗa ngeelooba!
40023025	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en, munaafuki'en! On layɓa gaɗa njardukoy mooɗon e le'oy mooɗon, ammaa nder e heewi nguyka e ciya suruki hoore.
40023026	An Faarisankeejo bumɗo! Artu layɓuki nder jardugel ngel e le'el ngel, nden koo toye maakoy wartay laɓɗum.
40023027	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! On nandi e genaale moytanaaɗe njoojeeri ndaneeri yaasi maaje e mbooɗi yiiki, ammaa nder maaje e woodi ƴi'e mayɓe e koo iri ɗume nefniiɗum.
40023028	Non onon maa mbaaɗon. Yimɓe e ngi'a'on bo on aadili'en, ammaa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon on munaafuki'en on keewii halleende.
40023029	“On mbonii, onon moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en! On munaafuki'en! On maha genaale boɗɗe ɗe siftorki annabo'en, ɗonmaa on mo''itina genaale aadili'en.
40023030	On mbi'a, ‘Daa en ɗon carel maamaaji meeɗen, daa en mballaayiɓe warki annabo'en.’
40023031	Non kollirɗon on ɓiɓɓe barɓe annabo'en.
40023032	Too, sey keenyiton kuugal ngal maamaaji mooɗon puɗɗi!
40023033	Onon boole, ɓiɓɓe boole kalluɗe! No ɗum waɗata kison nattuki wuro hiite?
40023034	Ngam non, e mi lilonoya'on annabo'en e gooduɓe faamu e moodiɓɓe. On mbara woɓɓe, on mbara woɓɓe dow gaafaangal, on piira woɓɓe looci nder cuuɗi do'aare mooɗon, on tokkaɓe gariiri‑gariiri on torraɓe.
40023035	Ngam non ƴiiƴam fuu aadili'en baraaɓe ndufaaɗam nder duuniyaaru ɗum ɗaɓɓitayɗam dow mooɗon, daga ƴiiƴam Habiila aadiliijo haa yaaki ƴiiƴam Annabi Jakaariya, ɓiɗɗo Beriikiya, mo mbarɗon hakkunde Suudu Joomiraawo e sakkirde.
40023036	E mi wi'a'on goonga, ƴiiƴamji ɗin ɗon fuu ɗum ɗaɓɓitayɗi to juuɗe yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um.
40023037	“Jalla Urucaliima, Urucaliima a warii annabo'en, a wardii liloyaaɓe to maaɗa e kaaƴe! Nde ɗuɗɗum e mi yiɗi moɓtuki yimɓe maaɗa no geroogal moɓtirta ɓikkoy maagal ley biyeeli maagal, ammaa a jaɓaayi.
40023038	Raɗɗum, Allah alanay'on Wuro Ceniingo mooɗon winde.
40023039	E mi wi'a'on, on puɗɗitataa ngi'onyam, naa nyalnde nde mbiiɗon, ‘O barkiɗinaaɗo, garoyɗo nder inde Joomiraawo.’ ”
40024001	Yeesu e wurtoyoo Wuro Ceniingo e mo yaha, sey tokkuɓemo ngari mbi'imo o raara cuuɗi maago.
40024002	Sey o nootii, o wi'iɓe, “On ngi'ii fuu cuuɗi ɗi'i? E mi wi'a'on goonga, walaa wonde hayre aleteende dow wonde. Ɗe fuu ɗum sankitayɗe.”
40024003	Yeesu e jooɗii dow Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako kamɓe tan, ɓe mbi'i, “Wi'umin, ndeye fii ɗu'um waɗata? Ɗume woni ko hollata wartoyki maaɗa e re'uki duuniyaaru?”
40024004	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Paamee to' goɗɗo majjina'on.
40024005	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngaroyay ɓe mbi'a kamɓe ngoni min, ɓe mbi'a, ‘Min woni Almasiihu,’ ɓe majjina yimɓe ɗuɗɓe.
40024006	On nanay habaru konuuji gaɗeteeɗi haade mooɗon, e habaru konuuji gaɗeteeɗi ɓadaaki. To' on kulu, ngam doole ɗu'um waɗa, ammaa re'uki duuniyaaru e horii taw.
40024007	Lenyol ummanto lenyol, laamu ummanto laamu. Ɗum waɗay weelo kallungo e dimbol leydi to bigeeje feere‑feere.
40024008	Ammaa ɗu'um fuu ɗum fuɗɗoode torraaji garayɗi.
40024009	“Nden ɓe ngaɗay'on nder juuɗe yimɓe torrayɓe'on, ɗum wara'on. Fuu lenyi duuniyaaru nganyay'on ngam on tokkuɓeyam.
40024010	E carel ngel yimɓe ɗuɗɓe alay hoolaakiyam, e ɓe ngullootira, e ɓe nganyindira.
40024011	Annabo'en fewre ɗuɗɓe ummoyto, ɓe majjina yimɓe ɗuɗɓe.
40024012	Halleende ɓeydoto haa yidde ɗuɗɓe ustoo.
40024013	Ammaa munyuɗo haa re'irde o hisay.
40024014	Nden ɗum wa'ajinay Habaru Belɗum dow Laamu Allah koo toye nder duuniyaaru, ngam ɗum warta ceyda to leƴƴi fuu, nden re'uki duuniyaaru kin wara.
40024015	“Carel e wara ngel ngi'oton ‘Nefniiɗum’ gartiroojum Wuro Ceniingo ngo laaɓaa e darii to Wigeere Ceniinde ɗum Annabi Daaniyel wi'i. Fuu jangoowo faama ma'ana maajum.
40024016	E carel ngel wonɓe nder leydi Yahuudiya ndogga nattoya kocceeje.
40024017	Gonɗo dow suudu fuu to' jippoyo ngam hoccuki ko woni nder suudu.
40024018	Gonɗo to ngesa to' so''o ngam hoccuki cuddaari muuɗum.
40024019	“Rewɓe gooduɓe deeɗi e musinteeɓe ɓe torroto naa' seɗɗa nder ɗen ɗon balɗe!
40024020	Ngaɗee do'aare to' doggudu ndun warana'on nder ndungu koo Nyalnde Siwtaare.
40024021	Ngam nder ɗen ɗon balɗe ɗum waɗay torra kalluka mawka iri ka ɗum meeɗaayi waɗuki daga carel ngel Allah tagi duuniyaaru haa jooni. Ɗum boo fuɗɗitataa ɗum waɗa iri kan ɗon torra.
40024022	Daa Allah ustaayi ɗen ɗon balɗe, daa walaa goɗɗo kisayɗo. Ammaa ngam ɓen ɗon cuɓaaɓe maako, o ustay balɗe ɗen.
40024023	“E ngel ɗon carel to goɗɗo wi'ii'on, ‘Raa Almasiihu ɗo'o!’ koo boo, ‘Rammo ɗaa'e!’ to' on njaɓu.
40024024	Ngam Almasiihu'en fewre e annabo'en fewre mburtoyto, ɓe ngaɗa alaamaaji mawɗi e kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ngam ɓe majjina yimɓe, haa e cuɓaaɓe ɓen to ɗum waɗoto.
40024025	Raɗɗum, mi wi'ii'on koo ɗume ko carel ngel wara.
40024026	“Ngam non, to ɓe mbi'ii'on, ‘Rammo ɗaa'e nder ladde,’ to' on njahu. Koo to ɓe mbi'ii'on, ‘Rammo ɗo'o e mo suuɗii nder cuuɗi,’ to' on njaɓu.
40024027	Non no maƴƴere maƴƴirta daga fuuna nde yi'e haa hirna, non wartuki Ɓii Neɗɗo wa'ata.
40024028	“Fuu to baatuɗum woni, ɗon jigaaje kawritata.
40024029	“Gaɗa torra kalluka kan, ɗon e ɗon ɗum ɓalwinay naange, lewru boo hokkataa jayngol mayru. Koode njanoyay daga dow, nden ko woni dow fuu dimboto.
40024030	E carel ngel ɗum yi'ay alaama Ɓii Neɗɗo wangii ton dow, nden fuu lenyi duuniyaaru mboyay bojji nawɗi. Sey ɓe ngi'a Ɓii Neɗɗo e wara nder duule e bawɗe e teddungal mangal.
40024031	O waɗay ɗum duuda luwal sembee duuduki liluki malaa'ika'en maako, ɓe kawrita ɓe o suɓi daga koo toye nder duuniyaaru, daga ngo'ol keerol duuniyaaru yaaki ngol ton keerol duuniyaaru.
40024032	“Too, ekkitee ekkitinol ngo'ol daga to ibbi. To lice maaki puɗɗi wilutuki, on andi ndungu ɓadake won ɗon.
40024033	Non maa to on ngi'ii fuu fii ɗu'um e waɗa, too, on anday Ɓii Neɗɗo ɓadake wartoya, e mo haade dammugal.
40024034	E mi wi'a'on goonga, jaamanu ɗu'um ɗum re'ataa naa fuu fii ɗu'um waɗii.
40024035	Dow e ley ƴaɓɓoto, ammaa boliiɗe am ƴaɓɓataako haa abadaa.
40024036	“Walaa anduɗo nden ɗon nyalnde koo ngel ɗon carel ngel fii ɗum ɗon waɗata. Koo malaa'ika'en wonɓe dow andaa, koo Ɓiɗɗo on maa andaa, sey Nyaako Mo Dow tan andi.
40024037	Non no ɗum waɗi e jaamanu Annabi Nuhu, non maa wartoyki Ɓii Neɗɗo wa'ata.
40024038	Nder balɗe ko ndiyam tufaana waɗa, yimɓe e nyaama, e njara, e te'a, e te'ee, haa carel ko Annabi Nuhu natti komiwal.
40024039	Ɓe paamaayi haa ndiyam tufaana wari halkiɓe ɓe fuu. Non maa wartoyki Ɓii Neɗɗo wa'ata.
40024040	E carel ngel, worɓe ɗiɗo e kuwa e ngesa, ɗum hocca go'oto ɗum ala go'oto.
40024041	Rewɓe ɗiɗo e namida, ɗum hocca go'oto ɗum ala go'oto.
40024042	Njooɗee on ciryii, ngam on andaa carel ko Joomiraawo mooɗon warata.
40024043	Ammaa andee ɗu'um, daa joomu wuro e andi carel ngel gujjo warantamo jemma, daa o jooɗoto e mo siryii o alataa o nattanamo wuro.
40024044	Ngam non, onon maa doole njooɗooɗon on ciryii ngam e carel ngel on andaa Ɓii Neɗɗo warata.
40024045	“Moye woni maccuɗo mo goonga mo faamu, mo joomu wuro muuɗum yowi dow maccuɓe muuɗum, ngam o hokkaɓe nyamndu nder carel?
40024046	O barkiɗinaaɗo maccuɗo mo joomu wuro muuɗum warti tawi e mo waɗa non.
40024047	E mi wi'a'on goonga, joomu wuro on yowaymo dow jawdi muuɗum fuu.
40024048	Ammaa to maccuɗo on o kalluɗo o wi'ay hoore maako, ‘Joomu wuro am wartataa jooni,’
40024049	sey o fuɗɗi fiyuki maccuɓe ɓe o huudata, e mo nyaama, e mo yarda njaru e yarooɓe.
40024050	Joomu wuro on wartay e nyalnde nde maccuɗo on kammaaki e carel ngel o andaa,
40024051	o fiyaymo boɗɗum o waɗamo nder munaafuki'en. Ɗon ɗum woyata ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.
40025001	“Nden ɗum nandinay Laamu Allah e surbaaɓe sappo koccuɓe fitilaaji ɓe ndilli taɓɓoyaaki angoojo.
40025002	Njowo nder maɓɓe e ngoodi faamu, njowo nder maɓɓe boo ngalaa faamu.
40025003	Carel ko surbaaɓe ɓe ngalaa faamu ɓen koccii fitilaaji maɓɓe, ɓe njogaaki nebbam fitila feere nder kolbaaji.
40025004	Gooduɓe faamu ɓen boo koccii fitilaaji maɓɓe e nebbam feere.
40025005	Nde angoojo on neeɓi yottaaki, sey ɓe fuu ɓe puɗɗi ŋoŋuki haa ɓe ɗaani.
40025006	“Ton caka jemma sey ɗum nani noddol sembee, e ɗum wi'a, ‘Raa angoojo on! Mburtoyee, taɓɓeemo!’
40025007	Sey surbaaɓe ɓen fuu ummii ciryii fitilaaji maɓɓe.
40025008	Ɓe ngalaa faamu ɓen mbi'i gooduɓe faamu ɓen, ‘Kokkoreemin nebbam mooɗon seɗɗa. Fitilaaji amin e mbaata!’
40025009	Ammaa gooduɓe faamu ɓen mbi'iɓe, ‘Naa' non, ɗam heƴataa'en. Ɗum ɓurii njahon to soorooɓe, coodoyon ɗam mooɗon.’
40025010	E ɓe dow laawol soodoykiɗam, sey angoojo on yottii. Ciryiiɓe fitilaaji ɓen nattidi e maako nder wuro to ɗum waɗata humto ngon. Ɗum maɓɓii dammugal wuro ngon.
40025011	“Daga gaɗa sey surbaaɓe koriiɓe ɓen maa ngarti, ɓe mbi'i, ‘Joomu wuro! Joomu wuro! Maɓɓitanmin!’
40025012	Ammaa o nootii, o wi'i, ‘E mi wi'a'on goonga, mi andaa'on.’
40025013	“Ngam non, sey njooɗooɗon on ciryii, ngam on andaa nyalnde nden koo carel ngel.
40025014	“Ɗonmaa, Laamu Allah e nandi e goɗɗo neɗɗo gaɗayɗo yaadu, sey o noddi maccuɓe maako o tambiniɓe jawdi maako.
40025015	O hokki go'oto jakaaje jowi kewɗe ceede jiinaari, go'oto boo jakaaje ɗiɗi, go'oto boo jakaare go'o. O hokki koo moye no waawata, nden o dilli.
40025016	Jaɓuɗo jakaaje jowi on, ɗon e ɗon o dilli o waadi luumo e ceede ɗen haa o heɓi bo maaje.
40025017	Non maa jaɓuɗo jakaaje ɗiɗi on heɓi bo maaje.
40025018	Ammaa jaɓuɗo jakaare go'o on yahi wasi ngayka suuɗi ceede jiinaari joomu wuro muuɗum.
40025019	“Too, gaɗa ɗum neeɓii, sey joomu maccuɓe on warti ngam yi'a ko koo moye heɓanimo.
40025020	Sey jaɓuɗo jakaaje jowi kewɗe ceede jiinaari wari waddi ceede jakaaje jiinaari jowi ɗe o ɓeydii. O wi'i, ‘Joomu wuro, a hokkiiyam jakaaje kewɗe ceede jiinaari jowi. Raa mi ɓeydii jakaaje ceede jowi.’
40025021	Sey joomu wuro on wi'imo, ‘A huwii boɗɗum, maccuɗo boɗɗo mo goonga. Nde a waɗii goonga dow fii seɗɗa, mi tambinte ɗuɗɗum. Woroy, nanidaa belɗum e am.’
40025022	Sey jaɓuɗo jakaaje ɗiɗi kewɗe ceede jiinaari maa wari, wi'i, ‘Joomu wuro, a hokkiiyam jakaaje ɗiɗi kewɗe ceede jiinaari. Raa mi ɓeydii jakaaje ceede ɗiɗi.’
40025023	Sey joomu wuro on wi'imo, ‘A huwii boɗɗum, maccuɗo boɗɗo mo goonga. Nde a waɗii goonga dow fii seɗɗa. Mi tambinte ɗuɗɗum. Woroy, nanidaa belɗum e am.’
40025024	Nden jaɓuɗo jakaare go'o kewnde ceede jiinaari on wari, wi'i, ‘Joomu wuro, e mi andi a neɗɗo caɗanɗo, a yiɗi fe''uki ko a aawaayi, a giɗɗo meere.
40025025	E mi hula, ngam non njaami ngasumi ngayka cuuɗumi ceede maaɗa nder leydi. Raa ceede maaɗa!’
40025026	Sey Joomu wuro on nootii, wi'i, ‘An a maccuɗo kalluɗo, dakkiiɗo! Too, e yiiki maaɗa e mi fe''a ko mi aawaayi, nden mi giɗɗo meere?
40025027	E haani ndesanaayam ceede to ɗe kuutirtee ɗe ɓeydoo, ngam to mi wartoyii mi jaɓaɗe haa e ɓeydaari!
40025028	Ngam non, njaɓee ceede ɗen to maako, kokkon on ɗon gooduɗo jakaaje sappo kewɗe ceede.
40025029	Ngam fuu gooduɗo, ɗum ɓeydanaymo, haa ɗum ɗuuɗanamo. Ammaa mo walaa, koo ko o woodi maa ɗum jaɓayɗum.
40025030	Nden paɗɗee maccuɗo o'o meereejo nder nyiwre ɓaleere, to ɗum woyata ɗum nyerƴindira nyiiƴe.’
40025031	“To Ɓii Neɗɗo warii nder teddungal muuɗum e malaa'ika'en fuu, o jooɗoto dow jooɗorgal laamu maako ɗum teddungal.
40025032	Ɗum hawritay yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu yeeso maako, o hakkitaɓe feere‑feere non no gaynaako hakkitirta baali e be'i.
40025033	O waɗa baali e jungo nyaamo maako, be'i e nano maako.
40025034	Sey Laamiiɗo on wi'a wonɓe nyaamo muuɗum, ‘Ngaree, onon ɓe Nyaako am barkiɗini, ndonee Laamu ɗum um siryanii'on daga fuɗɗoode duuniyaaru.
40025035	Ngam mi nanii weelo on kokkiiyam nyamndu. Mi nanii ɗonka on kokkiiyam ko njaraymi. Mi waɗii koɗaaku on njippiniiyam.
40025036	Mi walaa ko ɓornotoomi on kokkiiyam kolte. Mi waɗii ciya njamu on paamaniiyam. E mi suri nder suudu cural on kowniiyam.’
40025037	E carel ngel aadili'en noototo, mbi'amo, ‘Moodibbo, ndeye min ngiidumaa e weelo min kokkumaa nyamndu, koo min ngiidumaa e ɗonka min kokkumaa ko njarataa?
40025038	Ndeye min ngiimaa a koɗo min njippinmaa, koo a walaa ko ɓornotoɗaa min kokkumaa kolte?
40025039	Ndeye min ngiimaa a yamɗaa koo a surii nder suudu cural min kownumaa?’
40025040	Sey Laamiiɗo on nootoo, wi'aɓe, ‘E mi wi'a'on goonga, nde on ngaɗani go'oto nder ɓe'e bandiraaɓe am ɓurɓe famɗuki, min ngaɗanɗon.’
40025041	“Nden o wi'ay wonɓe nano maako, ‘Cendiree e am, onon laanaaɓe! Nattee hiite nge nyifataa haa abadaa nge ɗum siryanii Ceyɗan e malaa'ika'en muuɗum!
40025042	Ngam mi nanii weelo on kokkaayiyam nyamndu. Mi nanii ɗonka on kokkaayiyam ko njaraymi.
40025043	Mi waɗii koɗaaku on njippinaayiyam. Mi walaa ko ɓornotoomi on kokkaayiyam kolte. Mi waɗii ciya njamu on paamanaayiyam. Mi suraama nder suudu cural on kownaayiyam.’
40025044	Nden kamɓe maa ɓe nootoo, ɓe mbi'amo, ‘Moodibbo, ndeye min ngiidumaa e weelo, koo e ɗonka, koo e ciya kolte, koo e ciya njamu, ndeye min ngiimaa a koɗo, koo a nder suudu cural, min mballaayima?’
40025045	Sey o nootoo, o wi'aɓe, ‘E mi wi'a'on goonga, nde on ngaɗanaayi koo go'oto nder ɓe'e ɓurɓe famɗuki, min woni on ngaɗanaayi.’
40025046	Ɓe'e ngoni nattayɓe bone ɗum re'ataa, aadili'en boo keɓa yonki ki re'ataa.”
40026001	Nde Yeesu yottini wiiki fuu fii ɗu'um, o wi'i tokkuɓemo,
40026002	“On andi Humto Sakkinki hande horii balɗe ɗiɗi, ɗum hokkitiray Ɓii Neɗɗo ɗum waramo dow gaafaangal.”
40026003	Sey mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe kawriti e laamorde Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina bi'eteeɗo Kayaafa.
40026004	Ɓe kaɓɓi ɓe nanga Yeesu e suuɗe ɓe mbaramo.
40026005	Ɓe mbi'i, “Ammaa naa' ni carel Humto Sakkinki, ngam ɗum gaɗotooɗum yimɓe ummina hawre.”
40026006	Yeesu e nder gariiri Betani to wuro Siiman gooduɗo nyawu nyaamoojum laral,
40026007	sey goɗɗo debbo wari to maako e jogii jolloyel hayre bongel ngel nebbam uroojam mbelɗam gooduɗam ceede. Yeesu e nyaama nyamndu, sey debbo on wayliɗam dow hoore maako.
40026008	Ammaa nde tokkuɓemo ngi'i non, sey ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti, ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume o wonni nebbam ɗa'am nihi?
40026009	Daa ɗam sooraama ceede ɗuɗɗe, ɗum hokka ɓe ngalanaa ceede ɗen.”
40026010	Ammaa Yeesu faami ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, sey o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume ngannoton debbo o'o? Ko o waɗaniyam ɗum boɗɗum.
40026011	Koo ndeye ɓe ngalanaa e ngondi e mooɗon, ammaa min, carel e wara ngel alaymi'on.
40026012	Nde o wayli ɗa'am nebbam dow ɓandu am, o waɗu non ngam siryaaki uwukiyam.
40026013	E mi wi'a'on goonga, koo toye to ɗum wa'ajini ɗu'um Habaru Belɗum nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum hokkay habaru ko debbo o'o waɗi ngam siftorkimo.”
40026014	Sey go'oto nder tokkuɓe Yeesu sappo e ɗiɗo bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda Iskariyooti yahi to mawɓe ardiiɓe diina,
40026015	o wi'i, “Ɗume kokkotonyam to mi waɗii Yeesu nder juuɗe mooɗon?” Sey ɓe kokkimo ceede ajurfaari kanje 30.
40026016	Daga carel ngel Yahuuda fuɗɗi ɗaɓɓutuki laawol no hokkitirta Yeesu nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
40026017	Nyalnde arandeere nde Humto Buroodi Ɗum Walaa Ƴuufinirɗum, sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako, ɓe mbi'imo, “Toye ngiɗɗaa min njaha min ciryanomaa ngam nyaamen nyamndu Humto Sakkinki?”
40026018	Sey o wi'i, “Nattee gariiri to goɗɗo neɗɗo mbi'onmo, ‘Moodibbo wi'i: Carel am ɓadake. Mi waɗay Humto Sakkinki e tokkuɓeyam to wuro maaɗa.’ ”
40026019	Sey tokkuɓemo ɓen ngaɗi non no Yeesu wi'iɓe, sey ɓe ciryii koo ɗume ngam Humto Sakkinki.
40026020	Nde futuro waɗi, Yeesu jooɗii ngam nyamda e tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo.
40026021	E ɓe nder nyaamuki, sey o wi'i, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, go'oto nder mooɗon hokkitirayyam.”
40026022	Sey ɓe nganni naa' seɗɗa, ɓe puɗɗi wi'ukimo go'oto‑go'oto, “Moodibbo, naa' ɗum min, koo?”
40026023	Sey o nootii, o wi'i, “Neɗɗo nyamdayɗo e am e le'al go'o, kanko hokkitirtayam.
40026024	Ɓii Neɗɗo maayay no ɗum windiraa dow maako, ammaa kokkitirayɗomo wonii! Ɗum ɓuranaymo daa o danyaaka.”
40026025	Sey Yahuuda kokkitirayɗomo wi'i, “Moodibbo, naa' ɗum min, koo?” Yeesu wi'imo, “Ee, ɗum an.”
40026026	E ɓe nder nyaamuki nyamndu, sey Yeesu hocci buroodi yetti Allah, o sendiɗum, o hokki tokkuɓemo, o wi'i, “Njaɓeeɗum, nyaamon. Ɗu'um ɗum ɓandu am.”
40026027	Ɗonmaa o hocci jardugel ndiyam inabojam, o yetti Allah, o hokkiɓeɗam, o wi'i, “Njaree, on fuu,
40026028	ngam ɗa'am kanjam woni ƴiiƴam am tabbitinayɗam alkawal Allah ndufeteeɗam ngam yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngam yaafaaki hakke.
40026029	E mi wi'a'on, mi fuɗɗitataa mi yara ndiyam inabooje naa nyalnde nde njaraymi ngoɗɗam kesam hawti e mooɗon nder Laamu Nyaako am Mo Dow.”
40026030	Sey ɓe ngimi gimol mantuki Allah, nden ɓe ndilli Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun.
40026031	Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “Nder jemmaare nde'e on fuu on ndoggay alonyam, ngam nder aayaare Allah wi'ii, ‘Mi waray gaynaako, nden ornde baali ɗin cankitoto.’
40026032	Ammaa gaɗa mi ummake daga mayde, mi artay'on yaaki Galiili.”
40026033	Sey Biiturus wi'imo, “Koo ɓe fuu ɓe aliima, min mi alataama koo seɗɗa.”
40026034	Yeesu wi'imo, “E mi wi'umaa goonga, hande, nder jemmaare nde'e, ko njakardi hana, a wi'ay a andaayam nde tati.”
40026035	Ammaa Biiturus wi'imo, “Koo ɗum wardayyam e maaɗa, mi wi'ataa mi andaama.” Horiiɓe ɓen maa mbi'i non.
40026036	Sey Yeesu yaadi e tokkuɓemo wonde wigeere bi'eteende Geesamani, o wi'iɓe, “Njooɗee ɗo'o, mi yaha ɗaa'e mi waɗa do'aare.”
40026037	O hocci Biiturus e ɓiɓɓe Jabadi ɗiɗo. Ɓernde maako boo teddi, o fuɗɗi wannuki naa' seɗɗa.
40026038	Sey o wi'iɓe, “Ɓernde am wannii naa' seɗɗa haa bo mi maayay. Njooɗodee e am ɗo'o on ndeena.”
40026039	Nde o yahi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o yani e leydi e mo hippii, o waɗi do'aare, o wi'i, “Nyaako am Mo Dow, to ɗum waɗoto, ittanam jardugel torra ka'a. Fuu e non naa' ko ngiɗumi waɗetee, ammaa ko ngiɗɗaa waɗee.”
40026040	Gaɗa ɗon o so''ii to ɓen ɗon tokkuɓemo tato, o tawi e ɓe ɗaanii, sey o wi'i Biiturus, “Too, on mbaawataa jooɗodaaki e am on ɗaanaaki koo carel seɗɗa?
40026041	Njooɗee, to' on ɗaano, ngaɗee do'aare to ɗum foondii'on to' ngaɗon hakke. Ɓernde e yiɗi waɗuki ko haani, ammaa ɓandu tampii.”
40026042	O fuɗɗiti o dilli ɗiɗaɓum, o waɗi do'aare, o wi'i, “Nyaako am Mo Dow, to ɗum waɗataako ɗum ittanayam torra ka'a, sey to mi yariika, al ko ngiɗɗaa waɗee.”
40026043	Sey o fuɗɗiti o so''oyii to maɓɓe, o tawi e ɓe ɗaanii, ngam e ɓe nana ɗeyngol teddungol.
40026044	Sey o fuɗɗiti o dilli tataɓum o waɗi do'aare, o wi'i non no o wi'uno.
40026045	O fuɗɗiti o so''ii to maɓɓe tataɓum, o wi'iɓe, “Haa jooni on ɗaanii, on ciwtoo? Carel warii. Ɗum hokkitirii Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe gaɗooɓe hakke.
40026046	Ummee ndillen! Raa on ɗon kokkitirayɗoyam e wara.”
40026047	Yeesu e meta, sey Yahuuda, go'oto nder tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo wari. O wardoyi e yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e ɓe njogii kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e mawɓe yimɓe liloyiɓe.
40026048	Too, nden maa kokkitirayɗo Yeesu on o yaadake o wi'iiɓe no o hollirtaɓe Yeesu, o wi'i, “Neɗɗo mo kownaymi hownuki higaaku ɗum kanko. Nangeemo.”
40026049	Ɗon e ɗon Yahuuda on ɓaddii Yeesu, wi'i, “Moodibbo, Allah sabbinanee!” Nden o hownimo hownuki higaaku.
40026050	Yeesu nootii, wi'imo, “Higo am, waɗu ko waddumaa.” Sey yimɓe ɓen ɓaddii nangi Yeesu ɓe njogiimo boɗɗum.
40026051	E yiiki non, go'oto nder gonduɓe e Yeesu nangi kaafahi muuɗum soltiki, fe''i maccuɗo Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina o ittanimo nowru.
40026052	Ammaa Yeesu wi'imo, “Wattu kaafahi maaɗa nder holgo maaki. Ngam fuu koccuɗo kaafahi, kaafahi waratamo.
40026053	On kammii mi waawataa toraaki Nyaako am Mo Dow, ɗon e ɗon o liloya moɓɗe malaa'ika'en ɓurɗe moɓɗe sappo e ɗiɗi?
40026054	Ammaa no waɗata aayaaje keewa biiɗe doole ɗu'um waɗa nihi?”
40026055	E ngel ɗon carel Yeesu wi'i garoyɓe ɓen, “On ngardoyi e kaafaaje e cabbi ngam nangoyyam bo mi gujjo calorɗo? Koo ndeye e mi jooɗoo nder Wuro Ceniingo e mi ekkitina, on nangaayiyam.
40026056	Ammaa ɗu'um waɗii ngam ko annabo'en mbindi heewa.” Sey fuu tokkuɓemo alimo, ndoggi.
40026057	Sey nanguɓe Yeesu ɓen njaarimo to wuro Kayaafa Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina, to moodiɓɓe Attawra e mawɓe yimɓe kawriti.
40026058	Ammaa Biiturus tokkirimo gaɗa daga to woɗɗi haa yaaki caka wuro Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina on. O natti o jooɗodii e taadiiɓe Wuro Ceniingo, ngam o yi'a no ɗum waɗanta Yeesu.
40026059	Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e fuu Kawtal Mawɓe e ɓe ɗaɓɓita ceyda fewre ɗum ɓe nangirta Yeesu, ngam ɓe keɓa ɓe mbaramo.
40026060	Ammaa ɓe keɓaayi goɗɗum, koo nde yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ndarake yeeso maɓɓe kokki ceyda fewre. E re'irde, yimɓe ɗiɗo ndarii yeeso yimɓe, ɓe mbi'i,
40026061	“O'o neɗɗo wi'ii, ‘Mi waaway sankutuki Wuro Ceniingo ngo Allah, mi mahitoongo nder balɗe tati.’ ”
40026062	Sey Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina ummii darii wi'i Yeesu, “A walaa ko mbi'ataa? Ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum goonga?”
40026063	Ammaa Yeesu de''iti. Sey Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina on wi'imo, “Mi hawtiima e Allah mo yonki, wi'umin to an woni Almasiihu, Ɓiɗɗo Allah.”
40026064	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Ee, ɗum non no mbiiɗaa. Ammaa e mi wi'a'on, yeeso ɗo'o on ngi'ay Ɓii Neɗɗo e jooɗii to jungo nyaamo ngo Joomu Bawɗe e mo waroya nder duule.”
40026065	Sey Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina on seeki kolte muuɗum wi'i, “O huɗii Allah. Ɗume ceyda ɗaɓɓiteten kadin? Jooni on nanii ni haala kalluka ka o meti dow Allah.
40026066	Ko woni cuɓol mooɗon?” Sey ɓe mbi'i, “Hewtii o waree!”
40026067	Sey ɓe tuttanimo joode to yeeso, ɓe piyimo, woɓɓe kellimo to wolo,
40026068	e ɓe mbi'amo, “Almasiihu, waɗanmin annabaaku! Moye fiyumaa?”
40026069	Biiturus e jooɗii caka wuro ngon, sey goɗɗo korɗo wari to maako wi'i, “An maa, a wondi e Yeesu Galilankeejo!”
40026070	Ammaa Biiturus yeddi yeeso maɓɓe ɓe fuu wi'i, “Mi andaa ko mbi'ataa!”
40026071	Sey o yahi haade dammugal wuro ngon. Ɗonmaa sey goɗɗo korɗo yi'imo, wi'i yimɓe dariiɓe ɗon, “O'o neɗɗo e mo wondi e Yeesu Najarankeejo!”
40026072	Sey Biiturus fuɗɗiti yeddi haa e hunaaki, wi'i, “Mi andaa neɗɗo on!”
40026073	Gaɗa ɗon seɗɗa, sey dariiɓe ɗon ɓaddii Biiturus, mbi'i, “Seko walaa an maa a go'oto nder tokkuɓemo, ngam iri no metirtaa nangiima.”
40026074	Sey Biiturus fuɗɗi laanuki hoore muuɗum hunii wi'i, “Mi andaa neɗɗo on!” Ɗon e ɗon njakardi hani.
40026075	Sey Biiturus siftori ko Yeesu wi'unoomo wi'uki, “Ko njakardi hana a wi'ay nde tati a andaayam.” Sey o wurtii yaasi o woyi bojji nawɗi.
40027001	Nde weeti, sey fuu mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe meddi dow no ɓe mbardata Yeesu.
40027002	Ɓe kaɓɓimo, ɓe ndillidi e maako ɓe njaarimo to Bilaatus gomnaajo.
40027003	Nde Yahuuda kokkitirɗo Yeesu yi'i ɗum taƴanii Yeesu kiita mayde, sey o wanni, o so''itani mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe ceede ajurfaari 30 ɗen ɗon.
40027004	O wi'i, “Mi waɗii hakke ngam mi hokkitirii neɗɗo mo waɗaayi ko wooɗaa.” Ammaa ɓe mbi'imo, “Ko wannimin? An andi!”
40027005	Sey o hubini ceede ɗen nder Wuro Ceniingo, o dilli o sagi hoore maako e ɓoggol dow lekki o wari hoore maako.
40027006	Ammaa mawɓe ardiiɓe diina ɓopti ceede ɗen, mbi'i, “Attawra haɗii ɗum waɗa ɗe'e ceede nder to ɗum resata dokkal ngam Allah nder Wuro Ceniingo, nde ceede ɗen ɗum ceede ƴiiƴam.”
40027007	Ngam non ɓe cuɓi ɓe kuutira ceede ɗen ɓe cooda ngesa to goɗɗo mahoowo gojiije, ɓe ngartiraka wigeere to ɗum uwata hoɓɓe.
40027008	Kanjum waɗi, haa jooni ngesa kan e noddiree “Ngesa Ƴiiƴam.”
40027009	Non hebbini ko Annabi Irmiya wi'i, wiiki, “Ɓe kocci ceede ajurfaari 30, ceede ɗe Israa'iilanko'en mbi'i ɗum yoɓa dow maako.
40027010	Ɓe kuutiri ceede ɗen ɓe coodi ngesa to mahoowo gojiije, non no Joomiraawo wi'i mi waɗa.”
40027011	Yeesu e darii yeeso gomnaajo, sey gomnaajo on ƴamimo, wi'i, “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en?” Yeesu nootii wi'i, “A wi'iika.”
40027012	Ammaa nde mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe ngulliimo, o wi'aayi goɗɗum.
40027013	Sey Bilaatus wi'imo, “A nanataa ɓe ngullorakema fii ɗuɗɗum?”
40027014	Ammaa Yeesu nootanaakimo koo nde go'o, haa gomnaajo on hayɗini naa' seɗɗa.
40027015	Too, e carel Humto Sakkinki, Bilaatus gomnaajo woowii yoofanki hawrutuɓe curaaɗo go'oto mo ɓe ngiɗi.
40027016	E carel ngel boo e woodi curaaɗo kalluɗo indinɗo bi'eteeɗo Barabbas.
40027017	Nde yimɓe kawriti, sey Bilaatus ƴamiɓe, wi'i, “Moye ngiɗɗon mi yoofana'on? Barabbas koo Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu?”
40027018	Ngam Bilaatus faamii lawliiru waɗi ɓe ngaɗi Yeesu nder jungo maako.
40027019	Bilaatus e jooɗii dow jooɗorgal kiita, sey debbo maako liloyi ɗum wi'amo, “Taa' meemu on ɗon mo waɗaayi ko wooɗaa, ngam hanki mi hoyɗii dow maako mi wannii naa' seɗɗa dow koyɗol ngol.”
40027020	Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe ngaɗi yimɓe mbi'a ɗum yoofa Barabbas ɗum wara Yeesu.
40027021	Gomnaajo on fuɗɗiti wi'iɓe, “Nder yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓen moye ngiɗɗon mi yoofana'on?” Ɓe mbi'i, “Barabbas!”
40027022	Sey Bilaatus ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Too, ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu?” Ɓe fuu ɓe mbi'i, “Warumo dow gaafaangal!”
40027023	Bilaatus wi'i, “Ngam ɗume? Ɗume ko halli o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓeydi wi'uki sembee, “Warumo dow gaafaangal!”
40027024	Nde Bilaatus yi'i walaa ko waawata waɗuki, nden hawre fuɗɗi ummaaki, sey o nyeɗoyi ndiyam o looti juuɗe maako yeeso maɓɓe. O wi'i, “Mi walaa hakke ƴiiƴam neɗɗo o'o. Ɗum caɗɗum mooɗon.”
40027025	Sey yimɓe ɓen fuu nootii, mbi'i, “Ee, hakke ƴiiƴam maako e dow amin e ɓiɓɓe amin!”
40027026	Sey o yoofaniɓe Barabbas, ammaa o waɗi ɗum fiyi Yeesu looci, nden o tambinimo sooji'en Rooma ngam ɓe mbaroyamo dow gaafaangal.
40027027	Daga ɗon sooji'en gomnaajo njaari Yeesu nder laamorde gomnaajo, ɓe kawriti fuu sooji'en koriiɓe yeeso maako.
40027028	Ɓe ɓortimo ɓe ɓornimo iri toggoore laamiiɓe.
40027029	Ɓe mbaali giifol gi'e, ɓe taaranimongol e hoore, ɓe ngaɗanimo sawru e jungo nyaamo maako, ɓe ndiccii yeeso maako, e ɓe njukkitamo, e ɓe mbi'a, “Allah reene, laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en!”
40027030	Ɓe tuttanimo joode, ɓe njaɓi sawru ndun ɓe ngaɗi ka piirukimondu to hoore.
40027031	Gaɗa ɓe njukkitiimo, ɓe ɓortimo toggoore laamiiɓe nde ɓe ɓornunoomo, nden ɓe ɓornimo kolte maako. Sey ɓe mburtinimo ɓe ardinimo ngam ɓe mbaroyamo dow gaafaangal.
40027032	E ɓe njaha sey ɓe kawri e goɗɗo neɗɗo Saayirankeejo bi'eteeɗo Siiman. Ɓe ngaɗimo e sembe o hocca gaafaangal Yeesu.
40027033	Nde ɓe ngari to wonde wigeere bi'eteende Golgoota, waato “Ƴiƴal Hoore,”
40027034	ɓe kokki Yeesu ndiyam inabojam jillindiraaɗam e goɗɗum kaɗɗum. Ammaa nde o tahiɗam, o salii o yara.
40027035	Gaɗa ɓe piyaniimo kuusaaje dow gaafaangal, ɓe ngaɗi caaca ngam ɓe cenda kolte maako hakkunde maɓɓe.
40027036	Gaɗa non ɓe njooɗii e ɓe ndeenamo.
40027037	Dow hoore gaafaangal ngal ɗum takki allowal. Ɗum windi dow maagal ko ɗum wulloriimo wi'uki, “O'o woni Yeesu Laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en.”
40027038	Ɓe piyani wuyɓe ɗiɗo kuusaaje dow gaafaale haade Yeesu, go'oto e jungo maako nyaamo, go'oto e jungo maako nano.
40027039	Yimɓe ƴaɓɓotooɓe e kuɗa Yeesu e ngiila ko'e,
40027040	e ɓe mbi'a, “An giɗɗo pusuki Wuro Ceniingo mahitoongo nder balɗe tati, hisnu hoore maaɗa! Taa Ɓiɗɗo Allah, jippoya daga dow gaafaangal!”
40027041	Non maa mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e moodiɓɓe Attawra, e mawɓe yimɓe njukkitimo, e mbi'a,
40027042	“O hisnii woɓɓe, ammaa o waawaayi hisnuki hoore maako. To kanko woni Laamiiɗo Israa'iila, al o jippoyoo daga dow gaafaangal jooni, enen boo koolooɗenmo.
40027043	O hoolake Allah. Al Allah on hisnamo jooni to e mo yiɗimo, ngam o wi'ii, ‘Min mi Ɓiɗɗo Allah.’ ”
40027044	Non maa ɓen ɗon wuyɓe ɓe ɗum piyani kuusaaje dow gaafaale kuɗimo.
40027045	Daga caka nyalawma nyiwre maɓɓi leydi fuu, haa yaaki njamndi tati ndi alaasara.
40027046	E njamndi tati ndin, sey Yeesu wi'i e sembe, “Eloy, Eloy, lama sabattani?” waato, “Yaa Allah am, Yaa Allah am, ngam ɗume cendirɗaa e am?”
40027047	Nde woɓɓe dariiɓe to wigeere nden nani non, ɓe mbi'i, “E mo nodda Annabi Iliya.”
40027048	Sey ɗon e ɗon go'oto maɓɓe doggi hocci soosowa, suuwinga nder ndiyam inabojam lammuɗam, o ɗiisinga to sawru, o liwanii Yeesu yara.
40027049	Ammaa woɓɓe mbi'i, “Alee ngi'en koo Iliya waray hisnamo.”
40027050	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗiti wulli sembee nden yoofi yonki muuɗum.
40027051	Sey wudere cendunde Suudu Joomiraawo seeki ɗiɗi daga dow yaaki ley. Leydi boo dimbi, kaaƴe peccaa.
40027052	Ɗum omti genaale, yimɓe Allah mayɓe ɗuɗɓe ummii e yonki.
40027053	Ɓe mburtoyii nder genaale ɗen. Gaɗa Yeesu ummake daga mayde, ɓe nattoyi gariiri ceniindi, yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngi'iɓe.
40027054	Nde mawɗo sooji'en on e horiiɓe sooji'en reenooɓe Yeesu ngi'i dimbol leydi ngol e fuu ko waɗi, sey ɓe kultori naa' seɗɗa, ɓe mbi'i, “Goonga neɗɗo o'o o Ɓiɗɗo Allah!”
40027055	E woodi rewɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkoyɓe Yeesu daga leydi Galiili wallooɓemo e ɓe ndaara daga to woɗɗi.
40027056	Nder maɓɓe e woodi Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala, e Maryaama maduujo Yaakubu e Yusufu, e maduujo ɓiɓɓe Jabadi.
40027057	Nde alaasara waɗi, sey goɗɗo diskuɗo ƴiwoyɗo gariiri Armaatiya wari. Inde maako Yusufu. Kanko maa o tokkuɗo Yeesu.
40027058	O yahi to Bilaatus, o toriimo o hokkamo ɓandu Yeesu. Sey Bilaatus waɗi ɗum hokkamondu.
40027059	Sey Yusufu hocci ndu taarindu e wudere lamnde nde ceede.
40027060	O fukkinoyndu nder yenaande maako heyre nde o waɗi ɗum wasanimo nder hayre. O talliti kaaƴa manga o maɓɓi dammugal yenaande nden, o dilli.
40027061	Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala e go'oto Maryaama on e ɓe ɗon njooɗii yeeso yenaande nden.
40027062	Nde fini, waato gaɗa Nyalnde Siryaaki, sey mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e Faarisanko'en kawriti yeeso Bilaatus.
40027063	Ɓe mbi'i, “Allah reene! Min ciptorii ko on ɗon majjinoowo yimɓe wi'i ko o maaya, o wi'i, ‘Mi ummoto daga mayde gaɗa balɗe tati.’
40027064	Ngam non, sey ngaɗaa ɗum yaha ɗum reena yenaande nden boɗɗum haa balɗe tati, ngam to' tokkuɓemo njaha ngujja ɓandu maako mbi'a yimɓe o ummake daga mayde. Majjinki yimɓe cakitiiki kin ɓuray arandehi halluki.”
40027065	Sey Bilaatus wi'iɓe, “Too, njahee, koccon sooji'en, ngaɗon ko mbaawoton waɗuki ndeenon yenaande nden.”
40027066	Sey ɓe njahi yenaande nden ɓe piyi haatimiire laamiiɗo dow hayre to dammugal yenaande nden, ɓe ngaɗi sooji'en ndeenande boɗɗum.
40028001	Too, gaɗa Nyalnde Siwtaare, nyalnde Alal subaka, sey Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala e Maryaama go'oto on ɓe njahi ngam ɓe ngi'a yenaande nden.
40028002	Ɗon e ɗon ɗum waɗi wongol dimbol leydi mangol, ngam goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wari daga dow, o talliti kaaƴa ngan daga dammugal yenaande nden, o jooɗii dow maaga.
40028003	E mo ɗelkitoo bo maƴƴere, kolte maako boo e ranni tar bo hottollo.
40028004	Nde sooji'en reenooɓe yenaande nden ngi'imo, kulol mangol nangiɓe haa ɓe ndiwni, ɓe njani, ɓe ngarti bo mayɓe.
40028005	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo on wi'i rewɓe ɓen, “To' on kulu. E mi andi Yeesu ɗaɓɓitoton, baraaɗo dow gaafaangal.
40028006	O walaa ɗo'o. Ɗum umminiimo daga mayde. Ngaree ngi'on to ɗum fukkinnoomo.
40028007	Njahee nder yawɗaare mbi'on tokkuɓemo, ‘O ummake daga mayde. Raɗɗum, o artay'on yaaki leydi Galiili. Ton ngi'otonmo.’ Kanjum woni habaru ɗum ngaddanmi'on.”
40028008	Sey rewɓe ɓen ali yenaande nden jawɗum nder kulol, ammaa e welwelo mango. Ɓe ndoggi ɓe njahi ngam ɓe mbi'aka tokkuɓe Yeesu.
40028009	Sey Yeesu hawri e maɓɓe, wi'i, “Aku mooɗon!” Ɓe ɓattiimo, ɓe ndiccii, ɓe njogii koyɗe maako, ɓe mawninimo.
40028010	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “To' on kulu. Njahee mbi'on bandiraaɓe am njaha leydi Galiili. Ton ɓe ngi'atayam.”
40028011	Rewɓe ɓen e dow laawol, sey woɓɓe nder sooji'en reenooɓe yenaande nden njahi gariiri ɗiiwiti mawɓe ardiiɓe diina fuu ko waɗi.
40028012	Nde mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e mawɓe yimɓe kawriti, ɓe ndarwi dabare. Ɓe kokki sooji'en ɓen ceede ɗuɗɗe,
40028013	ɓe mbi'iɓe, “Mbi'ee yimɓe, ‘Tokkuɓemo ngari jemma e min ɗaanii ɓe ngujjimo.’
40028014	To Gomnaajo nanii ɗu'um habaru, min estaymo min curana'on nattuki torra.”
40028015	Sey sooji'en ɓen njaɓi ceede ɗen, ɓe ngaɗi non no ɗum wi'iɓe ɓe ngaɗa. Habaru ɗum sankitaama nder Yahuudanko'en, e ɓe kokka habaru ɗu'um haa hande.
40028016	Sey tokkuɓemo sappo e go'o ɓen ndilli leydi Galiili to hocceere nde Yeesu wi'iɓe ɓe njaha.
40028017	Nde ɓe ngi'imo, sey ɓe mawninimo, ammaa woɓɓe ngaɗi seko nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
40028018	Sey Yeesu ɓaddii haade maɓɓe, wi'iɓe, “Ɗum hokkiiyam fuu laamu dow e ley.
40028019	Ngam non, njahee ngartiron fuu lenyi duuniyaaru tokkuɓeyam, ngaɗanonɓe baptisma nder inde Allah Nyaako Mo Dow, e Ɓiɗɗo, e Ruuhu Allah,
40028020	on ekkitinaɓe ɓe tokka koo ɗume ko mbiimi'on ngaɗon. Raɗɗum, e mi wondi e mooɗon koo ndeye haa re'uki duuniyaaru.”
41001001	Ɗu'um woni Habaru Belɗum dow Yeesu Almasiihu, Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
41001002	Ɗum windaama nder deftere Annabi Icaaya wiiki, “Allah wi'i, ‘Raɗɗum, mi liloyay lilaaɗo am o ardoo yeeso maaɗa o mo''inanmaa laawol.’
41001003	Goɗɗo e nodda nder ladde, e wi'a, ‘Mo''inee ɗatal Joomiraawo, portee laawol ngam garol maako.’ ”
41001004	Non boo Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma jooɗii nder ladde, e wa'ajina, e mo wi'a, “Tuubee, ɗum waɗana'on baptisma, nden Allah yaafanto'on hakkeeji mooɗon.”
41001005	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe daga leydi Yahuudiya fuu e gariiri Urucaliima ngaɗi ka yaaki to maako. E ɓe mbi'a fuu ko wooɗaa ɗum ɓe ngaɗi, e mo waɗanaɓe baptisma nder Caangol Urdun.
41001006	Yahaya e ɓornii kolte ɗe ɗum waɗiri leeɓe ngeelooba, e mo taadii taadorde laral. Nyamndu maako woni baabeeji e njumri.
41001007	E mo wa'ajina, e mo wi'a, “Goɗɗo e wara gaɗa am o ɓuriiyam mangu, koo lokkulli paɗe maako mi fotaayi turaaki mi fittaɗi.
41001008	E mi waɗirana'on baptisma e ndiyam, ammaa kanko o waɗiranay'on baptisma e Ruuhu Allah.”
41001009	Nder balɗe ɗen Yeesu waroyi daga gariiri Najarat nder leydi Galiili, sey Yahaya waɗanimo baptisma nder Caangol Urdun.
41001010	E wurtaaki Yeesu daga nder ndiyam ɗam, o yi'i dow e maɓɓitoo, Ruuhu Allah e jippoyoo dow maako bo foondu.
41001011	Hononde ƴiwoyi daga dow wi'i, “An woni Ɓiɗɗo am, mo ngiɗumi. E mi nana belɗum maaɗa.”
41001012	Ɗon e ɗon Ruuhu Allah yaarimo nder ladde.
41001013	Ton o waɗi balɗe 40 Ceyɗan e foondamo. E mo wondi e marle ladde, malaa'ika'en mballimo.
41001014	Too, gaɗa ɗum surii Yahaya nder suudu cural, Yeesu yahi Galiili e wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum daga to Allah.
41001015	E mo wi'a, “Carel waɗii! Laamu Allah warii haade mooɗon. Tuubee, njaɓon Habaru Belɗum.”
41001016	Yeesu e yaha haade Mbeela Galiili, sey o yi'i Siiman e minyiraawo muuɗum Andiraawus e ɓe ngaɗa nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe nder ndiyam, ngam ɓe nangooɓe liƴƴi.
41001017	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Tokkeeyam, mi wartiray'on gaddayɓe yimɓe to am.”
41001018	Ɗon e ɗon ɓe ali nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe ɓe tokkimo.
41001019	Nde o ɓeydi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o yi'i Yaakubu ɓii Jabadi e minyiraawo muuɗum Yahaya e ɓe nder komiwal maɓɓe, e ɓe mo''ina nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe.
41001020	Ɗon e ɗon o noddiɓe. Sey ɓe ali nyaako maɓɓe Jabadi nder komiwal e kuwanooɓeɓe, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
41001021	Sey Yeesu e tokkuɓemo njahi gariiri Kafarnahum. Nde Nyalnde Siwtaare wari, o natti suudu do'aare, o fuɗɗi ekkitinki.
41001022	Yimɓe kayɗini e ekkitinol maako, ngam o ekkitiniraayiɓe no moodiɓɓe Attawra ekkitinirta, ammaa o ekkitiniiɓe e bawɗe.
41001023	Ɗon e ɗon gooduɗo ginnol nder suudu do'aare ndun wulli sembee,
41001024	wi'i, “Ko wannumaa e amin, Yeesu Najarankeejo? A waroyi ngam kalkaamin? E mi andi an a moye. An woni Ceniiɗo Allah.”
41001025	Sey Yeesu haɓaningol, wi'i, “De''utu! Wurta nder maako.”
41001026	Sey ginnol ngol dimbimo dimbol kallungol, ngol wulli sembee, ngol wurtii nder maako.
41001027	Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini, ɓe ngaɗi ka ƴamƴamtirki, e ɓe mbi'a, “Ɗum um ɗume? Ngo'ol ekkitinol ngol kesol! Neɗɗo o'o e woodi bawɗe haa ginni e ngaɗa ko o wi'iɗi.”
41001028	Nder carel seɗɗa habaru Yeesu sankitii koo toye nder leydi Galiili.
41001029	Nde Yeesu e Yaakubu e Yahaya ɓe mburtii daga suudu do'aare ndun, ɓe natti wuro Biiturus e Andiraawus.
41001030	Esiraawo Biiturus debbo e mo fiida e jonte e mo fukkii. E nattuki Yeesu ɓe kokkimo habaru maako.
41001031	Sey Yeesu yahi to maako joganiimo jungo umminimo. Ɗon e ɗon jonte ɗen njoofimo, o ummii o fuɗɗi waddankiɓe nyamndu.
41001032	Futuro, gaɗa naange hiirii, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu fuu nyawɓe e gooduɓe ginni.
41001033	Sey yimɓe gariiri ndin ɗuɗɓe kawriti e dammugal wuro ngon.
41001034	Yeesu yamɗitini ɗuɗɓe gooduɓe nyawuuji feere‑feere. O wurtinani yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ginni, o haɗiɗi metuki ngam e ɗi andimo.
41001035	Ilaa subaka, daga nyiwre e horii, o ummii o yahi wonde wigeere nder ladde, o waɗi do'aare ton.
41001036	Sey Siiman e gonduɓe e maako ndilli ɗaɓɓutukimo.
41001037	Nde ɓe keɓtimo, ɓe mbi'imo, “Koo moye e ɗaɓɓutumaa!”
41001038	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “En njahu gariije gonɗe haade ɗo'o mi wa'ajina ton maa, ngam kanjum ngarmi mi waɗa.”
41001039	O yahi koo toye nder leydi Galiili, e mo wa'ajina nder cuuɗi do'aare maɓɓe, e mo wurtinana yimɓe ginni.
41001040	Goɗɗo gooduɗo nyawu nyaamoojum laral wari to Yeesu diccii e toroomo, e wi'a, “Taa jaɓii, a waaway njamɗitinaayam.”
41001041	Jurumɗum nangi Yeesu, o forti jungo, o meemimo, o wi'imo, “Mi jaɓii. Yamɗutu!”
41001042	Ɗon e ɗon nyawu ɗum alimo, o yamɗiti.
41001043	Sey Yeesu wagginimo, wi'imo, “Dillu,
41001044	faamu, taa' wi'uka koo moye, ammaa yahu kollaa hoore maaɗa to ardiiɗo diina, nden kokkaa cakkiri no Muusa wi'i ɗum waɗa ngam laaɓol maaɗa. Waɗu non ngam tabbitinanki yimɓe a yamɗitii.”
41001045	Ammaa o dilli e mo wi'aka koo toye, e mo sankita habaru ɗum. Non waɗi Yeesu waawaayi nattuki wondi gariiri e njayri, ammaa o jooɗii e ladde. Fuu e non, yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngaɗi ka warki to maako daga koo toye.
41002001	Gaɗa balɗe seɗɗa Yeesu so''ii Kafarnahum. Sey yimɓe nani habaru e mo wuro.
41002002	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawriti keewi wuro ngon haa walaa njayri nder wuro ngon e yaasi dammugal maago. E mo wa'ajinanaɓe Wolde Allah.
41002003	Sey woɓɓe ngaroyi, ɓe ngaddanimo goɗɗo jaraaɗo, yimɓe nayo e koccoyimo.
41002004	Nde ɓe mbaawaayi nattinkimo to Yeesu woni ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗii, sey ɓe ƴentinimo dow suudu ndun, ɓe njulindu, ɓe ngaɗimo nder yulnde nden dow daago maako, ɓe njippinimo yeeso Yeesu.
41002005	Nde Yeesu yi'i hoolaare maɓɓe, o wi'i jaraaɗo on, “Higo, a yaafanaama hakkeeji maaɗa.”
41002006	Woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Attawra e njooɗii ɗon e ɓe nyuma nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe,
41002007	e ɓe mbi'a, “Ngam ɗume neɗɗo o'o metirta nihi? E mo fottidina hoore maako e Allah! Moye waawata yaafaaki hakke to naa' Allah tan?”
41002008	Ɗon e ɗon Yeesu faami nder ɓernde muuɗum e ɓe nyuma dow fii ɗu'um nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume nyumoton iri nyumooji ɗi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
41002009	Ko ɓuri hoyki, ɗum wi'a jaraaɗo o'o, ‘A yaafanaama hakke maaɗa,’ koo ɗum wi'amo, ‘Umma hoccu daago maaɗa, yaaɓu?’
41002010	Ammaa e mi yiɗi andon Ɓii Neɗɗo e woodi laamu nder duuniyaaru yaafoo hakke.” Ngam non o wi'i jaraaɗo on,
41002011	“E mi wi'umaa, umma, koccaa daago maaɗa, kootaa wuro.”
41002012	Sey o ummii, o hocci daago maako, o wurtii, o dilli yeeso koo moye. Fii ɗu'um hayɗini fuu yimɓe gonɓe ɗon, ɓe manti Allah, ɓe mbi'i, “Min meeɗaayi yiiki iri fii ɗu'um!”
41002013	Yeesu fuɗɗiti wurtii yahi haade Mbeela Galiili. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngari to maako o ekkitiɓe.
41002014	E mo ƴaɓɓoo, o yi'i Leewi ɓii Halfa e jooɗii to ɗum jaɓata ceede leydi, sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Tokkam.” Sey Leewi ummii tokkimo.
41002015	Gaɗa ɗon Yeesu e tokkuɓemo e ɓe njooɗii e ɓe kirtoo to wuro Leewi. Jaɓooɓe ceede leydi ɗuɗɓe e gaɗooɓe hakke e nyamda e maako e tokkuɓemo, ngam e woodi yimɓe ɗuɗɓe iri maɓɓe e tokkimo.
41002016	Nde moodiɓɓe Attawra Faarisanko'en ngi'i e mo nyamda e gaɗooɓe hakke e jaɓooɓe ceede leydi, ɓe mbi'i tokkuɓemo, “Ngam ɗume o nyamdata e jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e gaɗooɓe hakke?”
41002017	Nde Yeesu nani non, o wi'iɓe, “Naa' yamɓe ngiɗi nyawndoowo, sey ni nyawɓe. Mi waroyaayi ngam nodduki nyumooɓe ɓe aadili'en, ammaa mi waroyi ngam nodduki anduɓe ɓe gaɗooɓe hakke.”
41002018	Too, tokkuɓe Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma e tokkuɓe Faarisanko'en e cuumoo. Sey woɓɓe ngari ƴami Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume tokkuɓe Yahaya e tokkuɓe Faarisanko'en e cuumoo, ammaa tokkuɓema cuumataako?”
41002019	Yeesu nootii, wi'iɓe, “E yiiki mooɗon higooɓe angoojo cuumoto e carel ngel angoojo on e wondi e maɓɓe? To ni e ɓe ngondi e angoojo on, ɓe cuumataako.
41002020	Ammaa carel e wara ngel ɗum hoccata angoojo on daga nder maɓɓe, nden e nyalnde nden ɓe cuumotoo.
41002021	“Walaa nyootayɗo lefel kesel to limcere kiinde. To o waɗii non, lefel kesel ngel seekay e limcere kiinde nden. Non waɗay nde ɓura no ndenno seekuki.
41002022	Non maa walaa gaɗayɗo ndiyam inabojam kesam nder faandu hiindu. To o waɗii non, ɗam ƴuufay ɗam pusa faandu ndun, nden ɗum dullayɗam, ɗum dulla faandu ndun. Ammaa ndiyam inabojam kesam haani waɗee nder faandu heyru.”
41002023	Wonde Nyalnde Siwtaare Yeesu e tokkuɓemo e ƴaɓɓoo nder gese alkamaari, sey tokkuɓemo puɗɗi ɓoruki cammeeje mayri e ɓe nyaama.
41002024	Sey Faarisanko'en mbi'imo, “Raa ko tokkuɓema ngaɗata. Ko waɗata e ɓe ngaɗa ko Attawra haɗi ɗum waɗa Nyalnde Siwtaare?”
41002025	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On meeɗaayi janguki ko Dawda waɗi, kanko e gonduɓe e maako nde ɓe nani weelo kadin e ɓe nder dullere nyamndu?
41002026	E jaamanu ɗum Abiyata woni Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina, Dawda natti Lukuru Seniiɗum nyaami buroodi ceniiɗum. Attawra boo wi'ii ardiiɓe diina tan haani nyaamuki buroodi ɗum, ammaa Dawda nyaamiɗum haa maa o hokkori jaadooɓe e maako.”
41002027	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Nyalnde Siwtaare waɗaa ngam neɗɗo, naa' neɗɗo waɗaa ngam Nyalnde Siwtaare.
41002028	Ngam non Ɓii Neɗɗo o Joomu koo ɗume haa e Nyalnde Siwtaare.”
41003001	Wonde nyalnde Yeesu natti suudu do'aare, e woodi goɗɗo mo jungo jaraango nder mayru.
41003002	Sey woɓɓe nder suudu do'aare ndun cutiimo koo o yamɗitinay neɗɗo on Nyalnde Siwtaare ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngulliroytoomo.
41003003	Sey Yeesu wi'i mo jungo jaraango on, “Woroy ɗo'o.”
41003004	Nden Yeesu ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Ko Attawra wi'i ɗum waɗa Nyalnde Siwtaare? Ɗum waɗa ko wooɗi, koo ɗum waɗa ko wooɗaa? Ɗum hisna yonki, koo ɗum waɗa warhoore?” Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe nde''iti.
41003005	Yeesu raariɓe ɓernde muuɗum e metti, o wannii ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗe caatuɗe. Sey o wi'i mo jungo jaraango on, “Fortu jungo maaɗa.” O fortingo, sey ngo yamɗiti.
41003006	Sey Faarisanko'en mburtii suudu do'aare ndun, ɓe puɗɗi medduki e yimɓe Hirudus dow no ɓe mbardata Yeesu.
41003007	Sey Yeesu dillidi e tokkuɓemo yaaki haade Mbeela Galiili. Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ƴiwoyiɓe Galiili tokkimo.
41003008	Nde yimɓe ɗuɗɓe nani habaru fuu ko o waɗata, ɓe ngari to maako daga Yahuudiya, e Urucaliima, e Iduumiya, e fongo Caangol Urdun, e leydi haade gariije Taaya e Sidon.
41003009	O wi'i tokkuɓemo ngaddanamo komiwal ngam yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawritii to' ɓe ɓiɗɗamo.
41003010	O waɗu non ngam o yamɗitinii yimɓe ɗuɗɓe haa nyawɓe ɗuɗɓe ngaɗi ka fiiduki ngam ɓe meemamo.
41003011	Fuu carel ngel yimɓe gooduɓe ginni ngi'imo, sey ɓe njana yeeso maako e ɓe mbi'a e sembe, “An a Ɓiɗɗo Allah!”
41003012	Ammaa o wagginiɓe to' ɓe mbi'aka koo moye kanko o moye.
41003013	Yeesu ƴenti hocceere noddi ɓe o yiɗi. Ɓe njahi to maako.
41003014	O suɓi yimɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ngam ɓe njooɗodoo e maako, nden o lilaɓe ɓe nga'ajinoya, o noddiɓe lilaaɓe,
41003015	o hokkiɓe bawɗe wurtinki ginni.
41003016	Raa inɗe yimɓe ɓe o suɓi ɓen: Siiman mo o hokki inde Biiturus,
41003017	e Yaakubu ɓii Jabadi, e minyiraawo muuɗum Yahaya, o hokkiɓe inde Buwarnajis, waato Ɓiɓɓe Riggaango,
41003018	e Andiraawus, e Filibus, e Batiloomi, e Maatiyu, e Tooma, e Yaakubu ɓii Halfa, e Taadiyus, e Siiman Kananiyankeejo,
41003019	e Yahuuda Iskariyooti, gartuɗo kokkitirɗo Yeesu.
41003020	Nden Yeesu natti wuro to jooɗotoo, sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe fuɗɗiti kawriti to maako haa kanko e tokkuɓemo ɓe mbaawaayi nyaamuki nyamndu.
41003021	Nde bandiraaɓe maako nanii non, ɓe njahi ngam ɓe nangoyamo, ngam ɓe nanii yimɓe e mbi'a, “O haaŋake.”
41003022	Moodiɓɓe Attawra garoyɓe daga Urucaliima mbi'i, “Ba'aljabul laamiiɗo ginni nangimo, nden e bawɗe maagol o wurtinirta ginni.”
41003023	Sey Yeesu noddiɓe hokkiɓe misaalu wi'iɓe, “No waɗata Ceyɗan riiwa Ceyɗan?
41003024	To laamu sendake e wanywanytira, ɗum waawataa ɗum daroo.
41003025	Non maa to wuro sendake e wanywanytira, ngon ɗon wuro ngo waawataa ngo daroo.
41003026	To laamu Ceyɗan sendake e wanywanytira, ɗum waawataa ɗum daroo, re'irde maajum warii won ɗon.
41003027	“Walaa baawayɗo natta wuro cembiɗɗo teetanamo ko o woodi, sey ni arta haɓɓukimo, nden waawa hoccuki ko o woodi nder wuro ngon.
41003028	“E mi wi'a'on goonga, ɗum waaway yaafanaaki yimɓe hakke e koo iri ɗiye haalaaji kalluɗi ɗi ɓe meti.
41003029	Ammaa fuu bi'uɗo ko wooɗaa dow Ruuhu Allah, o yaafantaake haa abadaa. Haa abadaa hakke ɗum e dow maako.”
41003030	Yeesu wi'ii non ngam e ɓe mbi'a, “E mo woodi ginnol.”
41003031	Sey maduujo Yeesu e minyiraaɓe maako ngari ndarii yaasi, ɓe lili goɗɗo noddoya Yeesu.
41003032	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e njooɗii e ɓe pilii Yeesu, ɓe mbi'imo, “Maduujo maaɗa e minyiraaɓe maaɗa e ɓe ton yaasi, e ɓe ɗaɓɓutumaa.”
41003033	Yeesu ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Moye woni maduujo am, nden ɓeye ngoni minyiraaɓe am?”
41003034	O raari jooɗiiɓe e piliimo o wi'i, “Raa maduujo am e minyiraaɓe am ɗo'o!
41003035	Fuu gaɗuɗo ko Allah yiɗi, kanko woni minyiraawo am e maduujo am.”
41004001	Ɗonmaa Yeesu fuɗɗi ekkitinki haade Mbeela Galiili. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawriti to maako naaki o natti komiwal o jooɗii nder maagal dow ndiyam. Kawrutuɓe ɓen fuu e ɓe haade mbeela ngan dow njaareendi.
41004002	Sey o huutiri misaalu o ekkitiɓe ekkitinol feere‑feere ɗuɗngol. Nder ekkitinol maako o wi'i,
41004003	“Kettindee! Goɗɗo demoowo yahi ngesa ngam saaka awdi.
41004004	E mo nder saakuki awdi ndin, wondi yani dow ɗatal, colli ngari cuppidindi.
41004005	Wondi boo yani nder kaaƴe; ɗon ndi heɓaayi leydi ɗundi. Ndi fuɗi jawɗum ngam leydi ndin luggaa.
41004006	Ammaa nde naange wurtoyii fiyindi, sey ndi yoori ngam ndi walaa ɗaɗi.
41004007	Wondi awdi boo yani nder gi'e, sey gi'e ɗen mawni ɓiɗɗindi haa ndi waawaayi waɗuki cammeeje.
41004008	Ammaa wondi awdi yani dow leydi mbondi ndi fuɗi ndi mawni ndi waɗi cammeeje. Wondi waɗi gabbe 30, wondi waɗi gabbe 60, wondi haa 100.”
41004009	Nde Yeesu heenyi hokkuki misaalu ɗu'um, sey o wi'i, “Gooduɗo noppi nanuki fuu nana.”
41004010	Nde Yeesu e jooɗii kanum tan, tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo e woɓɓe tokkuɓemo njahi to maako ɓe ƴamimo o hokkaɓe ma'ana ɗum ɗon misaalu.
41004011	Sey o wi'iɓe, “Onon on kokkaama faamuki sirru Laamu Allah, ammaa yimɓe ɓe ngalaa nder mooɗon, koo ɗume sey e misaalu,
41004012	ngam, ‘E ɓe ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa. E ɓe nana, ammaa ɓe paamataa. Ngam to naa' non ɗum gaɗotooɗum ɓe nana, ɓe tuuba, ɗum yaafanooɓe.’ ”
41004013	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On paamaayi misaalu ɗu'um? Too, no paamirton misaalu koriiɗum?
41004014	Ko demoowo on saaki woni Wolde Allah.
41004015	Woɓɓe yimɓe e nandi e awdi njanundi dow ɗatal. Carel ngel ɓe nani Wolde Allah, ɗon e ɗon Ceyɗan wara hoccande daga nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
41004016	Woɓɓe boo e nandi e awdi njanundi hakkunde kaaƴe. To ɓe nanii Wolde Allah, ɗon e ɗon ɓe njaɓande nder belɗum ɓernde.
41004017	Ammaa nde ɓe ngalaa ɗaɗi, ɓe munyay carel seɗɗa tan. To caɗeele koo torra warii ngam wolde nden, ɗon e ɗon ɓe njoofande.
41004018	Woɓɓe kadin e nandi e awdi caakaandi nder gi'e. Ɓe nani Wolde nden,
41004019	ammaa wannuki e fii duuniyaaru, e yidde jawdi, e suuno feere‑feere natti ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɓiɗɗi wolde nden kaɗinde wallukiɓe ɓe ngaɗa ko Allah yiɗi.
41004020	Woɓɓe boo e nandi e awdi caakaandi dow leydi mbondi. Ɓe nani Wolde Allah, ɓe njaɓinde, ɓe kuutinirinde haa ɓe keɓi ɓeydaari, woɓɓe keɓi nde 30, woɓɓe keɓi nde 60, woɓɓe haa nde 100.”
41004021	O wi'iɓe, “On ngadday fitilaaru kippon tummude dow mayru, koo ndesonndu ley leeso? Naa' on ndesayndu dow danki?
41004022	Fuu ko suuɗii, ɗum wurtinayɗum e njayri, non maa fuu ko ombaa ɗum omteteeɗum.
41004023	Gooduɗo noppi nanuki fuu nana.”
41004024	O fuɗɗiti o wi'iɓe, “Paamee boɗɗum e ko nanoton! E poondirgel ngel poondirton, e maagel ɗum foondiranta'on haa maa ɗum ɓeydana'on.
41004025	Ngam fuu gooduɗo faamu dow Laamu Allah ɗum ɓeydanaymo. Ammaa mo walaa faamu dow Laamu Allah, koo ko o woodi maa ɗum jaɓayɗum.”
41004026	Yeesu fuɗɗiti wi'i, “Laamu Allah e nandi e neɗɗo caakoowo awdi e ngesa.
41004027	Waala fina, koo e mo ɗaanii koo o ɗaanaaki, awdi ndin fuɗay mawna, ammaa o andaa no ɗum waɗiri.
41004028	Leydi e wurtina gawri e hoore mayri. Arande ƴombal wurtoto, nden sammeere, nden sammeere nden wurtina ngabboy.
41004029	To gawri ndin ɓendii, sey o yaada e lawjeeru o taƴa, ngam carel ittukindi warii.”
41004030	Yeesu kadin wi'i, “Ko nandinaymi Laamu Allah? Koo boo e ɗume misaalu nandinaymiɗum?
41004031	E ɗum nandi e gabbel mastat, gabbel ɓurngel koo ngele gabbel aaweteengel famɗuki.
41004032	Fuu e non to ngel aawaama, e ngel mawna ngel ɓura koo ngele leggel mawnuki, ngel waɗa lice mawɗe haa colli koɗa nder ɗowdi maagel.”
41004033	Yeesu huutirii iri misaalu ɗu'um ɗuɗɗum, o wa'ajinaniɓe Wolde Allah haa keerol no ɓe mbaawi faamuki.
41004034	Fuu ko o wi'ataɓe e mo huutira misaalu. Ammaa to e mo wondi e tokkuɓemo kamɓe tan, sey o wi'aɓe ma'ana ko o wi'i.
41004035	E nden ɗon nyalnde alaasara Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “En kuulu fongo mbeela.”
41004036	Sey tokkuɓemo ali yimɓe hawrutuɓe, ɓe natti nder komiwal ngal o woni nder, ɓe ndillidi e maako. E woodi komiije feere tokkiɓe.
41004037	Sey iyeende e hendu cembindu ummoyii, geelooɗi ndiyam puɗɗi piiki komiwal ngal, ndiyam natti nder maagal haa naaki komiwal ngal ɓadii heewa ndiyam.
41004038	Yeesu boo e ton gaɗa komiwal ngal e ɗaanii dow ɓantirɗum hoore. Sey tokkuɓemo pindinimo mbi'imo, “Moodibbo, a wannaayi to en kalkii?”
41004039	Sey o ummii, o haɓani hendu ndun, o wi'i geelooɗi ndiyam ɗin, “Nde''itee! Alee!” Sey hendu ndun ali, koo ɗume de''iti.
41004040	O wi'i tokkuɓemo, “Ngam ɗume ngooduɗon kulol? Haa jooni on koolaakiyam?”
41004041	Ɓe kultori, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri, ɓe mbi'i, “Ɗum moye o'o? Haa hendu e geelooɗi ndiyam e ngaɗa ko o wi'i!”
41005001	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo kuuli fongo mbeela ɓe njottii leydi Gaarasinko'en.
41005002	Nde Yeesu wurtii daga nder komiwal ngal, sey goɗɗo gooduɗo ginnol ƴiwoyi to genaale taɓɓiimo.
41005003	Neɗɗo on nder genaale o jooɗotoo, walaa baawayɗo haɓɓukimo, koo e ɓoggi njamndi.
41005004	Nde ɗuɗɗum e mo haɓɓiree ɓoggi njamndi juuɗe e koyɗe, ammaa o taƴaɗi o yewa njamndi gaɗaandi to koyɗe maako. Walaa gooduɗo sembe baawayɗo jogaakimo.
41005005	Jemma e nyalawma e mo nder genaale koo dow kocceeje, e mo wulla sembee, e mo taƴira ɓandu maako e kaaƴe.
41005006	Nde o haynii Yeesu, o doggi o yahi to maako, o diccii yeeso maako.
41005007	O wulli sembee o wi'i, “Ko wannumaa e am, Yeesu Ɓiɗɗo Allah Joomu Mangu? E mi toromaa ngam Allah, taa' torram.”
41005008	O wi'u non ngam Yeesu wi'ii, “An ginnol, wurta nder neɗɗo o'o!”
41005009	Sey Yeesu ƴamingol wi'i, “No inde maaɗa?” Ngol nootii ngol wi'i, “Ɗuɗɗi, ngam e min ɗuuɗi.”
41005010	Sey ngol waɗi ka toraaki Yeesu to' o riiwaɗi daga leydi ndin.
41005011	Haade ɗon e woodi ornde aladeeji ɗuɗɗi e dura to regorde hocceere.
41005012	Sey ginni ɗin torii Yeesu ɗi mbi'i, “Alumin min nattoya aladeeji ɗin ni.”
41005013	Yeesu jaɓi, sey ɗi mburtii ɗi nattoyi aladeeji ɗin. Aladeeji ɗin boo kewtii 2,000. Ornde nden fuu nyaari jippoyii daga dow ƴolde nden yani nder mbeela, ndiyam nyaamiɗi.
41005014	Woynaaɓe aladeeji ɗin ndoggi mbi'oyika yimɓe nder gariiri e yimɓe ngarihoy. Yimɓe ɓen njahi ngi'a ko waɗi.
41005015	Nde ɓe ngari to Yeesu woni, ɓe ngi'i goodunooɗo ginni ɗuɗɗi on, e mo jooɗii ɗon, e ɓornii, e mo nder hakkiilo maako. Koo moye maɓɓe huli.
41005016	Gi'uɓe ko waɗi ɓe mbi'i yimɓe ɓen ko heɓi goodunooɗo ginni on e aladeeji ɗin.
41005017	Sey yimɓe ɓen puɗɗi toraaki Yeesu alanaɓe leydi maɓɓe.
41005018	Yeesu e natta komiwal, sey goodunooɗo ginni on torii dillida e Yeesu.
41005019	Ammaa Yeesu jaɓaayi o dillida e muuɗum, wi'imo, “Hootu to bandiraaɓe maaɗa mbi'aɓe fii mawɗum ɗum Joomiraawo waɗanmaa e no o yurminiranmaa.”
41005020	Sey neɗɗo on dilli leydi Dikapolis, o fuɗɗi hokkuki habaru fii mawɗum ɗum Yeesu waɗanimo. Fuu yimɓe ɓen kayɗini.
41005021	Nde Yeesu fuɗɗiti huuli fongo mbeela nder komiwal, yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawriti to maako, kanko boo e mo haade mbeela ngan.
41005022	Sey go'oto nder ardiiɓe suudu do'aare bi'eteeɗo Jaayirus wari. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o diccii yeeso maako,
41005023	o waɗi ka toraaki Yeesu, e mo wi'a, “Ɓiɗɗo am surbaajo pamaro ɓadake mayde, e mi toromaa ngaraa meemaamo ngam o yamɗita to' o maaya.”
41005024	Sey Yeesu yaadi e maako. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe tokkimo, e ɓe ɓiɗɗamo.
41005025	E woodi goɗɗo debbo ɗon gaɗuɗo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi e torrodoo e rufuki ƴiiƴam.
41005026	Debbo on torrake naa' seɗɗa to juuɗe nyawndooɓe ɗuɗɓe, o majjinii fuu jawdi maako. O yamɗitaayi, ammaa nyawu ɗum ɓeydii.
41005027	Nden maa o nanii habaru Yeesu, sey o ƴiwoyi gaɗa Yeesu nder yimɓe, o meemi toggoore maako.
41005028	Ngam o wi'ii nder ɓernde maako, “Koo toggoore maako meemumi tan, mi yamɗitay.”
41005029	Ɗon e ɗon ƴiiƴam ɗam darii, o nani nder ɓandu maako ɗum yamɗitiniimo daga nyawu maako.
41005030	Ɗon e ɗon Yeesu faami bawɗe mburtake daga nder muuɗum. O waylitii nder yimɓe, o wi'i, “Moye meemi toggoore am?”
41005031	Sey tokkuɓemo mbi'imo, “A yi'a yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e ɓiɗɗumaa, ammaa a ƴama moye meemumaa?”
41005032	Ammaa Yeesu waɗi ka raaruki nder yimɓe ɓen ngam yi'a moye meemimo.
41005033	Debbo on boo nde e mo andi ko heɓi ɓandu maako, o wari nder kulol e mo diwna, o diccii yeeso Yeesu, o wi'imo goonga dow koo ɗume ko waɗi.
41005034	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Bandiraawo, hoolaare maaɗa yamɗitiniima. Njippoɗaa jam, a hoyii daga nyawu maaɗa.”
41005035	Yeesu e meta, sey woɓɓe daga wuro Jaayirus ardiiɗo suudu do'aare on ngari, ɓe mbi'imo, “Ɓiɗɗo maaɗa maayii. Ngam ɗume ngannataa moodibbo kadin?”
41005036	Ammaa Yeesu wannaayi e ko ɓe mbi'i, o wi'i ardiiɗo suudu do'aare on, “Taa' hulu, hoolayam tan.”
41005037	O alaayi koo moye yaadi e maako sey Biiturus, e Yaakubu, e Yahaya minyiraawo Yaakubu.
41005038	Nde ɓe njottii wuro Jaayirus, Yeesu yi'i yimɓe nder wannaare, woɓɓe e mboya, woɓɓe e ngulla e sembe.
41005039	O natti, o wi'i, “Ngam ɗume nattuɗon wannaare nde'e on mboya? Surbaajo on o maayaayi, ammaa o ɗaani tan.”
41005040	Sey ɓe njalimo. O wurtiniɓe ɓe fuu yaasi, o hocci nyaako surbaajo on e maduujo maako e tokkuɓemo ɓe o wondi, ɓe natti to surbaajo on woni.
41005041	Yeesu jogii jungo surbaajo on wi'i, “Taliita, kumi,” waato, “Surbaajo, umma!”
41005042	Ɗon e ɗon surbaajo on ummii fuɗɗi yaadu. E mo woodi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi. Fii ɗum hayɗiniɓe naa' seɗɗa.
41005043	Yeesu wagginiɓe wi'i to' ɓe njaɓa ɓe mbi'aka koo moye. Nden o wi'iɓe, “Kokkeemo goɗɗum o nyaama.”
41006001	Sey Yeesu ali wigeere nden so''ii gariiri to mawni, tokkuɓemo njaadi e maako.
41006002	Nde Nyalnde Siwtaare wari, o fuɗɗi ekkitinki nder suudu do'aare. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe nanɓe ko o wi'i, ɓe kayɗini e ekkitinol maako. E ɓe mbi'a, “Toye neɗɗo o'o heɓi fuu fii ɗu'um? Toye o heɓi iri faamu ɗu'um? Toye o heɓi bawɗe waɗuki iri kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ɗe'e?
41006003	Naa' kanko woni on ɗon cehoowo, ɓiɗɗo Maryaama, mawniraawo Yaakubu, e Yusufu, e Yahuuda, e Siiman? Nden minyiraaɓe maako rewɓe naa' en ngondi e maɓɓe ɗo'o?” Sey ɓe njawanimo.
41006004	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Koo toye yimɓe e kokka annabiijo mangu, ammaa yimɓe gariiri maako, e bandiraaɓe maako, e yimɓe wuro maako, ɓe kokkataamo mangu.”
41006005	Yeesu waawaayi waɗuki goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum ton, sey ni yimɓe seɗɗa ɓe njamɗaa o yowi juuɗe maako dow maɓɓe o yamɗitiniɓe.
41006006	O hayɗini ngam ɓe koolaakimo. Yeesu e yiiloo e ekkitina nder ngarihoy.
41006007	O noddi tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo, o liliɓe ɗiɗo‑ɗiɗo, o hokkiɓe laamu dow ginni.
41006008	O wi'iɓe to' ɓe kocca goɗɗum ngam yaadu, koo nyamndu, koo jakaare, koo ceede e jiiba. Sawru tan ɓe njogotoo.
41006009	Ɓe ngatta paɗe, ammaa to' ɓe ɓornoo toggooje ɗiɗi.
41006010	O boo wi'iɓe, “Fuu wuro ngo njippiiɗon, njooɗee nder maago naa on alii gariiri ndin.
41006011	To ɗum jaɓɓaaki'on e wigeere, koo ɗum wanyii hettindanaaki'on, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon carel ko aloton wigeere nden. Kanjum hollata ɓe ngaɗii hakke.”
41006012	Sey ɓe ndilli e ɓe nga'ajina wi'uki yimɓe tuuba.
41006013	Ɓe mburtinani yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ginni, ɗuɗɓe ɓe njamɗaa boo ɓe moytaniɓe nebbam ɓe njamɗitiniɓe.
41006014	Hirudus Laamiiɗo nani habaru fii ɗu'um, ngam inde Yeesu andaama koo toye. Woɓɓe e mbi'a Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma umminaa daga mayde, kanjum waɗi e mo woodi bawɗe waɗuki kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe.
41006015	Woɓɓe boo mbi'i, “Ɗum Annabi Iliya.” Nden woɓɓe mbi'i, “O annabiijo bo annabo'en ndenno.”
41006016	Ammaa nde Hirudus nani non, o wi'i, “Yahaya mo ittanmi hoore, kanko umminaa daga mayde!”
41006017	Ngam ndenno Hirudus e hoore muuɗum waɗii ɗum nangii Yahaya, ɗum haɓɓimo, ɗum surimo nder suudu cural. O waɗu non ngam Hiruudiya debbo mawniraawo maako Filibus mo o te'i.
41006018	Ngam Yahaya waɗii ka wiiki Hirudus, “Ɗum haanaayi te'aa debbo mawniraawo maaɗa.”
41006019	Hiruudiya boo nder ɓernde maako e mo jogitii Yahaya e mo yiɗi warkimo. Ammaa o waawaayi warkimo,
41006020	ngam Hirudus e hula Yahaya e suranamo, nde e mo andi kanko o aadiliijo o ceniiɗo. Fuu carel ngel Hirudus nani haala Yahaya, e mo natta wannaare. Ammaa fuu e non e mo yiɗi hettindanaakimo.
41006021	Ammaa Hiruudiya heɓi laawol no warirta Yahaya. Nyalnde humto siftorki danyngol Hirudus, Hirudus siryii humto ngam kuwooɓe mawɓe nder laamu maako, e mawɓe ardiiɓe sooji'en, e mawɓe leydi Galiili.
41006022	Nde ɓiɗɗo Hiruudiya surbaajo natti wami, o welnani Hirudus ɓernde e hoɓɓe maako. Sey Hirudus wi'imo, “Torayam fuu ko ngiɗɗaa, mi hokketeɗum.”
41006023	Hirudus hunaniimo wi'i, “Fuu ko toriɗaayam mi hokketeɗum haa ko hewtata sendere laamu am.”
41006024	Sey surbaajo on wurtii wi'i maduujo muuɗum, “Ko haani mi toroo?” Maduujo on wi'imo, “Toramo hoore Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma.”
41006025	Ɗon e ɗon surbaajo on nder yawɗaare o so''ii to laamiiɗo on o wi'imo, “E mi yiɗi jooni‑jooni kokkaayam hoore Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma nder le'al.”
41006026	Hirudus Laamiiɗo wannii naa' seɗɗa, ammaa nde o yaadake o hunanakemo yeeso hoɓɓe, o yiɗaa o haɗamo.
41006027	Ɗon e ɗon o waɗi soojiijo o yaha o waddoya hoore Yahaya. Soojiijo on yahi ittani Yahaya hoore nder suudu cural,
41006028	o waddoyi hoore nden nder le'al, o hokkinde surbaajo on. Surbaajo on boo hokkinde maduujo muuɗum.
41006029	Nde tokkuɓe Yahaya nani non ɓe ngari ɓe kocci ɓandu maako ɓe pukkinoyindu nder yenaande gasaande nder hayre.
41006030	Lilaaɓe ɓe Yeesu lilunoo ngartoyii to maako, ɓe mbi'imo koo ɗume ko ɓe ngaɗi e ko ɓe ekkitini.
41006031	O wi'iɓe, “Ngaree, njahen to wigeere gewtunde keɓon ciwtooɗon seɗɗa.” O wi'ii non ngam yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e ngara e co''oo haa hewti ɓe keɓaayi koo carel ɓe nyaami nyamndu.
41006032	Sey ɓe natti komiwal ɓe ndilli to wigeere nder ladde kamɓe tan.
41006033	Ammaa carel ngel ɓe ndillata yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngi'iɓe anditiɓe. Yimɓe ɓen mburtoyii daga gariije ɗuɗɗe ɓe ndoggi e koyɗe ɓe artiɓe yaaki ton.
41006034	E jippaaki Yeesu daga nder komiwal ngal o yi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e kawriti, sey o nani jurumɗum maɓɓe, ngam e ɓe ɗon bo baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako. Sey o fuɗɗi ekkitinkiɓe fii ɗuɗɗum.
41006035	Nde alaasara waɗi, sey tokkuɓemo ngari to maako mbi'imo, “Ɗo'o ɗum ladde, ɗonmaa naange hiirii.
41006036	Wi'u yimɓe ɓe'e ndilla ngam ɓe njaha gure gonɗe haade e ngarihoy ngonkoy haade ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.”
41006037	Ammaa Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Onon kokkeeɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.” Sey ɓe mbi'imo, “A yiɗi min njaha min coodonoyaɓe nyamndu kewtundu ceede ɗe kuwoowo yoɓetee balɗe 200 min kokkaɓe ɓe nyaama?”
41006038	O wi'iɓe, “Buroodi noye ngooduɗon? Njahee ndaaron.” Nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe mbi'i, “Buroodi jowi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi.”
41006039	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe ɓe mbi'a yimɓe njooɗoo moɓɗe‑moɓɗe dow huɗo hecco.
41006040	Sey ɓe njooɗii moɓɗe 100‑100, woɓɓe njooɗii moɓɗe 50‑50.
41006041	O hocci buroodi jowi ɗum e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗin, o raari dow, o yetti Allah, o sendi buroodi ɗum o hokki tokkuɓemo ngeedana yimɓe fuu. Non o waadi e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗin maa.
41006042	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami ɓe kaari.
41006043	Tokkuɓemo moɓti buroodi koriiɗum e liƴƴi koriiɗi ko waɗi kondooje sappo e ɗiɗi.
41006044	Nyaamuɓe buroodi ɗum worɓe tan ɓadake 5,000.
41006045	Ɗon e ɗon Yeesu waɗi tokkuɓemo natta komiwal ɓe artamo huuluki yaaki Betasayda, kanko boo o jaɓɓitotoo kawrutuɓe.
41006046	Gaɗa o jaɓɓitakeɓe o ƴenti wonde hocceere ngam o waɗa do'aare.
41006047	Nde futuro waɗi, komiwal ngal e caka mbeela, Yeesu boo e dow hocceere kanum tan.
41006048	O yi'i tokkuɓemo e piida e komiwal, ngam hendu e haɗaɓe yaadu. Fajiri e mo yaha to maɓɓe, e mo yaha dow ndiyam mbeela ngan. E mo yiɗi o ƴaɓɓooɓe,
41006049	ammaa nde ɓe ngi'imo e mo yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe kammi ɗum ginnol, sey ɓe ngulli,
41006050	ngam ɓe fuu ɓe ngi'imo ɓe kultorii. Ammaa ɗon e ɗon o metaniɓe, o wi'i, “Pukkinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, ɗum min. To' on kulu.”
41006051	Nden o natti komiwal ngal to maɓɓe, sey hendu ndun darii. Ɓe kayɗini naa' seɗɗa,
41006052	ngam ɓe paamaayi ma'ana nyamnuki yimɓe 5,000 ki o waɗi, ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe paamaayi ma'ana maajum.
41006053	Nde ɓe kuuli fongo mbeela ngan, ɓe njottii leydi Janisarat ɓe kaɓɓi komiwal ngal.
41006054	Nde ɓe mburtii nder maagal, ɗon e ɗon yimɓe anditi Yeesu.
41006055	Yimɓe ɓen ndoggi ɓe njahi koo toye nder leydi ndin, e ɓe ngaddoya nyawɓe dow mbe''itaari to Yeesu koo toye to ɓe nani o woni.
41006056	Koo toye to o yahi, koo nder ngarihoy, koo nder gariije mawɗe, koo nder gure ladde, yimɓe e pukkina nyawɓe nder luumo, ɓe toroomo nyawɓe ɓen meema koo cilmbi toggoore maako. Fuu meemuɓeɗi njamɗiti.
41007001	Faarisanko'en e woɓɓe nder moodiɓɓe Attawra garoyɓe daga Urucaliima ɓe kawriti to Yeesu.
41007002	Sey ɓe ngi'i woɓɓe tokkuɓe Yeesu e ɓe nyaama nyamndu ɓe lootaayi juuɗe maɓɓe no diina Yahuudanko'en wi'i.
41007003	Faarisanko'en e fuu Yahuudanko'en ɓe nyaamataa nyamndu naa ɓe lootii juuɗe maɓɓe no diina maɓɓe wi'i, e ɓe tokki ndonu maama'en maɓɓe.
41007004	To ɓe ngartoyii daga luumo, ɓe nyaamataa nyamndu naa ɓe lootake no diina maɓɓe wi'i. Ɗonmaa e ɓe tokka ndonu ɗuɗɗum ɗum ɓe ndoni, bo lootuki jarduɗe, e gojiije, e paali gaɗiraaɗi njamndi mboɗeeri.
41007005	Sey Faarisanko'en e moodiɓɓe Attawra ɓen ƴami Yeesu ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume tokkuɓema tokkataa ndonu maama'en meeɗen, ammaa e ɓe nyaamira nyamndu juuɗe ɗe laaɓaa?”
41007006	Sey Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Annabi Icaaya wi'ii goonga nde waɗi annabaaku dow mooɗon, onon munaafuki'en, no ɗum windiraa, Allah wi'ii, ‘Ɓen ɗon yimɓe e honduko tan ɓe mawnintayam, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe e ngoɗɗitiiyam.
41007007	E meere ɓe mawnintayam; E ɓe ekkitina dooka yimɓe bo to am ɗum ƴiwoyi.’
41007008	“On alii tokkuki ko Allah wi'i ɗum waɗa, on njogake ndonuuji yimɓe.”
41007009	Sey o wi'iɓe, “On nyuma on ngaɗii fii boɗɗum nde nganyuɗon ko Allah wi'i ngam tokkon ndonu mooɗon.
41007010	Ngam Muusa wi'ii, ‘Hokku nyaako maaɗa e maduujo maaɗa mangu,’ nden, ‘Koo moye huɗi nyaako muuɗum koo maduujo muuɗum doole waree.’
41007011	Ammaa on mbi'a to neɗɗo wi'ii nyaako muuɗum koo maduujo muuɗum, ‘Fuu ko kokkaynomaami, ɗum Korban, waato mi hokkiiɗum Allah,’
41007012	nde mbiiɗon non on kaɗii yimɓe mballa danyooɓe maɓɓe.
41007013	Non ngartirɗon Wolde Allah meere laawol ndonu ɗum ekkitinɗon. Kadin on ngaɗa fii ɗuɗɗum iri ɗu'um.”
41007014	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗiti noddi yimɓe hawrutuɓe, o wi'i, “Kettindee, on fuu, paamon.
41007015	-
41007016	Walaa goɗɗum yaasi ɓandu neɗɗo nattayɗum nder maako wartiramo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah. Ammaa ko wurtoytoo daga nder ɓernde neɗɗo kalluɗum kanjum wartirtamo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.”
41007017	Nde o sendiri e yimɓe fuu, o natti wuro, tokkuɓemo ƴamimo ma'ana ekkitinol ngo'ol.
41007018	O nootii o wi'i, “Onon maa on paamaayi ma'ana ɗu'um? On andaa walaa ko nattata neɗɗo daga yaasi wartiramo mo laaɓaa?
41007019	Ngam naa' nder ɓernde ɗum nattata, ammaa nder reedu, nden ɗum wurto ɓandu.” (Nde Yeesu wi'i ɗu'um, o hollii koo nduye nyamndu ndu lamndu.)
41007020	O ɓeydi wi'uki, “Ko wurtotoo daga nder ɓernde neɗɗo, kanjum waɗata neɗɗo warta mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.
41007021	Ngam daga nder ɓernde neɗɗo nyumo kallungo wurtoytoo, e waɗuki njeenu hakkunde yimɓe ɓe ngalaa teegal, e nguyka, e warhoore, e njeenu,
41007022	e suuno fii duuniyaaru, e halleende, e ƴoyre kallunde, e fuu kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe ɓerɗe maɓɓe ngiɗi, e lawliiru, e wonnuki inde neɗɗo, e mawninki hoore, e wanyuki waɗuki ko wooɗi.
41007023	Fuu ɗe'e kuuɗe kalluɗe daga nder ɓernde ɗe mburtoytoo ɗe ngartira neɗɗo mo laaɓaa yeeso Allah.”
41007024	Daga ɗon Yeesu dilli yahi wigeere haade gariije Taaya e Sidon. O natti wongo wuro, o yiɗaa koo moye anda e mo ɗon ɗum. Ammaa fuu e non o waawaayi suuɗaaki yimɓe.
41007025	Ɗon e ɗon goɗɗo debbo gooduɗo ɓiɗɗo surbaajo pamaro gooduɗo ginnol nani habaru Yeesu. Sey o wari o diccii yeeso Yeesu.
41007026	Debbo on boo o Helenankeejo to Finiikiya nder leydi Siiriya o danyaa. O torii Yeesu wurtinana ɓiɗɗo maako ginnol ngol.
41007027	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Arande al ɗum nyamna ɓikkoy, ngam ɗum haanaayi ɗum hocca nyamndu ɓikkoy ɗum hubanoondu kutihoy.”
41007028	Ammaa debbo on wi'imo, “Ee, Moodibbo, ammaa haa kutihoy ngonkoy ley teebur e nyaama horaano sukaaɓe ɓen.”
41007029	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Ngam a wi'ii non, hootu, ginnol ngol wurtake ɓiɗɗo maaɗa.”
