41007030	Sey debbo on so''ii wuro o tawi ɓiɗɗo muuɗum e fukkii dow leeso, ginnol ngol boo wurtake daga nder maako.
41007031	Sey Yeesu ali wigeere gonde haade gariiri Taaya, o tokkiri gariiri Sidon, o regoyii Mbeela Galiili, o natti leydi Dikapolis.
41007032	Ton woɓɓe yimɓe ngaddanimo goɗɗo paho mo meto muuɗum wurtataako boɗɗum. Ɓe torii Yeesu yowa juuɗe muuɗum dow maako yamɗitinamo.
41007033	E woodi yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ɗon, sey Yeesu hakkitii kanko e paho on, o waɗi kooli maako nder noppi paho on. O tutti joode o meemi ɗemngal paho on.
41007034	Nden Yeesu raari dow foofi foofaango juutungo wi'imo, “Ifata,” waato, “Maɓɓita!”
41007035	Ɗon e ɗon noppi neɗɗo on maɓɓitii, ɗemngal maako yoofii, o fuɗɗi metuki boɗɗum.
41007036	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe to' ɓe mbi'aka goɗɗo. Ammaa fuu carel ngel o haɗiɓe wi'ukika, sey ɓe ɓeyda wi'ukika koo toye.
41007037	Yimɓe kayɗini naa' seɗɗa mbi'i, “O waɗii koo ɗume boɗɗum, haa maa e mo waɗa pahuɓe nana, e mo waɗa ɓe mbaawataa metuki meta.”
41008001	Nder ɗen ɗon balɗe yimɓe ɗuɗɓe fuɗɗiti kawri to Yeesu. Nde ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe nyaamata, sey Yeesu noddi tokkuɓemo, wi'iɓe,
41008002	“E mi nana jurumɗum yimɓe ɓe'e ngam hande balɗe maɓɓe tati e ɓe ngondi e am, ammaa ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe nyaamata.
41008003	To mi wi'iiɓe ɓe kootida e weelo, ɓe pekkoray dow ɗatal, ngam woɓɓe ngaroyii daga ɓadaaki.”
41008004	Tokkuɓemo nootii mbi'i, “Toye goɗɗo heɓata buroodi nder ladde nde'e keƴayɗum yimɓe ɓe'e?”
41008005	Yeesu ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Buroodi noye ngooduɗon?” Ɓe mbi'imo, “Joweeɗiɗi.”
41008006	Sey o wi'i yimɓe hawrutuɓe ɓen fuu ɓe njooɗoo e leydi. O hocci buroodi joweeɗiɗi ɗum, o yetti Allah, o sendiɗum, o hokki tokkuɓemo ngeedana yimɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe ngeedani yimɓe hawrutuɓe ɓen.
41008007	Ɗonmaa e ɓe ngoodi goɗɗi liƴƴi pamari seɗɗanaaji, sey o yetti Allah ngam maaji, o wi'i tokkuɓemo kanji maa ɓe ngeedana yimɓe.
41008008	Yimɓe ɓen nyaami kaari. Gaɗa maajum tokkuɓemo moɓti ko horii, ɗum heewi kondooje joweeɗiɗi.
41008009	Yimɓe ɓen ɓadake 4,000. Sey o jaɓɓitiiɓe
41008010	o natti komiwal, kanko e tokkuɓemo, ɓe ndilli leydi Dalmanuuta.
41008011	Faarisanko'en ngari puɗɗi yeddootirki e Yeesu. E ɓe ngiɗi foondukimo, sey ɓe mbi'imo o waɗanaɓe goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum ƴiwoyɗum to Allah.
41008012	Sey Yeesu fofti foofaango juutungo wi'i, “Ngam ɗume onon yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um ɗaɓɓitoton holleeki goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum? E mi wi'a'on goonga, walaa ko ɗum hollata yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um.”
41008013	Daga ɗon o aliɓe, o fuɗɗiti o natti komiwal, o huuli yaaki ngon ton fongo.
41008014	Tokkuɓe Yeesu ngejjitii ngardoya e buroodi, sey buroodi go'o tan ɗum ɓe ngoodi nder komiwal maɓɓe.
41008015	Yeesu wagginiɓe wi'i, “Paamee, ngaɗee hakkiilo e ƴuufinirɗum Faarisanko'en e ɗum Hirudus.”
41008016	Sey tokkuɓemo meddi hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i, “O wi'u non ngam en ngalaa buroodi.”
41008017	Nde Yeesu faami ko ɓe mbi'ata, sey o ƴamiɓe, o wi'i, “Ngam ɗume meddoton dow on ngalaa buroodi? Haa jooni on keɓtaayi on paamaayi? Koo ɓerɗe caatuɗe ngooduɗon?
41008018	On ngoodi gite, ammaa tampuɗon yiiki? On ngoodi noppi, ammaa tampuɗon nanuki? On ciftoraayi?
41008019	Carel ngel nyamnumi yimɓe 5,000 buroodi jowi, kondooje noye ɓoptuɗon e keewi horaano?” Ɓe mbi'i, “Sappo e ɗiɗi.”
41008020	“Nden carel ngel nyamnumi yimɓe 4,000 buroodi joweeɗiɗi, kondooje noye ɓoptuɗon e keewi horaano?” Ɓe mbi'imo, “Joweeɗiɗi.”
41008021	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Haa jooni on paamaayi?”
41008022	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo njottii gariiri Betasayda, sey woɓɓe yimɓe ngaddi bumɗo, ɓe torii Yeesu meemamo ngam yamɗitinamo.
41008023	Yeesu jogii jungo bumɗo on, yaarimo ton gaɗa gariyel, tuttanimo joode to gite yowi juuɗe muuɗum dow maako, sey ƴamimo, wi'i, “A yi'ii goɗɗum?”
41008024	Sey bumɗo on ƴefti hoore, raari, wi'i, “E mi yi'a yimɓe, ammaa e ɓe nandi e leɗɗe e ɓe ngiiloo.”
41008025	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗiti meemi gite ɗen. Bumɗo on maɓɓiti gite boɗɗum, gite maako njamɗiti, o yi'i koo ɗume boɗɗum.
41008026	Sey Yeesu wi'imo o hoota, wi'imo, “Taa' nattu nder gariyel ngel.”
41008027	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo ɓe ndilli yaaki ngarihoy ngonkoy haade gariiri Kaysaariya Filibi. E ɓe njaha dow ɗatal sey o ƴamiɓe, o wi'i, “Moye yimɓe mbi'atayam?”
41008028	Ɓe nootii ɓe mbi'i, “Woɓɓe e mbi'a a Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma. Woɓɓe boo e mbi'a a Annabi Iliya. Nden woɓɓe e mbi'a a go'oto nder annabo'en ndenno.”
41008029	Sey o ƴamiɓe, o wi'i, “Ammaa onon, moye mbi'otonyam?” Sey Biiturus nootii wi'i, “An woni Almasiihu.”
41008030	Nden Yeesu wagginiɓe naa' seɗɗa wi'iɓe to' ɓe mbi'aka koo moye kanko o moye.
41008031	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗi ekkitinkiɓe e wi'a doole Ɓii Neɗɗo torroo naa' seɗɗa. Mawɓe yimɓe, e mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e moodiɓɓe Attawra nganyamo, nden o waree. Gaɗa balɗe tati boo o ummoto daga mayde.
41008032	Yeesu metii haala ka'a e njayri. Sey Biiturus noddimo wuttudu go'o fuɗɗi haɓankimo.
41008033	Ammaa Yeesu waylitii raari tokkuɓemo koriiɓe, haɓani Biiturus, wi'i, “Sendir e am, an Ceyɗan! Naa' to Allah nyumo maaɗa ƴiwoyi, iri nyumo yimɓe nyumataa.”
41008034	Sey o noddi yimɓe ɗuɗɓe hawrutuɓe hawti e tokkuɓemo, o wi'iɓe, “Fuu giɗɗo warta tokkuɗoyam, to' waɗa ko hoore muuɗum yiɗi waɗuki tan, ammaa doole hocca gaafaangal muuɗum tokkayam.
41008035	Ngam fuu giɗɗo hisnuki yonki muuɗum o dullayki. Ammaa fuu dullayɗo yonki muuɗum ngam am e ngam Habaru Belɗum o hisnayki.
41008036	Ko ɗum nafanta neɗɗo, to o heɓii duuniyaaru fuu, ammaa o dullii yonki maako?
41008037	Koo boo ko neɗɗo waawata hokkuki ngam jaɓtoya yonki muuɗum?
41008038	Koo moye ganyuɗoyam e boliiɗe am nder ɗu'um jaamanu ɗum hakke, ɗum walaa goonga, min Ɓii Neɗɗo mi wanyaymo to mi wartidoyii e malaa'ika'en ceniiɓe nder teddungal Nyaako am Mo Dow.”
41009001	O wi'iɓe, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, e woodi woɓɓe dariiɓe ɗo'o ɓe maayataa naa ɓe ngi'ii Laamu Allah wardi e bawɗe.”
41009002	Gaɗa balɗe joweego'o, sey Yeesu hocci Biiturus, e Yaakubu, e Yahaya, o yaariɓe dow wonde hocceere townde kamɓe tan. Sey nandi maako waylitii yeeso maɓɓe.
41009003	Kolte maako ngarti daneeje tar. Walaa goɗɗo baawayɗo laaɓinira kolte non nder duuniyaaru fuu.
41009004	Sey Annabi Iliya e Annabi Muusa mbanganiɓe e ɓe medda e Yeesu.
41009005	Sey Biiturus wi'i Yeesu, “Moodibbo, wonki amin ɗo'o e wooɗi. Al min nyiɓa cuuɗi tati ɗo'o, wo'oyru ndu maaɗa, wo'oyru ndu Muusa, wo'oyru ndu Iliya.”
41009006	Biiturus no dullu ko wi'ata ngam kanko e tokkuɓe Yeesu koriiɓe ɓe kultorii naa' seɗɗa.
41009007	Sey nduula wangi suddiɓe, sey wonde hononde ƴiwoyi nder nduula ngan, wi'i, “O'o woni Ɓiɗɗo am mo ngiɗumi. Nanee ko o wi'ata'on!”
41009008	Ɗon e ɗon ɓe ndaari ɓe ngi'aayi goɗɗo e wondi e maɓɓe sey Yeesu tan.
41009009	E ɓe njippoyoo daga dow hocceere nden, sey Yeesu wagginiɓe wi'i to' ɓe mbi'a koo moye ko ɓe ngi'i naa gaɗa Ɓii Neɗɗo ummake daga mayde.
41009010	Ngam non ɓe ali haala kan hakkunde maɓɓe, e ɓe medda dow ma'ana “ummaaki daga mayde.”
41009011	Sey ɓe ƴamimo, ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe Attawra e mbi'a doole Annabi Iliya arta Almasiihu warki?”
41009012	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Goonga, Annabi Iliya artay warki ngam o siryoo koo ɗume. Ngam ɗume ɗum windi wiiki doole Ɓii Neɗɗo torroo naa' seɗɗa nden o wanyee?
41009013	Ammaa e mi wi'a'on Iliya yaadake warii, yimɓe boo ngaɗaniimo fuu ko ɓe ngiɗi, non no ɗum windiraa dow maako.”
41009014	Nde Yeesu e tokkuɓemo njottii to tokkuɓemo koriiɓe, sey ɓe ngi'i yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e piliiɓe. Woɓɓe moodiɓɓe Attawra e ngeddootira e maɓɓe.
41009015	Nde fuu yimɓe ɓen ngi'i Yeesu, ɓe kayɗini naa' seɗɗa, ɓe ndoggi ɓe njahi to maako ngam ɓe kownamo.
41009016	Sey Yeesu ƴamiɓe wi'i, “Dow ɗume ngeddootirton e maɓɓe?”
41009017	Sey go'oto nder yimɓe ɓen nootii wi'i, “Moodibbo, mi waddaniima ɓiɗɗo am gooduɗo ginnol. Ginnol ngol haɗiimo o meta.
41009018	Fuu carel ngel ginnol ngol nangimo, sey ngol do''amo to leydi, nguufo ngaɗa ka wurtaaki e honduko maako, e mo nyerƴindira nyiiƴe maako, ɓandu maako warta bo lekki. Mi torake tokkuɓema mburtinangol, ammaa ɓe mbaawaayi.”
41009019	Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Onon yimɓe jaamanu ɗu'um ɗum hoolaakiyam, haa ndeye njooɗodotoomi e mooɗon e mi munyida e mooɗon? Ngaddaneeyam suka on.”
41009020	Sey ɓe ngaddimo. Nde ginnol ngol yi'i Yeesu, ɗon e ɗon ngol waɗi ɓandu suka on waɗi ka diwnuki, o yani to leydi, e mo tallitoo, honduko maako e wurtina nguufo.
41009021	Sey Yeesu ƴami nyaako suka on, wi'i, “Daga ndeye ɗu'um fii heɓi suka on?” Nyaako on wi'i, “Daga o pamaro.
41009022	Nde ɗuɗɗum e ngol faɗɗamo nder hiite koo nder ndiyam ngam ngol waramo. Ammaa taa waaway waɗuki goɗɗum, yurminanmin mballaamin.”
41009023	Yeesu wi'imo, “Ngam ɗume mbi'ataayam, ‘taa waaway?’ Koo ɗume ɗum gaɗotooɗum to neɗɗo hoolakeyam.”
41009024	Ɗon e ɗon sey nyaako suka on ƴefti hononde wi'i, “Mi hoolakema. Wallam mi jaaloo ciya hoolaare am!”
41009025	Nde Yeesu yi'i yimɓe e ngaroya e doggudu ngam ngi'a ko waɗata, sey o haɓani ginnol ngol, o wi'ingol, “An, ginnol kaɗungol suka o'o metuki e nanuki, e mi wi'imaa, wurta daga nder maako! Taa' fuɗɗutu nattukimo!”
41009026	Sey ginnol ngol wulli, ngol waɗi suka on diwni naa' seɗɗa, nden ngol wurtii. Suka on warti bo mayɗo, haa maa yimɓe ɗuɗɓe mbi'i, “O maayii.”
41009027	Ammaa Yeesu jogii jungo maako umminimo, o darii.
41009028	Nde Yeesu natti nder wuro, tokkuɓemo ngari to maako kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴamimo ɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume minon min mbaawaayi wurtinki ginnol ngol?”
41009029	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Iri ngo'ol ginnol ngol wurtataako sey e do'aare.”
41009030	Sey Yeesu e tokkuɓemo ali ɗon ɓe ndilli ɓe ƴiwi nder leydi Galiili. Yeesu yiɗaa koo moye anda to ɓe ngoni,
41009031	ngam e mo ekkitina tokkuɓemo, e mo wi'aɓe, “Ɗum hokkitiray Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe yimɓe ɓe mbaramo. Nden to o waraama, gaɗa balɗe tati o ummoto.”
41009032	Ammaa ɓe paamaayi ko o wi'iɓe, nden e ɓe kula ƴamukimo.
41009033	Sey ɓe njottii Kafarnahum. Gaɗa Yeesu nattii wuro, o ƴami tokkuɓemo, o wi'i, “Dow ɗume meddoton dow ɗatal?”
41009034	Ammaa ɓe nde''iti ngam dow ɗatal ɓe ngeddootiri dow moye woni ɓurɗo mangu nder maɓɓe.
41009035	Sey o jooɗii, o noddi tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo ɓen, o wi'iɓe, “Fuu giɗɗo warta mawɗo, doole o warta pamaro, nden o warta maccuɗo koo moye.”
41009036	Sey o hocci sukayel pamarel, o darningel caka maɓɓe, o wuundiingel, o wi'iɓe,
41009037	“Fuu jaɓuɗo sukayel pamarel bo nge'el nder inde am jaɓiiyam. Fuu jaɓuɗoyam boo naa' min tan jaɓi, ammaa jaɓii liloyɗoyam maa.”
41009038	Sey Yahaya wi'imo, “Moodibbo, min ngi'i goɗɗo e wurtina ginni nder inde maaɗa min kaɗimo, ngam kanko naa' o tokkuɗo'en.”
41009039	Ammaa Yeesu wi'i, “To' on kaɗumo, ngam walaa gaɗoowo goɗɗum kayɗiniiɗum nder inde am nden ɗon e ɗon wi'a haala kalluka dow am.
41009040	Ngam fuu mo wanyaayi'en e wondi e meeɗen.
41009041	E mi wi'a'on goonga, koo moye hokki'on ndiyam nder jardugel njaron ngam onon ɗum ɓe Almasiihu, goonga o dullataa heɓuki mbarjaari.
41009042	“To goɗɗo waɗii go'oto nder sukahoy pamaroy ko'oy kooliikoyyam waɗii hakke, ɗum ɓuraniimo o haɓɓanee kaaƴa namol manga e daande ɗum faɗɗamo nder mbeela.
41009043	To jungo maaɗa e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittungo. Ɗum ɓuraniima nattaa wuro Allah jungo wo'oto dow ɗum hubomaa nder wuro hiite nge nyifataa e juuɗe ɗiɗi.
41009044	-
41009045	Non maa to koyngal maaɗa e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittungal. Ɗum ɓuraniima nattaa wuro Allah e koyngal go'otal dow ɗum hubomaa nder wuro hiite e koyɗe ɗiɗi.
41009046	-
41009047	To boo hitere maaɗa e waɗumaa ngaɗaa hakke, ittunde. Ɗum ɓuraniima nattaa wuro Allah e hitere go'o dow ɗum hubomaa nder wuro hiite e gite ɗiɗi.
41009048	Nder hiite ngen ‘gilƴi nyaamayɗiɓe ɗi mbaatataa, hiite ngen boo nge nyifataa.’
41009049	“Non no wondu nyamndu doole waɗanee lamɗam ngam ndu wela, non maa fuu yimɓe doole natta hiite, waato caɗeele, ngam ngikku maɓɓe warta boɗɗum.
41009050	“Lamɗam ɗum fii boɗɗum, ammaa to belɗum maajam ittake, ko wartirta belɗum maajam? Ngartee bo lamɗam, waato mbelnindiree ɓerɗe mooɗon, nden njooɗee jam hakkunde mooɗon.”
41010001	Sey Yeesu ummii ali ɗon yahi leydi Yahuudiya e fongo Caangol Urdun. Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe fuɗɗiti kawriti to maako, o ekkitiniɓe no o woowi waɗuki.
41010002	Sey woɓɓe Faarisanko'en ngari to maako ngam ɓe poondamo, ɓe ƴamimo ɓe mbi'i, “E yiiki maaɗa Attawra alii neɗɗo yoofa debbo muuɗum?”
41010003	Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Ɗume Muusa wi'i'on ngaɗon?”
41010004	Ɓe mbi'i, “Muusa wi'i neɗɗo waaway windana debbo muuɗum ɗerewol warki teegal wi'amo o dilla.”
41010005	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɓerɗe mooɗon ɗe caatuɗe waɗi Muusa windani'on ɗu'um dooka.
41010006	Ammaa daga fuɗɗoode taguki ‘Allah tagiiɓe gorko e debbo.’
41010007	‘Ngam non neɗɗo alay nyaako muuɗum e maduujo muuɗum takkanoo debbo muuɗum,
41010008	kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ngarta go'o.’ Ngam non naa' ɓe ɗiɗo kadin, ammaa ɓe ngartii neɗɗo go'oto.
41010009	Ngam maajum ko Allah hawti, to' neɗɗo sendaɗum.”
41010010	E ɓe nder wuro kadin, tokkuɓemo ƴamimo dow haala kan.
41010011	Sey o wi'iɓe, “Koo moye yoofi debbo muuɗum te'i goɗɗo, njeenu o waadata e maako.
41010012	Ɗonmaa to debbo sendirii e gorko muuɗum teeri e goɗɗo, njeenu o waɗata.”
41010013	Yimɓe e ngaddana Yeesu sukahoy pamaroy ngam o barkiɗinakoy, ammaa tokkuɓemo kaɓaniɓe.
41010014	Nde Yeesu yi'i non, ɓernde muuɗum metti, o wi'iɓe, “Alee sukahoy pamaroy ngara to am. To' on kaɗukoy, ngam gooduɓe ɓerɗe iri ɗe maakoy njeyi Laamu Allah.
41010015	E mi wi'a'on goonga, fuu mo jaɓaayi Laamu Allah bo sukayel pamarel, o nattataa laamu ɗum koo seɗɗa!”
41010016	Sey Yeesu wuundiikoy go'o‑go'o, o yowanikoy juuɗe maako ngam barkiɗinki.
41010017	Yeesu nangi laawol won ɗon, sey goɗɗo neɗɗo doggi yahi diccii yeeso maako. Neɗɗo on ƴamimo, wi'i, “Moodibbo geeto, ko haani mi waɗa mi heɓa yonki ki re'ataa?”
41010018	Yeesu wi'imo, “Ngam ɗume noddirɗaayam geeto? Walaa geeto sey Allah tan.
41010019	A andi ko Attawra wi'i: ‘Taa' waɗu warhoore. Taa' waɗu njeenu. Taa' wujju. Taa' hokku ceyda fewre. Taa' ƴoyru neɗɗo njaɓanaamo ko o jeyi. Hokku nyaako maaɗa e maduujo maaɗa mangu.’ ”
41010020	Sey o wi'i Yeesu, “Moodibbo, e mi waɗa fuu fii ɗu'um daga e mi suka.”
41010021	Yeesu raarimo nder yidde, wi'imo, “A dullii waɗuki fii go'o. Yahu, cooraa ko ngooduɗaa, kokkaa ɓe ngalanaa ceede ɗen, nden a heɓay mbarjaari ton dow. Nden ngaraa, tokkaayam.”
41010022	Nde neɗɗo on nani non, ɓernde maako taƴi, o dilli o nanaayi belɗum, ngam e mo woodi risku ɗuɗɗum.
41010023	Yeesu raari tokkuɓemo wi'iɓe, “E ɗum saɗi diskuɗo natta Laamu Allah!”
41010024	Tokkuɓemo kayɗinii e ko o wi'i, ammaa o fuɗɗiti o wi'iɓe, “Ɓiɓɓe am, nattuki Laamu Allah e saɗi naa' seɗɗa!
41010025	Ɗum ɓuray hoyki ngeelooba tokka nder yolnde baatal dow diskuɗo natta Laamu Allah.”
41010026	Tokkuɓemo kayɗini naa' seɗɗa, ɓe mbi'imo, “Too, to ɗum non, moye hisata?”
41010027	Yeesu raariɓe, wi'i, “To yimɓe ɗum waɗataako, ammaa to Allah ɗum waɗoto. Ngam to maako koo ɗume ɗum gaɗotooɗum.”
41010028	Sey Biiturus wi'imo, “Too, raɗɗum, minon min alii koo ɗume min tokkiima.”
41010029	Yeesu wi'i, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, fuu aluɗo wuro muuɗum, koo sakiraaɓe muuɗum worɓe koo rewɓe, koo maduujo muuɗum, koo nyaako muuɗum, koo ɓiɓɓe muuɗum, koo gese muuɗum ngam am e Habaru Belɗum,
41010030	o heɓay ko ɓuri non nder ɗu'um jaamanu. O heɓay gureeje, e sakiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe, e danyooɓe, e ɓiɓɓe, e gese nde 100. Ɗonmaa yimɓe torraymo, ammaa Nyalnde Jaango o heɓay yonki ki re'ataa.
41010031	Ammaa yimɓe ɗuɗɓe artuɓe ɓe ngartay cakitiiɓe, nden cakitiiɓe ngartay artuɓe.”
41010032	Yeesu e tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo e woɓɓe tokkuɓemo e ɓe dow laawol yaaki Urucaliima, Yeesu e ardiiɓe. Tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo ɓen e kayɗini, tokkuɓemo koriiɓe boo e kula. Yeesu fuɗɗiti noddi tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo ɓen kamɓe tan, o fuɗɗi wi'ukiɓe ko heɓatamo,
41010033	o wi'i, “Raɗɗum, en njahay Urucaliima, nden ɗum waɗay Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra. Ɓe taƴanaymo kiita mayde, nden ɓe ngaɗamo nder juuɗe yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en,
41010034	ɓe njukkitamo, ɓe tuttanamo joode, ɓe piyamo, ɓe mbaramo. Nden gaɗa balɗe tati, o ummoto daga mayde.”
41010035	Sey Yaakubu e Yahaya ɓiɓɓe Jabadi ɓaddii Yeesu, mbi'i, “Moodibbo, e min ngiɗi ngaɗanaamin fuu ko min torimaa.”
41010036	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana'on?”
41010037	Ɓe mbi'i, “Taa jooɗake dow jooɗorgal laamu maaɗa nder teddungal maaɗa, go'oto amin jooɗoo to nyaamo maaɗa, go'oto to nano maaɗa.”
41010038	Ammaa Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On andaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaaway njaron iri jardugel torra ngel njaraymi yeeso ɗo'o? Koo on mbaaway ɗum waɗana'on iri baptisma torra ɗum um waɗantayam yeeso ɗo'o?”
41010039	Ɓe mbi'i, “Ee, min mbaaway.” Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On njaray iri jardugel torra ngel njaraymi, nden ɗum waɗana'on baptisma iri ɗum um waɗantayam.
41010040	Ammaa jooɗaaki e jungo am nyaamo e jungo am nano naa' min hokkataɗum. Ɗe'e bigeeje ɗum ɗe ɓen ɗon ɓe ɗum siryaniiɗe.”
41010041	Nde horiiɓe tokkuɓe Yeesu sappo nani non, ɓe puɗɗi monnanki Yaakubu e Yahaya.
41010042	Sey Yeesu noddiɓe, wi'iɓe, “On andi nder yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en, yimɓe ɓe ɗum andiri laamu e kolla laamu sembe, nden mawɓe maɓɓe e kolla ɓural.
41010043	Ammaa onon, to' on ngaɗu non hakkunde mooɗon. Fuu giɗɗo warta mawɗo nder mooɗon, doole warta jaggantooɗo'on.
41010044	Kadin fuu giɗɗo warta ardiiɗo, doole o warta maccuɗo koo moye.
41010045	Ngam Ɓii Neɗɗo warii naa' ngam o jagganee, ammaa ngam o jagganoo yimɓe, o hokka yonki maako ngam rimɗinki ɗuɗɓe.”
41010046	Sey ɓe njottii gariiri Jeriiko. Yeesu e tokkuɓemo hawti e yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e mburtoo gariiri Jeriiko, goɗɗo bumɗo torotooɗo e jooɗii haade ɗatal. Inde maako Bartimaawus, waato ɓii Timaawus.
41010047	Nde o nani Yeesu Najarankeejo ƴaɓɓotoo, o fuɗɗi nodduki e sembe, e mo wi'a, “Yeesu, Ɓiɗɗo Dawda, yurminanam!”
41010048	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kaɓanimo mbi'imo o de''ita, ammaa o ɓeydi nodduki e sembe, e mo wi'a, “Ɓiɗɗo Dawda, yurminanam!”
41010049	Sey Yeesu darii, wi'i, “Noddaneeyammo.” Ɓe noddi bumɗo on, ɓe mbi'imo, “Nanu belɗum! Umma! E mo noddumaa.”
41010050	Sey o hubini cuddaari maako, o ummii jawɗum, o yahi to Yeesu.
41010051	Sey Yeesu ƴamimo, wi'i, “Ɗume ngiɗɗaa mi waɗanmaa?” Bumɗo on nootii wi'i, “Moodibbo, e mi yiɗi mbumtinaayam.”
41010052	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “Dillu. Hoolaare maaɗa yamɗitiniima.” Ɗon e ɗon gite maako mbumti, o tokki Yeesu, ɓe ndillidi.
41011001	Nde ɓe ɓadii Urucaliima, to gariije Betafaaji e Betani to Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun, sey Yeesu lili tokkuɓemo ɗiɗo,
41011002	o wi'iɓe, “Nattee gariyel gongel yeeso mooɗon. E nattuki mooɗon, on taway mbabba mola e nga haɓɓii, ɗum meeɗaayi waɗɗaakinga. Pittoyeenga ngaddonnga ɗo'o.
41011003	To goɗɗo ƴamii'on, ‘Ko waɗi pittotonnga?’ mbi'eemo, ‘Moodibbo e yiɗi huutirkinga, o waɗay ɗum wartiranga naa' ko neeɓi.’ ”
41011004	Sey ɓe njahi ɓe tawi mbabba mola ngan e haɓɓii to dammugal, haade ɗatal. E ɓe pittanga,
41011005	sey woɓɓe dariiɓe ɗon ƴamiɓe mbi'i, “Ngam ɗume pittotonnga?”
41011006	Kamɓe boo ɓe mbi'iɓe ko Yeesu wi'i, sey yimɓe ɓen aliɓe ɓe ndillidi e maaga.
41011007	Ɓe njaaraninga Yeesu, ɓe mbe''iti cuddaari maɓɓe dow magga. Yeesu waɗɗiinga.
41011008	Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe mbe''iti cuddaari maɓɓe dow ɗatal, woɓɓe boo mbe''iti haako ko ɓe ngewoyi to saabeere.
41011009	Yimɓe wonɓe yeeso maako e wonɓe gaɗa maako, e ɓe mbi'a e sembe, “Hosaana! O barkiɗinaaɗo on ɗon garoyɗo nder inde Joomiraawo!
41011010	Laamu maama meeɗen Dawda garayɗum ɗum barkiɗinaaɗum! En mantu Allah Mo Dow!”
41011011	Sey Yeesu natti Urucaliima, o natti Wuro Ceniingo, o raari koo ɗume gaɗeteeɗum ɗon. Ngam naange hiirii, sey o wurtii, o dilli Betani kanko e tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo.
41011012	Nde weeti, e ɓe ala Betani, Yeesu nani weelo.
41011013	O haynii lekki ibbi gooduki haako, o yahi o yi'a koo o heɓay ibbe to maaki. Nde o yottii to maaki, o tawaayi goɗɗum sey haako, ngam naa' ɗum carel ɓikkoy maaki.
41011014	Sey o wi'i lekki kin, “To' koo moye ɓeyda nyaamuki ɓikkoy daga to maaɗa!” Tokkuɓemo boo nanii ko o wi'i.
41011015	Nde ɓe natti Urucaliima, Yeesu natti Wuro Ceniingo, sey o fuɗɗi riiwuki soorooɓe e soodooɓe nder maggo. O talli teeburji gaylitooɓe ceede Roomanko'en yaaki ceede Wuro Ceniingo e jooɗorle coorooɓe pooli.
41011016	O haɗi koo moye ƴaɓɓodoo e dongal nder njayri Wuro Ceniingo.
41011017	O wi'iɓe, “Ɗum windaama, Allah wi'ii, ‘Ɗum noddiray wuro am wuro do'aare ngam leƴƴi fuu,’ ammaa onon on ngartiriingo luuro wuyɓe.”
41011018	Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra nani ko Yeesu waɗi, sey ɓe ngaɗi ka ɗaɓɓutuki laawol no ɓe mbardatamo. E ɓe kulamo, ngam yimɓe fuu kayɗini e ekkitinol maako.
41011019	Nde naange hiiri, Yeesu e tokkuɓemo mburtii gariiri ndin.
41011020	Subaka e ɓe ƴaɓɓoo, sey ɓe ngi'i lekki ibbi kin yoorii haa e ɗaɗi maaki.
41011021	Biiturus siftori wi'i Yeesu, “Moodibbo, raaru! Ibbi kin ɗon ki laanuɗaa ki yoorii.”
41011022	Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “Koolee Allah.
41011023	E mi wi'a'on goonga, to goɗɗo wi'ii hocceere nde'e, ‘Dillu, kuboɗaa hoore maaɗa nder mbeela,’ to o waɗaayi seko nder ɓernde maako, ammaa o hoolii ko o wi'i ɗum waɗay, ɗum waɗanaymoɗum.
41011024	Ngam non e mi wi'a'on, fuu ko toriiɗon nder do'aare, koolee on keɓiiɗum, nden ɗum wartay ɗum mooɗon.
41011025	-
41011026	Koo ndeye to on ndarake on ngaɗa do'aare, to e woodi mo njogitiiɗon nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, njaafaneemo, ngam Nyaako mooɗon Mo Dow maa yaafanoo'on hakke mooɗon.”
41011027	Ɗonmaa Yeesu e tokkuɓemo natti Urucaliima. Yeesu e yiiloo nder Wuro Ceniingo, sey mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra e mawɓe yimɓe ngari to maako.
41011028	Ɓe mbi'imo, “E laamu moye ngaɗataa kuuɗe ɗe'e? Moye hokkumaa laamu waɗukiɗe?”
41011029	Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “Mi ƴamay'on ƴamol go'o. Nootaneeyam, nden mi wi'ay'on e ɗume laamu ngaɗiraymi kuuɗe ɗe'e.
41011030	Baptisma ɗum Yahaya waɗi, to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi, koo to yimɓe ɗum ƴiwoyi? Nootaneeyam!”
41011031	Sey ɓe meddi hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'i, “To en mbi'ii, ‘Daga to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi,’ o wi'ay, ‘Ko waɗi on jaɓaayi ko o wi'i?’
41011032	Ammaa to en mbi'ii, ‘To yimɓe ɗum ƴiwoyi…’ ” Ɓe mbi'u non ngam e ɓe kula yimɓe, ngam koo moye njaɓii Yahaya o annabiijo.
41011033	Sey ɓe nootii ɓe mbi'i Yeesu, “Min andaa.” Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Non min maa, mi wi'ataa'on koo e ɗume laamu ngaɗiraymi kuuɗe ɗe'e.”
41012001	Sey Yeesu fuɗɗi metirankiɓe e misaalu, wi'i, “Goɗɗo neɗɗo waɗi ngesa inabooje, o howika, o wasi ngayka mawka nder tafaare ngam moyluki ndiyam daga nder inabooje ɗen, o mahi suudu towndu ngam reenuki ngesa kan. Sey o hokkika woɓɓe remooɓe mo''inaka, o dilli wondi leydi.
41012002	Nde carel ɓenduki inabooje ɗen waɗi, o lili maccuɗo maako to yimɓe ɓe o hokki ngesa kan ngam o jaɓanoyamo ko ɓe ngaadunoo nder ko ɓendi.
41012003	Ammaa ɓe nangi maccuɗo on, ɓe piyimo, ɓe ndiiwimo koo ko ɓe kokkimo.
41012004	Sey joomu ngesa on fuɗɗiti lili goɗɗo maccuɗo to maɓɓe, kanko maa ɓe piyanimo hoore, ɓe kuɗikuɗinimo.
41012005	Sey o fuɗɗiti o lili goɗɗo maccuɗo, kanko boo ɓe mbarimo. O lilililinii maccuɓe ɗuɗɓe. Ɓe piyi woɓɓe, ɓe mbari woɓɓe.
41012006	Joomu ngesa kan e woodi go'oto mo o lilaayi, waato ɓiɗɗo maako mo o yiɗi. Gaɗa maajum fuu o lili ɓiɗɗo on to maɓɓe, o wi'i, ‘Ɓe kokkay ɓiɗɗo am mangu.’
41012007	Ammaa ɓe o hokki ngesa ɓen mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe, ‘Too! Raa donoowo ngesa kan. Ngaree mbarenmo, ndonu ngesa kan warta ɗum meeɗen.’
41012008	Sey ɓe nangimo ɓe mbarimo, ɓe paɗɗimo gaɗa ngesa kan.
41012009	“Too, ko joomu ngesa kan waɗata? O waray o halkaɓe, o hokka woɓɓe ngesa kan.
41012010	On meeɗaayi janguki ko aayaare wi'i? Nde wi'ii, ‘Hayre nde mahooɓe nganyi kayre warti hayre ɓurnde darnuki maadi.
41012011	Ɗu'um ɗum kuugal Joomiraawo, ɗum kayɗiniiɗum to meeɗen.’ ”
41012012	Daga ɗon sey mawɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓiti laawol no ɓe nangirtamo, ngam e ɓe andi dow maɓɓe o hokki misaalu ɗum, ammaa e ɓe kula yimɓe. Ngam non ɓe alimo, ɓe ndilli.
41012013	Gaɗa maajum ɓe lili woɓɓe Faarisanko'en e woɓɓe yimɓe Hirudus to Yeesu ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe nangirtamo nder meto maako.
41012014	Ɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe mbi'imo, “Moodibbo, e min andi ko mbi'ataa e ko ngaɗataa ɗum goonga. A hollataa feerootirol hakkunde yimɓe, ngam a hoccii yimɓe fuu e pottidi. Ɗonmaa a ekkitina laawol Allah e goonga. Too, wi'umin, e ɗum haani min njoɓa Kaysar Mawɗo Laamiiɓe ceede leydi, koo ɗum haanaayi?
41012015	Min njoɓa ceede leydi, koo to' min njoɓa?” Ammaa Yeesu e andi e ɓe ngiɗi ƴoyrukimo, sey o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume poondotonyam? Ngaddaneeyam yamnde ajurfaari mi raarande.”
41012016	Ɓe ngaddanimo yamnde go'o. O wi'iɓe, “Ɗowdi moye e inde moye woni dow mayre?” Ɓe nootii ɓe mbi'i, “Ɗum Kaysar.”
41012017	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Too, kokkee Kaysar ko woni ɗum Kaysar, nden kokkon Allah ko woni ɗum Allah.” Sey o hayɗiniɓe naa' seɗɗa.
41012018	Saadusanko'en e mbi'a walaa ummaaki mayɓe. Woɓɓe maɓɓe ngari to Yeesu, ɓe ƴamimo, ɓe mbi'i,
41012019	“Moodibbo, Annabi Muusa wi'ii to neɗɗo te'ii debbo maayii danyidaayi e maako, sakiraawo maako sey te'amo ngam heɓana mayɗo on ɓiɓɓe.
41012020	Too, ndenno e woodi woɓɓe sakiraaɓe worɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Afo on te'i, maayi, ali debbo walaa ɓiɗɗo.
41012021	Sey ɗiɗaɓo on te'i debbo on. Kanko maa o maayi, o ali debbo on walaa ɓiɗɗo. Tataɓo on maa non.
41012022	Ɓe fuu njoweeɗiɗo ɓen ɓe te'ii debbo on, ɓe maayi, ɓe alimo walaa ɓiɗɗo. Gaɗa ɗon debbo on maa maayi.
41012023	Too, nyalnde nde mayɓe ummotoo, debbo on wartay debbo moye nder maɓɓe? Ngam ɓe fuu njoweeɗiɗo ɓe te'iimo.”
41012024	Sey Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “On mboofii ngam on andaa ko aayaaje mbi'i, nden on andaa bawɗe Allah.
41012025	To mayɓe ummake daga mayde, walaa te'ayɗo walaa te'eteeɗo, ammaa ɓe ngartay bo malaa'ika'en Allah.
41012026	Nden dow ummaaki mayɓe daga mayde, on jangaayi deftere Muusa dow habaru leggel goodungel hiite? Allah wi'iimo, ‘Min woni Allah mo Ibraahim, Allah mo Iciyaaku, Allah mo Yaakubu.’
41012027	Kanko naa' o Allah mayɓe, ammaa o Allah gooduɓe yonki. On majji naa' seɗɗa!”
41012028	Go'oto nder moodiɓɓe Attawra wari nani e ɓe ngeddootira hakkunde maɓɓe. Nde o nani Yeesu nootanakeɓe boɗɗum, sey o ƴami Yeesu, o wi'i, “Nder dookaaji ɗi Allah waɗi, ɗume ɓuri mangu?”
41012029	Yeesu nootii wi'i, “Ɓurɗum mangu woni, ‘Yimɓe Israa'iila nanee, Allah Joomiraawo meeɗen o Joomiraawo go'oto.
41012030	Yiɗu Allah Joomiraawo maaɗa e ɓernde maaɗa fuu, e yonki maaɗa fuu, e hakkiilo maaɗa fuu, e sembe maaɗa fuu.’
41012031	Ɗiɗaɓum boo woni, ‘Yiɗu bandiraawo maaɗa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maaɗa.’ Nder dookaaji ɗi Allah waɗi walaa ɓurɗum ɗi'i ɗiɗi.”
41012032	Sey moodibbo Attawra on wi'i, “Moodibbo, a wi'ii goonga nde mbiiɗaa Allah o go'oto, walaa goɗɗo sey kanko tan.
41012033	Neɗɗo yiɗamo e ɓernde muuɗum fuu, e faamu muuɗum fuu, e sembe muuɗum fuu, nden yiɗa bandiraawo muuɗum no yiɗiri hoore muuɗum, ɗum ɓurii marle gulanteeɗe Allah e fuu ko ɗum sakkantamo.”
41012034	Nde Yeesu nani o nootorake faamu, sey wi'imo, “Goonga a woɗɗidaa e Laamu Allah.” Gaɗa maajum walaa gaɗuɗo sembe ɓernde ƴamimo wongol ƴamol.
41012035	Yeesu e ekkitina nder njayri Wuro Ceniingo, sey o ƴami, o wi'i, “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe Attawra e mbi'a Almasiihu o ɓiɗɗo Dawda?
41012036	Ngam Dawda e hoore muuɗum, nder bawɗe Ruuhu Allah o wi'ii, ‘Joomiraawo wi'ii Joomiraawo am, “Jooɗa to jungo am nyaamo, naa mi waɗii a yaaɓii wanywanyɓe maaɗa.” ’
41012037	Dawda e hoore muuɗum noddiriimo Joomiraawo. Too, no waɗata Almasiihu warta ɓiɗɗo Dawda?” Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe kawrutuɓe kettindaniimo nder welwelo.
41012038	Yeesu e ekkitina, wi'i, “Paamanee moodiɓɓe Attawra, giɗuɓe yiilaaki e ɓornii toggoho njuutuko, giɗuɓe hownireeki mangu nder luumo.
41012039	E ɓe ngiɗi jooɗaaki dow jooɗorle mawɓe nder cuuɗi do'aare e jooɗorle mawɓe to humto.
41012040	Kamɓe ngoni nyaamooɓe jawdi rewɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi haa e gure maɓɓe, e ɓe ngaɗa do'aare juutunde ngam ɗum yi'aɓe. Iri ɓen ɗon yimɓe ɗum waɗanayɓe kiita ɓurka halluki.”
41012041	Yeesu jooɗii nder Wuro Ceniingo haade to ɗum hokkata ceede ngam Allah. E mo raara yimɓe e ɓe ngaɗa ceede maɓɓe nder to ɗum hokkata ceede ngam Allah. Riskuɓe ɗuɗɓe ngaɗi ceede ɗuɗɗe nder.
41012042	Sey raa goɗɗo debbo mo walanaa mo gorko muuɗum maayi. O wari o waɗi ceede njamkoy ɗiɗoy koy njamndi mboɗeeri nder. Ɗum ceedoy seɗɗanahoy tan.
41012043	Sey Yeesu noddi tokkuɓemo, wi'iɓe, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, o'o debbo mo walanaa, ko o hokki ɗum ɓurii ko horiiɓe fuu kokki.
41012044	Ngam kamɓe ɓe kokki daga nder risku maɓɓe. Ammaa kanko boo, daga nder ciya maako, o hokki fuu ko o woodi, waato koo ɗume ɗum o marortoo.”
41013001	Yeesu e wurtoyoo Wuro Ceniingo, sey go'oto nder tokkuɓemo wi'imo, “Moodibbo, raaru kaaƴe mawɗe ɗe ɗum mahiri wuro ngo'o! Raaru no maadi ndin wooɗiri.”
41013002	Sey Yeesu wi'imo, “A yi'ii ndi'i maadi mawndi? Walaa wonde hayre aleteende dow wonde. Ɗe fuu ɗum sankitayɗe.”
41013003	Yeesu e jooɗii dow Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun daaraynde Wuro Ceniingo, sey Biiturus, e Yaakubu, e Yahaya, e Andiraawus ɓe njahi to maako kamɓe tan, ɓe ƴamimo ɓe mbi'i,
41013004	“Wi'umin, ndeye fii ɗu'um waɗata? Ɗume woni ko hollata fuu fii ɗu'um ɓadake heewa?”
41013005	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Paamee to' goɗɗo majjina'on.
41013006	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe noddiray ko'e maɓɓe inde am, ɓe mbi'a ‘Min woni Almasiihu,’ ɓe majjina yimɓe ɗuɗɓe.
41013007	To on nanii habaru konuuji gaɗeteeɗi haade mooɗon, e konuuji gaɗeteeɗi ɓadaaki, to' on kulu. Doole ɗu'um waɗa, ammaa re'uki duuniyaaru e horii taw.
41013008	Lenyol ummanto lenyol, laamu ummanto laamu. Ɗum waɗay weelo kallungo e dimbol leydi to bigeeje feere‑feere. Ɗu'um ɗum fuɗɗoode torraaji garayɗi.
41013009	“Ammaa paamanee ko'e mooɗon. Ɓe ngaɗay'on nder juuɗe mawɓe cuuɗi do'aare, ɗum piya'on nder cuuɗi do'aare ɗin. Ngam on tokkuɓeyam ɗum yaaray'on yeeso mawɓe leydi e laamiiɓe, non wartay laawol no kokkirtonɓe habaru am.
41013010	Ammaa ko re'irde duuniyaaru wara, doole ɗum arta wa'ajinki Habaru Belɗum nder fuu leƴƴi duuniyaaru.
41013011	Fuu carel ngel ɗum nangi'on ɗum yaari'on yeeso laamu, to' on ngannu dow ko mbi'oton. E carel ngel Allah hokkay'on ko mbi'oton, sey mbi'onka. Ngam naa' ɗum onon metata, ammaa ɗum Ruuhu Allah.
41013012	Neɗɗo hokkitiray sakiraawo muuɗum ɗum waramo, nyaako maa hokkitiray ɓiɗɗo muuɗum. Ɓiɓɓe ummanto danyooɓe maɓɓe, ɓe ngaɗa ɗum waraɓe.
41013013	Koo moye wanyay'on ngam on tokkuɓeyam. Ammaa munyuɗo haa re'irde hisay.
41013014	“Carel e wara ngel ngi'oton ‘Nefniiɗum’ gartiroojum Wuro Ceniingo ngo laaɓaa e darii to wigeere nde haanaa. Fuu jangoowo faama ma'ana maajum. E carel ngel wonɓe nder leydi Yahuudiya ndogga nattoya kocceeje.
41013015	Gonɗo dow suudu to' jippoyoo koo natta wuro ngam hoccuki goɗɗum.
41013016	Gonɗo to ngesa to' so''o hocca cuddaari muuɗum.
41013017	Rewɓe gooduɓe deeɗi e musinteeɓe ɓe torroto naa' seɗɗa nder ɗen ɗon balɗe!
41013018	Ngaɗee do'aare to' fii ɗu'um waɗa nder ndungu.
41013019	Ngam nder ɗen ɗon balɗe ɗum waɗay torra kalluka iri ka ɗum meeɗaayi waɗuki daga carel ngel Allah tagi duuniyaaru haa jooni. Ɗum boo fuɗɗitataa ɗum waɗa iri kan ɗon torra.
41013020	Daa Joomiraawo ustaayi ɗen ɗon balɗe, daa walaa goɗɗo kisayɗo. Ammaa ngam ɓen ɗon cuɓaaɓe maako ɓe o suɓi, o ustii balɗe ɗen.
41013021	“E ngel ɗon carel to goɗɗo wi'ii'on, ‘Raa Almasiihu ɗo'o!’ koo boo, ‘Rammo ɗaa'e!’ to' on njaɓu.
41013022	Ngam Almasiihu'en fewre e annabo'en fewre ɓe mburtoyto ɓe ngaɗa alaamaaji e kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ngam ɓe majjina yimɓe, haa e cuɓaaɓe ɓen to ɗum waɗoto.
41013023	Ndaree, on ndeena! Mi wi'ii'on koo ɗume ko carel ngel wara.
41013024	“Ammaa nder ɗen ɗon balɗe gaɗa kan ɗon torra kalluka, ɗum ɓalwinay naange, lewru boo hokkataa jayngol mayru.
41013025	Koode njanoyay daga dow, nden ko woni dow fuu dimboto.
41013026	E carel ngel ɗum yi'ay Ɓii Neɗɗo e wara nder duule. O warday e bawɗe mawɗe e teddungal.
41013027	O liloyay malaa'ika'en maako ɓe kawrita ɓe o suɓi daga koo toye nder duuniyaaru, daga ngo'ol keerol duuniyaaru yaaki ngol ton keerol.
41013028	“Too, ekkitee ekkitinol ngo'ol daga to lekki ibbi. To lice maaki puɗɗii wilutuki, on andi ndungu ɓadake won ɗon.
41013029	Non maa to on ngi'ii fii ɗu'um e waɗa, too, on anday Ɓii Neɗɗo ɓadake wartoya, e mo haade dammugal.
41013030	E mi wi'a'on goonga, jaamanu ɗu'um ɗum re'ataa naa fuu fii ɗu'um waɗii.
41013031	Dow e ley ƴaɓɓoto, ammaa boliiɗe am ƴaɓɓataako haa abadaa.
41013032	“Walaa anduɗo nden ɗon nyalnde koo ngel ɗon carel ngel fii ɗum ɗon waɗata. Koo malaa'ika'en wonɓe dow andaa, Ɓiɗɗo on maa andaa, sey Nyaako Mo Dow tan andi.
41013033	Paamee, njooɗee on ciryii, ngam on andaa ko carel ngel warata.
41013034	Ɗum bo neɗɗo gaɗuɗo yaadu. Nde o wari dilluki o ali wuro maako nder juuɗe maccuɓe maako, o hokki koo moye kuugal ngal waɗata, o wi'i deenoowo dammugal ngal o daroo e mo reena.
41013035	Ngam non, njooɗee on ndeena ngam on andaa carel ngel joomu wuro ngon wartoyta, koo ɗum futuro, koo ɗum caka jemma, koo ɗum fajiri, koo ɗum subaka.
41013036	To o wartii walaa anduɗo, to' o tawa on ɗaanii.
41013037	Ko mbiimi'on, e mi wi'aka koo moye, kanjum woni njooɗee on ciryii!”
41014001	Horii balɗe ɗiɗi ɗum waɗa Humto Sakkinki e Humto Buroodi Ɗum Walaa Ƴuufinirɗum. Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra e ɗaɓɓita laawol no ɓe nangirta Yeesu e suuɗe ɓe mbaramo.
41014002	Ɓe mbi'i, “Ammaa naa' ni carel Humto, ngam to' yimɓe ummina hawre.”
41014003	Yeesu e nder gariiri Betani to wuro Siiman gooduɗo nyawu nyaamoojum laral. E mo nyaama nyamndu, sey goɗɗo debbo wari e jogii jolloyel hayre bongel ngel nebbam uroojam mbelɗam ɗam ɗum waɗiri nardi gooduɗam ceede. Sey o maɓɓitingel, o wayli nebbam ɗam dow hoore Yeesu.
41014004	Woɓɓe gonɓe ɗon ɓe monni ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe, “Ngam ɗume o wonni nebbam ɗa'am nihi?
41014005	Daa ɗam sooraama, daa ɗum heɓii ceede ɓurɗe ɗe ɗum yoɓata kuwoowo hitaande go'o, ɗum hokkaɗe ɓe ngalanaa.” Ɓe kaɓani debbo on sembee.
41014006	Ammaa Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Aleemo. Ngam ɗume ngannotonmo? Ko o waɗaniyam ɗum boɗɗum.
41014007	Koo ndeye ɓe ngalanaa e ngondi e mooɗon, on mbaaway wallukiɓe fuu carel ngel ngiɗɗon. Ammaa min, carel e wara ngel alaymi'on.
41014008	O'o debbo waɗii ko o waawata waɗuki. O waylanii ɓandu am nebbam ngam siryaaki uwukiyam.
41014009	E mi wi'a'on goonga, koo toye to ɗum wa'ajini Habaru Belɗum nder duuniyaaru fuu, ɗum hokkay habaru ko debbo o'o waɗi ngam siftorkimo.”
41014010	Sey go'oto nder tokkuɓe Yeesu sappo e ɗiɗo bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda Iskariyooti yahi to mawɓe ardiiɓe diina ngam hokkitira Yeesu nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
41014011	Ɓe nani belɗum naa' seɗɗa nde ɓe nani non, ɓe ngaɗi alkawal hokkukimo ceede. Ngam non, Yahuuda fuɗɗi ɗaɓɓutuki laawol no hokkitirta Yeesu nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
41014012	Nyalnde arandeere nde Humto Buroodi Ɗum Walaa Ƴuufinirɗum, nyalnde nde ɗum hirsata karooji ngam Humto Sakkinki, tokkuɓe Yeesu ƴamimo, mbi'i, “Toye ngiɗɗaa min njaha min ciryanomaa ngam nyaamen nyamndu Humto Sakkinki?”
41014013	Sey o lili tokkuɓemo ɗiɗo, o wi'iɓe, “Nattee gariiri, on kawray e goɗɗo e mo rondii ƴoogirde ndiyam. Tokkeemo
41014014	yaaki wuro ngo o nattata, mbi'on joomu wuro ngon, ‘Moodibbo wi'ii min ƴamumaa: Toye suudu ndu nyaamaymi nyamndu Humto Sakkinki, min e tokkuɓeyam?’
41014015	O hollay'on suudu mawndu ndu dow mo''inaandu ciryaandu. Ciryanee'en koo ɗume ɗon ngam nyaamen nyamndu Humto Sakkinki.”
41014016	Sey tokkuɓemo ɓen nangi laawol natti gariiri ndin ɓe tawi koo ɗume non no Yeesu wi'iɓe. Sey ɓe ciryii koo ɗume ngam Humto Sakkinki.
41014017	Nde futuro waɗi, Yeesu e tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo ngari wuro ngon.
41014018	E ɓe njooɗii e ɓe nyaama nyamndu, sey Yeesu wi'i, “E mi wi'a'on goonga, go'oto nder mooɗon nyamndayɗo e am hokkitirayyam.”
41014019	Sey ɓe nganni, ɓe puɗɗi wi'ukimo go'oto‑go'oto, “Naa' ɗum min, koo?”
41014020	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Ɗum go'oto nder mooɗon, onon sappo e ɗiɗo ɓe cuɓumi, nyamdayɗo e am le'al go'o.
41014021	Ɓii Neɗɗo maayay no ɗum windiraa dow maako, ammaa kokkitirayɗomo wonii! Ɗum ɓuranaymo daa o danyaaka.”
41014022	E ɓe nder nyaamuki nyamndu, sey Yeesu hocci buroodi yetti Allah, o sendiɗum, o hokki tokkuɓemo, o wi'i, “Njaɓeeɗum. Ɗu'um ɗum ɓandu am.”
41014023	Ɗonmaa o hocci jardugel ndiyam inabojam, o yetti Allah, o hokkiɓeɗam, ɓe fuu ɓe njariɗam.
41014024	Nden o wi'iɓe, “Ɗa'am kanjam woni ƴiiƴam am tabbitinayɗam alkawal Allah ndufeteeɗam ngam yimɓe ɗuɗɓe.
41014025	E mi wi'a'on goonga, mi fuɗɗitataa mi yara ndiyam inabooje naa nyalnde nde njaraymi ngoɗɗam kesam nder Laamu Allah.”
41014026	Sey ɓe ngimi gimol mantuki Allah, nden ɓe ndilli Hocceere Nde Leɗɗe Jaytun.
41014027	Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “On fuu on ndoggay alonyam, ngam nder aayaare Allah wi'ii, ‘Mi waray gaynaako, nden baali ɗin cankitoto.’
41014028	Ammaa gaɗa mi ummake daga mayde, mi artay'on yaaki Galiili.”
41014029	Sey Biiturus wi'imo, “Koo ɓe fuu ɓe aliima, min mi alataama.”
41014030	Yeesu wi'imo, “E mi wi'umaa goonga, hande, nder jemmaare nde'e, ko njakardi hana nde ɗiɗi, a wi'ay a andaayam nde tati.”
41014031	Ammaa Biiturus jaɓaayi, o wi'i, “Koo ɗum wardayyam e maaɗa, mi wi'ataa mi andaama.” Horiiɓe ɓen maa mbi'i non.
41014032	Sey ɓe njahi wigeere bi'eteende Geesamani, Yeesu wi'i tokkuɓemo, “Njooɗee ɗo'o, mi yaha mi waɗa do'aare.”
41014033	Sey o hocci Biiturus, e Yaakubu, e Yahaya. Ɓernde maako boo teddi, o fuɗɗi wannuki naa' seɗɗa.
41014034	O wi'iɓe, “Ɓernde am wannii naa' seɗɗa haa bo mi maayay. Njooɗee ɗo'o on ndeena.”
41014035	Nde o yahi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o yani e leydi e mo hippii, o waɗi do'aare, o wi'i to ɗum gaɗotooɗum ɗum hoccanamo carel torra wonka yeeso maako.
41014036	O wi'i, “Yaa Nyaako am Mo Dow, koo ɗume ɗum gaɗotooɗum to maaɗa. Taa jaɓii, ittanam jardugel torra ka'a. Fuu e non naa' ko ngiɗumi waɗetee, ammaa ko ngiɗɗaa waɗee.”
41014037	Gaɗa ɗon o so''ii to ɓen ɗon tokkuɓemo tato, o tawi e ɓe ɗaanii, sey o wi'i Biiturus, “Biiturus, a ɗaanii? A waawataa jooɗaaki a ɗaanaaki koo carel seɗɗa?
41014038	Njooɗee, to' on ɗaano, ngaɗee do'aare to ɗum foondii'on to' ngaɗon hakke. Ɓernde e yiɗi waɗuki ko haani, ammaa ɓandu tampii.”
41014039	O fuɗɗiti o dilli, o waɗi do'aare, o wi'i ko o wi'unoo.
41014040	O fuɗɗiti o so''oyii to maɓɓe, o tawi e ɓe ɗaanii, ngam e ɓe nana ɗeyngol teddungol. Ɓe ndulli ko ɓe mbi'atamo.
41014041	O fuɗɗiti o so''ii to maɓɓe tataɓum, o wi'iɓe, “Haa jooni on ɗaanii, on ciwtoo? Ɗum heƴii non! Carel warii. Ɗum hokkitirii Ɓii Neɗɗo nder juuɗe gaɗooɓe hakke.
41014042	Ummee ndillen! Raa on ɗon kokkitirayɗoyam e wara.”
41014043	Yeesu e meta, sey Yahuuda, go'oto nder tokkuɓemo sappo e ɗiɗo yottii. O wardoyi e yimɓe ɗuɗɓe e ɓe njogii kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e moodiɓɓe Attawra, e mawɓe yimɓe liloyiɓe.
41014044	Too, nden maa kokkitirayɗo on yaadake wi'iiɓe no hollirtaɓe Yeesu, o wi'i, “Neɗɗo mo kownaymi hownuki higaaku ɗum kanko. Nangeemo, ngaɗon taadiiɓe njogoomo boɗɗum ndillida e maako.”
41014045	Nde Yahuuda yottii to ɓe ngoni, ɗon e ɗon o ɓaddii Yeesu, o wi'imo, “Moodibbo!” nden o hownimo hownuki higaaku.
41014046	Sey yimɓe ɓen nangi Yeesu ɓe njogiimo boɗɗum.
41014047	Ammaa go'oto nder tokkuɓe Yeesu dariiɗo ɗon solti kaafahi muuɗum fe''i maccuɗo Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina ittanimo nowru.
41014048	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On ngardoyi e kaafaaje e cabbi ngam nangoyyam bo gujjo calorɗo?
41014049	Koo ndeye e mi wondi e mooɗon, e mi ekkitina nder Wuro Ceniingo, on nangaayiyam. Ammaa doole ko aayaaje mbi'i heewa.”
41014050	Sey tokkuɓemo fuu alimo ndoggi.
41014051	Goɗɗo kayeejo boo e tokkiri Yeesu ton gaɗa, o ɓornaaki goɗɗum, wudere nde ceede tan o waanii. Ɓe nangimo,
41014052	sey o alaniɓe wudere nden, o doggi o ɓornaaki.
41014053	Ɓe njaari Yeesu to Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina. Fuu mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e mawɓe yimɓe, e moodiɓɓe Attawra kawritii ɗon.
41014054	Biiturus boo tokkirimo gaɗa daga to woɗɗi haa yaaki caka wuro Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina. O jooɗodii e taadiiɓe Wuro Ceniingo, e mo irfoo haade hiite.
41014055	Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e fuu Kawtal Mawɓe e ɓe ɗaɓɓita ceyda ko ɓe nangirta Yeesu, ngam ɓe keɓa ɓe mbaramo, ammaa ɓe keɓaayi goɗɗum.
41014056	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe meti haalaaji fewre dow maako, ammaa ko ɓe mbi'i wardaayi go'o.
41014057	Sey woɓɓe ummii ɓe mbi'i haalaaji fewre ɗi'i dow maako, ɓe mbi'i,
41014058	“Min nanii o wi'ii o sankitay ngo'o Wuro Ceniingo ngo yimɓe mahi, nden nder balɗe tati o maha wongo naa' e juuɗe yimɓe.”
41014059	Ammaa fuu e non ko ɓe mbi'i wardaayi go'o.
41014060	Sey Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina ummii darii yeeso maɓɓe ƴami Yeesu, o wi'i, “A walaa ko mbi'ataa? Ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum goonga?”
41014061	Ammaa Yeesu de''iti nootanaakimo. Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina on fuɗɗiti ƴami Yeesu, wi'i, “Too, an woni Almasiihu, Ɓiɗɗo Joomu Mangu?”
41014062	Yeesu nootii, wi'i, “Ee, ɗum min. On ngi'ay Ɓii Neɗɗo e jooɗii to jungo nyaamo ngo Joomu Bawɗe, e mo waroya nder duule.”
41014063	Sey Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina on seeki kolte muuɗum wi'i, “Ɗume ceyda ɗaɓɓiteten kadin?
41014064	On nanii ni haala kalluka ka o meti dow Allah. Ko woni cuɓol mooɗon?” Sey yimɓe fuu mbi'i e haani o waree.
41014065	Woɓɓe puɗɗi tuttankimo joode, ɓe kaɓɓanimo gite, ɓe piyimo, e ɓe mbi'amo, “Waɗu annabaaku! Moye fiyimaa?” Sey taadiiɓe Wuro Ceniingo koccimo piyimo.
41014066	Biiturus e caka wuro ngon, sey go'oto nder horɓe Mawɗo Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina wari wigeere nden.
41014067	Nde o yi'i Biiturus e irfoo, o sutiimo, o wi'imo, “An maa, a wondi e Yeesu on ɗon ƴiwoyɗo gariiri Najarat.”
41014068	Ammaa Biiturus yeddi wi'i, “Min mi andaa, mi faamaayi ko mbi'ataa.” Biiturus wurtii yahi njayri dammugal yaasi, sey njakardi hani.
41014069	Korɗo on yi'i Biiturus ton, o fuɗɗiti o wi'i dariiɓe ɗon kamɓe maa, “O'o neɗɗo o go'oto maɓɓe!”
41014070	Ammaa Biiturus fuɗɗiti yeddi. Gaɗa ɗon seɗɗa, dariiɓe haade ɗon mbi'i Biiturus, “Seko walaa an maa a go'oto nder tokkuɓemo, ngam a Galilankeejo.”
41014071	Biiturus fuɗɗi laanuki hoore muuɗum hunii wi'i, “Mi andaa neɗɗo o'o mo mbi'oton.”
41014072	Ɗon e ɗon njakardi hani ɗiɗaɓum. Sey Biiturus siftori ko Yeesu wi'unoomo wi'uki, “Ko njakardi hana nde ɗiɗi, a wi'ay a andaayam nde tati.” Nden Biiturus fuɗɗi bojji.
41015001	Ilaa subaka mawɓe ardiiɓe diina, e mawɓe yimɓe, e moodiɓɓe Attawra, e fuu Kawtal Mawɓe ɓe meddi dow ko ɓe ngaɗata. Sey ɓe kaɓɓi Yeesu ɓe ndillidi e maako, ɓe tambinimo Bilaatus gomnaajo.
41015002	Bilaatus ƴamimo, wi'i, “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en?” Yeesu nootii, wi'imo, “Ee, a wi'iika.”
41015003	Mawɓe ardiiɓe diina ngulloriimo fii ɗuɗɗum.
41015004	Sey Bilaatus fuɗɗiti ƴamimo, wi'i, “Walaa ko mbi'ataa? Raa ɓe ngullorakema fii ɗuɗɗum.”
41015005	Ammaa Yeesu ɓeydaayi nootaaki, haa ɗum hayɗini Bilaatus.
41015006	Too, e carel Humto Sakkinki Bilaatus woowii yoofankiɓe curaaɗo go'oto mo ɓe torii.
41015007	E woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Barabbas curaaɗo, kanko e woɓɓe curaaɓe ngam ɓe kaɓdii e laamu, ɓe ngaɗii warhoore nder hawre nden.
41015008	Sey yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngari ɓe torii Bilaatus waɗanaɓe ko o woowi waɗankiɓe.
41015009	Bilaatus ƴamiɓe wi'i, “On ngiɗi mi yoofana'on Laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en?”
41015010	Ngam Bilaatus faamii lawliiru waɗi mawɓe ardiiɓe diina ngaɗi Yeesu nder jungo maako.
41015011	Ammaa mawɓe ardiiɓe diina ɓen ngaɗi yimɓe mbi'a Bilaatus o yoofanaɓe Barabbas naa' Yeesu.
41015012	Sey Bilaatus ƴamiɓe, wi'i, “Too, ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana neɗɗo o'o mo noddirton Laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en?”
41015013	Ɓe fuu ɓe mbi'i sembee, “Warumo dow gaafaangal!”
41015014	Bilaatus ƴamiɓe, wi'i, “Ngam ɗume? Ɗume ko halli o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓeydi wi'uki sembee, “Warumo dow gaafaangal!”
41015015	Nde Bilaatus e yiɗi waɗa ko hawrutuɓe ɓen ngiɗi, o yoofaniɓe Barabbas. O waɗi ɗum fiyi Yeesu looci, nden o tambinimo sooji'en Rooma ngam ɓe mbaroyamo dow gaafaangal.
41015016	Sooji'en ɓen ardini Yeesu yaaki laamorde gomnaajo bi'eteende “Firetooriyum.” Ɓe noddi fuu sooji'en koriiɓe ɓe kawritiɓe.
41015017	Ɓe ɓornimo iri toggoore laamiiɓe, nden ɓe mbaali giifol gi'e, ɓe taaranimongol to hoore.
41015018	Sey ɓe puɗɗi hownukimo, e ɓe mbi'a, “Allah reene, laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en!”
41015019	Ɓe ngaɗi ka piirukimo sawru to hoore. E ɓe tuttanamo joode. Ɓe ndiccii yeeso maako bo ɓe kokkaymo mangu.
41015020	Gaɗa ɓe njukkitiimo, ɓe ɓortimo toggoore laamiiɓe nde ɓe ɓornunoomo, nden ɓe ɓornimo kolte maako. Sey ɓe mburtinimo ɓe ardinimo ngam ɓe mbaroyamo dow gaafaangal.
41015021	Goɗɗo neɗɗo Saayirankeejo e ƴaɓɓoo bi'eteeɗo Siiman, nyaako Alijanda e Ruufus. O ƴiwoyɗo nder ladde e mo nattoya gariiri ndin. Sey ɓe ngaɗimo e sembe o hocca gaafaangal Yeesu.
41015022	Ɓe njaari Yeesu wonde wigeere bi'eteende Golgoota, waato “Wigeere Ƴiƴal Hoore.”
41015023	Nden ɓe kokkimo ndiyam inabojam jillindiraaɗam e mur ngam o yara, ammaa o yaraayiɗam.
41015024	Sey, ɓe piyanimo kuusaaje dow gaafaangal. Nden ɓe cendi kolte maako hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe ngaɗi caaca ngam ɓe ngi'a ko koo moye heɓata.
41015025	Carel ngel ɓe piyanimo kuusaaje dow gaafaangal ɗum njamndi joweenayi subaka.
41015026	Dow hoore gaafaangal ngal ɗum takki allowal. Ɗum windi dow maagal ko ɗum wulloriimo wi'uki, “Laamiiɗo Yahuudanko'en.”
41015027	-
41015028	Kadin ɓe piyani wuyɓe ɗiɗo kuusaaje dow gaafaale haade Yeesu, go'oto e jungo maako nyaamo, go'oto e jungo maako nano.
41015029	Yimɓe ƴaɓɓotooɓe e kuɗa Yeesu e ɓe ngiila ko'e, e ɓe mbi'a, “Too! An giɗɗo pusuki Wuro Ceniingo mahitoɗaango nder balɗe tati,
41015030	jippoya daga dow gaafaangal kisnaa hoore maaɗa!”
41015031	Non maa mawɓe ardiiɓe diina e moodiɓɓe Attawra ɓe njukkitimo hakkunde maɓɓe, e ɓe mbi'a, “O hisnii woɓɓe, ammaa o waawaayi hisnuki hoore maako.
41015032	Al o'o bi'oowo kanko woni Almasiihu, Laamiiɗo Israa'iila, o jippoyoo jooni daga dow gaafaangal ngam ngi'en koolooɗenmo.” Ɓen ɗon wuyɓe ɓe ɗum piyani kuusaaje dow gaafaale maa kuɗimo.
41015033	Caka nyalawma, sey nyiwre maɓɓi leydi fuu haa yaaki njamndi tati ndi alaasara.
41015034	E njamndi tati ndin, sey Yeesu wi'i e sembe, “Eloy, Eloy, lama sabattani?” waato, “Yaa Allah am, Yaa Allah am, ngam ɗume cendirɗaa e am?”
41015035	Nde woɓɓe dariiɓe to wigeere nden nani non, ɓe mbi'i, “Nanee, e mo nodda Annabi Iliya.”
41015036	Sey go'oto maɓɓe doggi sofni soosowa nder ndiyam inabojam lammuɗam, o ɗiisinga to sawru, o hokki Yeesu yara. O wi'i, “Alee ngi'en koo Iliya waray jippinamo.”
41015037	Sey Yeesu wulli sembee, nden maayi.
41015038	Sey wudere cendunde Suudu Joomiraawo seeki ɗiɗi daga dow yaaki ley.
41015039	Mawɗo sooji'en dariiɗo ɗon e raara Yeesu. Nde o yi'i no Yeesu foftiri foofaango cakitiingo, maayi, o wi'i, “Goonga, neɗɗo o'o o Ɓiɗɗo Allah!”
41015040	E woodi woɓɓe rewɓe e ɓe ndaara daga to woɗɗi. Nder maɓɓe e woodi Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala, e Maryaama maduujo Yaakubu pamaro, e Yusufu, e Saloomi.
41015041	Ɓe'e rewɓe kamɓe tokkaynoo Yeesu, e ɓe mballamo ko o wonnoo leydi Galiili. E woodi rewɓe ɗuɗɓe feere gardoyɓe Urucaliima e maako e ɓe ɗon ɗum kamɓe maa.
41015042	Ɗum alaasara Nyalnde Siryaaki, waato to finii ɗum Nyalnde Siwtaare.
41015043	Ngam maajum Yusufu ƴiwoyɗo gariiri Armaatiya, o waɗi sembe ɓernde, o yahi to Bilaatus, o toriimo o hokkamo ɓandu Yeesu. Yusufu o neɗɗo mo ɗum hokkata mangu nder Kawtal Mawɓe, kanko maa o haaɓii yi'uki garol Laamu Allah.
41015044	Bilaatus hayɗini nde nani Yeesu yaadake maayii. O noddi mawɗo sooji'en, o ƴamimo koo ɗum non.
41015045	Nde o nani to honduko mawɗo sooji'en on Yeesu yaadake maayi, sey o jaɓi Yusufu hocca ɓandu ndun.
41015046	Sey Yusufu soodoyi wudere nde ceede, o waɗi ɗum jippini ɓandu Yeesu, o taarindu e wudere nden, o fukkinoyindu nder yenaande gasaande nder hayre. O talliti kaaƴa manga o maɓɓi dammugal yenaande nden.
41015047	Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala e Maryaama maduujo Yusufu ɓe ngi'i to ɗum fukkini ɓandu Yeesu.
41016001	Nde Nyalnde Siwtaare ƴaɓɓii, Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala, e Maryaama maduujo Yaakubu, e Saloomi ɓe coodi nebbam uroojam mbelɗam ngam ɓe njaha ɓe moytana ɓandu Yeesu.
41016002	Nyalnde Alal subaka gaɗa naange fuɗii, e ɓe dow laawol yaaki to yenaande nden,
41016003	e ɓe mbi'a hakkunde maɓɓe, “Moye tallitanta'en kaaƴa manga nga ɗum maɓɓiri dammugal yenaande nden?”
41016004	Ammaa nde ɓe ndaari ɓe ngi'i ɗum yaadake ɗum tallitii kaaƴa ngan.
41016005	Nde ɓe natti yenaande nden, ɓe ngi'i goɗɗo kayeejo e jooɗii wuttudu nyaamo. E mo ɓornii kolte daneeje tar, sey ɓe kultori.
41016006	Kayeejo on wi'iɓe, “To' on kulu. On ɗaɓɓita Yeesu Najarankeejo baraaɗo dow gaafaangal. Ɗum umminiimo daga mayde! O walaa ɗo'o. Raa to ɗum fukkinnoomo.
41016007	Ammaa njahee mbi'on tokkuɓemo, haa e Biiturus, o artay'on yaaki leydi Galiili. Ton ngi'otonmo non no o wi'unoo'on.”
41016008	Kulol nangiɓe e ɓe ndiwna ɓe mburtii daga nder yenaande nden ɓe ndoggi. Ɓe mbi'aayi goɗɗo koo ɗume ngam e ɓe kula.
41016009	[Subaka Nyalnde Alal Yeesu ummii daga mayde. Gaɗa o ummake o arti wanganki Maryaama ƴiwoyɗo Magadala mo o wurtinani ginni joweeɗiɗi.
41016010	Sey Maryaama on yahi wi'ika ɓen ɗon gondunooɓe e maako, o tawiɓe nder wannaare e ɓe mboya.
41016011	Ammaa nde ɓe nani Yeesu e woodi yonki, ɗonmaa Maryaama on yi'iimo, ɓe njaɓaayika.
41016012	Gaɗa maajum woɓɓe tokkuɓemo ɗiɗo e ɓe dow laawol nder ladde yaaki wongel gariyel, sey Yeesu wanganiɓe nder nandi feere.
41016013	Sey ɓe co''ii ɓe mbi'ika horiiɓe, ammaa ɓe njaɓaayi ko ɓe mbi'i kamɓe maa.
41016014	Daga gaɗa Yeesu wangani tokkuɓemo sappo e go'o e carel ngel e ɓe nyaama nyamndu. Sey o haɓaniɓe ngam ciya hoolaare maɓɓe e ɓerɗe caatuɗe ɗe ɓe ngoodi, ngam ɓe njaɓaayi ko giiɓemo gaɗa o ummake mbi'iɓe.
41016015	Nden o wi'iɓe, “Njahee koo toye nder duuniyaaru nga'ajinanon koo moye Habaru Belɗum.
41016016	Koo moye kooliiɗoyam waɗanaa baptisma o hisay, ammaa fuu mo hoolaakiyam ɗum taƴanaymo kiita.
41016017	Fuu kooliiɓeyam ɓe ngaɗay kuuɗe kollayɗe e ɓe ngoodi bawɗe Allah. Nder inde am ɓe mburtinay ginni, ɓe ngaɗay do'aare nder ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe andaa.
41016018	Ɓe nangay boole e juuɗe maɓɓe, nden to ɓe njarii tooke, ɗe ngaɗantaaɓe goɗɗum. Ɓe boo njowanay nyawɓe juuɗe, nyawɓe ɓen njamɗita.”
41016019	Gaɗa Yeesu Joomiraawo metaniiɓe, o hoccaa yaaki dow, o jooɗii jungo nyaamo ngo Allah.
41016020	Sey tokkuɓemo ɓen ndilli ɓe nga'ajinoyi Habaru Belɗum koo toye. Joomiraawo walliɓe, o hokkiɓe bawɗe waɗuki kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ngam tabbitinki ko ɓe mbi'ata to maako ɗum ƴiwoyi.]
42001001	Yaa Tiyoofilus mawɗo, Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe fuɗɗii winduki habaru dow ko Yeesu waɗi nder amin.
42001002	Ɓe mbindi habaru ɗum nanɗen daga konduɗe giiɓe ko waɗi e gite maɓɓe, andinooɓe Wolde Allah.
42001003	Ngam non, min maa ɗum wooɗaniiyam mi ɗaɓɓita koo ɗume e seese‑seese daga fuɗɗuki maajum, mi windanmaa koo ɗume no woni,
42001004	ngam andaa goonga dow koo ɗume ko ɗum ekkitinmaa.
42001005	Nder carel ngel Hirudus laamiiɗo leydi Yahuudiya laamotoo, e woodi ardiiɗo diina bi'eteeɗo Jakaariya, e mo nder ardiiɓe diina daga lenyol Abija. Debbo maako Alisabatu ƴiwoyii daga lenyol Haruuna, waato ardiiɓe diina.
42001006	Ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe njooɗake jonde wooɗunde yeeso Allah, e ɓe ngaɗa koo ɗume ko Joomiraawo wi'i yimɓe ngaɗa.
42001007	Ammaa ɓe ngalaa ɓiɓɓe, ngam Alisabatu o danyataa, kadimaa ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe nawyii.
42001008	Wonde nyalnde Jakaariya e huwa yeeso Allah nder Wuro Ceniingo e ɓe o huudata.
42001009	Ɗum suɓiimo, no ardiiɓe diina mboowi waɗuki, ngam o natta nder Suudu Joomiraawo o wula urde welnde ngam Joomiraawo.
42001010	Nde carel wuluki urde welnde waɗi, moɓgal fuu e dari yaasi e ɓe ngaɗa do'aare.
42001011	Sey malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wangi to maako e darii wuttudu nyaamo to ɗum wulata urde welnde.
42001012	Nde Jakaariya yi'imo, ɓernde muuɗum taƴi, kulol nangimo.
42001013	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo on wi'imo, “Taa' hulu Jakaariya, Joomiraawo nanii do'aare maaɗa. Debbo maaɗa Alisabatu danyante ɓiɗɗo gorko, nden a hokkaymo inde Yahaya.
42001014	Ɓiɗɗo on waɗete nanaa belɗum ɗuɗɗum, ɗuɗɓe maa nanay belɗum ngam danyeeki maako,
42001015	ngam o wartay mawɗo yeeso Joomiraawo. O yarataa ndiyam inabojam koo njaru gaylitayngu hoore, nden o heeway Ruuhu Allah daga e mo nder reedu maduujo maako.
42001016	O wartiray ɓiɓɓe Israa'iila ɗuɗɓe to Allah Joomiraawo maɓɓe.
42001017	O artay Almasiihu warki nder bawɗe Ruuhu Allah ɗe Annabi Iliya heɓunoo, o siryootiray danyooɓe e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe. O waylitay caliiɓe ɗatal Joomiraawo to ɗatal gooduɓe goonga. O waɗay yimɓe ciryoo ngam garol Joomiraawo.”
42001018	Jakaariya ƴami malaa'ikaajo on wi'i, “Noye andiraymi ko mbiiɗaa ɗum goonga? Min, mi nawyii, debbo am boo duuɓi muuɗum ɗuuɗii.”
42001019	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'imo, “Min woni Jibiriilu darotooɗo yeeso Allah, mi liloyaa to maaɗa ngam mi hokkumaa Habaru Belɗum ɗu'um.
42001020	Ammaa jooni a waawataa metuki naa nyalnde nde fii ɗu'um waɗi, ngam a jaɓaayi haala am tabbitayka to carel maaka warii.”
42001021	E carel ngel yimɓe e keɗii Jakaariya yaasi, ɓe kayɗinii ko waɗi o neeɓiri non nder Suudu Joomiraawo.
42001022	Nde o wurtoyii, o waawaayi metankiɓe. Ɓe faami o yi'i wahayu nder Suudu Joomiraawo. O waɗi ka metirankiɓe juuɗe, ammaa non o jooɗorii o metataa.
42001023	Nde o heenyi balɗe kuugal maako, o so''ii wuro maako.
42001024	Gaɗa fii ɗu'um waɗii, debbo maako Alisabatu heɓi reedu, waɗi lebbi jowi o wurtaaki daga nder wuro. O wi'i,
42001025	“Joomiraawo waɗaniiyam ɗu'um. Nder balɗe ɗe'e, o ittaniiyam semteende am hakkunde yimɓe.”
42001026	Nder lewru joweego'ooru gaɗa Alisabatu heɓii reedu, Allah lili malaa'ikaajo Jibiriilu to gariiri bi'eteendi Najarat ngondi nder leydi Galiili.
42001027	Malaa'ikaajo on yahi to surbaajo bi'eteeɗo Maryaama gaɗanaaɗo alkawal teegal e bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, daga lenyol Dawda. Maryaama on andaa gorko.
42001028	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'imo, “E mi silminoo, barkiɗinaaɗo Joomiraawo! Joomiraawo e wondi e maaɗa!”
42001029	Haala kan wannii Maryaama ko ɗuuɗi. O wi'i nder ɓernde maako, “Min, mi moye o'o mettirantayam nihi?”
42001030	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo on wi'imo, “Taa' hulu, Maryaama, Allah suɓii barkiɗinmaa.
42001031	A heɓay reedu, a danyay ɓiɗɗo gorko, nden a nodday inde maako Yeesu.
42001032	O wartay mawɗo, ɗum noddaymo Ɓiɗɗo Allah Joomu Mangu. Allah Joomiraawo hokkaymo jooɗorgal laamu maama maako Dawda.
42001033	O laamoto dow ɓiɓɓe Israa'iila haa abadaa. Laamu maako re'ataa.”
42001034	Maryaama wi'i malaa'ikaajo on, “Noye ɗum waɗortoo? Mi andaa gorko sam.”
42001035	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'imo, “Ruuhu Allah jippoyto dow maaɗa, bawɗe Allah Joomu Mangu suddete bo ɗowdi. Ngam non, danyeteeɗo on ɗum noddiraymo ‘Ɓiɗɗo Allah, Ceniiɗo.’
42001036	Raa, Alisabatu bandiraawo maaɗa heɓii reedu nder nayewu muuɗum, o danyay ɓiɗɗo gorko. Kanko mo yimɓe mbi'ata o danyataa, jooni e mo woodi reedu ndu lebbi joweego'o.
42001037	Ngam walaa ko salorta Allah.”
42001038	Nden Maryaama wi'i, “Mi korɗo Joomiraawo, ɗum wartanayam non no mbiiɗaa.” Sey malaa'ikaajo on dilli alimo.
42001039	Nder balɗe ɗen, Maryaama ummii nder yawɗaare yahi gariiri ngondi nder kocceeje leydi Yahuudiya.
42001040	O natti wuro Jakaariya, o howni Alisabatu.
42001041	Carel ko Alisabatu nani kownol Maryaama, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu maako diwi ngam belɗum, Alisabatu boo hebbinaa Ruuhu Allah.
42001042	O noddi Maryaama e sembe, o wi'i, “A barkiɗinaaɗo nder rewɓe! Ɓiɗɗo mo caawuɗaa o barkiɗinaaɗo.
42001043	Min, mi moye nde inna Almasiihu warata to am?
42001044	Nde nanumi kownol maaɗa, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu am diwii ngam belɗum.
42001045	A barkiɗinaaɗo ngam a jaɓii ko Joomiraawo waɗanmaa alkawal ɗum heeway.”
42001046	Nden Maryaama wi'i, “E mi manta Joomiraawo e ɓernde am fuu.
42001047	E mi nana belɗum ɗuɗɗum nder ɓernde am ngam Allah, Kisnoowoyam,
42001048	ngam o yurminaniiyam, min, korɗo maako, lestinɗo hoore. Daga jooni yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu noddirayyam barkiɗinaaɗo,
42001049	ngam Allah Baawuɗo waɗaniiyam fii mawɗum ɗuɗɗum, o ceniiɗo.
42001050	Jurumɗum maako jooɗoto dow kulooɓemo haa abadaa.
42001051	E mo waɗa fii mawɗum e jungo maako sembingo, e mo sankita mawninɓe ko'e maɓɓe e ko ɓe mantortoo nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
42001052	E mo itta laamiiɓe dow laamu maɓɓe, ammaa e mo mawnina lesnuɓe ko'e maɓɓe.
42001053	E mo harna nanooɓe weelo e fii boɗɗum, ammaa e mo ala riskuɓe juuɗe meere.
42001054	E mo walla yimɓe Israa'iila maccuɓe maako, o yejjitataa yurminanki
42001055	Ibraahim e lenyol muuɗum haa abadaa, no o wi'unoo maama'en meeɗen.”
42001056	Maryaama jooɗodake e Alisabatu ko waɗi lebbi tati, nden o so''ii wuro maako.
42001057	Nde carel danyuki Alisabatu waɗi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
42001058	Ɓe o heddi e bandiraaɓe maako ɓe nanidi belɗum e maako nde ɓe nani Joomiraawo yurminanimo.
42001059	Nde ɓingel ngel waɗi balɗe joweetati, ɓe ngari naadukingel. Ɓe ngiɗiino noddankingel inde nyaako maagel Jakaariya.
42001060	Ammaa maduujo maagel wi'i, “Naa' non, ɗum noddanangel Yahaya.”
42001061	Ɓe mbi'imo, “Walaa goɗɗo nder lenyol maaɗa gooduɗo inde nden ɗon.”
42001062	Sey ɓe metirani nyaako maagel juuɗe, ngam ɓe anda inde nde o yiɗi ɗum noddanangel.
42001063	Jakaariya holliɓe e mo yiɗi allowal, o windi, “Inde maagel Yahaya.” Ɓe fuu fii ɗum hulniiɓe.
42001064	Ɗon e ɗon, honduko maako maɓɓitii, ɗemngal maako yoofi, nden o fuɗɗi metuki, e mo manta Allah.
42001065	Kulol nangi ɓe o heddi fuu, koo moye waɗi ka metuki dow fii ɗum fuu nder kocceeje leydi Yahuudiya.
42001066	Koo moye nanɗo fii ɗu'um nyumi dow maajum, e wi'a, “Ɗume ɓingel nge'el wartata to mawni?” Ngam jungo Joomiraawo e wondi e maagel.
42001067	Jakaariya, nyaako ɓingel ngel, e heewi Ruuhu Allah, waɗi annabaaku, o wi'i,
42001068	“En mantu Joomiraawo, Allah Israa'iila, ngam o waroyii o rimɗinii yimɓe maako.
42001069	Allah waddanii'en kisnoowo mawɗo ƴiwoyɗo daga lenyol Dawda, maccuɗo maako.
42001070	No o wi'unoo nder konduɗe annabo'en maako cuɓaaɓe daga ko neeɓi,
42001071	o hisnay'en daga ganyooɓe meeɗen e kallanɓe'en.
42001072	O wi'iino o yurminanay maama'en meeɗen, o yejjitataa alkawal maako ceniingal,
42001073	ngal o waɗannoo maama meeɗen Ibraahim.
42001074	O wi'ii o hisnay'en daga juuɗe ganyooɓe meeɗen, ngam kuwanenmo kulol walaa,
42001075	njooɗooɗen jonde ceniinde e aadilaaku yeeso maako nder balɗe meeɗen fuu, ngaɗen koo ɗume ko o wi'i.
42001076	“An ɓingel am, ɗum noddirte annabiijo Joomiraawo Joomu Mangu, a artay Almasiihu warki ngam mo''inanaamo laawol,
42001077	ngam andinaa yimɓe maako ɗum hisnayɓe laawol yaafaaki hakke maɓɓe.
42001078	Allah waɗii fii ɗu'um ngam o keewuɗo jurumɗum. Ngam jurumɗum maako, Almasiihu waroyay to meeɗen daga dow no naange wurtiroytoo,
42001079	ngam o yeynanoo wonɓe nder nyiwre e nder kulol mayde, ɗum tokkinay koyɗe meeɗen dow laawol jam.”
42001080	Ɓiɗɗo on mawni, faamu maako ɓeydii. E mo jooɗii nder ladde haa carel ko ɗum andinimo to yimɓe Israa'iila.
42002001	Carel ko Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma danyaa, Mawɗo Laamiiɓe leyɗe Rooma bi'eteeɗo Kaysar Agustus wi'i wonɓe nder laamu Rooma fuu ɗum winda inɗe maɓɓe.
42002002	Kanki woni winduki arandehi ki ɗum waɗi carel ko Kiriiniyus woni gomnaajo leydi Siiriya.
42002003	Koo moye yahi to lenyol muuɗum ƴiwoyi ngam ɗum winda inde muuɗum.
42002004	Sey Yusufu maa ummii daga gariiri Najarat nder leydi Galiili. O yahi gariiri to Dawda danyaa bi'eteendi Baytalaami ngondi nder leydi Yahuudiya, ngam kanko daga lenyol Dawda.
42002005	O yahu ton ngam ɗum winda inde maako, kanko e Maryaama, mo ɗum waɗanimo alkawal teegal. Maryaama on e woodi reedu.
42002006	E ɓe nder Baytalaami, sey carel danyngol maako waɗi.
42002007	Sey o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, afo maako, o saawimo nder wudere wooɗunde, o fukkinimo nder to ɗum waɗanta marle nyamndu, ngam walaa njayri nder suudu hoɓɓe.
42002008	E woodi woynaaɓe haade ɗon e ɓe mbaala yaasi, e ɓe ndeena marle maɓɓe jemma.
42002009	Sey malaa'ikaajo Joomiraawo wanganiɓe nder teddungal Joomiraawo, kulol nangiɓe.
42002010	Ammaa malaa'ikaajo on wi'iɓe, “To' on kulu! Mi waddanii'on habaru ɓurɗum welki ngam koo moye.
42002011	Hande nder gariiri Dawda ɗum danyanii'on kisnoowo, kanko woni Almasiihu, Joomiraawo.
42002012	Raa no keɓtirtonmo, on taway ɓingel e saawaa nder wudere, nden e ngel fukkinaa nder to ɗum waɗanta marle nyamndu.”
42002013	Ɗon e ɗon sey woɓɓe malaa'ika'en ɗuɗɓe wangi haade malaa'ikaajo on, e ɓe mawnina mangu Allah, e ɓe mbi'a,
42002014	“En mawnin Allah Mo Dow, jam jooɗoo nder duuniyaaru e dow yimɓe ɓe o nanata belɗum maɓɓe.”
42002015	Nde malaa'ika'en ɓen co''ii dow, sey woynaaɓe ɓen ngaɗi ka medduki, e ɓe mbi'a, “En njahu Baytalaami ngi'en fii ɗu'um ɗum Joomiraawo wi'i'en.”
42002016	Sey ɓe njawɗii, ɓe njahi, ɓe tawi Maryaama e Yusufu e ɓingel ngel e ngel fukkii nder to ɗum waɗanta marle nyamndu.
42002017	Nde ɓe ngi'ingel, ɓe ndilli, ɓe mbi'i yimɓe ko malaa'ikaajo wi'iɓe dow maagel.
42002018	Ko woynaaɓe ɓen mbi'i kayɗinii koo moye nanɗo.
42002019	Ammaa Maryaama boo e jogii ko nani fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum, o waɗi ka nyumuki dow maajum.
42002020	Sey woynaaɓe ɓen co''ii, e ɓe mawnina Allah, e ɓe mantamo ngam koo ɗume ko ɓe nani e ko ɓe ngi'i, non no ɗum wi'iriɓe.
42002021	Nde ɓingel ngel waɗi balɗe joweetati, ɗum naadimo ɗum hokkimo inde Yeesu, inde nde malaa'ikaajo hokkimo ko ɗum waɗa reedu maako.
42002022	Gaɗa balɗe lootaaki maɓɓe heenyi no Annabi Muusa wi'i nder Attawra ɓe ngaɗa to ɓe ndanyii, Yusufu e Maryaama njaari Yeesu Urucaliima yeeso Joomiraawo.
42002023	Non ɗum windiraa nder Attawra, “Koo moye gorko afo, Joomiraawo jeyimo.”
42002024	Ɓe cakkani Allah no ɗum windiraa nder Attawra, “pooli ɗiɗi koo boo tattabarahoy ɗiɗoy.”
42002025	E carel ngel e woodi goɗɗo neɗɗo nder Urucaliima bi'eteeɗo Saaminu, aadiliijo, kuloowo Allah. O haaɓii o yi'a garol Almasiihu ngam hisna yimɓe Israa'iila. Ruuhu Allah e wondi e maako,
42002026	holliimo o maayataa naa o yi'ii Almasiihu Joomiraawo.
42002027	Ruuhu Allah yaarimo nder Wuro Ceniingo. Sey Maryaama e Yusufu ngaddoyi Yeesu nder wuro ngon ngam waɗankimo ko Attawra wi'i.
42002028	Saaminu jaɓi ɓingel ngel nder juuɗe muuɗum, nden manti Allah, wi'i,
42002029	“Yaa Joomiraawo, a hebbinii alkawal maaɗa. Jooni alu maccuɗo maaɗa dilla jam.
42002030	Ngam gite am ngi'ii kisnoowo mo liloyɗaa,
42002031	mo ciryaniɗaa lenyi fuu.
42002032	O wartay bo jayngol, o hollay lenyi duuniyaaru laawol maaɗa, o waɗay yimɓe maaɗa Yahuudanko'en keɓa mangu.”
42002033	Nyaako ɓingel ngel e maduujo maagel ɓe kayɗini e ko ɗum wi'i dow maagel.
42002034	Sey Saaminu barkiɗiniɓe, nden o wi'i Maryaama, maduujo Yeesu, “Ɓingel nge'el wartay ɗatal yanuki ɗuɗɓe e ummaaki ɗuɗɓe nder leydi Israa'iila. Ngel wartay anditirɗum daga Allah ɗum yimɓe ɗuɗɓe nganyata.
42002035	Ɓiɗɗo o'o wanginay nyumooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi. An maa, ɓernde maaɗa naaway bono kaafahi tufinde.”
42002036	Ɗonmaa e woodi annabiijo debbo bi'eteeɗo Hannatu ɓii Faanuwel, ƴiwoyɗo daga lenyol Aaciru. Debbo on o nayeejo, o jooɗodake e gorko maako duuɓi joweeɗiɗi, nden gorko on maayii.
42002037	Gaɗa goriiko maayi, o jooɗii o te'aaka haa duuɓi maako ngaɗi 84. Koo ndeye e mo yaha Wuro Ceniingo e mo mawnina Allah, e mo suumoo, e mo waɗa do'aare jemma e nyalawma.
42002038	E carel ngel, o waroyi to maɓɓe, o yetti Allah, o yahi to kaaɓuɓe yi'uki carel ko Allah rimɗinta Urucaliima, o hokkiɓe habaru dow ɓingel ngel.
42002039	Nde Yusufu e Maryaama njottini koo ɗume ko Attawra wi'i ɗum waɗa, ɓe co''ii gariiri maɓɓe Najarat nder leydi Galiili.
42002040	Yeesu mawni, sembiɗi, faamu heewimo, nden barka Allah e dow maako.
42002041	Koo ɗume ndungu danyooɓe Yeesu e njaha Urucaliima ngam Humto Sakkinki.
42002042	Nde Yeesu waɗi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njahi humto no ɓe mboowi.
42002043	Gaɗa humto ngon heenyi, danyooɓe maako e dow ɗatal hootuki wuro, Yeesu boo darii nder Urucaliima, ammaa danyooɓe ɓen andaa o darake.
42002044	E ɓe kammii e mo nder ɓe ɓe njaadata, ɓe ngaɗi yaadu nyalnde go'o, nden ɓe puɗɗi ɗaɓɓutukimo nder bandiraaɓe maɓɓe e higooɓe maɓɓe.
42002045	Nde ɓe ɗaɓɓiti ɓe keɓtaayimo, ɓe co''ii Urucaliima ngam ɗaɓɓutukimo.
42002046	Nder nyalnde tatawre ɓe tawimo nder Wuro Ceniingo, e mo jooɗii hakkunde moodiɓɓe, e mo nanaɓe, nden e mo ƴamaɓe.
42002047	Nanɗomo fuu hayɗini e faamu maako e nootaaki maako.
42002048	Nde danyooɓe maako ngi'imo, ɓe kayɗini. Maduujo maako wi'imo, “Ɓiɗɗo am, ko waɗi ngaɗanɗaamin niini? Min e nyaako maaɗa nde min ɗaɓɓiti min ngi'aayima, min ngannii.”
42002049	O wi'iɓe, “Ko waɗi ɗaɓɓitotoyyam? On andaa e haani mi jooɗoo nder wuro Nyaako am?”
42002050	Ammaa ɓe faamaayi ko o wi'iɓe.
42002051	Sey Yeesu so''odii e maɓɓe Najarat, e mo waɗa ko ɓe mbi'imo fuu. Maduujo maako jogii fii ɗu'um fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum.
42002052	Yeesu mawni, ɓeydi faamu e heɓuki yidde daga to Allah e to yimɓe.
42003001	Mawɗo Laamiiɓe leyɗe Rooma bi'eteeɗo Kaysar Tibaariya e woodi duuɓi sappo e jowi dow laamu, e carel ngel Buntus Bilaatus woni gomnaajo leydi Yahuudiya. Hirudus boo e laamii leydi Galiili, mawniiko Filibus boo e laamii leydi Ituuriya e Tarakuniitas, nden Lisaaniyas e laamii leydi Abiiliya.
42003002	Hanaana e Kayaafa boo ngoni Mawɓe Mawɓe Ardiiɓe Diina. E carel ngel Wolde Allah warani Yahaya, ɓiɗɗo Jakaariya, nder ladde.
42003003	Ngam non, Yahaya yahi bigeeje gonɗe haade Caangol Urdun fuu, e mo wa'ajina, e mo wi'a, “Tuubee, ɗum waɗana'on baptisma, nden Allah yaafanto'on hakkeeji mooɗon.”
42003004	No ɗum windiraa nder deftere Annabi Icaaya dow Yahaya, “Goɗɗo e nodda nder ladde e wi'a, ‘Mo''inee ɗatal Joomiraawo, portee laawol ngam garol maako.
42003005	Pogooji fuu ɗi kebbinteeɗi, kocceeje e ƴoole fuu ɗe nameteeɗe. Ɗate guuriiɗe ɗe dartinteeɗe, ɗate bonniiɗe ɗe mo''inteeɗe.
42003006	Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu ɓe ngi'ay kisndam Allah.’ ”
42003007	Yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngaroyi to Yahaya ngam o waɗanaɓe baptisma. O wi'iɓe, “Onon ɓiɓɓe boole! Moye wi'i'on ndoggon bone garayɗum?
42003008	Ngaɗee ko hollata on alii hakkeeji mooɗon. To' on mbi'u nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ‘Minon, min ɓiɓɓe Annabi Ibraahim.’ Ngam e mi wi'a'on, Allah waaway umminanki Annabi Ibraahim ɓiɓɓe daga nder kaaƴe ɗe'e.
42003009	Koo jooni fe''irde ƴeftaama ngam fe''a leɗɗe daga ɗaɗi maaje. Lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓikkoy mboɗkoy, ɗum fe''ayki ɗum faɗɗaki nder hiite.”
42003010	Yimɓe mbi'imo, “Ko haani min ngaɗa?”
42003011	Yahaya wi'iɓe, “Gooduɗo toggooje ɗiɗi fuu hokka mo walanaa go'o, nden gooduɗo nyamndu fuu hokkora mo walanaa.”
42003012	Jaɓooɓe ceede leydi maa ngari ngam ɓe ngaɗanee baptisma, ɓe mbi'imo, “Moodibbo, ko haani min ngaɗa?”
42003013	O wi'iɓe, “To' on njaɓu ko ɓuri no ɗum wi'i'on njaɓon.”
42003014	Woɓɓe sooji'en ƴamimo mbi'i, “Minon maa, ko haani min ngaɗa?” O wi'iɓe, “To' on teetan yimɓe ceede e sembe, to' on mbi'u yimɓe ngaɗii ko ɓe ngaɗaayi ngam njaɓanonɓe ceede. Munyee dow ko ɗum yoɓata'on.”
42003015	Yimɓe kaaɓii ngi'a Almasiihu. Koo moye nder maɓɓe e nyuma nder ɓerɗe muuɗum koo Yahaya woni Almasiihu.
42003016	Yahaya wi'iɓe, “E mi waɗirana'on baptisma e ndiyam, ammaa ɓurɗoyam mangu e wara. Mi fotaayi fittuki lokkulli paɗe maako. O waɗiranay'on baptisma e Ruuhu Allah e hiite.
42003017	E mo jogii besirɗum gawri maako ngam senduki gawri e nyaande. O hawritay gawri ndin, o waɗandi nder resirde gawri maako, ammaa o wula nyaande nden nder hiite nge waatataa.”
42003018	Non Yahaya waggini yimɓe e boliiɗe ɗuɗɗe, o andiniiɓe Habaru Belɗum.
42003019	Nden o haɓani Hirudus laamiiɗo leydi ngam te'i debbo mawniraawo muuɗum bi'eteeɗo Hiruudiya, kadimaa ngam kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu ɗe o waɗi.
42003020	Sey o ɓeydi waɗuki ko ɓuri non, o waɗi ɗum maɓɓi Yahaya nder suudu cural.
42003021	Nde yimɓe fuu ngaɗanaa baptisma, Yeesu maa waɗanaa baptisma. E mo nder waɗuki do'aare, sey dammugal dow maɓɓitii.
42003022	Ruuhu Allah jippoyii dow maako e ɓandu bo foondu. Hononde ƴiwoyi daga dow wi'i, “An woni Ɓiɗɗo am, mo ngiɗumi. E mi nana belɗum maaɗa.”
42003023	Ko Yeesu fuɗɗi kuugal muuɗum, o ɓadake duuɓi 30. Yimɓe e nyuma Yeesu ɗum ɓiɗɗo Yusufu. Yusufu ɓiɗɗo Heeli,
42003024	Heeli ɓiɗɗo Matat, Matat ɓiɗɗo Leewi, Leewi ɓiɗɗo Malki, Malki ɓiɗɗo Yanna, Yanna ɓiɗɗo Yusufu,
42003025	Yusufu ɓiɗɗo Mataatiya, Mataatiya ɓiɗɗo Amos, Amos ɓiɗɗo Naahum, Naahum ɓiɗɗo Ajaliya, Ajaliya ɓiɗɗo Najaya,
42003026	Najaya ɓiɗɗo Ma'ata, Ma'ata ɓiɗɗo Mataatiya, Mataatiya ɓiɗɗo Cimeeya, Cimeeya ɓiɗɗo Joosek, Joosek ɓiɗɗo Yahuuda,
42003027	Yahuuda ɓiɗɗo Yowaanan, Yowaanan ɓiɗɗo Refaya, Refaya ɓiɗɗo Jaruubabel, Jaruubabel ɓiɗɗo Ceyaltiyal, Ceyaltiyal ɓiɗɗo Neeri,
42003028	Neeri ɓiɗɗo Malki, Malki ɓiɗɗo Addi, Addi ɓiɗɗo Kosma, Kosma ɓiɗɗo Almadama, Almadama ɓiɗɗo Er,
42003029	Er ɓiɗɗo Joocuwa, Joocuwa ɓiɗɗo Eliyeeja, Eliyeeja ɓiɗɗo Yorim, Yorim ɓiɗɗo Matat, Matat ɓiɗɗo Leewi,
42003030	Leewi ɓiɗɗo Saaminu, Saaminu ɓiɗɗo Yahuuda, Yahuuda ɓiɗɗo Yusufu, Yusufu ɓiɗɗo Yonana, Yonana ɓiɗɗo Eliyaakim,
42003031	Eliyaakim ɓiɗɗo Malaya, Malaya ɓiɗɗo Maynana, Maynana ɓiɗɗo Mataata, Mataata ɓiɗɗo Naatan, Naatan ɓiɗɗo Dawda,
42003032	Dawda ɓiɗɗo Jeesi, Jeesi ɓiɗɗo Obida, Obida ɓiɗɗo Bo'aaja, Bo'aaja ɓiɗɗo Salmon, Salmon ɓiɗɗo Naacon,
42003033	Naacon ɓiɗɗo Amiinadab, Amiinadab ɓiɗɗo Aram, Aram ɓiɗɗo Heseruuna, Heseruuna ɓiɗɗo Feresa, Feresa ɓiɗɗo Yahuuda,
42003034	Yahuuda ɓiɗɗo Yaakubu, Yaakubu ɓiɗɗo Iciyaaku, Iciyaaku ɓiɗɗo Ibraahim, Ibraahim ɓiɗɗo Teera, Teera ɓiɗɗo Naaho,
42003035	Naaho ɓiɗɗo Serug, Serug ɓiɗɗo Reyu, Reyu ɓiɗɗo Feele, Feele ɓiɗɗo Eber, Eber ɓiɗɗo Ceela,
42003036	Ceela ɓiɗɗo Kenan, Kenan ɓiɗɗo Arfakacaadi, Arfakacaadi ɓiɗɗo Cem, Cem ɓiɗɗo Nuhu, Nuhu ɓiɗɗo Lamek,
42003037	Lamek ɓiɗɗo Metusela, Metusela ɓiɗɗo Enok, Enok ɓiɗɗo Yared, Yared ɓiɗɗo Mahaalalel, Mahaalalel ɓiɗɗo Kenan,
42003038	Kenan ɓiɗɗo Enoc, Enoc ɓiɗɗo Ciitu, Ciitu ɓiɗɗo Aadamu, Aadamu mo Allah.
42004001	Yeesu ƴiwoyi daga Caangol Urdun e heewi Ruuhu Allah. Sey Ruuhu Allah yaarimo nder ladde.
42004002	Ton o waɗi balɗe 40 Ceyɗan e foondamo, o nyaamaayi goɗɗum nder balɗe ɗen. Nden gaɗa maaje, weelo nangimo.
42004003	Ceyɗan wi'imo, “To an woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah, wi'u nde'e hayre warta buroodi.”
42004004	Yeesu nootii wi'imo, “Aayaare wi'ii, ‘Naa' e nyamndu tan neɗɗo marortoo.’ ”
42004005	Sey Ceyɗan yaarimo wonde wigeere townde, bo maƴƴuki hollimo leyɗe duuniyaaru fuu.
42004006	Nden Ceyɗan wi'imo, “Mi hokkete laamu e mangu dow leyɗe ɗe'e fuu, ngam ɗum hokkiiyamɗe. Mi waaway hokkukiɗe koo moye mo ngiɗumi.
42004007	Ngam non, taa mawniniiyam, ɗu'um fuu ɗum wartay ɗum maaɗa.”
42004008	Yeesu wi'imo, “Aayaare wi'ii, ‘Mawnin Allah Joomiraawo maaɗa, kanko tan mawnintaa.’ ”
42004009	Sey Ceyɗan yaarimo Urucaliima, darnimo ton dow hoore Wuro Ceniingo, wi'imo, “To an woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah, diwu daga ɗo'o,
42004010	ngam aayaare wi'ii, ‘Allah wi'ay malaa'ika'en muuɗum mballumaa boɗɗum.
42004011	Ɓe taɓɓete nder juuɗe maɓɓe, ngam to' nawnaa koyɗe maaɗa dow hayre.’ ”
42004012	Yeesu wi'imo, “Aayaare wi'i, ‘Taa' foondu Allah Joomiraawo maaɗa.’ ”
42004013	Nde Ceyɗan heenyi foonduki Yeesu fuu, sey o alimo yaaki wongel carel.
42004014	Sey Yeesu so''ii leydi Galiili nder bawɗe Ruuhu Allah. Habaru maako sankitii nder leydi ndin.
42004015	O fuɗɗi ekkitinki nder cuuɗi do'aare maɓɓe, koo moye mantimo.
42004016	Yeesu yahi Najarat, gariiri to mawni. Nyalnde Siwtaare, o natti suudu do'aare no o woowi waɗuki. Sey o ummii o darii ngam o janga Deftere Ceniinde.
42004017	Ɗum hokkimo deftere Annabi Icaaya, o maɓɓitinde, o jangi aayaaje bi'uɗe,
42004018	“Ruuhu Joomiraawo e dow am, ngam o suɓiiyam mi hokka ɓe ngalanaa Habaru Belɗum. O liliiyam mi wadda habaru yoofuki maccuɓe, mi wumtina wumɓe, mi waɗa ɗum ala torreteeɓe ndilla,
42004019	Mi wa'ajinana duuniyaaru wiiki hitaande nde Joomiraawo hisnata yimɓe muuɗum waroyi.”
42004020	Sey o maɓɓi deftere nden, o hokkitinde ballitoowo o jooɗii. Koo moye gonɗo nder suudu do'aare ndun sutiimo.
42004021	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ɗe'e aayaaje ɗe nanɗon, hande ɗe keewii.”
42004022	Koo moye e wi'a boɗɗum dow maako. Boliiɗe boɗɗe burtiiɗe nder honduko maako hayɗiniiɓe. Ɓe mbi'i, “Naa' o'o woni ɓiɗɗo Yusufu?”
42004023	O wi'iɓe, “Walaa seko on mbi'ayyam haala ka'a, ‘Nyawndoowo, yamɗin hoore maaɗa! Ko min nani a waɗii nder Kafarnahum, waɗu ɗum ɗo'o nder gariiri maaɗa.’ ”
42004024	Kadimaa o wi'iɓe, “Goonga, e mi wi'a'on, walaa annabiijo jaɓeteeɗo to gariiri muuɗum.
42004025	E mi wi'a'on goonga, e carel Annabi Iliya e woodi rewɓe ɗuɗɓe nder leydi Israa'iila ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi. E carel ngel, ɗum waɗi duuɓi tati e lebbi joweego'o ndiyam toɓaayi, nden ɗum waɗi weelo kallungo nder leydi ndin fuu.
42004026	Ammaa Annabi Iliya liloyaaka to koo moye maɓɓe, sey to goɗɗo debbo naa' Yahuudankeejo mo gorko muuɗum maayi, gonɗo gariiri Jarifat nder leydi Sidon.
42004027	Kadimaa e woodi gooduɓe nyawu nyaamoojum laral ɗuɗɓe nder Israa'iila e carel Annabi Iliica, ammaa walaa jamɗinaaɗo nder maɓɓe sey Na'aman neɗɗo leydi Siiriya, naa' o Yahuudankeejo.”
42004028	Nde yimɓe wonɓe nder suudu do'aare ndun nani non, ɓe fuu ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti.
42004029	Ɓe ummii, ɓe ndiiwimo daga nder gariiri, nden ɓe njaarimo dow ƴolde to gariiri maɓɓe woni, ngam ɓe tuuroyoomo ley,
42004030	ammaa o tokki hakkunde maɓɓe, o dilli.
42004031	Sey Yeesu yahi gariiri Kafarnahum nder leydi Galiili, e mo ekkitinaɓe nder suudu do'aare Nyalnde Siwtaare.
42004032	Ɓe kayɗini e ekkitinol maako, ngam boliiɗe maako e woodi bawɗe.
42004033	E woodi gooduɗo ginnol nder suudu do'aare ndun, o wulli sembee, o wi'i,
42004034	“Wayyoo! Ko wannumaa e amin, Yeesu Najarankeejo? A waroyi ngam kalkaamin? E mi andi an a moye. An woni Ceniiɗo Allah!”
42004035	Yeesu haɓaningol wi'i, “De''utu! Wurta nder maako!” Sey ginnol ngol do''i neɗɗo on yeeso maɓɓe, ngol wurtii ngol nawnaayimo.
42004036	Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini, ɓe ngaɗi ka metuki hakkunde maɓɓe, e ɓe mbi'a, “Iri ɗeye boliiɗe ngoni ɗo'o? Ngam e mo metana ginni nder laamu e bawɗe, e ɗi mburtoo.”
42004037	Nden habaru Yeesu sankitii nder leydi ndin.
42004038	Gaɗa Yeesu alii suudu do'aare, dillii wuro Siiman. Esiraawo Biiturus debbo jonte kalluɗe e torramo, ɓe torii Yeesu yamɗitinamo.
42004039	O wari to nyawɗo on, o haɓani jonte ɗen, sey ɗe njoofimo. Ɗon e ɗon nyawɗo on ummii, fuɗɗi waddankiɓe nyamndu.
42004040	Nde naange hiiri, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu gooduɓe nyawuuji feere‑feere, o yowi juuɗe maako dow koo moye nyawɗo, o yamɗitiniɓe.
42004041	Ginni maa mburtii nder yimɓe ɗuɗɓe, e ɗi ngulla, e ɗi mbi'a, “An, a Ɓiɗɗo Allah!” Ammaa o haɓaniɗi, o haɗiɗi metuki, ngam e ɗi andi kanko woni Almasiihu.
42004042	Nde weeti, Yeesu wurtii gariiri ndin yahi wonde wigeere nder ladde. Yimɓe ngaɗi ka ɗaɓɓutukimo. Nde ɓe tawimo, ɓe ngiɗaa o dilla o alaɓe.
42004043	Ammaa o wi'iɓe, “Doole mi wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum dow Laamu Allah e goɗɗe gariije, ngam maajum ɗum liloyiyam.”
42004044	Nden o waɗi ka wa'ajinki nder cuuɗi do'aare leydi Yahuudiya.
42005001	Wonde nyalnde Yeesu e darii daande Mbeela Janisarat, yimɓe e piliimo e nana Wolde Allah.
42005002	O yi'i komiije ɗiɗi e ɗe ndesii daande ndiyam. Nangooɓe liƴƴi mburtii nder maaje, e ɓe laɓɓina nangirɗum liƴƴi maɓɓe.
42005003	O natti komiwal Siiman, o torii Siiman dirdinangal seɗɗa nder ndiyam. O jooɗii nder maagal, e mo ekkitina yimɓe.
42005004	Nde o heenyi ko o wi'ata, o wi'i Siiman, “Turta komiwal ngal yaaki ton to luggi, ngaɗaa nangirɗum liƴƴi maaɗa nder ndiyam ngam nanguki liƴƴi.”
42005005	Siiman Biiturus wi'i, “Moodibbo, min kuwii jemmaare fuu, min nangaayi goɗɗum. Ammaa daga a wi'i non, mi waɗay nangirɗum liƴƴi nder ndiyam.”
42005006	Nde ɓe ngaɗi non, ɓe nangi liƴƴi ɗuɗɗi haa nangirɗum ɗum fuɗɗi seekuki.
42005007	Sey ɓe noddiri higooɓe maɓɓe juuɗe, wonɓe nder wongal komiwal, ngam ɓe ngara ɓe mballaɓe. Ɓe ngari, ɓe kebbini komiije ɗen ɗe fuu ɗiɗi e liƴƴi naaki ɗe fuɗɗi mutuki nder ndiyam.
42005008	Nde Siiman yi'i non, o diccii yeeso Yeesu, o wi'i, “Moodibbo, woɗɗitayam, mi neɗɗo gooduɗo hakke!”
42005009	Siiman wi'i non ngam kanko e ngonduɓe e maako ɓe kayɗinii e liƴƴi ɗuɗɗi ɗi ɓe nangi.
42005010	Yaakubu e Yahaya, ɓiɓɓe Jabadi, higooɓe kuugal Siiman, kamɓe maa ɓe kayɗinii. Yeesu wi'i Siiman, “Taa' hulu! Daga jooni a wadday yimɓe to am.”
42005011	Ɓe mburtini komiije maɓɓe daga nder ndiyam, ɓe ali koo ɗume, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
42005012	Wonde nyalnde Yeesu e nder wondi gariiri, goɗɗo waroyi gooduɗo nyawu nyaamoojum laral fuu ɓandu maako. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o diccii, o torii Yeesu, o wi'i, “Moodibbo, taa jaɓii, a waaway njamɗitinaayam.”
42005013	Sey Yeesu forti jungo muuɗum, meemimo, wi'i, “Mi jaɓii. Yamɗutu!” Ɗon e ɗon o yamɗiti, nyawu ngun alimo.
42005014	Yeesu wi'imo, “Taa' wi'uka goɗɗo. Ammaa yahu, kollaa hoore maaɗa to ardiiɗo diina, kokkaa cakkiri no Annabi Muusa wi'i ngam laaɓol maaɗa. Waɗu non ngam tabbitinanki yimɓe a yamɗitii.”
42005015	Ammaa koo nde Yeesu haɗiimo wi'ukika, habaru ɗum woɗɗinii, yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ngari ngam nanuki ekkitinol maako e yamɗitineeki daga nyawuuji mu''en.
42005016	Ammaa no Yeesu woowi e yaha wigeere nder ladde waɗa do'aare.
42005017	Wonde nyalnde Yeesu e nder ekkitinki, Faarisanko'en e moodiɓɓe Attawra e njooɗii ɗon ƴiwoyɓe ngarihoy fuu ngonkoy nder leyɗe Galiili e Yahuudiya e gariiri Urucaliima. Bawɗe Joomiraawo e wondi e maako, e mo yamɗitina nyawɓe.
42005018	Sey woɓɓe ngaddi goɗɗo jaraaɗo dow daago, ɓe ɗaɓɓiti ɗatal ngal ɓe nattinirtamo nder wuro ngon, ɓe pukkinamo yeeso Yeesu.
42005019	Ammaa ɓe mbaawaayi nattinkimo ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗii, sey ɓe ƴentinimo dow suudu ndun, ɓe njulindu, ɓe njippinimo daga dow mayru yaaki hakkunde yimɓe yeeso Yeesu.
42005020	Nde Yeesu yi'i hoolaare maɓɓe, o wi'i jaraaɗo on, “Higo, ɗum yaafanakema hakkeeji maaɗa.”
42005021	Sey Faarisanko'en e moodiɓɓe Attawra puɗɗi metitaaki hakkunde maɓɓe, e ɓe mbi'a, “O'o ɗum moye pottidinoowo hoore muuɗum e Allah? Moye waawata yaafaaki hakke to naa' Allah?”
42005022	Yeesu faami nyumo maɓɓe, o wi'iɓe, “Ngam ɗume nyumoton iri nyumooji ɗi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
42005023	Ko ɓuri hoyki, ɗum wi'a, ‘A yaafanaama hakke maaɗa,’ koo ɗum wi'a, ‘Umma yaaɓu?’
42005024	Ammaa e mi yiɗi andon Ɓii Neɗɗo e woodi laamu nder duuniyaaru yaafoo hakke.” Sey o wi'i jaraaɗo on, “E mi wi'imaa, umma, koccaa daago maaɗa, kootaa wuro!”
42005025	Ɗon e ɗon o ummii yeeso maɓɓe, o hocci daago maako, o hooti wuro, e mo manta Allah.
42005026	Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini, ɓe mawnini Allah. Kulol nangiɓe, ɓe mbi'i, “Hande en ngi'i ko hulnii!”
42005027	Gaɗa ɗon, Yeesu wurtii yi'i jaɓoowo ceede leydi bi'eteeɗo Leewi, e mo jooɗii to ɗum jaɓata ceede leydi, Yeesu wi'imo, “Tokkam.”
42005028	Leewi ummii, ali koo ɗume, tokkimo.
42005029	Sey Leewi yaari Yeesu wuro muuɗum defanimo nyamnduuji feere‑feere. Jaɓooɓe ceede leydi ɗuɗɓe e woɓɓe yimɓe e nyamda e maɓɓe.
42005030	Ammaa, Faarisanko'en e moodiɓɓe Attawra maɓɓe ngaɗi ka metitaaki, e ɓe mbi'a tokkuɓe Yeesu, “Ngam ɗume nyamdoton e jaɓooɓe ceede leydi e gaɗooɓe hakke?”
42005031	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Naa' yamɓe ngiɗi nyawndoowo, sey ni nyawɓe.
42005032	Mi waroyaayi ngam nodduki nyumooɓe ɓe aadili'en, ammaa mi waroyi ngam nodduki anduɓe ɓe gaɗooɓe hakke ɓe tuuba.”
42005033	Ɓe mbi'imo, “Koo ndeye tokkuɓe Yahaya Gaɗoowo Baptisma e cuumoo e ngaɗa do'aare, non maa tokkuɓe Faarisanko'en ngaɗata, ammaa tokkuɓema e nyaama e njara.”
42005034	Yeesu nootii wi'iɓe, “On mbaaway kaɗon higooɓe angoojo nyaamuki nyamndu carel ngel o wondi e maɓɓe? On mbaawataa!
42005035	Ammaa carel e wara ngel ɗum hoccata angoojo on daga nder maɓɓe, gaɗa ɗon ɓe cuumoto.”
42005036	O wi'iɓe misaalu ɗu'um, “Walaa ceekoowo lefel daga limcere heyre nyootangel to limcere kiinde. To o waɗii non, o seekay limcere heyre nden, lefel kesel ngel boo yaadataa e limcere hiinde nden.
42005037	Non maa walaa gaɗayɗo inabojam kesam nder faandu hiindu. To o waɗii non, ɗam ƴuufay, ɗam pusa faandu ndun, ɗam rufa.
42005038	Ammaa, inabojam kesam haani waɗee nder faandu heyru.
42005039	Walaa boo jaroowo inabojam kiiɗam gaɗa ɗon ɗaɓɓita kesam, ngam o wi'ay, ‘Kiiɗam ɗam ɓurii.’ ”
42006001	Wonde Nyalnde Siwtaare Yeesu e yaha nder ngesa alkamaari, sey tokkuɓemo ngaɗi ka ɓoruki cammeeje mayri e molmaɗe nder juuɗe maɓɓe, e ɓe nyaama.
42006002	Ammaa woɓɓe Faarisanko'en mbi'iɓe, “Ko waɗi ngaɗoton ko Attawra haɗi ɗum waɗa Nyalnde Siwtaare?”
42006003	Yeesu wi'iɓe, “On meeɗaayi janguki ko Dawda waɗi nde nani weelo, kanko e gonduɓe e maako?
42006004	O natti Lukuru Seniiɗum, o hocci buroodi ceniiɗum, o nyaamiɗum. Attawra boo wi'ii ardiiɓe diina tan haani nyaamuki buroodi ɗum, ammaa Dawda nyaamiɗum haa maa o hokkori jaadooɓe e maako.”
42006005	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “Ɓii Neɗɗo woni Joomu Nyalnde Siwtaare.”
42006006	Wonde Nyalnde Siwtaare o natti nder suudu do'aare, e mo ekkitina. Goɗɗo mo jungo jaraango e nder mayru.
42006007	Moodiɓɓe Attawra e Faarisanko'en cutii Yeesu koo o yamɗitinay goɗɗo nder Nyalnde Siwtaare, ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngulliroytoomo.
42006008	Ammaa, Yeesu e andi ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, sey o wi'i neɗɗo mo jungo jaraango on, “Woroy, ndaroɗaa caka maɓɓe.” O ummii, o darii ɗon.
42006009	Sey Yeesu wi'iɓe, “E mi ƴama'on, ko Attawra wi'i ɗum waɗa nder Nyalnde Siwtaare, waɗa ko wooɗi koo waɗa ko wooɗaa, hisna yonki koo halkaki?”
42006010	Gaɗa o raariiɓe ɓe fuu, sey o wi'i neɗɗo on, “Fortu jungo maaɗa.” O fortingo, sey ngo yamɗiti.
42006011	Ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti naa' seɗɗa, ɓe meti hakkunde maɓɓe dow ko ɓe ngaɗanta Yeesu.
42006012	Nder balɗe ɗen, Yeesu yahi dow hocceere ngam waɗa do'aare. O waali waɗuki do'aare.
42006013	Nde weeti, o noddi tokkuɓemo, o suɓi sappo e ɗiɗo, o hokkiɓe inde lilaaɓe.
42006014	Kamɓe ngoni: Siiman mo o hokki inde Biiturus, e minyiraawo maako Andiraawus, e Yaakubu, e Yahaya, e Filibus, e Batiloomi,
42006015	e Maatiyu, e Tooma, e Yaakubu ɓii Halfa, e Siiman bi'eteeɗo Jalooti,
42006016	e Yahuuda ɓii Yaakubu, e Yahuuda Iskariyooti, gartuɗo kokkitirɗo Yeesu.
42006017	Sey Yeesu jippodii e maɓɓe o darii e njayri. Tokkuɓemo ɗuɗɓe e ɗon e yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ƴiwoyɓe daga leydi Yahuudiya fuu, e Urucaliima, e leydi Taaya e Sidon haade mbeela.
42006018	Ɓe ngaroyi ngam nanukimo e yamɗineeki daga nyawuuji maɓɓe. Ɓe ginni torrata njamɗinaa.
