45016025	Mangu tabbita to Allah baawayɗo sembiɗina'on barka Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinaymi dow Yeesu Almasiihu. Habaru Belɗum ɗum ɗum sirru cuuɗaaɗum daga duuɓi ɗuɗɗi ƴaɓɓiiɗi.
45016026	Ammaa jooni ɗum wanginaama e njayri, ɗum andiniiɗum leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu laawol defte ɗe annabo'en mbindi. Allah tabiiɗo wi'ii ɗum waɗa non ngam leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu kooloomo tokka ko o wi'i.
45016027	Teddungal tabbita to Allah haa abadaa barka Yeesu Almasiihu! Kanko tan woni Allah. Kanko tan woodi faamu nder koo ɗume. Aamin.
46001001	Min, Bulus mo Allah suɓi warta lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiihu e bandiraawo meeɗen Sastaanis mbindi ɗerewol ngo'ol.
46001002	Min mbindanngol kawtal yimɓe Allah wonɓe Korinti, ɓe Allah noddi ngarta yimɓe muuɗum. Min mbindanngol yimɓe fuu gonɓe koo toye gaɗooɓe do'aare nder inde Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Kanko woni Joomiraawo meeɗen e maɓɓe fuu.
46001003	Allah Nyaako meeɗen Mo Dow e Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo barkiɗina'on hokka'on jam.
46001004	Koo ndeye e mi yetta Allah ngam mooɗon ngam barka e yidde ɗum o hokki'on ngam sumpootirki mooɗon e Yeesu Almasiihu.
46001005	Sumpootirki mooɗon e maako ɗum barkiɗinii'on e koo ngole laawol, waato nder meto fuu e andal fuu,
46001006	ngam ɗum tabbitinanii'on wa'aju ɗum min nga'ajinani'on dow Almasiihu ɗum goonga.
46001007	Ngam non, on ndullaayi koo ngale dokkal ngal Ruuhu Allah hokkata, on keɗii on kaaɓii gartol Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46001008	O waɗay ka sembiɗinki'on haa yaaki re'irde, ngam ngarton ɓe ngalaa ko ɗum huɗirta'on nyalnde nde o wartoyta.
46001009	Allah o gaɗoowo ko o wi'i. Kanko noddi'on ngam cumpootiron e Ɓiɗɗo maako Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46001010	E mi toroo'on bandiraaɓe ngam inde Joomiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu, on fuu njaɓee ko mbi'oton warta go'o ngam to' ɗum heɓa feerootirol hakkunde mooɗon, ammaa nyumo mooɗon e ɓerɗe mooɗon warta go'o.
46001011	Bandiraaɓe am, yimɓe wuro Kuluuwi kokkiiyam habaru e woodi ciya famfamtirki hakkunde mooɗon.
46001012	Ko ngiɗumi mi wi'a woni, goɗɗo mooɗon e wi'a, “Min Bulus tokkumi.” Goɗɗo e wi'a, “Min Afoolos tokkumi,” on ni e wi'a, “Min Biiturus tokkumi.” On ɗaa'e boo e wi'a, “Min Almasiihu tokkumi.”
46001013	Too, Almasiihu e sendii won ɗon? Koo Bulus waraa dow gaafaangal ngam mooɗon? Koo e inde Bulus ɗum waɗirani'on baptisma?
46001014	Mi yettii Allah nde mi waɗanaayi koo moye mooɗon baptisma sey ni Kiribus e Gaayus.
46001015	Ngam non, walaa baawayɗo wi'a ɗum waɗanii'on baptisma nder inde am.
46001016	Too, ɗonmaa mi waɗanii yimɓe wuro Istifaanus baptisma. Gaɗa ɓen ɗon mi yejjitii to mi waɗanii goɗɗo baptisma.
46001017	Ngam Almasiihu lilaayiyam ngam mi waɗa baptisma, ammaa ngam mi wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum. Naa' e faamu neɗɗo nga'ajiniraymiɗum, ngam to' bawɗe mayde Almasiihu dow gaafaangal wartiree meere.
46001018	Habaru mayde Almasiihu dow gaafaangal, ɗum haaŋoore to yimɓe gonɓe dow laawol halkere. Ammaa to meeɗen enen kisnaaɓe ɗum bawɗe Allah.
46001019	Ngam aayaare wi'ii, “Mi lallinay faamu nyumooɓe e ngoodi faamu; Mi wonnay ƴoyre nyumooɓe e ngoodi ƴoyre.”
46001020	Too, to gooduɗo faamu woni? To moodibbo Attawra woni? To bawɗo geddi woni? Naa' Allah wartirii faamu duuniyaaru ndu'u haaŋoore?
46001021	Ngam Allah nder faamu muuɗum suɓii to' yimɓe andamo laawol faamu maɓɓe. O nanii belɗum hisnuki kooliiɓe Almasiihu laawol wa'ajinki Habaru Belɗum ɗum woɓɓe ngi'ata ɗum haaŋoore.
46001022	Yahuudanko'en e ngiɗi ngaɗanee ko hayɗinii ko ɓe njaɓa habaru ɗu'um. Yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en boo e ngiɗi metiraneeki andal ko ɓe njaɓaɗum.
46001023	Minon boo, e min nga'ajina Almasiihu baraaɗo dow gaafaangal. To Yahuudanko'en ɗum haala kalluka, to yimɓe naa' Yahuudanko'en boo ɗum haaŋoore.
46001024	Ammaa to yimɓe ɓe Allah noddi, Yahuudanko'en e naa' Yahuudanko'en, Almasiihu o bawɗe Allah e faamu Allah.
46001025	Ko ɗum yi'ata bo haaŋoore Allah waɗi ɗum ɓurii ƴoyre neɗɗo. Nden ko ɗum yi'ata bo Allah tampii, ɗum ɓurii sembe neɗɗo sembe.
46001026	Bandiraaɓe, nyumee no mbaanooɗon carel ko Allah noddi'on. Seɗɗa nder mooɗon ngoodi faamu e yiiki yimɓe duuniyaaru. Seɗɗa nder mooɗon ngoni andanɓe koo ɗume, nden seɗɗa nder mooɗon ngoodi danyooɓe laamiiɓe.
46001027	Ammaa Allah suɓii ko yimɓe duuniyaaru ndu'u ngi'ata ɗum haaŋoore, ngam o semtina gooduɓe faamu iri ɗum duuniyaaru ndu'u. Allah suɓii ko yimɓe ngi'ata bo ɗum tampuɗum nder duuniyaaru ndu'u ngam o semtina gooduɓe laamu.
46001028	Ko yimɓe njawanta, e ko ɓe kocci walaa ko ɗum waɗetee nder duuniyaaru, e ko ɓe kocci naa' ɗum goɗɗum, kanjum Allah suɓi huutira ngam lallina ko yimɓe ngi'ata e ɗum woodi daraja.
46001029	Allah waɗii non ngam to' goɗɗo neɗɗo mawnina hoore muuɗum yeeso maako.
46001030	O wartirii'on ɓe Yeesu Almasiihu. Allah wartiriimo faamu meeɗen. Laawol maako ɗum wartiri'en aadili'en, ceniiɓe, rimɗinaaɓe.
46001031	Ngam non, non no ɗum windiraa, “Fuu mantitotooɗo, o mantitoroo Joomiraawo.”
46002001	Bandiraaɓe, carel ko ngarmi to mooɗon e mi wa'ajina sirru Allah, mi huutiraayi boliiɗe lugguɗe koo holluki andal.
46002002	Carel ko ngondunoomi e mooɗon, mi suɓii nder ɓernde am mi metataa dow koo ɗume, sey dow habaru Yeesu Almasiihu mo ɗum wari dow gaafaangal.
46002003	Mi warii to mooɗon mi sembiɗaa, e mi diwna ngam kulol.
46002004	Nder ko mbiimi e ko nga'ajinmi mi huutiraayi faamu lugguɗum koo belɗum haala ngam njaɓon ko mbiimi, ammaa bawɗe Ruuhu Allah tabbitinanii'on ɗum goonga.
46002005	Mi waɗu non ngam to' hoolaaki ki kooliiɗon Yeesu daroo dow faamu yimɓe, sey ni dow bawɗe Allah.
46002006	Fuu e non, to e min metana keewuɓe nder hoolaaki Yeesu, e min metira faamu, ammaa naa' iri faamu ɗum jaamanu ɗu'um, koo faamu laamotooɓe jaamanu ɗu'um ɓe laamu de'oojum.
46002007	Ammaa e min meta dow faamu Allah ɗum sirru cuuɗiiɗum ndenno, ɗum Allah siryanii'en ko duuniyaaru tagee ngam teddinki'en.
46002008	Nder laamotooɓe jaamanu ɗu'um walaa paamuɗo ɗu'um. Ngam daa ɓe paamiinoɗum, daa ɓe mbaraayi Joomiraawo joomu mangu dow gaafaangal.
46002009	Ammaa non no ɗum windiraa, “Ko hitere meeɗaayi yiiki, ko nowru meeɗaayi nanki, ko neɗɗo meeɗaayi nyumuki, kanjum Allah siryanii yiɗuɓemo.”
46002010	Ammaa Allah hollii'enɗum laawol Ruuhu maako. Ngam Ruuhu maako e andi koo ɗume haa e sirru maako lugguɗum.
46002011	Moye nder yimɓe andata ko woni nder ɓernde neɗɗo to naa' neɗɗo on? Non maa, walaa anduɗo nyumo Allah sey ni Ruuhu Allah.
46002012	Ruuhu ɗum keɓuɗen, naa' to duuniyaaru ɗum ƴiwoyi; to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi, ngam anden caahu ɗum o hokki'en.
46002013	E min meta dow ɗu'um naa' nder haala ka faamu neɗɗo ekkitata, sey ni nder haala ka Ruuhu Allah ekkitinimin. E min ekkitina gooduɓe Ruuhu Allah dow goonga Allah.
46002014	Neɗɗo mo walaa Ruuhu Allah, o jaɓataa ko ƴiwoyi to Ruuhu Allah, ngam to maako ɗum haaŋoore. O waawataa o faamaɗum ngam o walaa Ruuhu Allah.
46002015	Gooduɗo Ruuhu Allah boo waaway faamuki koo ɗume ko Ruuhu Allah ekkitata. Ammaa mo walaa Ruuhu Allah faamataa nyumo gooduɗo Ruuhu Allah.
46002016	No aayaare wi'i, “Moye meeɗi anduki nyumo Joomiraawo ngam ekkitinamo?” Ammaa enen en paamay fii ɗu'um ngam en nyuma no Almasiihu nyumirta.
46003001	Bandiraaɓe, min mi waawaayi metanki'on no metiranaymi keewuɓe nder hoolaaki Yeesu. Sey ni mi metiranii'on no metiranaymi yimɓe duuniyaaru ndu'u, koo boo no metiranaymi ɓikkoy pamaroy, waato tokkuɓe Yeesu hesɓe.
46003002	Ɗum hokkataa ɓingel keccel nyamndu cembindu. Non min maa mi hokkaayi'on nyamndu cembindu, waato ekkitinol luggungol. Ammaa mi hokkii'on enɗam, waato ekkitinol ngol luggaa ngam on kewtaayi nyaamuki nyamndu cembindu. Goonga, haa jooni on kewtaayi nyaamukindu.
46003003	Ngam haa jooni on ngaɗa jonde iri nde yimɓe duuniyaaru. To ni e woodi lawliiru e geddi hakkunde mooɗon, too, haa jooni duuniyaaru jeyi'on, on kuwa kuuɗe iri ɗe duuniyaaru ndu'u.
46003004	Ngam to goɗɗo wi'ii, “Bulus tokkumi,” on nii boo wi'ii, “Afoolos tokkumi,” too, naa' on ngaɗa jonde iri nde yimɓe duuniyaaru ndu'u won ɗon?
46003005	Too, moye woni Afoolos? Moye woni Bulus? Min maccuɓe Allah tan. Laawol amin kooliiɗon Yeesu Almasiihu. Koo moye amin e huwa kuugal ngal Joomiraawo hokkimo o huwa.
46003006	Min mi aawii, Afoolos boo yarnii awre nden, ammaa Allah woni mawninɗonde.
46003007	Ngam non, e aawuɗo on e jarnuɗo on naa' ɓe goɗɗum, ammaa Allah tan woni mawɗo, ngam kanko woni mawninɗo awre nden.
46003008	E aawuɗo e jarnuɗo ɓe kuudooɓe. Koo moye heɓay mbarjaari ko fottidi e kuugal muuɗum.
46003009	Ngam minon, min kuudooɓe e Allah. Onon boo on ngesa maako, maadi maako.
46003010	Barka dokkal ngal Allah hokkiyam, mi fuɗɗii maadi bo mahoowo bawɗo maadi naa' seɗɗa. Mi fuɗɗi maadii, nden goɗɗo e maha dow fuɗɗoode nden. Ammaa koo moye mahoowo dow fuɗɗoode nden o faama iri mahuki ki o mahata.
46003011	Ngam walaa goɗɗo baawayɗo fuɗɗa wonde fuɗɗoode maadi feere ɓurnde nde ɗum fuɗɗi, waato Yeesu Almasiihu.
46003012	To goɗɗo mahii dow fuɗɗoode nden, to o huutirii jiinaari, koo ajurfaari, koo kaaƴe gooduɗe ceede, koo leɗɗe, koo geene, koo ƴombe,
46003013	wooɗuki kuugal maako wurtoto e njayri Nyalnde Jaango. E nden ɗon nyalnde hiite wanginay kuugal koo moye, nge foonday kuugal ngal nge holla no ngal wontindiri.
46003014	To boo maadi ndi o mahi wulaayi, o heɓay mbarjaari mbondi.
46003015	To maadi ndin wulii, o dullay mbarjaari maako, koo nde o heɓay kisndam, ammaa bo nder hiite o ƴiwi.
46003016	On andaa ɓalli mooɗon ɗum wuro to Allah jooɗotoo, nden Ruuhu Allah e jooɗoo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
46003017	Fuu bonnuɗo wuro Allah, Allah halkaymo. Ngam wuro Allah ngo ceniingo; onon boo ngoni wuro maako ngon.
46003018	To' goɗɗo ƴoyra hoore muuɗum. To goɗɗo mooɗon e nyuma e woodi faamu no jaamanu ɗu'um hocciri faamu, sey o wartira hoore maako bo kaaŋaaɗo, ngam o warta gooduɗo faamu ɗum goonga.
46003019	Ngam faamu iri ɗum duuniyaaru ndu'u, yeeso Allah ɗum haaŋoore. Non no ɗum windiraa, “Allah e nanga gooduɓe faamu nder dabare maɓɓe.”
46003020	Ɗonmaa wonde aayaare wi'ii, “Joomiraawo e andi nyumo gooduɓe faamu walaa ko nafi.”
46003021	Ngam non, to' neɗɗo mantoroo neɗɗo! Ngam koo ɗume onon njeyiɗum.
46003022	Koo Bulus, koo Afoolos, koo Biiturus, koo duuniyaaru, koo yonki, koo mayde, koo ko woni jooni, koo ko woni yeeso ɗo'o, ɗum fuu um ɗum mooɗon.
46003023	Onon boo ɗum ɓe Almasiihu. Almasiihu boo ɗum mo Allah.
46004001	Kocceemin min maccuɓe Almasiihu ɓe Allah hokki kuugal wa'ajinki sirru maako.
46004002	Fii go'o ko ɗum yiɗi to iri ɓen ɗon maccuɓe ɓe ngaɗa koo ɗume ko jeyɗoɓe wi'i.
46004003	Ammaa mi wannaayi dow no ngiiroton kuugal am, koo boo no woɓɓe ngiiratangal. Min e hoore am mi foondataa hoore am.
46004004	Ɓernde am e ranni tar, ammaa non hollaayi mi waɗaayi goɗɗum ko wooɗaa. Joomiraawo woni daarayɗo kuugal am wi'a koo ko ngaɗumi e wooɗi koo ɗum wooɗaa.
46004005	Ngam non, to' on mbi'u goɗɗo waɗii kuugal ngal Allah hokkimo boɗɗum, koo o waɗaayingal boɗɗum. Keɗee naa nyalnde nde Joomiraawo warti. Koo ɗume cuuɗiiɗum nder nyiwre o wurtinayɗum e njayri, nden o wurtinay nyumooji gonɗi nder ɓerɗe yimɓe e njayri. E carel ngel Allah wi'ay koo neɗɗo waɗii kuugal ngal o hokkimo boɗɗum koo waɗaayingal boɗɗum.
46004006	Too, bandiraaɓe, mi hokku misaalu ɗu'um dow am e dow Afoolos ngam e mi yiɗi ekkitooɗon to amin: to' ƴaɓɓooɗon ko windaa, ngam to' piyon gabaare mbi'on goɗɗo ardiiɗo ɓurii goɗɗo.
46004007	Moye wartirmaa mawɗo dow horiiɓe? Koo ɗume ɗum ngooduɗaa naa' Allah hokkumaaɗum? To ɗum non, ngam ɗume a fiya gabaare maaɗa bo ko ngooduɗaa naa' caahu keɓuɗaaɗum?
46004008	On ngi'a bo on njaadake on keɓii ko ngiɗɗon! On ngi'a bo on njaadake on ngartii diskuɓe! On ngi'a bo on ngartii laamiiɓe, koo nde minon naa' min laamiiɓe. Daa on ngartii laamiiɓe daa wooɗii, sey laamodooɗen!
46004009	Ngam e yiiki am minon lilaaɓe, Allah wartiriimin yimɓe koccaaɓe naa' ɓe goɗɗum, bo yimɓe ɓe ɗum taƴani kiita mayde bareteeɓe yeeso koo moye. Mi wi'u non ngam min ngartii ko malaa'ika'en e yimɓe fuu ngaɗani gite.
46004010	Too, minon min haaŋaaɓe ngam e min tokki Almasiihu, ammaa onon on tokkuɓe Almasiihu gooduɓe faamu. Minon min ngalaa bawɗe Allah, ammaa onon on ngi'a bo on ngoodi bawɗe Allah naa' seɗɗa! Yimɓe e kokka'on mangu, ammaa minon yimɓe e njawanamin.
46004011	Haa jooni e min piida e weelo e ɗonka. Min ngalaa kolte boɗɗe. Yimɓe e kallanamin, nden min ngalaa wuro.
46004012	E min kuwa e juuɗe amin naa' seɗɗa. To yimɓe kuɗiimin, sey min mbarkiɗinaɓe. To ɓe torriimin, sey min munya.
46004013	To yimɓe metii haala kalluka dow amin, sey min metanaɓe haala mbelka. Min ngartii mbuuri duuniyaaru, min ngartii ko nefnii. Haa jooni non ɗum woni.
46004014	Mi windan'on ɗerewol ngo'ol naa' ngam mi semtina'on, sey ni ngam mi waggina'on ngam on ɓiɓɓe am ɓe ngiɗumi.
46004015	Koo daa on ngoodi moodiɓɓe 10,000 nder tokkuki Almasiihu, on ngalaa danyooɓe ɗuɗɓe. Goonga, mi wartii nyaako mooɗon nder tokkuki Yeesu Almasiihu nde nga'ajinanmi'on Habaru Belɗum.
46004016	Ngam non, e mi toroo'on, ekkitee iri ngikku am.
46004017	Kanjum waɗi lilonoymi'on Timooti, ɓiɗɗo am mo ngiɗumi, tokkuɗo Joomiraawo e goonga. O siftoranay'on iri jonde nde ngaɗumi nder tokkuki Yeesu Almasiihu. E mi ekkitina iri jonde nden koo toye nder tokkuɓe Yeesu.
46004018	Woɓɓe nder mooɗon e ƴefta ko'e ngam e ɓe kammoo mi warataa to mooɗon.
46004019	Ammaa to Joomiraawo jaɓii mi waroyay to mooɗon naa' ko neeɓi, mi ɗaɓɓitay mi yi'a iri bawɗe ɗe ɓen ɗon ƴeftooɓe ko'e ngoodi, naa' mete‑mete maɓɓe tan.
46004020	Ngam ko hollata neɗɗo e waɗa ko Allah Laamiiɗo wi'i, naa' ɗum boliiɗe maako, ammaa ɗum bawɗe Ruuhu Allah gonɗe nder maako.
46004021	Too, ɗume ɓurɗon yiɗuki? Mi wardana'on e sawru, koo mi warana'on nder yidde e munyal?
46005001	Mi nanii habaru e woodi njeenu kalluɗum hakkunde mooɗon iri njeenu ɗum waɗataake koo nder heeferɓe, haa neɗɗo e walda e debbo nyaako muuɗum!
46005002	Fuu e non on mantoroo kawtal mooɗon! Naa' e haani ngannon haa mburtinon gaɗuɗo kuugal nga'al daga nder kawtal mooɗon?
46005003	-
46005004	Koo nde mi wondaa e mooɗon nder ɓandu, e mi nyuma dow mooɗon nder ɓernde am. Barka laamu ɗum Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen hokkiyam, mi yaadake mi taƴanii neɗɗo gaɗuɗo non kiita bo e mi wondi e mooɗon. To on kawritii, bawɗe Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen e wondi e mooɗon, min maa, bo e mi wondi e mooɗon.
46005005	Sey ngaɗon neɗɗo gaɗuɗo non nder jungo Ceyɗan, ngam Ceyɗan torra ɓandu maako, ngam ɗum hisna yonki maako nyalnde wartoyki Yeesu Joomiraawo.
46005006	Mantitaaki mooɗon wooɗaa. On andaa no ƴuufinirɗum seɗɗa ɓuutinirta condi buroodi ɗundi? Non to on alii hakke seɗɗa nder mooɗon, ɗum sankitoto koo toye nder mooɗon.
46005007	Cendiree e ƴuufinirɗum kiiɗum gonɗum nder mooɗon, waato hakke, ngam ngarton bo condi buroodi ndi walaa ƴuufinirɗum, waato kawtal tokkuɓe Yeesu ɓe ngalaa yimɓe nganyuɓe tuuba daga hakke maɓɓe, non no ngontindirɗon. Ngam ɗum yaadake ɗum hirsii karoori meeɗen ndi Humto Sakkinki. Kayri woni Almasiihu.
46005008	Ngam non, en ngaɗu Humto Sakkinki meeɗen naa' e buroodi gooduɗum ƴuufinirɗum kiiɗum ɗum halleende e kuuɗe kalluɗe, sey ni e buroodi ɗum walaa ƴuufinirɗum, waato en ngaɗu jonde lamnde nde goonga.
46005009	Nder ɗerewol am mi windanii'on wiiki, to' on kawtu ko'e mooɗon e gaɗooɓe njeenu.
46005010	Naa' e mi meta dow yimɓe ɓe duuniyaaru ndu'u gaɗooɓe njeenu, koo gooduɓe suuno ceede, koo wuyɓe, koo mawninooɓe gunkiiji. Ngam to ni mi wi'ii'on, to' kawton ko'e e iri yimɓe ɓe'e, too, sey ni alon duuniyaaru.
46005011	Ammaa jooni e mi windana'on wiiki, to' on kawtu ko'e e koo moye noddeteeɗo tokkuɗo Yeesu, nyamruɗo yeeso e waɗuki njeenu, koo gooduɗo suuno ceede, koo mawninoowo gunkiiji, koo metoowo kalluka dow goɗɗo, koo jaroowo, koo gujjo. To' maa on nyamdu e iri maɓɓe.
46005012	Naa' ɗum kuugal meeɗen ngaɗanen yimɓe ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu kiita. Kuugal mooɗon woni ngaɗanon gonɓe nder kawtal mooɗon ngal tokkuɓe Yeesu kiita.
46005013	Allah woni gaɗanayɗo yimɓe ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu kiita. No aayaare wi'i, “Onon, ndiiwee gaɗoowo ko halli daga nder mooɗon.”
46006001	To goɗɗo mooɗon wulloyto goɗɗo tokkuɗo Yeesu, naa' ɗum cemtiniiɗum o wulloyoomo to ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu? Naa' e haani o wulloyoomo to tokkuɓe Yeesu?
46006002	On andaa nyalnde go'o yimɓe Allah ngaɗanay duuniyaaru kiita? To ɗum onon ngaɗanta duuniyaaru kiita, ngam ɗume on mbaawataa ngaɗanon yimɓe kiita dow caɗɗum pamarum?
46006003	On andaa en ngaɗanay malaa'ika'en kiita? To ɗum non, on mbaaway ciryootiron ciya famfamtirki hakkunde yimɓe!
46006004	Ngam non, to on ngoodi ciya famfamtirki, ngam ɗume njaarotonɗum to yimɓe ɓe tokkuɓe Yeesu kocci naa' ɓe goɗɗum?
46006005	Mi wi'u non ngam mi semtina'on. Jooni, walaa koo go'oto nder mooɗon gooduɗo faamu baawayɗo siryootira kooliiɓe Yeesu?
46006006	Ammaa kooliiɗo Yeesu wulloyoo kooliiɗo Yeesu, haa yeeso ɓe koolaaki Yeesu!
46006007	Wullootirki hakkunde mooɗon ɗum cemtiniiɗum. Naa' ɗum ɓurii munyon to yimɓe ngaɗanii'on ko wooɗaa? Naa' ɗum ɓurii munyon to ɗum ƴoyrii'on ɗum jaɓanii'on ko ngooduɗon?
46006008	Ammaa onon e ko'e mooɗon haa on ngaɗana woɓɓe tokkuɓe Yeesu ko wooɗaa on ƴoyraɓe on njaɓanaɓe ko ɓe ngoodi!
46006009	On andaa gaɗooɓe ko wooɗaa nattataa Laamu Allah? To' on njaɓu ɗum majjina'on. Gaɗooɓe njeenu, koo e ɓe ngoodi teegal koo ɓe ngalaa teegal, e mawninooɓe gunkiiji, e gaɗooɓe luuɗu,
46006010	e wuyɓe, e gooduɓe suuno ceede, e jarooɓe, e metooɓe kalluka dow woɓɓe, e wuyɓe teetooɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe nattataa Laamu Allah.
46006011	Ndenno non woɓɓe mooɗon mba'i. Ammaa jooni ɗum lootii hakke mooɗon, on ngartiraama yimɓe Allah, on ngartiraama aadili'en barka Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen e Ruuhu Allah.
46006012	Woɓɓe mooɗon mbi'ay, “Ɗum jaɓii mi waɗa koo ɗume,” ammaa e mi wi'a'on naa' koo ɗume nafanta'en. Ɗum jaɓii mi waɗa koo ɗume, ammaa mi wartataa maccuɗo koo ɗume.
46006013	Ɗonmaa woɓɓe mooɗon mbi'ay, “Ɗum waɗii nyamndu ngam reedu, non maa ɗum waɗii reedu ngam nyamndu,” ammaa carel e wara ngel Allah wartirta fuu ɗiɗum koo ko nafi. Ɓandu waɗaaka ngam njeenu, ammaa ndu waɗaa ngam Joomiraawo, nden Joomiraawo jeyindu.
46006014	Allah umminii Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen daga mayde, enen maa o umminay'en daga mayde barka bawɗe maako.
46006015	On andaa ɓalli mooɗon ɗum jokkooɗe ɓandu Almasiihu? Too, mi hoccay ɓandu Almasiihu mi hawtandu e ɓandu kaaruwaajo? Sam, mi waɗataa non!
46006016	On andaa fuu kawtuɗo ɓandu e kaaruwaajo ɓe ngartii ɓandu go'o won ɗon? Ngam no aayaare wi'i, “Kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ngarta ɓandu go'o.”
46006017	Ammaa fuu cumpootiroowo e Joomiraawo, kanko e Joomiraawo ɓe ngartii go'o.
46006018	Ngoɗɗitee waɗuki njeenu! Koo ɗume hakke ɗum neɗɗo waɗata, ɗum meemataa ɓandu maako, ammaa gaɗoowo njeenu e wonna ɓandu muuɗum.
46006019	On andaa ɓalli mooɗon ɗum wuro to Ruuhu Allah jooɗotoo? Allah hokkii'onɗum ɗum jooɗoo nder mooɗon. Naa' onon njeyi ko'e mooɗon.
46006020	Allah hokki Ɓiɗɗo muuɗum ngam o wartira'on ɓe maako. Ngam non, mawniniree Allah e ɓalli mooɗon.
46007001	Too, jooni mi noototo ƴamol ngol ƴamɗonyam nder ɗerewol ngol mbindonoyɗonyam: E ɗum wooɗi to' neɗɗo te'a.
46007002	Ammaa nde e woodi njeenu naa' seɗɗa hakkunde yimɓe, e haani koo moye neɗɗo te'a, nden koo moye debbo waɗa teegal.
46007003	Gorko hokka debbo muuɗum ɓandu muuɗum no dooka teegal wi'i. Non maa debbo on hokka gorko muuɗum ɓandu muuɗum no dooka teegal wi'i.
46007004	Ngam debbo jeyaayi ɓandu muuɗum; gorko maako jeyindu. Non maa gorko jeyaayi ɓandu muuɗum, debbo maako jeyindu.
46007005	To' on nganyu walduki to naa' non ciryiiɗon hakkunde mooɗon ngam carel seɗɗa, ngam ngaɗon hakkiilo mooɗon dow do'aare. Gaɗa maajum nyamron yeeso e walduki ngam to' Ceyɗan fooɗa'on ngaɗon ko wooɗaa ngam ciya suruki ko'e mooɗon.
46007006	Ko mbiimi'on, ɗum caawori, naa' ɗum dooka.
46007007	Min mi ɓurii yiɗuki daa koo moye walaa teegal bo am! Ammaa koo moye e iri dokkal ngal Allah hokkimo, o'o e ngal muuɗum, on ɗaa'e e ngal muuɗum.
46007008	Jooni dow yimɓe ɓe ngalaa teegal e rewɓe ɓe worɓe maɓɓe maayi, e mi wi'a ɗum ɓurii to' ɓe ngaɗa teegal bo am.
46007009	Ammaa to ɓe mbaawataa suruki ko'e maɓɓe, e haani ɓe ngaɗa teegal. Ngam ɗum ɓurii neɗɗo waɗa teegal dow suuno njeenu nangamo.
46007010	Gooduɓe teegal boo e mi hokkaɓe dooka ɗu'um. Naa' ɗum min hokkiɗum, Joomiraawo hokkiɗum: To' debbo yoofa gorko muuɗum.
46007011	To boo o yoofii gorko maako, doole o waɗataa wongal teegal, koo boo o siryootira e gorko maako. Non maa to' gorko yoofa debbo muuɗum.
46007012	Dow horiiɓe boo e mi wi'a ɗu'um, naa' Joomiraawo wi'ika, min e hoore am wi'ika. To goɗɗo kooliiɗo Yeesu e woodi debbo mo hoolaaki Yeesu, to debbo on jaɓii njooɗodoo e maako, too, to' o yoofamo.
46007013	Non maa to debbo kooliiɗo Yeesu e woodi gorko mo hoolaaki Yeesu, to gorko on jaɓii jooɗodoo e maako, to' debbo on yoofamo.
46007014	Ngam gorko mo hoolaaki Yeesu e laaɓinee barka teegal maako e debbo kooliiɗo Yeesu. Non maa debbo mo hoolaaki Yeesu e laaɓinee barka teegal maako e gorko kooliiɗo Yeesu. Daa naa' ɗum non, daa ɓiɓɓe mooɗon ngartii ɓe laaɓaa, ammaa no ɗum wontindiri jooni ɓe ngartii laɓɓe.
46007015	Ammaa to neɗɗo mo hoolaaki Yeesu e yiɗi yoofa debbo muuɗum kooliiɗo Yeesu, too, sey o yoofamo. To iri non waɗii, kooliiɗo Yeesu gorko koo debbo naa' ɗum doole o jooɗodoo e mo hoolaaki Yeesu, ngam Allah suɓii'en ngam njooɗodooɗen jam.
46007016	An debbo kooliiɗo Yeesu, a andaa ɗum gaɗotooɗum ngartaa laawol hisnuki gorko maaɗa? An gorko kooliiɗo Yeesu, a andaa ɗum gaɗotooɗum ngartaa laawol hisnuki debbo maaɗa?
46007017	E haani koo moye nyamra yeeso e waɗuki jonde non no Joomiraawo suɓiri o jooɗoroo non no o wontindirnoo ko Allah noddamo. Kanjum woni ko ekkitinaymi koo toye nder tokkuɓe Yeesu.
46007018	Neɗɗo naadaaɗo ko Allah noddamo, to' o ɗaɓɓita wartuki mo naadaaka. Non maa neɗɗo mo naadaaka ko Allah noddamo, to' o ɗaɓɓita wartuki naadaaɗo.
46007019	Naadeeki naa' ɗum goɗɗum, non maa ciya naadeeki naa' ɗum goɗɗum. Ammaa waɗuki ko Allah wi'i ɓurii koo ɗume.
46007020	E haani koo moye nyamra yeeso e waɗuki jonde non no Allah suɓiri o jooɗoroo.
46007021	Taa maccuɗo carel ko Allah noddumaa, taa' wannu dow maajum. Ammaa taa heɓii laawol rimɗineeki, waɗuɗum.
46007022	To neɗɗo o maccuɗo carel ko Joomiraawo noddimo, o wartii rimɗinaaɗo Joomiraawo. Non maa to neɗɗo naa' o maccuɗo carel ko Allah noddimo, o wartii maccuɗo Almasiihu.
46007023	Allah hokkii Ɓiɗɗo muuɗum ngam o wartira'on ɓe maako. Ngam non, to' on ngartu maccuɓe yimɓe.
46007024	Too, bandiraaɓe am, e haani koo moye nyamra yeeso e waɗuki jonde non no Allah suɓiri o jooɗoroo yeeso maako.
46007025	Jooni mi noototo ƴamol ngol ƴamɗonyam nder ɗerewol ngol mbindonoyɗonyam dow yimɓe ɓe ngalaa teegal. Joomiraawo wi'aayiyam goɗɗum dow maɓɓe, ammaa mi hokkay caawori. Mi tabbitinii on njaɓay ko mbiimi ngam Joomiraawo wartiriiyam koolaaɗo barka yurmeende maako.
46007026	Ngam torraaji ɗi ngonɗen nder hande, e yiiki am ɗum ɓurii koo moye nyamra yeeso e waɗuki jonde non no wontindiri.
46007027	Taa woodi debbo, taa' ɗaɓɓutu yoofukimo. Taa walaa debbo boo, taa' ɗaɓɓutu te'uki.
46007028	Ammaa taa waɗii teegal, naa' hakke ngaɗɗaa. Ɗonmaa to surbaajo waɗii teegal, naa' hakke o waɗi. Fuu e non, fuu gaɗuɓe teegal njaray torra nder jonde maɓɓe. Min boo, mi yiɗaa njaron kan ɗon torra.
46007029	Bandiraaɓe am, ko ngiɗumi wiiki woni naa' ko neeɓi Yeesu Almasiihu wartoyay duuniyaaru. Daga jooni gooduɓe teegal to' ɓe ngaɗa hakkiilo maɓɓe dow maagal tan.
46007030	Woyooɓe ngam mayde, e welweltooɓe, e luumotooɓe,
46007031	e kuutirooɓe ko woni nder duuniyaaru ndu'u, to' ɓe ngaɗa hakkiilo maɓɓe dow maajum tan, ngam duuniyaaru ndu'u e ko woni nder mayru ɗum ƴaɓɓotooɗum.
46007032	E mi yiɗi ngaɗon jonde nde walaa wannaare. Gorko mo walaa debbo e mo waɗa ɓernde maako fuu dow waɗuki kuugal Joomiraawo, ngam e mo yiɗi o welnana Joomiraawo ɓernde.
46007033	Ammaa gooduɗo debbo boo e wanni e fii duuniyaaru, ngam e mo yiɗi o welnana debbo maako ɓernde.
46007034	Hakkiilo maako sendake ɗiɗi won ɗon. Ɗonmaa surbaajo koo debbo mo waɗaayi teegal e mo waɗa ɓernde maako fuu dow waɗuki kuugal Joomiraawo, ngam o warta laaɓuɗo nder fuu ko o waɗata e ko o nyumata. Debbo gooduɗo teegal boo e mo wanni e fii duuniyaaru, ngam e mo yiɗi o welnana gorko maako ɓernde.
46007035	Mi wi'u non ngam ɓeydaari mooɗon, naa' ngam mi ɓiɗɗa'on, ammaa ngam ngaɗon jonde mooɗon no haani, tokkon Joomiraawo e ɓernde go'o.
46007036	To neɗɗo waɗidii alkawal teegal e surbaajo, to e mo nyuma e mo waɗana surbaajo on ko haanaa, to o waawataa suruki suuno maako, e mo nyuma e haani o te'amo, too, sey o te'amo, naa' ɗum hakke.
46007037	Ammaa to o suɓii nder ɓernde maako to' o te'a surbaajo on, kadin to walaa dooluɗomo o te'amo, ammaa e mo suri suuno maako, o waɗii ko haani.
46007038	Ngam non, fuu te'uɗo surbaajo mo o waadi alkawal teegal waɗii ko wooɗi, ammaa neɗɗo mo waɗaayi teegal waɗii ko ɓuri wooɗuki.
46007039	Teegal haɓɓii debbo e gorko muuɗum, to ni gorko on e foofa. To boo gorko on maayii, o waaway o teera e mo o yiɗi fuu, ammaa sey ni o teera e tokkuɗo Yeesu.
46007040	Ammaa e mi nyuma o ɓuray nanki belɗum to o waɗaayi teegal, nden e yiiki am e mi woodi Ruuhu Allah.
46008001	Too, jooni dow ko ɗum sakkani gunkiiji, en andi en fuu en ngoodi andal. Andal boo e wadda mangu hoore, ammaa yidde e sembiɗina yimɓe.
46008002	Fuu nyumoowo e andi goɗɗum, too, haa jooni o walaa andal no haani.
46008003	Ammaa neɗɗo giɗɗo Allah, Allah e andimo.
46008004	Ngam non, dow nyaamuki ko ɗum sakkani gunkiiji, en andi ngunkiwa naa' ɗum goɗɗum nder duuniyaaru ndu'u, nden en andi Allah o go'oto, walaa goɗɗo sey kanko tan.
46008005	Koo nde ɗum gaɗotooɗum e woodi ko yimɓe noddata “allaaji” ton dow koo nder duuniyaaru, goonga boo e woodi bi'eteeɓe “allaaji” ɗuɗɗi e “joomiraaɓe” ɗuɗɓe.
46008006	Fuu e non, to meeɗen Allah o go'oto, Nyaako Mo Dow, taguɗo koo ɗume, nden en ngaɗa jonde ngam maako. Ɗonmaa e woodi Joomiraawo go'oto, waato Yeesu Almasiihu. Barka maako koo ɗume tagaa, nden barka maako keɓuɗen yonki.
46008007	Ammaa naa' koo moye woodi andal nga'al. E woodi yimɓe mawnuduɓe e nyumo wiiki gunkiiji e ngoodi yonki. Haa jooni boo to ɓe nyaamii nyamndu ndu ɗum sakkani gunkiiji, e ɗum wannaɓe ngam e ɓe nyuma ko ɓe ngaɗi ɗum hakke.
46008008	Ammaa naa' nyamndu ɓaddintaa'en haade Allah. To en nyaamaayi, ɗum ustantaa'en goɗɗum. To boo en nyaamii, ɗum ɓeydantaa'en goɗɗum.
46008009	On kokkaama laawol nyaamon koo iri nduye nyamndu. Ammaa paamee to' non warta ko majjinta mo sembiɗaa nder tokkuki Yeesu.
46008010	An gooduɗo andal dow ɗu'um, to neɗɗo mo sembiɗaa nder tokkuki Yeesu yi'ii a nyaama nyamndu nder suudu gunkiiji, e yiiki maaɗa ɗum sembiɗintaamo o nyaama nyamndu ndu ɗum sakkani gunkiiji?
46008011	Non, andal maaɗa majjinay neɗɗo on mo Almasiihu maayi ngam muuɗum.
46008012	Taa waɗii non, a majjinii tokkuɗo Yeesu mo sembiɗaa, a waɗanii Almasiihu hakke.
46008013	Ngam maajum, to ko nyaamaymi waɗii bandiraawo am waɗii hakke, too, mi fuɗɗitataa mi nyaama kusel, ngam to' mi waɗa bandiraawo am waɗa hakke.
46009001	Min, naa' mi dimo? Naa' mi lilaaɗo? Naa' mi yi'ii Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen? Naa' on ngartii tokkuɓe Yeesu barka kuugal am ngal Joomiraawo?
46009002	Koo to naa' mi lilaaɗo to woɓɓe, mi tabbitinii mi lilaaɗo to mooɗon! Ngam onon ngoni ko tabbitini mi lilaaɗo Joomiraawo.
46009003	Raa ko mbi'aymi gooduɓe ƴamol dow laamu am ɗum lilaaɗo.
46009004	Naa' e haani min nyaama min njara?
46009005	Naa' min mbaaway min te'a tokkuɗo Yeesu min njaada e maako koo toye to min njahata no lilaaɓe horiiɓe, e minyiraaɓe Yeesu Joomiraawo, e Biiturus ngaɗata?
46009006	Koo min e Barnaba tan ngoni lilaaɓe kaanuɓe kuwa ngam keɓa ko nyaami?
46009007	Moye soojiijo yoɓata hoore muuɗum njoɓaari? Moye remata ngesa inabooje ɗum haɗamo nyaamuki ɓikkoy koy? Moye durata ornde nden ɗum haɗamo yarki kosam maaji?
46009008	Ko mbiimi naa' ɗum nyumo neɗɗo. Naa' Attawra maa metii dow maajum?
46009009	Ɗum windaama nder Attawra Muusa wiiki, “Taa' maɓɓan ngaari honduko carel ko ndi sorɓata.” Nde Allah wi'i non, ga'i tan o wanni?
46009010	Naa' ngam meeɗen o wi'ika? Goonga ngam meeɗen ɗum windaa. Ngam e haani koo moye demoowo e corɓoowo ɓe ngaɗa kuugal maɓɓe nder kammunde heɓuki geɗal maɓɓe daga ngesa kan.
46009011	Nde min aawi Wolde Allah nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, too, ɗum fii mawɗum to min nyaamii bote mooɗon iri ɗum duuniyaaru?
46009012	To woɓɓe mbaaway keɓa iri ballal nga'al to mooɗon, naa' min ɓurayɓe? Fuu e non min kuutiraayi ngol ɗon laawol, ammaa min munyii nder koo kaye torra, ngam to' min kaɗa Habaru Belɗum dow Almasiihu nyamruki yeeso.
46009013	On andaa kuwooɓe nder Wuro Ceniingo e keɓa nyamndu maɓɓe daga nder maggo? Non maa kuwooɓe to sakkirde e ɓe keɓa geɗal maɓɓe daga nder ko ɗum sakki dow mayre?
46009014	Nden non maa Joomiraawo wi'ii wa'ajinooɓe Habaru Belɗum e haani ɓe keɓa ko ɓe nyaamata daga nder kuugal ngal.
46009015	Ammaa mi huutiraayi ɗin ɗon laawi. Ɗonmaa naa' e mi windonoya'on ɗerewol ngo'ol ngam kokkoyyam goɗɗum. Ɗum ɓurii mi maaya dow goɗɗo haɗayam ko mantortoomi.
46009016	Ammaa to mi wa'ajinii Habaru Belɗum, mi mantortaakoɗum, ngam ɗum doole mi wa'ajina. To mi wa'ajinaayi Habaru Belɗum mi woni!
46009017	Daa min e hoore am suɓi mi wa'ajina, daa mi heɓay njoɓaari. Ammaa to naa' min suɓi mi wa'ajina, ko ngaɗaymi woni e mi huwa kuugal ngal ɗum tambiniyam.
46009018	To ɗum non, ko woni njoɓaari am? Njoɓaari am woni wa'ajinki Habaru Belɗum caahu, naa' mi ɗaɓɓita ko haani mi heɓa nder wa'ajinkiɗum.
46009019	Koo nde naa' mi maccuɗo koo moye, mi wartirii hoore am maccuɗo koo moye ngam mi waddoya yimɓe ɗuɗɓe to Almasiihu.
46009020	Nder Yahuudanko'en mi wartirii hoore am bo Yahuudankeejo, ngam mi waddaɓe to Almasiihu. Koo nde naa' ley laamu Attawra ngonmi, nder yimɓe gonɓe ley laamu Attawra, mi wartirii hoore am bo gonɗo ley laamu Attawra ngam mi waddaɓe to Almasiihu.
46009021	Nder yimɓe ɓe ngalaa ley laamu Attawra boo, mi wartirii hoore am bo mo walaa ley laamu Attawra ngam mi waddaɓe to Almasiihu kamɓe maa. Non hollaayi mi tokkaayi dooka Allah, ammaa e mi tokka dooka Almasiihu.
46009022	Nder yimɓe ɓe cembiɗaa nder tokkuki Yeesu, mi wartirii hoore am bo mo sembiɗaa, ngam mi waddaɓe to Almasiihu. Mi wartirii hoore am bo koo iri moye neɗɗo ngam e koo ngole laawol mi hisna woɓɓe.
46009023	Mi waɗu ɗu'um fuu ngam Habaru Belɗum, ngam mi heɓa geɗal am nder barka gonɗum nder maajum.
46009024	On andaa nder fijo doggudu yimɓe ɗuɗɓe ndoggata nder fijo ngon, ammaa neɗɗo go'oto tan heɓata dokkal heɓuki jaalorgal? Ngam non, ndoggiree no keɓirton jaalorgal.
46009025	Fuu giɗɓe keɓa jaalorgal nder fijo e ɓe elta ɓalli maɓɓe. E ɓe ngaɗa non ngam ɓe keɓa giifol koo nde giifol ngol ngol de'oowol. Ammaa enen giifol tabbitayngol keɓeten.
46009026	Ngam non, mi doggataa bo neɗɗo gaɗoowo doggudu meere. Non maa mi haɓataa bo neɗɗo piyoowo hendu.
46009027	Ammaa e mi torra ɓandu am, e mi wartirandu maccuɗo am, ngam to' gaɗa mi wa'ajinanii woɓɓe, min e hoore am mi dulla heɓuki dokkal ngal.
46010001	Bandiraaɓe, e mi yiɗi andon ko heɓi maama'en meeɗen. Ɓe ngaɗii yaadu ley nduula njuutunga portiinga dow, ɓe fuu ɓe kultii Maayo Woɗewo.
46010002	Yaadu ndu ɓe ngaɗi ley nduula e huuluki ki ɓe kuuli Maayo Woɗewo bo ɓe ngaɗana baptisma, ɓe ngarti tokkuɓe Muusa.
46010003	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaamii nyamndu go'o ƴiwoyndu to Allah,
46010004	nden ɓe njarii ndiyam ngo'otam ƴiwoyɗam to Allah. Ngam ɓe njarii ndiyam daga Hayre ƴiwoynde to Allah yaadaynde e maɓɓe. Hayre nden boo woni Almasiihu.
46010005	Fuu e non Allah nanaayi belɗum ɗuɗɓe maɓɓe haa ɓe mbaraa, ɓalli maɓɓe cankitaa nder ladde.
46010006	Fuu fii ɗu'um ɗum waɗu ngam ɗum warta misaalu to meeɗen, ngam to' ngaɗen suuno waɗuki fii kalluɗum non no ɓe ngaɗi.
46010007	To' on ngartu mawninooɓe gunkiiji no woɓɓe maɓɓe ngaɗi. Non no ɗum windiraa, “Yimɓe njooɗake nyaamii, njarii, ɓe ummii, ɓe ngami gamol kallungol.”
46010008	To' en ngaɗu njeenu no woɓɓe maɓɓe ngaɗi haa yimɓe 23,000 maayi nyalnde go'o.
46010009	To' en poondu Joomiraawo no woɓɓe maɓɓe ngaɗi, haa boole kalkiɓe.
46010010	Nden to' on metito no woɓɓe maɓɓe ngaɗi haa Malaa'ikaajo Mayde wariɓe.
46010011	Ɗu'um fuu heɓuɓe ngam ɗum warta misaalu to meeɗen, nden ɗum windaa ngam ɗum waggina'en, enen gonɓe re'irde jaamanu.
46010012	Ngam non, taa nyuma a darii boɗɗum, waɗu hakkiilo to' njanaa.
46010013	Walaa poondol ngol ɗum foondata'on ngol ɗum meeɗaayi foonduki neɗɗo. Allah boo o kebbinoowo alkawal, o alataa ɗum foonda'on poondol ɓurngol sembe mooɗon. Ammaa nder poondol ngol, o waɗanay'on laawol no mburtortooɗon ngam mbaawon munyon nder maggol.
46010014	Ngam non, onon ɓe ngiɗumi, ngoɗɗitee mawninki gunkiiji.
46010015	E mi metana'on onon yimɓe ɓe hakkiilo. Ndaaranee ko'e mooɗon ngi'on koo ko mbi'aymi ɗum goonga.
46010016	Jardugel ndiyam inabojam ɗam njareten nder kirtaari Joomiraawo ɗam ngetteten Allah ngam maajam, to en njariiɗam, naa' en keɓay barka gonɗum nder ƴiiƴam Almasiihu? Nden Buroodi ɗum cendeten, to en nyaamiiɗum, naa' en keɓay barka gonɗum nder ɓandu Almasiihu?
46010017	Nde buroodi ɗum ɗum go'otum, enen ɗuɗɓe en ngartii bo ɓandu go'o, ngam en fuu buroodi go'o nyaameten.
46010018	Ndaaree ɓiɓɓe Israa'iila; nyaamooɓe ko ɗum sakki, naa' ɓe ngartii go'o nder mawninki Allah?
46010019	Ɗume ngiɗumi wiiki? Ko ɗum sakkani ngunkiwa ɗum goɗɗum? Koo ngunkiwa ɗum goɗɗum?
46010020	Naa' non! Ammaa ko heeferɓe cakkata, ginni ɓe cakkanta, naa' Allah. Mi boo yiɗaa ngarton go'o e ginni.
46010021	Ɗum waɗataako njaron ko woni nder jardugel Joomiraawo, nden fuɗɗiton njaron ko woni nder jardugel ginni. Ɗum waɗataako nyaamon kirtaari Joomiraawo, nden nyaamon nyamndu ginni.
46010022	En ngiɗi njukkiten Joomiraawo umminanenmo lawliiru? En nyuma en ɓuriimo sembe?
46010023	Woɓɓe mooɗon e mbi'a, “Ɗum jaɓii ngaɗen koo ɗume.” Ɗum non, ammaa naa' koo ɗume nafanta'en. Kadin e ɓe mbi'a, “Ɗum jaɓii ngaɗen koo ɗume.” Ɗum non, ammaa naa' koo ɗume sembiɗinta'en.
46010024	To' goɗɗo mooɗon ɗaɓɓita ko nafantamo tan, ammaa o ɗaɓɓita ko nafanta woɓɓe.
46010025	Nyaamee koo ngele kusel cooreteengel to luumo. To' on ƴamu koo ɗum sakkaniingel gunkiiji.
46010026	Ngam aayaare wi'ii, “Duuniyaaru e koo ɗume ko woni nder mayru, Joomiraawo jeyiɗum.”
46010027	To goɗɗo mo tokkaayi Yeesu noddii'on nyaamuki nyamndu, to on njaɓii on njahii, nyaamee koo ɗume ko ɗum hokki'on, naa' naa on ƴamii koo gunkiiji ɗum sakkani nyamndu ndun.
46010028	Ammaa to goɗɗo wi'ii'on, “Gunkiiji ɗum sakkani nyamndu ndun,” too, to' on nyaamundu ngam on ɗon biiɗo'onka, kadin ngam nyumo ɓernde.
46010029	Naa' dow nyumo mooɗon metaymi, ammaa e mi meta dow nyumo biiɗo'onka. Ngam ɗume nyumo goɗɗo haɗatayam nyaamuki koo ɗume?
46010030	To e mi yetta Allah dow nyamndu am, ngam ɗume ɗum huɗatayam dow ko ngettumi Allah nyaamumi?
46010031	Too, koo on nyaama koo on njara, koo nder koo ɗume ɗum ngaɗoton, ngaɗeeɗum ngam teddinki Allah.
46010032	To' on ngaɗu goɗɗum ko wonnata nyumo goɗɗo, koo o Yahuudankeejo, koo ɗum wongol lenyol, koo kawtal yimɓe Allah,
46010033	non no ngiɗumi mi welnana koo moye ɓernde. Mi ɗaɓɓitataa ko nafantayam, ammaa e mi ɗaɓɓita ko nafanta yimɓe ɗuɗɓe, ngam ɓe keɓa ɓe kisa.
46011001	Ekkitee to am no ekkitoriimi to Almasiihu.
46011002	E mi mana'on ngam on ngejjitaayiyam nder koo ɗume, nden on tokka ekkitinol ngol ekkitinmi'on.
46011003	Ammaa e mi yiɗi andon, Almasiihu woni ardiiɗo koo moye gorko, nden gorko woni ardiiɗo debbo muuɗum, Allah woni ardiiɗo Almasiihu.
46011004	Fuu gorko gaɗuɗo do'aare koo annabaaku e hurnii, o semtinii ardiiɗomo.
46011005	Ammaa fuu debbo gaɗuɗo do'aare koo annabaaku hurnaaki o semtinii ardiiɗomo, o wartii bo o pembuɗo hoore maako.
46011006	To debbo wanyii hurna hoore muuɗum, sey o taƴa gaasa maako. Ammaa to e ɗum semtinii debbo taƴa gaasa muuɗum koo femboo, too, sey o hurnoo.
46011007	Gorko haanaayi hurna hoore muuɗum ngam o tagaa nder nandi Allah nden e mo holla mangu Allah, ammaa debbo e holla mangu gorko.
46011008	Ngam gorko naa' daga ɓandu debbo tagaa, ammaa debbo tagaa daga ɓandu gorko.
46011009	Non maa ɗum tagaayi gorko ngam debbo, ammaa debbo tagaa ngam gorko.
46011010	Ngam ɗu'um e ngam malaa'ika'en, e haani debbo hurnoo.
46011011	Fuu e non, nder yimɓe Joomiraawo debbo e yiɗi ballal gorko, non maa gorko e yiɗi ballal debbo.
46011012	Debbo arandeejo o tagaa daga ɓandu gorko, nden worɓe fuu debbo danyiɓe, ammaa koo ɗume daga to Allah ɗum ƴiwoyi.
46011013	Nyumee e ko'e mooɗon, e ɗum haani debbo waɗa do'aare hurnaaki?
46011014	Naa' e yiiki yimɓe, to gorko alii gaasa hoore muuɗum juutii, ɗum cemtiniiɗum?
46011015	Ammaa to debbo e woodi gaasa njuutuka, ɗum wartii ko o mantortoo. Allah hokkiimo gaasa kan ngam ka suddanamo hoore.
46011016	To boo goɗɗo e yiɗi yedda haala ka'a, sey o anda min ngalaa goɗɗum ndonu feere, non maa koo ngale kawtal yimɓe Allah.
46011017	Too, e woodi ko ngiɗumi wiiki'on, mi mantataa'on dow maajum, ngam fuu carel ko kawrutuɗon ngam mawninki Allah, hawrutuki kin nafantaa'on, sey ni e ki ɓeyda so''uki'on gaɗa.
46011018	Arande, mi nanii onon tokkuɓe Yeesu to on kawritii, e woodi feerootirol hakkunde mooɗon. E mi nyuma e woodi goonga nder haala kan.
46011019	Walaa seko doole ɗum heɓa feerootirol hakkunde mooɗon, ngam ɗum waawa heɓtuki ɓeye ngoni dariiɓe e goonga nder mooɗon.
46011020	To on kawritii, goonga naa' ngam nyaamuki kirtaari Joomiraawo kawritoton.
46011021	Ngam to carel hirtaaki waɗii, koo moye e nyamra yeeso e nyaamuki nyamndu muuɗum, walaa keɗotooɗo goɗɗo. Goɗɗo aldee e weelo, goɗɗo boo yara naa yiltake.
46011022	Too, on ngalaa gure to nyaamoton njaron? Koo on njawana kawtal yimɓe Allah, nden on cemtina ɓe ngalanaa? Too, ko mbi'aymi'on? Mi mana'on dow non? Mi waawataa mi mana'on dow maajum koo seɗɗa.
46011023	Ngam ko nanmi to Joomiraawo, kanjum ekkitinmi'on. Nder jemmaare nde ɗum hokkitiri Joomiraawo meeɗen Yeesu, o hocci buroodi,
46011024	o yetti Allah, o sendiɗum, o wi'i, “Ɗu'um ɗum ɓandu am kokkaandu ngam mooɗon. Ngaɗee ka waɗuki non ngam siftorkiyam.”
46011025	Non maa, gaɗa ɓe kirtake, o hocci jardugel ndiyam inabojam, o wi'i, “Ɗa'am inabojam ngonɗam nder jardugel nge'el kanjam woni alkawal kesal tabbitayngal e ƴiiƴam am. Ngaɗee non fuu carel ngel njarotonɗam ngam siftorkiyam.”
46011026	Fuu carel ngel nyaamoton buroodi ɗum nden on njara inabojam ɗam, ngaɗee non on kokka habaru mayde Yeesu Joomiraawo. Ngaɗee ka waɗuki non haa carel ngel o wartoyta.
46011027	Ngam non, fuu nyaamuɗo buroodi ɗum, koo yarii inabojam ɗam Joomiraawo no haanaa, o waɗii hakke wartirki ɓandu Joomiraawo e ƴiiƴam Joomiraawo meere.
46011028	E haani neɗɗo foonda hoore muuɗum ko o nyaama buroodi ɗum o yara inabojam ɗam.
46011029	Fuu nyaamuɗo buroodi ɗum yari inabojam ɗam, to o nyumaayi dow ɓandu Joomiraawo, o fooɗanii hoore maako kiita laawol nyaamuki e yarki ki o waɗi.
46011030	Kanjum waɗi ɗuɗɓe nder mooɗon ɓalli maɓɓe cembiɗaa on ngoodi ciya njamu, nden woɓɓe mooɗon boo maayii.
46011031	Ammaa to en poondii ko'e meeɗen, Allah waɗantaa'en kiita.
46011032	To Joomiraawo nattinii'en torra, e mo yiɗi o elta'en, ngam to' ɗum taƴana'en kiita hawti e duuniyaaru.
46011033	Ngam non, bandiraaɓe am, to on kawritii ngam nyaamuki kirtaari ndin, keɗootiree.
46011034	To e woodi nanoowo weelo nder mooɗon, sey o nyaama nyamndu to wuro, ngam to' hawrutuki mooɗon fooɗana'on kiita. Dow fii koriiɗum boo, to mi warii, mi ekkitinay'on dow maajum.
46012001	Jooni bandiraaɓe am, dow dokke ɗe Ruuhu Allah hokkata, e mi yiɗi paamon.
46012002	On andi carel ngel ngonnooɗon heeferɓe ɗum fooɗii hakkiilo mooɗon ɗum majjinii'on, on mawnina gunkiiji ɗi metataa.
46012003	Ngam non, e mi yiɗi andon walaa neɗɗo mo Ruuhu Allah tokkinta wi'a, “Yeesu o laanaaɗo!” Non maa walaa baawayɗo wi'a, “Yeesu o Joomiraawo,” sey ni to Ruuhu Allah tokkiniimo.
46012004	Too, e woodi dokke feere‑feere, ammaa Ruuhu go'otum hokkataɗe.
46012005	E woodi kuuɗe feere‑feere, ammaa Joomiraawo go'oto huwanteeɗe.
46012006	E woodi laawi huwanki Allah feere‑feere, ammaa Allah go'oto hokkata koo moye bawɗe huutirkiɗi.
46012007	Allah e hokka koo moye neɗɗo alaama kolloojum e mo woodi Ruuhu Allah ngam ɓeydaari koo moye.
46012008	Ruuhu ɗum, kanjum hokkata goɗɗo dokkal wolde faamu, goɗɗo boo dokkal wolde andal.
46012009	Kanjum hokkata goɗɗo dokkal hoolaaki Allah, nden goɗɗo boo dokkal yamɗitinki nyawɓe,
46012010	goɗɗo kadin dokkal waɗuki fii kayɗiniiɗum, goɗɗo waɗuki annabaaku, goɗɗo boo mbawka feerootirki hakkunde Ruuhu Allah e ginni, goɗɗo boo mbawka waɗirki do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe andaa, goɗɗo boo mbawka hokkuki ma'ana ɗemɗe ɗen.
46012011	Fuu fii ɗu'um ɗum kuugal Ruuhu go'otum, kanjum hokkata koo moye dokkal non no ɗum suɓiri.
46012012	Ɓandu go'o e woodi jokkooɗe ɗuɗɗe. Fuu jokkooɗe ɓandu ndun koo nde e ɗe ɗuuɗi, kanje kawti ngarti ɓandu go'o. Too, non maa tokkuɓe Almasiihu ngontindiri.
46012013	Yahuudanko'en, e leƴƴi feere, e maccuɓe, e naa' maccuɓe, en fuu en ngaɗanaama baptisma nder Ruuhu go'otum ngam ngarten bo ɓandu go'o, nden en fuu Allah hokkii'en Ruuhu ɗum.
46012014	Ngam ɓandu naa' jokkoode wo'oyre tan woodi, ammaa jokkooɗe ɗuɗɗe ndu woodi.
46012015	To koyngal wi'ii, “Nde naa' mi jungo, ɓandu jeyaayiyam,” wi'uki non sendataangal e ɓandu ndun.
46012016	Non maa to nowru wi'ii, “Nde naa' mi hitere, ɓandu jeyaayiyam,” wi'uki non sendataandu e ɓandu ndun.
46012017	To ɓandu fuu wartii gite, too, ko ɗum nanirta? To ɓandu fuu wartii noppi, ko ɗum nanirta lumngol?
46012018	Ammaa no ɗum wontindiri, Allah siryake jokkooɗe nder ɓandu, o siryake koo ndeye jokkoode non no o yiɗiri.
46012019	To ɓandu e woodi jokkoode go'o tan, nden naa' ɗum ɓandu.
46012020	No ɗum wontindiri, ɓandu ndu wo'oyru, ammaa e ndu woodi jokkooɗe ɗuɗɗe.
46012021	Hitere fotaayi wi'a jungo, “A nafantaayam.” Ɗonmaa hoore fotaayi wi'a koyɗe, “On nafantaayam.”
46012022	Naa' non ɗum woni. Jokkooɗe ɗe ɗum yi'ata bo ɗe cembiɗaa, kanje ɓuri nafuki.
46012023	Jokkule ɓandu ɗe ngi'eten bo seɗɗa tan ɗe nafi, kanje ɓurɗen faamanki boɗɗum, nden jokkooɗe ɗe cemteten yiiki, kanje ɓurɗen faamanki.
46012024	Jokkule meeɗen ɓurɗe wooɗuki, naa' naa en paamaniiɗe. Ammaa Allah hawtii jokkooɗe ɓandu fuu. Jokkule ɗe ngi'eten bo seɗɗa tan ɗe nafi, o hokkiiɗe mangu ɓurɗum,
46012025	ngam to' ɗum heɓa feerootirol nder ɓandu, ammaa jokkooɗe ɗen fuu ɗe ngiɗindira yidde go'o.
46012026	To wonde jokkoode nawnake, sey koriiɗe fuu nanida nawɗum e jokkoode nden. To jokkoode wo'oyre mawninaama, sey koriiɗe fuu kawta mbelmbelta hawti e jokkoode nden.
46012027	Too, onon ngoni ɓandu Almasiihu, koo moye mooɗon bo ɗum jokkoode maako.
46012028	Nder kawtal tokkuɓe Yeesu, arande Allah wartirii woɓɓe lilaaɓe, woɓɓe boo o wartiriiɓe annabo'en, nden woɓɓe ekkitinooɓe, woɓɓe boo gaɗooɓe kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe, woɓɓe boo yamɗitinooɓe nyawɓe, woɓɓe boo wallooɓe, woɓɓe ardiiɓe, woɓɓe boo gaɗirooɓe do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe andaa.
46012029	Ɓe fuu ngoni lilaaɓe? Ɓe fuu ngoni annabo'en? Ɓe fuu ngoni ekkitinooɓe? Ɓe fuu ngoni gaɗooɓe kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe?
46012030	Ɓe fuu ngoni yamɗitinooɓe nyawɓe? Ɓe fuu ngoni gaɗirooɓe do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe andaa? Ɓe fuu mbaawi hokkuki ma'ana ɗemɗe ɗen? Naa' non!
46012031	Ammaa onon ɗaɓɓitee heɓuki dokke ɓurɗe mangu. Jooni mi hollay'on laawol ɓurngol wooɗuki.
46013001	To mi metirii ɗemɗe yimɓe e ɗe malaa'ika'en, ammaa mi walaa yidde, too, mi wartii bo lenguru conyooru tan, koo mbaggu iidoowu e meere.
46013002	To e mi waɗa annabaaku, nden to e mi faama sirruuji Allah, to e mi woodi andal kewngal, koo to e mi woodi hoolaare cembinde haa e mi sottina kocceeje, ammaa mi walaa yidde, too, walaa ko nafumi.
46013003	To mi hokkii ɓe ngalanaa fuu ko ngoodumi, koo mi jaɓii ɓandu am wulee, to mi walaa yidde, walaa ko ɓeydoriimi.
46013004	Gooduɗo yidde e woodi munyal, e ngikku boɗɗum. O walaa lawliiru, o mantitataako, o walaa mangu hoore.
46013005	Gooduɗo yidde waɗataa ko semtinii, o ɗaɓɓitataa ko wallatamo kanko tan. O yaawaa monnuki, o jogitataako fii kalluɗum ɗum goɗɗo waɗanimo.
46013006	Gooduɗo yidde nanataa belɗum halleende, ammaa e mo nana belɗum goonga.
46013007	E mo munya nder koo ɗume. Hoolaare maako, e kammunde maako, e munyal maako re'ataa.
46013008	Annabaaku re'ay, waɗirki do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa ƴaɓɓoto, andal re'ay, ammaa yidde re'ataa haa abadaa.
46013009	Ngam andal meeɗen e annabaaku meeɗen naa' ɗum kewɗum,
46013010	ammaa to kewɗum warii, ko heewaayi re'ay.
46013011	Carel ko ngonmi sukayel, mi metii no sukayel metirta, mi nyumii no sukayel nyumirta. Ammaa nde mawnumi, mi alii ngikku sukaaku.
46013012	Ko ngi'eten jooni, en ngi'ataaɗum boɗɗum bo daaroowo daaroggal nyiɓɓungal, ammaa carel e wara ngel ngi'etenɗum boɗɗum. Jooni seɗɗa tan andumi, ammaa carel e wara ngel andaymi andal kewngal, non no ɗum andiriyam.
46013013	Too, jooni e woodi fii tatum, waato hoolaare, e kammunde, e yidde, ammaa yidde woni ko ɓurii mangu.
46014001	Ngaɗee ko mbaawoton waɗuki ngarton gooduɓe yidde, nden ɗaɓɓitee dokke Ruuhu Allah, ko ɓuri woni dokkal waɗuki annabaaku.
46014002	Ngam gaɗiroowo do'aare ɗemngal ngal ɗum andaa naa' yimɓe o metanta, Allah o metanta. Walaa paamayɗo ko o wi'ata, ngam sirruuji o metata laawol Ruuhu Allah.
46014003	Ammaa fuu gaɗuɗo annabaaku, yimɓe o metanta, ngam o ɓeydanaɓe hoolaare, o sembiɗinaɓe, o waltina ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
46014004	Gaɗiroowo do'aare ɗemngal ngal ɗum andaa hoore maako o sembiɗinta, ammaa gaɗoowo annabaaku, tokkuɓe Yeesu o sembiɗinta.
46014005	E mi yiɗi on fuu ngaɗiron do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa, ammaa mi ɓurii yiɗuki ngaɗon annabaaku. Ngam gaɗoowo annabaaku ɓurii gaɗiroowo do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa, sey ni to e mo hokka ma'ana maaje, ngam o sembiɗina tokkuɓe Yeesu.
46014006	Too, jooni bandiraaɓe am, to mi warii to mooɗon mi waɗirii do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa, ɗume ɗum ɓeydanta'on? Walaa! Sey ni to mi wi'ii'on ko Allah wanginaniyam, koo mi ekkitinii'on ko andumi dow Allah, koo mi waɗanii'on annabaaku, koo mi ekkitinii'on Wolde Allah.
46014007	Raa misaalu dow fii ɗum walaa yonki, waato duudaandu e garaayaaru. To duudaandu duudaaka boɗɗum koo to garaayaaru piyaaka boɗɗum, no ɗum andirta duuduki kin koo piyol ngol?
46014008	Ɗonmaa, to duudoowo luwal konu duudaayingal boɗɗum, moye siryotoo yaaki konu?
46014009	Non ɗum woni to mooɗon, to naa' on ngaɗir do'aare ɗemngal ngal yimɓe nanata, no waɗata ɓe paama ko mbi'oton? Ɗum wartay bo on meta e meere.
46014010	Goonga, e woodi ɗemɗe feere‑feere e duuniyaaru, ammaa nder ɗemɗe ɗen walaa ɗemngal ngal walaa ma'ana.
46014011	To mi faamaayi ɗemngal ngal goɗɗo meti, mi wartii koɗo to maako, kanko maa o wartii koɗo to am.
46014012	Onon maa, non ɗum woni to mooɗon. Nde on kaaɓii keɓon dokke Ruuhu Allah, ngaɗee ko mbaawoton waɗuki ɓuron huutirki dokke cembiɗinayɗe tokkuɓe Yeesu.
46014013	Ngam non, fuu gaɗirɗo do'aare ɗemngal ngal o andaa, sey o toroo Allah wallamo o waawa hokkuki ma'ana ɗemngal ngal.
46014014	Ngam to mi waɗirii do'aare ɗemngal ngal mi andaa, ɓernde am waɗii do'aare, ammaa mi heɓtataa ko mbiimi.
46014015	Too, ko haani mi waɗa? Mi waɗay do'aare nder ɓernde am, ɗonmaa mi waɗay do'aare nder nyumol am. Mi yimay gimol mantuki Allah nder ɓernde am, ɗonmaa mi yimay nder nyumo am.
46014016	To naa' non, taa yettii Allah nder ɗemngal ngal a andaa, no goɗɗo mo nanataangal wiirata “Aamin” dow yettoore maaɗa? O faamaayi ko mbiiɗaa.
46014017	Ɗum goonga a yetta Allah boɗɗum, ammaa ɗum sembiɗintaa nanayɗoma.
46014018	Mi yettii Allah ngam mi ɓurii'on on fuu waɗirki do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe mi andaa.
46014019	Ammaa nder kawtal tokkuɓe Yeesu ɗum ɓurii mi meta boliiɗe jowi paameteeɗe ngam mi ekkitina woɓɓe e dow mi meta boliiɗe 10,000 nder ɗemngal ngal ɗum andaa.
46014020	Bandiraaɓe, alee nyumuki bo sukahoy. Ngartee ɓe ngalaa halleende bo ɓikkoy keccoy, ammaa ngartee bo mawɓe nder nyumo mooɗon.
46014021	Attawra wi'ii Joomiraawo wi'ii, “Mi metanay yimɓe am laawol metooɓe ɗemɗe ɗe andaaka. Mi metanayɓe e honduko yimɓe goɗɗe leyɗe, ammaa fuu e non ɓe kettindantaakoyam.”
46014022	Ngam non, waɗirki do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa naa' ɗum alaama ngam tokkuɓe Yeesu, ammaa ɗum alaama ngam yimɓe ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu. Annabaaku boo ɗum ngam tokkuɓe Yeesu, naa' ngam yimɓe ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu.
46014023	Ngam non, to on fuu on kawritii koo moye e waɗira do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa, to woɓɓe ɓe paamaayi koo yimɓe ɓe tokkaayi Yeesu nattii nder mooɗon, naa' ɓe mbi'ay on haaŋaaɓe?
46014024	Ammaa to goɗɗo mo tokkaayi Yeesu koo goɗɗo mo andaa ko ngaɗoton nattii nder mooɗon tawii koo moye e waɗa annabaaku, o faamay o waɗii hakke, non waɗay o ɗaɓɓita o tuuba.
46014025	Ko woni nder ɓernde maako cuuɗiiɗum ɗum wurtoto e njayri, o diccoto, o mawnina Allah, e mo wi'a, “Goonga, Allah e ɗon nder mooɗon.”
46014026	Too, bandiraaɓe, ɗume ngaɗoton? To on kawritii ngam mawninki Allah, goɗɗo e woodi gimol, goɗɗo e woodi ekkitinol, nden goɗɗo e waɗiray do'aare ɗemngal ngal ɗum andaa, goɗɗo hokkay ma'ana ɗemngal ngal. Ɗum fuu ɗum waɗee ngam sembiɗinki kawtal tokkuɓe Yeesu.
46014027	To woɓɓe e ngaɗira do'aare ɗemngal ngal ɗum andaa, to' ɓe ɓura ɗiɗo koo tato. E haani ɓe meta go'o‑go'o, ɗonmaa doole goɗɗo hokka ma'ana ko ɓe mbi'ata.
46014028	Ammaa to walaa kokkoowo ma'ana ko ɓe mbi'ata, e haani ɓe nde''ita nder kawtal tokkuɓe Yeesu, ɓe metana Allah nder ɓernde maɓɓe.
46014029	Gaɗooɓe annabaaku maa, to' ɓe ɓura ɗiɗo koo tato. E haani ɓe meta go'o‑go'o, nden kettindaniiɓeɓe poonda ko ɓe mbi'ata e hakkiilo.
46014030	To e woodi ko Allah wanginani goɗɗo nder kettindantooɓe ɓen, sey metoowo arandeejo on de''ita.
46014031	On fuu on mbaaway ngaɗon annabaaku go'oto‑go'oto ngam koo moye ekkitoo heɓa ko sembiɗintamo.
46014032	Gaɗooɓe annabaaku e haani ɓe mbaawana ko'e maɓɓe.
46014033	Ngam Allah naa' o Allah gaddoowo jiiɓaare, ammaa o gaddoowo jam. To tokkuɓe Yeesu kawritii nder kawtal maɓɓe,
46014034	e haani rewɓe nde''ita. Ɗum jaɓaayi ɓe meta, ammaa ɓe njooɗoo ley laamu worɓe no Attawra wi'i.
46014035	To e woodi goɗɗum ɗum ɓe ngiɗi ɓe anda, ɓe ƴama worɓe maɓɓe to wuro. Ngam ɗum cemtiniiɗum debbo meta nder tokkuɓe Yeesu carel ko ɓe kawriti ngam mawninki Allah.
46014036	Too, to mooɗon Wolde Allah fuɗɗiri, koo to mooɗon tan nde yahi?
46014037	To goɗɗo e kammii o annabiijo, koo o keɓuɗo dokkal Ruuhu Allah, e haani o anda ɗu'um ɗum mbindanaymi'on to Joomiraawo ɗum ƴiwoyi.
46014038	Ammaa to o wanyii ɗum non, kanko maa sey o wanyee.
46014039	Ngam non, bandiraaɓe am, ngiɗee waɗuki annabaaku, to' on karmin waɗirki do'aare ɗemɗe ɗe ɗum andaa.
46014040	Sey koo ɗume waɗee no haani e laawol bongol.
46015001	Jooni bandiraaɓe am, e mi yiɗi mi siftorana'on Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinanmi'on, ɗum njaɓuɗon, ɗum tokkoton boɗɗum.
46015002	Barka maajum on kisii, to on njogake boɗɗum wa'aju ɗum nga'ajinanmi'on. To naa' non, on koolii Yeesu e meere.
46015003	Mi waddanii'on fii ɓurɗum daraja ɗum keɓumi. Kanjum woni Almasiihu maayii ngam hakke meeɗen non no goɗɗe aayaaje mbi'i,
46015004	o uwaama, o umminaama daga mayde nyalnde tatawre non no goɗɗe aayaaje mbi'i,
46015005	o wangani Biiturus, nden o wanganii lilaaɓe maako sappo e ɗiɗo.
46015006	Gaɗa ɗon o wanganii tokkuɓemo ɓurɓe 500 e carel go'o. Ɗuɗɓe maɓɓe haa jooni e ɓe foofa, ammaa woɓɓe maayii.
46015007	Ɗonmaa o wanganii Yaakubu, nden fuu lilaaɓe maako.
46015008	Gaɗa maajum fuu, min maa, o wanganiiyam, koo nde e mi nandi e ɓingel danyaangel ko carel danyukingel waɗa.
46015009	Ngam min woni ɓurɗo famɗuki nder lilaaɓe maako. Mi hewtaayi maa mi noddee lilaaɗo maako, ngam mi torrii kawtal yimɓe Allah.
46015010	Ammaa ngam yidde nde Allah holliyam mi wartii ko ngonmi hande, nden yidde nde o holliyam wartaayi meere. Mi ɓurii koo moye lilaaɗo huwuki, koo nde naa' ɗum min huwata, ɗum yidde Allah gondunde e am huwata.
46015011	Too, walaa feerootirol koo to min wa'ajinani'on, koo to lilaaɓe horiiɓe nga'ajinani'on. Ko min nga'ajinta ɗum go'o; kanjum boo njaɓuɗon.
46015012	Too, to e ɗum wa'ajina wiiki Almasiihu umminaama daga mayde, no waɗata woɓɓe mooɗon e mbi'a mayɓe ummataako?
46015013	Daa mayɓe ummataako daga mayde, too, daa Almasiihu umminaaka daga mayde won ɗon.
46015014	To boo Almasiihu ummaaki daga mayde, too, wa'ajinki amin wartii meere, nden hoolaare mooɗon wartii meere.
46015015	Ko ɓuri non woni, min ngartii ceydu'en fewooɓe dow Allah. Ngam min mbi'ii Allah umminii Almasiihu daga mayde. Ammaa daa ɗum goonga mayɓe ummintaake, daa Allah umminaayimo.
46015016	Ngam daa ɗum ummintaa mayɓe, too, daa Almasiihu maa umminaaka daga mayde won ɗon.
46015017	Daa Almasiihu umminaaka, too, hoolaare mooɗon wartii meere, nden haa jooni on ngondi e hakke mooɗon,
46015018	nden mayɓe e koolii Almasiihu kalkii won ɗon.
46015019	To ni ngam jonde duuniyaaru ndu'u tan ngaɗeten kammunde dow Almasiihu, en ɓurii koo moye wartuki ɓe ɗum yurminanta.
46015020	Ammaa goonga Almasiihu umminaama daga mayde. Kanko woni artuɗo ummaaki daga nder ɓe ɗum umminta daga mayde.
46015021	Nde mayde warii laawol neɗɗo go'oto, non maa ummaaki mayɓe daga mayde warii laawol neɗɗo go'oto.
46015022	No yimɓe fuu mayrata ngam sumpo e Aadamu, non maa fuu gooduɓe sumpo e Almasiihu keɓay yonki ki re'ataa.
46015023	Ammaa raa no ummaaki mayɓe wa'ata. Arande Almasiihu umminaama daga mayde, nden nyalnde nde o wartoyi ɗum umminay fuu yimɓe maako daga mayde.
46015024	Nden gaɗa o heɓii jaalorgal dow koo moye laamiiɗo, e koo ɗume laamu ginni, e koo ɗeye bawɗe, re'irde duuniyaaru waray, nden o hokkita Allah Nyaako Mo Dow laamu.
46015025	Ngam doole Almasiihu laamoo naa Allah yowiimo dow wanywanyɓe maako fuu.
46015026	Ganyo kalketeeɗo gaɗa koo ɗume, kanko woni mayde.
46015027	Ngam aayaare wi'ii, “Allah wartirii koo ɗume ley laamu Almasiihu.” Ammaa nde ɗum wi'i, “Koo ɗume wartiraama ley laamu Almasiihu,” too, e njayri ɗum woni ɗu'um hawtaayi e on ɗon gartirɗo koo ɗume ley laamu Almasiihu.
46015028	Gaɗa Allah waɗii koo ɗume ley laamu Ɓiɗɗo maako, sey Ɓiɗɗo on warta ley Laamu Allah gartirɗo koo ɗume ley laamu Ɓiɗɗo on, ngam Allah tan warta laamiiɗo koo ɗume koo toye.
46015029	Too, to mayɓe ummataako daga mayde, ɗume gaɗanaaɓe baptisma ngam mayɓe ngaɗata? To ɗum umminaayi mayɓe koo seɗɗa, ngam ɗume ɗum waɗanta yimɓe baptisma ngam maɓɓe?
46015030	Nden ngam ɗume min coorata yonki amin koo ndeye?
46015031	Goonga bandiraaɓe, mantoraaki ki mantortoomi'on nder sumpootirki e Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen waɗi koo ndeye nyalnde e mi haade mayde.
46015032	To mi haɓdii e yimɓe gooduɓe ngikku bo ɗum marle ladde nder gariiri Aafisa ngam heɓuki fii duuniyaaru ndu'u tan, ɗume ɓeydoriimi? To mayɓe ummintaake daga mayde, sey ngaɗen ko ɗum wi'unoo, “En nyaamu, en njaru, ngam jaango en maayay.”
46015033	To' on njaɓu ɗum majjina'on. “Jooɗodaaki e gooduɓe ngikku kalluɗum wonnay ngikku boɗɗum.”
46015034	Ngartee nder hakkiilo mooɗon no haani, alee waɗuki hakke, ngam e woodi woɓɓe mooɗon ɓe ngalaa andal dow Allah. Mi wi'u non ngam cemton.
46015035	Goɗɗo ƴamay wi'a, “No mayɓe umminirtee daga mayde? E iri nduye ɓandu ɓe ummodortoo?”
46015036	An kaaŋaaɗo! Taa aawii gabbel, ngel fuɗataa naa ngel waatii.
46015037	Ko aawuɗaa fuu, koo gabbel alkamaari, koo wongel gabbel feere, ko fuɗi nandataa e ko aawuɗaa.
46015038	Ammaa Allah e hokka ko fuɗi nandi feere non no o suɓiri. Koo iri ngele gabbel e iri nandi ɗum ngel fuɗirta.
46015039	Naa' fuu ɓalli ngoni nanduɗi. Ɓalli yimɓe feere, ɓalli marle feere, ɓalli colli feere, ɓalli liƴƴi feere.
46015040	Koo ɗume gonɗum e dow e woodi no ɗum wa'i. Non maa koo ɗume gonɗum nder duuniyaaru e woodi no ɗum wa'i. Gonɗum e dow wooɗuki maajum e feerootiri e wooɗuki fii gonɗum nder duuniyaaru.
46015041	Naange no ɗelkitirta feere, lewru no ɗelkitirta feere, koode no ɗelkitirta feere, nden koode e feerootiri koo ndeye hoodere e no nde ɗelkitortoo.
46015042	Non ummaaki mayɓe wa'i. Ɓandu uwaandu ndu nyolayndu, to ndu umminaama ndu nyolataa.
46015043	Ɓandu uwaandu wooɗaa yiiki, ndu walaa sembe, to ndu umminaama, ndu wartay wooɗundu yiiki, goodundu bawɗe.
46015044	Ɓandu uwaandu kayru huutirtee nder duuniyaaru ndu'u, ammaa ɓandu umminteendu, kayru huutinirtee e ton dow. Nde e woodi ɓandu kuutirteendu nder duuniyaaru, non maa e woodi ɓandu kuutirteendu ton dow.
46015045	Ngam, non no ɗum windiraa, “Neɗɗo arandeejo, waato Aadamu, o wartii gooduɗo yonki.” Ammaa Aadamu cakitiiɗo, waato Almasiihu, o heɓii ɓandu kuutirteendu ton dow, o wartii kokkoowo yonki ki re'ataa.
46015046	Naa' ɓandu kuutirteendu ton dow ɗum artata heɓuki, ammaa kuutirteendu nder duuniyaaru ɗum artata heɓuki, nden ɗum heɓa kuutirteendu ton dow.
46015047	Neɗɗo arandeejo mbulmbuldi o tagiraa, nden neɗɗo ɗiɗaɓo boo, daga dow o ƴiwoyi.
46015048	Yimɓe duuniyaaru e ngoodi ɓandu iri ndu Aadamu tagiraaɗo mbulmbuldi. Jahayɓe ton dow boo, ɓe keɓay ɓandu iri ndu on ɗon ƴiwoyɗo daga ton dow, waato Almasiihu.
46015049	Non no ngoodirɗen nandi on ɗon tagiraaɗo mbulmbuldi, non maa en keɓay nandi on ɗon ƴiwoyɗo daga dow.
46015050	Bandiraaɓe, e mi wi'a'on, ɓandu goodundu kusel e ƴiiƴam nattataa nder wuro Allah ton dow. Ɓandu nyolayndu nattataa wuro Allah tabitayngo.
46015051	Ndaree mi wi'a'on goɗɗum sirru: Naa' en fuu maayata, ammaa en fuu ɗum waylitanay'en ɓalli
46015052	ɗon e ɗon, bo maƴƴuki hitere, to ɗum duudii luwal cakitiingal. Ngam to luwal ngal duudaama, mayɓe ummodoto e ɓalli ɗi nyolataa, nden enen foofooɓe ɗum waylitay ɓalli meeɗen.
46015053	Ngam doole ndu'u ɓandu maayayndu nyolayndu wartiree ɓandu ndu maayataa ndu nyolataa.
46015054	Carel ngel ɓandu maayayndu nyolayndu wartiraa ɓandu ndu maayataa ndu nyolataa, ko aayaare wi'i ɗum heeway, waato, “Ɗum heɓii jaalorgal dow mayde!”
46015055	“Mayde, to jaalorgal maaɗa? Mayde, to tooke maaɗa?”
46015056	Ngam hakke woni tooke pooɗayɗe mayde, nden bawɗe hakke to Attawra ƴiwi.
46015057	Ammaa yettoore tabbita to Allah kokkuɗo'en jaalorgal barka Yeesu Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46015058	Ngam non, bandiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗumi, ndaree boɗɗum, to' goɗɗum dimba'on. Koo ndeye ngaɗee ko mbaawoton waɗuki kuwon kuugal Joomiraawo, ngam on andi kuugal ngal kuwantonmo naa' e meere ngal woni.
46016001	Too, jooni dow hawrutuki ceede ngam walluki yimɓe Allah gonɓe Urucaliima, ngaɗee ko mbiimi tokkuɓe Yeesu ɓe Galaatiya ngaɗa.
46016002	Koo ndeye nyalnde arandeere nde yontoore, koo moye mooɗon resa goɗɗum nder ko heɓii keerol no waawata. Nden to' on alu naa mi warii puɗɗon hawrutuki ceede ɗen.
46016003	To mi yottake to mooɗon, mi hokkay yimɓe ɓe cuɓuɗon ɗereeji kollayɗi on cuɓiiɓe ɓe njaara ballal mooɗon Urucaliima.
46016004	To e haani min maa mi yaha, sey ɓe njaada e am.
46016005	Mi waray to mooɗon gaɗa mi yahii leydi Makidooniya, ngam mi suɓii yaaki Makidooniya.
46016006	Ɗum gaɗotooɗum mi jooɗoo to mooɗon carel seɗɗa, koo maa mi ruuma, ngam mballonyam mi yaha fuu to njahaymi.
46016007	Mi yiɗaa mi yaala to mooɗon tan mi ƴaɓɓoo, ngam e mi yiɗi mi neeɓida e mooɗon to Joomiraawo jaɓii.
46016008	Ammaa mi jooɗoto to gariiri Aafisa naa Humto Ɓendol Alkamaari,
46016009	ngam mi heɓii laawol huwuki kuugal mangal, nden e woodi ɗuɗɓe ganyuɓeyam.
46016010	To Timooti warii to mooɗon, tabbitinon o wedditake nder mooɗon, ngam kanko maa o kuwanoowo Joomiraawo bo am.
46016011	Ngam non, to' goɗɗo yawanamo. Mballeemo nder yaadu maako, njaɓɓootiron jam e jam, o wartoya to am. Min e woɓɓe bandiraaɓe e min ndenti gartol maako.
46016012	Jooni dow bandiraawo meeɗen Afoolos, mi torakemo naa' seɗɗa o wara to mooɗon kanko e woɓɓe bandiraaɓe, ammaa o yiɗaa yaadu ndun jooni. O waray to mooɗon to o heɓii laawol.
46016013	Njooɗee on paama, ndaree boɗɗum dow hoolaare mooɗon, ngaɗon ngorgu, cembiɗee.
46016014	Fuu ko ngaɗoton, ngaɗeeɗum nder yidde.
46016015	Bandiraaɓe, on andi nder leydi Akaaya yimɓe wuro Istifaanus arti wartuki tokkuɓe Yeesu, nden ɓe kokkii ko'e maɓɓe ngam walluki yimɓe Allah.
46016016	E mi toroo'on kokkee iri ɓen ɗon yimɓe mangu hawti e fuu yimɓe ɓe min kuwidi min piidi nder kuugal.
46016017	Mi nanii belɗum waroyki Istifaanus, e Fartunaatus, e Akaykus, ngam ɗum wartaniiyam bo onon ngari to am,
46016018	ngam ɓe mbaltinii ɓernde am e ɓerɗe mooɗon onon maa. Ngam non, kokkee iri ɓen ɗon yimɓe mangu.
46016019	Tokkuɓe Yeesu wonɓe leydi Aasiya e kowna'on. Akiila, e Biriskila, e tokkuɓe Yeesu kawritooɓe e wuro maɓɓe e ɓe kowna'on boɗɗum nder inde Joomiraawo.
46016020	Fuu bandiraaɓe gonɓe ɗo'o e kowna'on. Kownindiree hownirki higaaku ceniiki.
46016021	Min Bulus windi kownol ngo'ol e jungo am.
46016022	Fuu mo yiɗaa Joomiraawo, Allah laanamo. Yaa Joomiraawo amin, waroy!
46016023	Yeesu Joomiraawo barkiɗina'on.
46016024	E mi yiɗi'on on fuu ngam sumpootirki meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiihu.
47001001	Min Bulus mo Allah suɓi warta lilaaɗo Yeesu Almasiihu e bandiraawo meeɗen Timooti minon mbindi ɗerewol ngo'ol. Min mbindanngol kawtal yimɓe Allah gonɓe gariiri Korinti, e fuu yimɓe Allah gonɓe nder fuu leydi Akaaya.
47001002	Allah Nyaako meeɗen e Joomiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu barkiɗina'on hokka'on jam.
47001003	Yettoore tabbita to Allah, Nyaako Joomiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu. Kanko woni Nyaako mo yurmeende, Allah baltinayɗo ɓerɗe.
47001004	E mo waltina ɓerɗe meeɗen nder fuu torraaji ɗi njareten, ngam enen maa mbaltinen ɓerɗe wonɓe nder koo iri kaye torra. En mbaltinay ɓerɗe maɓɓe e iri waltinki ki o waltini ɓerɗe meeɗen.
47001005	Non no njardeten torra naa' seɗɗa iri ka Almasiihu yari, non maa barka Almasiihu ɗum waltinay ɓerɗe meeɗen naa' seɗɗa.
47001006	To min torraama, min torra ngam ɗum waltina ɓerɗe mooɗon nden ngam kisndam mooɗon. To boo Allah waltinii ɓerɗe amin, o waltinɗe ngam minon maa min mbaltina ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam keɓon sembe munyon nder torraaji ɗi njaroton iri ɗi min njarata.
47001007	Min tabbitinii, e min andi non no njardoton torra iri ka min njari, non maa ɓerɗe mooɗon mbaltoto iri waltaaki ɓernde ki min keɓi.
47001008	Bandiraaɓe, e min ngiɗi andon iri torra ka min njari nder leydi Aasiya. Min nattii torra kalluka ɓurka sembe amin haa min ittii kammunde yonki amin.
47001009	Nder ɓerɗe amin min nanii bo kiita mayde min taƴanaa, ammaa non waɗii ngam to' min kooloo ko'e amin, ammaa min kooloo Allah umminoowo mayɓe.
47001010	Kanko hisnimin daga mayde kallunde, o nyamray yeeso e hisnukimin. Dow maako min ngaɗi kammunde o hisnaymin kadin.
47001011	Onon maa mballireemin do'aare, sey Allah barkiɗinaymin, nden ɗuɗɓe ngettamo ngam amin.
47001012	Ko min mantortoo woni ɓerɗe amin e tabbitinanamin min ngaɗii jonde nder duuniyaaru nder senaaki e goonga ƴiwoyɗum to Allah, hakko maa nder mooɗon. Min njooɗori non naa' dow andal iri ngal yimɓe duuniyaaru, ammaa yidde Allah wallimin.
47001013	Nder ɗereeji amin min mbindanaayi'on goɗɗum ɗum on mbaawataa janguki koo faamuki.
47001014	Jooni seɗɗa tan paamuɗonmin, ammaa yeeso ɗo'o e mi yiɗi paamonmin boɗɗum, ngam nyalnde nde Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen wartoyta mbaawon mantorooɗonmin non no minon maa min mbaawirta mantoraaki'on.
47001015	Nde mi tabbitinii ɗu'um, mi yiɗiino warki to mooɗon arande ngam keɓon barka nde ɗiɗi.
47001016	E mi yiɗunoo dow laawol am yaaki Makidooniya, mi yaala to mooɗon, nden gaɗa mi yahii Makidooniya, mi so''oyto to mooɗon, ngam mballonyam nder yaadu am yaaki leydi Yahuudiya.
47001017	Nde mi heɓaayi ngaɗumi yaadu ndun, e yiiki mooɗon mi waɗii ɓerɗe ɗiɗi nde ciryinoomi waɗuki yaadu ndun? Koo e yiiki mooɗon e mi siryoo yaadu am no yimɓe duuniyaaru ngaɗata, wi'ooɓe “Ee” puɗɗita mbi'a “Aa'a?”
47001018	Allah o gaɗoowo ko o wi'i, o ceyduujo amin, min mbi'ataa “Ee” e “Aa'a” carel go'o.
47001019	Ngam habaru Ɓiɗɗo Allah, waato Yeesu Almasiihu, mo min nga'ajinani'on, min e Siila e Timooti, naa' ɗum “Ee” e “Aa'a,” ammaa kanko koo ndeye “Ee” maako ɗum “Ee.”
47001020	Ngam Almasiihu hebbinii koo ngale alkawal ngal Allah waɗi. Kanjum waɗi mbi'eten “Aamin” laawol maako ngam teddinki Allah.
47001021	Ngam Allah woni gaɗuɗo'en ndariiɗen boɗɗum nder sumpootirki meeɗen e Yeesu Almasiihu. Kanko suɓi'en,
47001022	o waɗanii'en alaama maako kolluɗum enen ɗum ɓe maako. O hokkii'en Ruuhu maako nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, ngam ɗum tabbitinana'en ko o hokkata'en yeeso ɗo'o.
47001023	Allah woni ceyduujo am to mi feway, mi yiɗaa mi waɗa'on nanon ciya belɗum, kanjum haɗiyam so''aaki Korinti.
47001024	Min ngiɗaa min kolla'on laamu sembe dow hoolaare mooɗon. Minon min kuudooɓe e mooɗon ngam nanon belɗum nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam on ndarake boɗɗum dow ko kooliiɗon.
47002001	Ngam maajum cuɓumi to' mi wara to mooɗon mi waɗa'on nanon ciya belɗum.
47002002	Ngam to mi waɗii on nanii ciya belɗum, moye welnantayam ɓernde to naa' onon ɓe ngaɗumi nani ciya belɗum?
47002003	Ko mbindanmi'on nder ɗerewol am arandewol, mi winduɗum ngam to mi warii to mooɗon to' onon kaanuɓe mbelnanayam ɓernde ngaɗonyam mi nana ciya belɗum. Ngam mi tabbitinii to mi nanii belɗum, on fuu on nanay belɗum.
47002004	Ko mbindanmi'on, mi winduɗum nder nawɗum ɓernde e wannaare e gonɗi ɗuɗɗi naa' ngam mi mettinana'on ɓerɗe, sey ni ngam mi waɗa'on andon iri yidde luggunde nde ngiɗumi'on.
47002005	Too, to goɗɗo waddii ko mettini ɓernde, naa' min tan o mettinani ɓernde, on fuu o mettinani ɓerɗe. Mi wi'u non, ammaa mi yiɗaa mi haɓanamo ko ɓuri no haani.
47002006	Haɓanki ki ɗuɗɓe mooɗon kaɓanimo heƴii.
47002007	Ammaa jooni e haani njaafanooɗonmo cembiɗinonmo ngam to' nawɗum ɓernde maako ɓura sembe maako.
47002008	Ngam non, e mi toroo'on, kolleemo haa jooni on ngiɗimo.
47002009	Mi windan'on ngol ton ɗerewol ngam mi foonda'on mi yi'a koo on ngaɗay ko mbiimi'on nder koo ɗume.
47002010	Fuu mo njaafaniiɗon, min maa mi yaafanakemo. Ko njaafiimi, to e woodi ko haani maa mi yaafoo, mi yaafiɗum ngam mooɗon yeeso Almasiihu.
47002011	Mi waɗu non ngam to' Ceyɗan ƴoyra'en, ngam en andi nyumo maako boɗɗum.
47002012	Nde njaami Tooruwas ngam mi wa'ajina Habaru Belɗum ɗum Almasiihu, Joomiraawo maɓɓitaniiyam laawol kuugal ɗon.
47002013	Ammaa mi wannii naa' seɗɗa ngam mi tawaayi Tiitus bandiraawo meeɗen ton. Ngam non, sey njaɓɓootirmi e maɓɓe njaami Makidooniya.
47002014	Ammaa yettoore tabbita to Allah kokkoowo'en jaalorgal koo ndeye barka sumpootirki meeɗen e Almasiihu. Laawol meeɗen o sankitii habaru Almasiihu koo toye bo urngol belngol.
47002015	Ngam enen ngoni bo urngol urde welnde nde Almasiihu hokki Allah. Urngol urde nden yottake kisnaaɓe e gonɓe dow laawol halkere.
47002016	To gonɓe dow laawol halkuki urngol ngol ɗum urngol mayde. Ammaa to kisnaaɓe urngol ngol ɗum urngol gaddanoowolɓe yonki. E woodi potuɗo huwuki kuugal nga'al?
47002017	Min nga'ajintaa Wolde Allah ngam min keɓa ceede no ɗuɗɓe ngaɗata. Ammaa e min meta goonga yeeso Allah, ngam Almasiihu jeyimin, nden Allah liloyimin.
47003001	Too, on kammii min puɗɗii mantuki ko'e amin kadin? Koo boo ɗum doole min ngarda e ɗereeji kollayɗi minon min ɓeye, koo ƴiwuɗi to mooɗon ngam kolla woɓɓe min ɓeye no woɓɓe ngaɗata?
47003002	Onon e ko'e mooɗon ngoni ɗerewol amin bindaangol nder ɓerɗe amin. Koo moye waaway jangangol andangol.
47003003	On kollii onon ngoni ɗerewol ngol Almasiihu windi, ngol o lildi laawol amin. Naa' e dawaaru ngol windiraa, ammaa e Ruuhu Allah gooduɗo yonki ngol windiraa. Naa' dow allowal hayre ngol windaa, ammaa dow allowal ɓerɗe yimɓe ngol windaa.
47003004	Min mbi'u non ngam e min koolii Allah laawol Almasiihu.
47003005	Min keƴaayi min mbi'a min mbaaway waɗuki koo ɗume e bawɗe amin, ammaa bawɗe amin to Allah ƴiwoyi.
47003006	Kanko waɗi min mbaawi wartuki ekkitinooɓe Alkawal Kesal. Alkawal ngal boo daraaki dow dooka bindaaɗum, ammaa dow Ruuhu maako ngal dari. Ngam dooka bindaaɗum e fooɗa mayde, ammaa Ruuhu e hokka yonki ki re'ataa.
47003007	Ɗum windi dooka Muusa dow allooje hayre, nden carel ko Muusa hokketeeɗum, teddungal Allah wangi waɗi yeeso maako e ɗelkitoo. Koo nde ɗelkitaaki kin e ustoo, fuu e non Israa'iilanko'en mbaawaayi sutaaki yeeso maako. To dooka gaddayɗum mayde wardii e iri nga'al teddungal,
47003008	too, kuugal Ruuhu Allah ɓuray non teddungal!
47003009	To ko fooɗata kiita e woodi teddungal, too, ko waɗata yimɓe keɓa aadilaaku Allah ɓuray non teddungal naa' seɗɗa!
47003010	Goonga, teddungal alkawal kiingal walaa mangu jooni to ngal hawtaama e teddungal alkawal kesal.
47003011	To ƴaɓɓotooɗum wardii e teddungal, too, alkawal kesal tabitayngal ɓuray non teddungal naa' seɗɗa!
47003012	Ngam non, nde e min ngoodi iri nde'e kammunde, e min metira sembe ɓernde naa' seɗɗa.
47003013	Minon naa' bo Muusa min mba'i, cuddirɗo yeeso maako e lefel, ngam to' Israa'iilanko'en cutoomo ngi'a no ɗelkitol yeeso maako ustortoo.
47003014	Ammaa ɓe ndullii faamu, ngam haa hande to ɓe njanganaama alkawal kiingal, lefel ngel e haɗaɓe ɓe paama goonga, ngam sumpootirki e Almasiihu tan ittatangel.
47003015	Goonga, haa jooni to ɓe njanganaama Attawra, lefel ngel e wumna ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
47003016	Ammaa to neɗɗo tuubii tokkii Joomiraawo, ɗum ittay lefel ngel daga ɓernde maako.
47003017	Too, Joomiraawo on woni Ruuhu Allah, nden to Ruuhu Allah woni ɗon rimɗineeki woni.
47003018	Enen ɓe geece mu''en cudditaa en fuu en kolla teddungal Joomiraawo en ɓeyda wartuki bo maako. Teddungal ngal waɗay ka ɓeydaaki. Ɗu'um ɗum kuugal Joomiraawo, kanko woni Ruuhu.
47004001	Ngam non, nde Allah yurminaniimin hokkiimin kuugal nga'al, min ittataa kammunde.
47004002	Min nganyii huwuki kuuɗe cuuɗiiɗe cemtiniiɗe. Min majjintaa yimɓe, min ngaylitataa ma'ana Wolde Allah. Ammaa e min mbi'a goonga e njayri. Laawol waɗuki non, koo moye anday nder ɓernde muuɗum yeeso Allah minon e min ngoodi goonga.
47004003	To Habaru Belɗum ɗum min nga'ajinta e suuɗii, wonɓe dow laawol halkere tan ɗum suuɗanii.
47004004	Ceyɗan laamiiɗo duuniyaaru ndu'u wumnii ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓe koolaaki Yeesu, ngam to' ɓe ngi'a jayngol Habaru Belɗum ɗum teddungal Almasiihu nanduɗo e Allah.
47004005	Ngam naa' habaru amin min nga'ajinta, ammaa ko min nga'ajinta woni Yeesu Almasiihu o Joomiraawo, minon boo ngam maako min ngarti maccuɓe mooɗon.
47004006	Ngam Allah biiɗo jayngol wurtoyoo daga nder nyiwre, kanko waɗi jayngol maako yeynii nder ɓerɗe amin ngam min anda teddungal Allah ngal ɗum yi'ii e yeeso Yeesu Almasiihu.
47004007	Ammaa minon e min nandi e gojiije loope. Ɗum resii jawdi nder amin ngam holluki ɗe'e bawɗe ɓurɗe koo ɗeye bawɗe, to Allah ɗe ƴiwoyi, naa' to amin.
47004008	Min ɓiɗɗaama e koo nduye wuttudu, ammaa min pusaayi. Nyumooji amin njiiɓake, ammaa min ittaayi kammunde.
47004009	E min torree, ammaa Allah sendiraayi e amin. E min ndo''ee, ammaa min kalkaaka.
47004010	Koo ndeye e min haade wareeki no ɗum wariri Yeesu, ngam yonki iri ki maako yi'ee nder ɓalli amin.
47004011	Ngam minon gooduɓe yonki e min haade mayde koo ndeye ngam Yeesu, ngam ɗum yi'a yonki maako nder ɓalli amin ɗi'i maayayɗi.
47004012	Kanjum waɗi min keddi to mayde, ngam onon keɓon yonki.
47004013	Nde e min ngoodi hoolaare go'o e binduɗo aayaare biinde, “Mi hoolake, kanjum waɗi metumi.” Minon maa min koolake, kanjum waɗi min meti.
47004014	Ngam e min andi Allah umminɗo Yeesu Joomiraawo meeɗen daga mayde, o umminaymin minon maa non no o umminiri Yeesu, o waddamin hawti e mooɗon yeeso maako.
47004015	Fuu ɗu'um ɗum ngam ɓeydaari mooɗon, ngam caahu Allah jottotooɗum yimɓe ɗuɗɓe, waɗa ɗum ɓeyda yettuki Allah ngam teddinkimo.
47004016	Ngam non, min ittataa kammunde. Koo nde ɓalli amin e ɓeyda tampuki, fuu e non ɓerɗe amin e cembiɗinee koo ndeye.
47004017	Ngam torraaji ɗi min torretee jooni ɗi seɗɗanaaji ɗi neeɓataa ɗi ngaɗay min keɓa teddungal ngal haa abadaa ɓurngal koo ɗume.
47004018	Ngam non, hakkiilo amin walaa dow ko gite ngi'ata. E min ngaɗa hakkiilo amin dow ko gite mbaawataa yiiki. Ngam ko gite ngi'ata ɗum ƴaɓɓotooɗum, ammaa ko gite mbaawataa yiiki, ɗum tabitayɗum.
47005001	Ngam e min andi ɓalli amin e nandi e lukuru ɗum min njooɗotoo nder, nder duuniyaaru ndu'u. To lukuru ɗum sankitaama, e min andi Allah hokkaymin wuro tabitayngo ton dow, ngo mahiraaka e jungo neɗɗo.
47005002	Jooni e min otta e min kaaɓii naa' seɗɗa ngam ɗum ɓornamin ɓandu amin ndu dow.
47005003	Ngam to min ɓornaama ɓandu ndun, min ngartataa yonkiiji ɗi ngalaa ɓandu.
47005004	Nge'el carel ngel min ngondi nder lukuru ɗum duuniyaaru, waato ɓandu amin, e min otta ngam torraaji ɗi ɓandu ndun yarata. Naa' ngam e min ngiɗi sendirki e ɓandu ndun, ammaa e min ngiɗi ɗum ɓornamin ɓandu amin ndu dow, ngam ɓandu ndu maayataa hocca njayri ɓandu maayayndu.
47005005	Allah e hoore muuɗum siryiimin ngam ɗu'um, o hokkiimin Ruuhu maako ngam tabbitinankimin ko o waɗantamin yeeso ɗo'o.
47005006	Kanjum waɗi koo ndeye e min ngoodi sembe ɓernde. E min andi to ni e min nder ɓandu amin ndu'u, e min ngoɗɗitii wuro amin wongo to Joomiraawo.
47005007	E min ngaɗa jonde amin dow hoolaaki Allah, naa' dow ko min ngi'ata e gite.
47005008	Goonga e min ngoodi sembe ɓernde, nden min ɓurii yiɗuki min cendira e ndu'u ɓandu min njooɗodoo e Joomiraawo ton dow.
47005009	Ngam non, ko min ngiɗi woni min mbelnanamo ɓernde, koo e min nder ndu'u ɓandu koo e ton dow.
47005010	Ngam en fuu doole en ndaroto yeeso Almasiihu ngam kiita, ngam koo moye heɓa mbarjaari ko waɗi nder ɓandu ndu'u, koo ko o waɗi e wooɗi koo ɗum wooɗaa.
47005011	Nde e min andi ko woni kulol Joomiraawo, kanjum waɗi e min ngaɗa ko min mbaawata waɗuki min pooɗoya hakkiilo yimɓe. Allah e andi no min ngontindiri boɗɗum, e mi kammoo onon maa on andimin boɗɗum nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
47005012	Naa' e min ngiɗi min mana ko'e amin yeeso mooɗon, ammaa e min ngiɗi min kokka'on laawol mantoraakimin, ngam mbaawon nootooɗon ƴamɗe ƴeftooɓe ko'e dow mangu maɓɓe naa' dow ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
47005013	To yimɓe kocciimin min haaŋaaɓe, fuu ɗum ngam Allah. To boo e min nder hakkiilo amin, ɗum ngam mooɗon.
47005014	Ngam yidde Almasiihu waɗatamin e min kuwa kuuɗe amin, ngam en tabbitinii go'oto maayii ngam koo moye, ngam non koo moye maayii.
47005015	O maayii ngam yimɓe fuu, ngam to' ɓe ngaɗa jonde belnanayndeɓe ɓerɗe, ammaa ɓe ngaɗa jonde belnanaynde on ɗon mayɗo ngam maɓɓe ummii daga mayde.
47005016	Ngam non, daga jooni min koccataa goɗɗo no yimɓe duuniyaaru koccirimo. Koo nde ndenno min koccii Almasiihu no yimɓe duuniyaaru koccirimo, jooni naa' non min koccirimo.
47005017	Ngam non, fuu gartuɗo mo Almasiihu o wartii neɗɗo keso. Koo ɗume ɗum ndenno ƴaɓɓake, koo ɗume wartii kesum.
47005018	Ɗu'um fuu Allah waɗiɗum ciryootirɗomin e maako laawol Almasiihu, nden o hokkiimin kuugal wa'ajinki siryootirki yimɓe e maako.
47005019	Wa'aju ɗum woni Allah e siryootira yimɓe duuniyaaru e muuɗum laawol Almasiihu, nden o windataa hakke ɗum ɓe ngaɗi. Kanko hokkimin kuugal wa'ajinki siryootirki e maako.
47005020	Ngam non, min metooɓe ko Almasiihu wi'imin, bo Allah torotoo'on laawol amin. E min toroo'on ngam Almasiihu, ciryootiree e Allah.
47005021	Almasiihu meeɗaayi waɗuki hakke, ammaa Allah yowii fuu hakkeeji meeɗen dow maako, ngam laawol maako ngarten aadili'en yeeso Allah.
47006001	Minon, min kuudooɓe e Allah. Ngam maajum e min toroo'on to' on alu caahu Allah ɗum keɓuɗon warta meere.
47006002	Ngam Allah wi'ii, “Nde carel kaanungel waɗi, mi nanii do'aare maaɗa, nde nyalnde kisndam wari, mi walliima.” Raa, jooni woni carel kaanungel, jooni woni nyalnde kisndam!
47006003	Min ngiɗaa min ngaɗa ko waɗata goɗɗo feggoo dow laawol goonga, ngam to' ɗum heɓa ko ɗum huɗata nder kuugal amin.
47006004	Ammaa nder koo ɗume ko min ngaɗata, e min kolla min maccuɓe Allah ɓe goonga nder munyal mangal ngal min ngaɗata nder torra, e caɗeele, e ɓiɗɗaare.
47006005	Min piyaama, min curaama, ɗum umminii hawre dow amin, min kuwii naaki ɓalli amin mbaati, min mbaalii balɗe min ɗaanaaki, bannye min keɓataa ko min nyaamata.
47006006	Min kollii min maccuɓe Allah ɓe goonga nder laɓki ɓerɗe ki min ngoodi, e andal, e munyal, e no min mballirta yimɓe, e Ruuhu Allah ɗum min ngoodi, e yidde nde goonga,
47006007	e metuki goonga, e bawɗe Allah. Aadilaaku woni ko min konirta ɗum min njogii jungo nyaamo e nano.
47006008	E min kokkee mangu, e min cemtinee, e min kuɗee, e min manee. Min koccaama bo majjinooɓe yimɓe, ammaa min goonga'en.
47006009	Min koccaama bo ɗum andaamin, ammaa e ɗum andimin boɗɗum. Min koccaama bo mayɓe, ammaa e min poofa. E min piyee, ammaa min maayaayi.
47006010	E ɗum waɗa min nana ciya belɗum ɓernde, ammaa koo ndeye e min mbelmbelta. Min ngalanaa, ammaa min ngartirii ɗuɗɓe riskuɓe. Min koccaama bo koo ko min ngoodi, ammaa e min ngoodi koo ɗume.
47006011	Onon Korintiyanko'en, min metanii'on e njayri. Min maɓɓitanii'on ɓerɗe amin.
47006012	Naa' minon nganyi holluki'on yidde, ammaa onon nganyi hollukimin yidde.
47006013	Mi metanii'on no metiranaymi ɓiɓɓe am. E mi toroo'on, nde e min ngiɗi'on, onon maa maɓɓitaneemin ɓerɗe mooɗon.
47006014	To' on kawtu ko'e e yimɓe ɓe koolaaki Yeesu. Ko hawti aadilaaku e halleende? Koo boo, ngoye sumpo woni hakkunde jayngol e nyiwre?
47006015	Kiye siryootirki woni hakkunde Almasiihu e Ceyɗan? Koo boo, ko hawti tokkuɗo Yeesu e mo tokkaayi Yeesu?
47006016	Nden ko hawti wuro ceniingo ngo Allah e gunkiiji? Ɓalli meeɗen ngoni wuro ceniingo ngo Allah mo yonki. Ngam o wi'i, “Mi jooɗoto nder maɓɓe, mi yaada e maɓɓe. Mi wartay Allah maɓɓe, ɓe ngartay yimɓe am.”
47006017	Ɗonmaa o wi'i, “Ngam non, mburtoyee daga nder maɓɓe, kakkitee daga nder maɓɓe. To' on meemu ko laaɓaa, nden mi jaɓay'on.
47006018	Mi wartay Nyaako mooɗon, onon boo on ngartay ɓiɓɓe am worɓe e rewɓe. Non Joomiraawo Joomu Bawɗe wi'i.”
47007001	Too, bandiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗumi, nde en ngaɗanaama alkawal dow fuu ɗu'um, en laaɓin ko'e meeɗen daga koo ɗume gaɗoojum ɓalli meeɗen e ɓerɗe meeɗen ngarta ko laaɓaa yeeso Allah. En ngartu ɓe senaaki keewuki, kulooɓe Allah.
47007002	Kooleemin nder yidde. Min ngaɗanaayi goɗɗo ko wooɗaa, min majjinaayi goɗɗo, min ƴoyraayi goɗɗo ngam min njaɓanamo goɗɗum.
47007003	Mi wi'aayi haala ka'a ngam mi yowana'on goɗɗum ko wooɗaa. Mi wi'iino'on e min ngiɗi'on naa' seɗɗa nder ɓerɗe amin koo e min foofa koo nder mayde.
47007004	Mi hoolake'on ɓernde go'o, e mi mantoroo'on naa' seɗɗa, on cembiɗiniiyam naa' seɗɗa. Fuu e torraaji ɗi min njarata, welwelo am walaa keerol.
47007005	Ngam ko min ngari leydi Makidooniya, min keɓaayi siwtaare, ammaa koo toye to min ngaylitorii e min torree. Min ngeddootirii e woɓɓe, nder ɓerɗe amin kulol nangimin.
47007006	Ammaa Allah baltinoowo ɓerɗe gonɓe nder wannaare, o waltini ɓerɗe amin e garol Tiitus.
47007007	Naa' warki maako tan waltini ɓerɗe amin, ammaa habaru ɗum o hokkimin no mbaltinirɗon ɓernde maako. O wi'iimin no kaaɓirɗon ngi'onyam, e no ngannirɗon dow ko ngaɗanɗonyam, e no ngiɗirɗon wallukiyam. Kanjum ɓeydaniyam welweltuki.
47007008	Koo to ɗerewol ngol mbindanmi'on waɗii on nanii ciya belɗum, ɗum wannaayiyam jooni, koo nde ndenno mi wannii, ngam mi faamii ɗerewol ngol waɗii on nanii ciya belɗum ɓerɗe, koo nde ɗum carel seɗɗa tan.
47007009	Jooni e mi nana belɗum nder ɓernde am, naa' ngam on nanaayi belɗum, ammaa ngam ciya nanki belɗum mooɗon waɗi tuubuɗon. Ngam ciya nanki belɗum kin ɗum iri ki Allah yiɗi. Ngam non min ngaɗanaayi'on ko wooɗaa.
47007010	Ngam ciya nanki belɗum iri ki Allah yiɗi e waɗa neɗɗo tuuba heɓa kisndam. Ki waɗataa o wi'a, “Daa e mi andunoo,” ammaa ciya nanki belɗum iri ki duuniyaaru e fooɗa mayde.
47007011	Ndaaree ngi'on ko ciya nanki belɗum mooɗon waddani'on, ki waɗii'on on ngartii tiiɗuɓe, on ngartii kaaɓuɓe kolla onon naa' on gaɗooɓe ko wooɗaa, on ɓernii dow ko wooɗaa, on kultorii, on kaaɓii ngi'onyam, on ngiɗii wallukiyam, on kaaɓii ngi'on ɗum taƴanii gaɗoowo hakke kiita. On kollii on ngaɗii ko haani dow ko mbindannoomi'on.
47007012	Ngam non, koo nde mi windaniino'on ɗerewol, naa' ngam neɗɗo gaɗuɗo ko wooɗaa mbindumingol, koo ngam neɗɗo gaɗanaaɗo ko wooɗaa, ammaa mi windungol ngam ngi'anon gite mooɗon no ngirruɗonmin yeeso Allah.
47007013	Kanjum waltini ɓerɗe amin. Ko ɓuri non, welwelo ngo Tiitus nani mbelnaniimin ɓerɗe, ngam on fuu on mbelnaniimo ɓernde.
47007014	Mi mantorake'on yeeso Tiitus, onon boo on cemtinaayiyam. Non no koo ɗume ɗum min mbi'i'on ɗum goonga, non maa mantoraaki ki min mantorii'on yeeso Tiitus tabbitinaama ɗum goonga.
47007015	Yidde nde Tiitus yiɗi'on jooni ɓurii nde ndenno, to o nyumii no tokkirɗon ko ɗum wi'i'on, e no njaɓɓoriiɗonmo nder mangu e faamanki.
47007016	E mi nana belɗum ngam e mi hoolii'on e ɓernde go'o.
47008001	Too, bandiraaɓe am, jooni e min ngiɗi andon caahu ɗum Allah hokki tokkuɓe Yeesu gonɓe Makidooniya.
47008002	Koo nde ɓe poondiraama torra kalluka, ɗonmaa e ɓe nder dullere kallunde, fuu e non welwelo maɓɓe mango waɗii ɓe kokkii ballal mangal.
47008003	Mi ceydake ɓe kokkii ballal no ɓe mbaawi hokkuki, haa maa ko ɓuri non. Nder yidde ɓerɗe maɓɓe,
47008004	ɓe torakemin naa' seɗɗa min alaɓe ɓe ngaɗa jungo nder kuugal walluki yimɓe Allah gonɓe Urucaliima.
47008005	Ɓe ngaɗii ko ɓuri nyumo amin. Arande ɓe kokkii Joomiraawo ko'e maɓɓe, nden minon maa ɓe kokkiimin ko'e maɓɓe no Allah yiɗi.
47008006	Nde Tiitus fuɗɗi kuugal hawrutuki ballal to mooɗon, min torakemo o so''oo to mooɗon o yottinangal.
47008007	Too, on ngaɗii boɗɗum nder koo ɗume, waato nder hoolaaki Yeesu, e metuki boɗɗum, e anduki goonga, e yidde walluki, e yidde nde ngiɗɗonmin. Non maa e min ngiɗi ngaɗon boɗɗum nder nga'al kuugal walluki.
47008008	Naa' e mi wi'a doole ngaɗɗon non. Mi hokku'on habaru ballal mangal ngal woɓɓe mballi ngam mi anda koo yidde nde ngiɗɗon woɓɓe nde goonga.
47008009	Ngam on andi ko Joomiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu waɗani'on ngam yidde maako. Koo nde o diskuɗo, ngam mooɗon o warti mo walanaa, ngam laawol dullere maako ngarton riskuɓe.
